detailed_translations.english: as different as possible from something else
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

name: dystrophy
trans: 营养障碍； 营养不良

sentences.english: In fleck corneal dystrophy, the lesion only involved stroma, epithelium and endothelium levels were normal.
sentences.chinese: 斑点状角膜营养不良病变仅累及基质层，而角膜上皮层及内皮层正常；

sentences.english: Bell palsy (a type of neuritis) paralyzes the muscles of one side of the face. Muscular dystrophy causes paralysis by attacking muscle.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔氏麻痹（神经炎的一种）引起面部一侧的肌肉瘫痪。肌营养不良侵袭肌肉也能导致瘫痪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 营养障碍； 营养不良

name: pack
trans: 打包，收拾；包装，包裹；塞满

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people packed into the mosque.
sentences.chinese: 成百上千的人挤进了清真寺。

sentences.english: Send away for your free information pack today.
sentences.chinese: 今天就来函索取免费资料包吧。

detailed_translations.english: to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere
something wrapped in paper or packed in a box and then sent by post or taken somewhere

name: pollutant
trans: 污染物质， 有害物质

sentences.english: a dumping ground for toxic pollutants
sentences.chinese: 有毒污染物堆放场

detailed_translations.english: a substance that makes air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty, and is caused by cars, factories etc

sentences.english: She stood nervously in the wings waiting for her cue.
sentences.chinese: 她紧张地站在台侧等待出场的提示。

detailed_translations.english: an action or event that is a signal for something else to happen
to give someone a sign that it is the right moment for them to speak or do something, especially during a performance

name: enroll
trans: 入学； 登记； 加入； 招收

sentences.english: You need to enroll before the end of August.
sentences.chinese: 你必须在八月底前注册。

detailed_translations.english: to officially arrange to join a school, university, or course, or to arrange for someone else to do this

name: infringe
trans: 侵犯， 侵害； 违背， 触犯； 干涉， 干扰

sentences.english: A backup copy of a computer program does not infringe copyright.
sentences.chinese: 计算机程序的备份不侵犯版权。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that is against a law or someone’s legal rights

sentences.english: However, after three weeks of cold exposure, body weight began to stabilise.
sentences.chinese: 不过，暴露在寒冷中三周后，体重就开始稳定下来。

sentences.english: But these will not stabilise levels of atmospheric carbon dioxide — only slow the rate of increase.
sentences.chinese: 但是这无法稳定大气中的二氧化碳水平——而只能降低增加的速率。

name: entertainment
trans: 招待， 款待； 娱乐； 供消遣的事物

sentences.english: The town provides a wide choice of entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 该镇提供各式各样的娱乐活动。

sentences.english: There will be live entertainment (= performed then, not recorded ) throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 现场表演将持续一整天。

sentences.english: The dolphins give good entertainment value (= a lot of amusement and interest ).
sentences.chinese: 海豚具有很高的娱乐价值。

detailed_translations.chinese: 娱乐， 文娱节目， 表演会； 招待， 款待， 请客
detailed_translations.english: things such as films, television, performances etc that are intended to amuse or interest people

sentences.english: She produces legal documents for a downtown Seattle law firm.
sentences.chinese: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper that has official information on it
to write about something, film it, or take photographs of it, in order to record information about it

name: availability
trans: 可利用性， 可得性； 利用的可能性； 可利用的人或物

sentences.english: the availability of cheap flights
sentences.chinese: 有廉价机票出售

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being at hand when needed

sentences.english: You have to take the top off to change the batteries .
sentences.chinese: 你得把顶盖拿掉才能更换电池。

sentences.english: When the red light comes on, you should recharge the battery .
sentences.chinese: 红灯亮起的时候你就应该给电池充电了。

sentences.english: The car’s got a flat battery .
sentences.chinese: 汽车的蓄电池没电了。

sentences.english: a battery-operated hairdryer
sentences.chinese: 使用电池的吹风机

detailed_translations.english: an object that provides a supply of electricity for something such as a radio, car, or toy

sentences.english: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.chinese: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.english: pictures of starving children
sentences.chinese: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.english: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

detailed_translations.english: to suffer or die because you do not have enough to eat

sentences.english: Bricks are made from clay.
sentences.chinese: 砖是用黏土制成的。

detailed_translations.chinese: [土壤] 粘土；泥土；肉体；似黏土的东西
detailed_translations.english: a type of heavy sticky earth that can be used for making pots, bricks etc

name: promote
trans: 促进； 提升； 促销

sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

name: attack
trans: 进攻； 抨击； 突然发作

sentences.english: a bomb attack
sentences.chinese: 炸弹袭击

sentences.english: a knife attack
sentences.chinese: 持刀攻击

sentences.english: an arson attack
sentences.chinese: 纵火袭击

sentences.english: victims of racial attacks
sentences.chinese: 种族袭击的受害者

detailed_translations.chinese: 攻击， 进攻； 突然发作
detailed_translations.english: an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place

sentences.english: his humour and charm
sentences.chinese: 他的幽默感和魅力

sentences.english: Greg’s feeble attempt at humour
sentences.chinese: 格雷格干巴巴的幽默

sentences.english: English humour
sentences.chinese: 英国式幽默

sentences.english: It’s vital to have a sense of humor in this job.
sentences.chinese: 做这份工作必须具备幽默感。

sentences.english: The host puts the contestants at ease with his own brand of humour .
sentences.chinese: 主持人以他别具一格的幽默让参赛者放松心情。

sentences.english: He showed flashes of humor that delighted the audience.
sentences.chinese: 他不时冒出些幽默话逗得观众忍俊不禁。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or tendency to think that things are funny, or funny things you say that show you have this ability
to do what someone wants or to pretend to agree with them so that they do not become upset

sentences.english: an impressive building with a red brick facade
sentences.chinese: 正面为红砖的雄伟建筑

detailed_translations.english: the front of a building, especially a large and important one

name: distribute
trans: 分发， 分配， 分送； 散布， 分布； 分类， 分区

sentences.english: a man distributing leaflets to passers-by
sentences.chinese: 一个向路人派发传单的男子

sentences.english: Make sure that your weight is evenly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 注意让你的重量分布均匀。

detailed_translations.english: to share things among a group of people, especially in a planned way

name: attach
trans: 系， 贴； 认为有重要性； 使附属， 附加

sentences.english: When approving a merger, the commission can attach conditions.
sentences.chinese: 委员会在批准公司合并时可能附加条件。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缚， 系， 贴， 附加； 使依恋， 使喜爱； 使附属； 认为有
detailed_translations.english: to allow something to happen, but only if someone agrees to do a particular thing or accept a particular idea

name: graphic
trans: 文字的； 生动的， 形象的； 绘画的， 图表的

sentences.english: ...fine and graphic arts.
sentences.chinese: …美术与制图艺术。

detailed_translations.chinese: 生动的， 形象的； 绘画的， 文字的， 图表的
detailed_translations.english: Graphic means concerned with drawing or pictures, especially in publishing, industry, or computing

sentences.english: a job creation scheme
sentences.chinese: 创造就业机会的计划

detailed_translations.chinese: 创造， 创建； 创造的作品， 产物； 宇宙， 天地万物
detailed_translations.english: the act of creating something

name: legislation
trans: 法律， 法规； 立法

sentences.english: This is a very important piece of legislation (= law ).
sentences.chinese: 这是一条非常重要的法规。

detailed_translations.english: a law or set of laws

name: inclination
trans: 爱好； 趋势； 倾斜

sentences.english: My natural inclination was to say no.
sentences.chinese: 我生性爱说“不”。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that makes you want to do something

name: fraught
trans: 充满…的； 担心的， 烦恼的

sentences.english: The earliest operations employing this technique were fraught with dangers.
sentences.chinese: 最早采用这一技术的手术充满了危险。

detailed_translations.english: If a situation or action is fraught with problems or risks, it is filled with them

name: ingredient
trans: 组成部分， 成分； 原料； 要素， 因素

sentences.english: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

name: stereoscopic
trans: 有立体视觉的； 有立体效果的
刺， 戳； 黏贴， 黏住； 卡住， 陷住

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["stereoscopic vision"]}
sentences.chinese: 立体视觉

detailed_translations.chinese: 有立体视觉的； 有立体效果的
detailed_translations.english: a stereoscopic picture, photograph etc appears solid when you look at it through a special machine

detailed_translations.chinese: 刺， 戳； 黏贴， 黏住； 卡住， 陷住

sentences.english: A small car is more economical to run.
sentences.chinese: 开小型汽车比较省油。

sentences.english: good-quality clothes at economical prices
sentences.chinese: 物美价廉的衣服

detailed_translations.english: using money, time, goods etc carefully and without wasting any

sentences.english: Your essay is good, you just need to polish it a bit.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章不错，只要稍加润色就可以了。

detailed_translations.english: to improve a piece of writing, a speech etc by making slight changes to it before it is completely finished
a liquid, powder, or other substance that you rub into a surface to make it smooth and shiny

sentences.english: microscopes and other optical instruments
sentences.chinese: 显微镜和其他光学仪器

detailed_translations.english: relating to machines or processes which are concerned with light, images, or the way we see things

name: fashion
trans: 方式； 流行款式； 时装

sentences.english: Their music will never go out of fashion (= stop being fashionable ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Please leave the building in an orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 请大家有秩序地离开大楼。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

detailed_translations.english: something that is popular or thought to be good at a particular time

name: insurance
trans: 保险； 保险费； 保险业

sentences.english: Your father took out insurance to cover the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲购买了抵押借款保险。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement with a company in which you pay them money, especially regularly, and they pay the costs if something bad happens, for example if you become ill or your car is damaged

sentences.english: a deer dazzled by the headlights
sentences.chinese: 被车头灯光照得目眩的鹿

sentences.english: As children, we were dazzled by my uncle’s good looks and charm.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我叔叔的英俊外表和魅力令我们倾倒。

detailed_translations.english: if a very bright light dazzles you, it stops you from seeing properly for a short time

name: principle
trans: 原则， 原理； 规范， 准则； 基本信念， 信条

sentences.english: Schools try to teach children a set of principles.
sentences.chinese: 学校设法教给孩子们一套道德准则。

sentences.english: He’s got no principles at all!
sentences.chinese: 他毫无道德准则！

sentences.english: It’s against my principles to accept gifts from clients.
sentences.chinese: 收受客户礼物违背我的原则。

detailed_translations.english: a moral rule or belief about what is right and wrong, that influences how you behave

name: medical
trans: 医学的， 医疗的； 内科的

sentences.english: medical research
sentences.chinese: 医学研究

sentences.english: medical staff
sentences.chinese: 医务人员

sentences.english: a medical student
sentences.chinese: 医科学生

sentences.english: a patient’s medical history
sentences.chinese: 患者的病史

sentences.english: medical or surgical treatment
sentences.chinese: 内科或外科疗法

detailed_translations.english: relating to medicine and the treatment of disease or injury

sentences.english: Through controlling the each step in process of darkroom disposal, improve the quality of the sciagram efficently.
sentences.chinese: 通过对暗室处理过程中各个环节的控制，有效提高射线底片的质量。

sentences.english: In Chicago I took pictures of landmarks like the Water Tower and Lake Shore Drive, and after we got home I developed them in my darkroom (photography was another of my hobbies).
sentences.chinese: 在芝加哥我拍摄了很多地标照片，诸如水塔和湖滨道，回家后我在暗房里把照片冲冼出来（摄影是我的另一项爱好）。

sentences.english: This experience, eerie at first, but now utterly familiar, has come to feel appropriate for a photographic adventure, like the adjustment of one's eyes, and perspective, upon entry into a darkroom.
sentences.chinese: 这样的经历一开始让我觉得有点怪，不过现在却非常熟稔，这对我的摄影历险非常适合，类似于刚进入暗房时人的眼睛和视角要先适应一下。

detailed_translations.english: a special room with only red light or no light, where film from a camera is made into photographs

sentences.english: The shorts are so small I can't fit my thighs into any of them.
sentences.chinese: 短裤太小了，我的大腿塞不进去。

detailed_translations.english: the top part of your leg, between your knee and your hip

name: tedious
trans: 冗长乏味的， 单调的

sentences.english: The audience coughed down the tedious speaker.
sentences.chinese: 听众用咳嗽声阻挠演讲人的沉闷发言。

sentences.english: There's no point in labouring at a tedious task.
sentences.chinese: 辛苦地干单调乏味的工作没有意义。

name: source
trans: 来源， 出处； 源头， 发源地； 根源， 起源

sentences.english: They get their money from various sources.
sentences.chinese: 他们从各种途径弄到钱。

detailed_translations.english: a thing, place, activity etc that you get something from

name: smell
trans: 散发…的气味； 闻到， 嗅到

sentences.english: I can smell burning.
sentences.chinese: 我闻到烧焦的气味。

sentences.english: Can you smell something?
sentences.chinese: 你闻到什么气味了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to notice or recognize a particular smell
the quality that people and animals recognize by using their nose

sentences.english: If you have time – please answer a comment of another participant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有时间-请答复另外一个参与者的评论。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is taking part in an activity or event

name: domestic
trans: 本国的； 家庭的； 驯养的

sentences.english: ...over 100 domestic flights a day to 30 leading U.S. destinations.
sentences.chinese: …每天飞往美国30个主要目的地的100多个国内航班。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or happening in one particular country and not involving any other countries

name: initiate
trans: 开始， 创造， 发起； 接纳， 让…加入

sentences.english: They have decided to initiate legal proceedings against the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定向该报提起法律诉讼。

sentences.english: Intellectuals have initiated a debate on terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 知识分子就恐怖主义发起了辩论。

detailed_translations.chinese: 开始， 创造， 发起； 使初步了解； 接纳， 让…加入
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something important to start, such as an official process or a new plan
someone who has been allowed to join a particular organization, club, or group and has been taught its secrets

sentences.english: The castle dates from the 1500s and has a rustic charm, reminiscent of a grand West Country manor.
sentences.chinese: 城堡的历史可追溯到1500年代，极富乡村魅力，令人回忆起西南各郡的庄园。

sentences.english: Dragon manor senior clubs set the function of advanced SPA, chess room, restaurant, conference room and other areas.
sentences.chinese: 龙脉庄园高级会所集合了高级SPA、棋牌室、餐厅、会议室等多种功能区域。

detailed_translations.english: a big old house with a large area of land around it

sentences.english: During dry place, keep within the new air circulation, avoid rain and insolate, also can use some detergent to remove odor.
sentences.chinese: 在晾置期间，要保持新居内空气的流通，避免雨淋及曝晒，还可采用一些去除气味的清洁剂。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid or powder used for washing clothes, dishes etc

name: terrestrial
trans: 陆地的， 陆生的， 陆栖的； 地球的

sentences.english: ...terrestrial life forms.
sentences.chinese: …地球上的生命形态。

detailed_translations.chinese: 地球的；陆地的，[生物] 陆生的；人间的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth rather than to the moon or other  planets

sentences.english: Small blockages or collapses of the canal would choke the intricate irrigation networks.
sentences.chinese: 运河的小堵塞或倒塌都会阻塞整个负责的灌溉网络。

sentences.english: In the United States, by contrast, 41% goes for agriculture, almost all of it for irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 与之相比，美国全年41%的水投向了农业，并几乎全都用在了灌溉上。

sentences.english: Spray irrigation sprinkling water over land to be used for crops. often used to dispose of wastewater from sewage treatment plants.
sentences.chinese: 喷洒灌溉，喷灌把水喷洒于准备种植作物的土地上。常常使用经过污水厂处理过的废水。

sentences.english: The document was compiled by the Department of Health.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件是由卫生部汇编的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编
detailed_translations.english: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc

sentences.english: She didn’t have the courage to admit to her deception.
sentences.chinese: 她没有勇气承认自己的欺骗行为。

sentences.english: He was convicted of obtaining money by deception .
sentences.chinese: 他被判犯有诈骗钱财罪。

detailed_translations.english: the act of deliberately making someone believe something that is not true

sentences.english: Despite her eighty years, Elsie was full of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 尽管已80岁了，埃尔茜依然充满活力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活力； 生机， 元气
detailed_translations.english: great energy and eagerness to do things

sentences.english: There have been generous donations from EU funds.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟基金给予了慷慨的捐款。

detailed_translations.english: something, especially money, that you give to a person or an organ-ization in order to help them

name: familiarise
trans: 使熟悉， 使通晓； 使家喻户晓

sentences.english: Here again, of course, you can always try some practice tests to familiarise yourself with the format.
sentences.chinese: 当然,为了熟悉考试形式你也可以做一些测试练习。

sentences.english: I began to familiarise myself with my new body: the grill, the bread bin, the speaker and the spring mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 我开始熟悉自己的新身体：烤盘、面包箱、话筒和弹簧装置。

sentences.english: The reason you want to familiarise yourself with the camera is that when you read the manual and it refers to a button with a star and moon you will know where it is.
sentences.chinese: 要熟悉相机的理由是，当你阅读说明书时，对上面提到的按键你都知道在哪里。

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

name: radiate
trans: 发光； 发热； 辐射

sentences.english: He radiated calm confidence.
sentences.chinese: 他身上散发着沉稳自信的气质。

detailed_translations.chinese: 辐射；传播；流露；发射；广播
detailed_translations.english: if someone radiates a feeling, or if it radiates from them, it is very easy to see that this is how they feel

sentences.english: I’m not joking. Those were his actual words.
sentences.chinese: 我没开玩笑，那都是他的原话。

sentences.english: I know Germany won, but I can’t tell you the actual score.
sentences.chinese: 我知道德国队胜了，但我不知道确切的比分。

sentences.english: Interest is only charged on the actual amount borrowed.
sentences.chinese: 利息只按实际借款额收取。

sentences.english: In actual fact (= really  ) , there is little evidence to support the allegations.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，这些指控几乎没有证据支持。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is real or exact

sentences.english: Her heart was pounding in her chest.
sentences.chinese: 她的心在胸口怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: a hairy chest
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的胸部

detailed_translations.english: the front part of your body between your neck and your stomach

sentences.english: a beautiful campus in New England
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰的一个美丽校园

detailed_translations.english: the land and buildings of a university or college, including the buildings where students live

name: ultimate
trans: 最好的事物， 极品， 精华

sentences.english: The ultimate outcome of the experiment cannot be predicted.
sentences.chinese: 试验的最后结果无法预测。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s ultimate aim is their main and most important aim, that they hope to achieve in the future

name: caustic
trans: 腐蚀性的； 讽刺的， 挖苦的

sentences.english: caustic soda (= a chemical used for cleaning things )
sentences.chinese: 苛性钠，烧碱

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 腐蚀性的；[化学] 苛性的；刻薄的；焦散的
detailed_translations.english: a caustic substance can burn through things by chemical action

detailed_translations.chinese: [助剂] 腐蚀剂；苛性钠；焦散曲线

name: verbal
trans: 口头的； 言辞的， 文字的， 词语的； 动词的

sentences.english: verbal skills
sentences.chinese: 语言技能

detailed_translations.chinese: 口头的； 用言辞的， 用文字的； 动词的
detailed_translations.english: spoken rather than written

name: develop
trans: 发展； 生长， 形成； 开发

sentences.english: Knowledge in the field of genetics has been developing very rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学领域的知识发展非常迅速。

sentences.english: Corsica has developed its economy around the tourist industry.
sentences.chinese: 科西嘉岛的经济是围绕旅游业发展起来的。

sentences.english: exercises to develop muscle strength
sentences.chinese: 锻炼肌肉力量的运动

sentences.english: He had developed a certain affection for me.
sentences.chinese: 他对我产生了一些好感。

sentences.english: The land was developed for low-cost housing.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地被开发建造廉价住宅。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually grow or become bigger, more advanced, stronger, etc.; to make sth do this

sentences.english: ...the family's ancestral home in southern Germany.
sentences.chinese: …这一家在德国南部的祖宅。

detailed_translations.english: You use ancestral to refer to a person's family in former times, especially when the family is important and has property or land that they have had for a long time

sentences.english: a house in a pleasant suburban district
sentences.chinese: 地处宜人郊区的一幢房屋

detailed_translations.english: an area of a town or the countryside, especially one with particular features

name: arboreal
trans: 树木的； 栖于树木的

sentences.english: ...arboreal marsupials which resemble monkeys.
sentences.chinese: ...类猴树栖有袋动物。

detailed_translations.english: relating to trees, or living in trees

sentences.english: The overall cost of the exhibition was £400,000.
sentences.chinese: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.english: The overall result is an increase in population.
sentences.chinese: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.english: An overall winner and a runner-up were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.english: We don’t want all the details now, just the overall picture.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们不需要全部细节，只要知道大致的情况。

detailed_translations.english: heavy cotton trousers with a piece covering your chest, held up by pieces of cloth that go over your shoulders
considering or including everything

name: assume
trans: 假定， 设想； 承担， 就

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们几乎可以肯定，利率很快会再次上调。

sentences.english: When it got to midnight and Paul was still not back, I began to assume the worst (=  think that the worst possible thing had happened  ) .
sentences.chinese: 到午夜时保罗还没回来，我就开始往最坏的地方想了。

sentences.english: Whoever they appoint will assume responsibility for all financial matters.
sentences.chinese: 不管他们任命的是谁，他都要负责财务方面的所有事务。

sentences.english: These relationships assume great importance in times of crisis.
sentences.chinese: 在危急时刻，这些关系显得尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is true, although you do not have definite proof

sentences.english: salt and pepper
sentences.chinese: 盐和胡椒粉

detailed_translations.english: a powder that is used to add a hot taste to food
to add pepper to food

sentences.english: Nancy wondered whether it was her destiny to live in England and marry Melvyn.
sentences.chinese: 南希想知道她生活在英格兰又嫁给梅尔文是不是命运的安排。

sentences.english: We are masters of our own destiny.
sentences.chinese: 我们是自己命运的主人。

detailed_translations.english: the things that will happen to someone in the future, especially those that cannot be changed or controlled

sentences.english: a doctoral thesis
sentences.chinese: 博士论文

detailed_translations.english: done as part of work for the university degree of doctor

name: concept
trans: 概念， 观念； 设想

sentences.english: a new concept in business travel
sentences.chinese: 商务旅行的新理念

sentences.english: our basic concepts of decent human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 我们对得体的人类行为的基本观念

sentences.english: It’s very simple, once you grasp the concept .
sentences.chinese: 你一旦掌握了这个概念之后就很简单了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概念， 观念； 设想
detailed_translations.english: an idea of how something is, or how something should be done

name: resistant
trans: 抵抗的， 有抵抗力的

sentences.english: Some people are very resistant to the idea of exercise.
sentences.chinese: 一些人对锻炼的主意非常抵制。

detailed_translations.english: not damaged or affected by something

name: millennium
trans: 一千年， 千禧年； 太平盛世

sentences.english: people who have inhabited this land for millennia
sentences.chinese: 在这片土地上已经居住了数千年的人们

detailed_translations.chinese: 千年期，千禧年；一千年，千年纪念；太平盛世，黄金时代
detailed_translations.english: a period of 1,000 years

name: stark
trans: 光秃秃的， 赤裸的； 荒凉的； 完全的

sentences.chinese: 在寒冷的曙光中，城堡看上去了无生气，令人生畏。

sentences.english: the stark beauty of New Mexico
sentences.chinese: 新墨西哥州的荒凉之美

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全的；荒凉的；刻板的；光秃秃的；朴实的
detailed_translations.english: very plain in appearance, with little or no colour or decoration

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全；明显地；突出地；质朴地
detailed_translations.english: completely crazy

detailed_translations.chinese: (Stark)人名；(俄、罗)斯塔尔克；(英、芬、法、瑞典)斯塔克；(德)施塔克

sentences.english: She sat there staring into space (= looking for a long time at nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 她坐在那里，出神地凝视前方。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something or someone for a long time without moving your eyes, for example because you are surprised, angry, or bored

name: refundable
trans: 可退还的， 可归还的， 可偿还的

sentences.english: A refundable deposit is payable on arrival.
sentences.chinese: 货一到就把可退还的押金退给你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可退还的， 可归还的， 可偿还的
detailed_translations.english: A refundable payment will be paid back to you in certain circumstances

name: enhance
trans: 提高， 增强， 增进

sentences.english: Good lighting will enhance any room.
sentences.chinese: 良好的照明能给房间增色不少。

sentences.english: The publicity has enhanced his reputation.
sentences.chinese: 这次宣传提高了他的声誉。

detailed_translations.english: to improve something

trans: 大会， 会议； 惯例， 常规， 习俗； 公约， 协定

sentences.english: a teachers’ convention
sentences.chinese: 教师大会

sentences.english: the city’s new convention center
sentences.chinese: 该市新建的会议中心

sentences.english: a convention for science fiction fans
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说迷的集会

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting for people who belong to the same profession or organization or who have the same interests

sentences.english: The antiseptic properties of copper sulphate have never been questioned.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸铜具有防腐性，这是不曾有过问题的。

sentences.english: Polyurethane is a kind of excellent anticorrosion material, material has excellent antiseptic effect on metal substrate.
sentences.chinese: 聚胺又是一种优良的防腐材料，对金属底材具有优异的防腐作用。

sentences.english: Don't just give money, go volunteer somewhere so you can have direct interactions with people. Your life is too antiseptic and it is making you a bit boring.
sentences.chinese: 不要只是捐钱，去某个地方做志愿者吧，这样你就可以和别人直接互动。你的生活太“防腐”了，你开始觉得有点无聊了吧。

detailed_translations.english: a medicine that you put onto a wound to stop it from becoming infected

sentences.english: Like fibre, calcium binds with fat molecules and helps flush them out through the intestine.
sentences.chinese: 像纤维、钙可以和脂肪分子结合，帮助他们彻底的通过肠道。

sentences.english: What you eat and drink, from childhood on, is critical to the amount of calcium in your bones.
sentences.chinese: 从儿童时期起你吃的和喝的东西对于你的骨骼里的钙质量就有重大的影响。

sentences.english: What you eat and drink, from childhood on, is critical to the amount of calcium in your bones.
sentences.chinese: 从儿童时期起，你所吃的食物和饮用的饮料，对骨骼中的钙含量都是很关键的。

detailed_translations.english: a silver-white metal that helps to form teeth, bones, and  chalk  . It is a chemical  element  : symbol Ca

sentences.english: Her country suffered through her refusal to accept change.
sentences.chinese: 她的国家因为她拒绝接受变革而受了害。

detailed_translations.english: when you say firmly that you will not do, give, or accept something

sentences.english: She paid for her purchases and left.
sentences.chinese: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.english: I enclose my receipt as proof of purchase .
sentences.chinese: 我附上小票作为购物凭证。

sentences.english: She made two purchases from my stall.
sentences.chinese: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在网上买保险。

detailed_translations.english: something you buy, or the act of buying it

sentences.english: We could see a boat about a mile from shore.
sentences.chinese: 我们看见离岸边大约一英里的地方有一艘船。

sentences.english: Only a few survivors reached the shore.
sentences.chinese: 仅有几个生还者到达岸边。

sentences.english: She began to swim to shore.
sentences.chinese: 她开始朝岸边游去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支撑，使稳住；用支柱撑住

name: teem
trans: 倾泻； 充满， 遍布

sentences.chinese: 一年的大部分时间里这个地方都挤满了游客。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that a place is teeming with people or animals, you mean that it is crowded and the people and animals are moving around a lot

sentences.english: a stylish woman in her forties
sentences.chinese: 一名40多岁的时髦女子

sentences.english: Jack is quite stylish.
sentences.chinese: 杰克很时髦。

sentences.english: a stylish restaurant in the West End
sentences.chinese: 位于伦敦西区的一家有格调的饭店

detailed_translations.chinese: 时髦的；现代风格的；潇洒的
detailed_translations.english: attractive in a fashionable way

sentences.english: a triple bypass operation
sentences.chinese: 接三通管的手术

sentences.english: Interstate 8 bypasses the town to the north.
sentences.chinese: 八号州际公路绕城向北而行。

detailed_translations.english: a tube that allows gas or liquid to flow around something rather than through it
to go around a town or other busy place rather than through it

sentences.english: Both candidates received an equal number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 两位候选人的得票数相等。

sentences.english: I’m not sure he’s equal to the task.
sentences.chinese: 我不确定他是否能胜任这项任务。

sentences.english: He treats all his staff as equals.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有员工都一视同仁。

sentences.english: Two plus two equals four.
sentences.chinese: 二加二等于四。

detailed_translations.english: the same in size, number, amount, value etc as something else
someone who is as important, intelligent etc as you are, or who has the same rights and opportunities as you do
to be exactly the same in size, number, or amount as something else

name: optometrist
trans: 验光师， 视力测定者

sentences.english: One evaluation has shown that 70% of the people who received the new glasses corrected their own vision at least as well, if not better, than a trained optometrist.
sentences.chinese: 评价表明，在得到新型眼镜的人中，有70％的人最起码与一位训练有素的验光配镜师一样很好地矫正了其视力。

detailed_translations.english: someone who tests people’s eyes and orders glasses for them

sentences.english: But the brittleness of silicon limits its uses.
sentences.chinese: 但是，硅的脆性也限制了其应用范围。

sentences.english: The company pioneered the use of the silicon chip.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司首先使用硅片。

sentences.english: They consist of silicon, sand and metal so there’s no any connection to dinosaurs … Besides, we may see corrosion on some of them.
sentences.chinese: 它们是由硅砂和金属构成的，和恐龙蛋没有任何关系……除此之外，我们还能看到它们上面的腐蚀的部分。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that exists as a solid or as a powder and is used to make glass, bricks, and parts for computers. It is a chemical element: symbol Si

name: fund
trans: 为…提供资金， 给…拨款

sentences.english: The fund was set up to try to save the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 设立基金以挽救大教堂。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is collected and kept for a particular purpose

sentences.english: the force of gravity
sentences.chinese: 重力

sentences.english: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

detailed_translations.english: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet

name: moderation
trans: 温和， 中庸； 适度， 合理

sentences.english: Some people think drinking in moderation can prevent heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 有些人认为适量饮酒可以预防心脏病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 温和， 中庸； 适度， 合理

sentences.english: ...the largest recipient of U.S. foreign aid.
sentences.chinese: …最大的美国对外援助接受方。

detailed_translations.english: someone who receives something

name: commonwealth
trans: [the C-] 英联邦； 联合体

sentences.english: ...the Commonwealth of Australia.
sentences.chinese: …澳大利亚联邦。

detailed_translations.english: used in the official names of some countries, groups of countries, or parts of countries

sentences.english: A University of Muenster team drew up a marsupial family tree based on DNA.
sentences.chinese: 明斯特的一所大学的研究小组构建了一株有袋类动物家族的DNA基因树图谱。

sentences.chinese: 小袋鼠是像袋鼠一样有袋的哺乳类动物并食用含有大量制备的食物。

sentences.chinese: 袋狼以塔斯马尼亚虎知名，它是现代社会最知名的食肉有袋动物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有袋动物 a有袋动物的
detailed_translations.english: an animal such as a  kangaroo  which carries its babies in a pocket of skin on its body

sentences.english: A thrush alighted on a branch of the pine tree.
sentences.chinese: 一只画眉落在这棵松树的一根树枝上。

detailed_translations.english: if a bird or insect alights on something, it stops flying and stands on it
burning

name: enfranchise
trans: 给予…政治权利； 解放

sentences.english: The company voted to enfranchise its 120 women members.
sentences.chinese: 公司投票决定给予其120名女员工选举权。

detailed_translations.chinese: 给予选举权；给予自治权；解放，释放
detailed_translations.english: to give a group of people the right to vote

sentences.english: leasing and other forms of business finance
sentences.chinese: 租赁及其他商业金融形式

sentences.english: Russia’s finance minister
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯财政部长

sentences.english: the world of high finance
sentences.chinese: 高级金融界

detailed_translations.chinese: 财政，金融；财源，财务情况
detailed_translations.english: the management of money by governments, large organizations etc
to provide money, especially a lot of money, to pay for something

sentences.english: We went for the bottle of whisky that we had stashed behind the bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 我们去取那瓶我们藏在书柜后面的威士忌。

detailed_translations.english: to store something secretly or safely somewhere
an amount of something that is kept in a secret place, especially money, weapons, or drugs

sentences.english: And operational downtime caused by reliability or performance problems can incur opportunity costs if customers are unable to access your system or the business is unable to do its work.
sentences.chinese: 并且如果顾客不能访问你的系统或业务不能进行工作，那么由可靠性或性能问题引起的运作停工就会招致机会成本。

detailed_translations.english: if you incur a cost, debt, or a fine, you have to pay money because of something you have done

name: inundate
trans: 淹没， 泛滥； 使不胜负荷， 使应接不暇

sentences.english: The tidal wave inundated vast areas of cropland.
sentences.chinese: 海啸淹没了大片农田。

detailed_translations.english: to cover an area with a large amount of water

name: studio
trans: 工作室； 摄影室； 练习室

sentences.english: a recording studio in Nashville
sentences.chinese: 在纳什维尔的一间录音室

sentences.english: a photographer’s studio
sentences.chinese: 摄影师的工作室

detailed_translations.english: a room where television and radio programmes are made and broadcast or where music is recorded

name: regulate
trans: 管制， 控制； 调节， 校准； 调整

sentences.english: People sweat to regulate their body heat.
sentences.chinese: 人出汗以调节体温。

detailed_translations.english: to make a machine or your body work at a particular speed, temperature etc

name: complementary
trans: 互补的； 补充的， 补足的

sentences.english: The computer and the human mind have different but complementary abilities.
sentences.chinese: 电脑与人脑各不相同，却又互为补充。

detailed_translations.english: complementary things go well together, although they are usually different

sentences.chinese: 叙述者：故事讲述的是一颗毫无偏见的心是怎样改变我们这个山谷的。

sentences.chinese: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.chinese: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

sentences.chinese: …法国文化部长杰克·朗和他的副手凯瑟琳·塔斯卡。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow area of water that reaches from the sea or a lake into the land

detailed_translations.chinese: 引进; 嵌入; 插入;

sentences.chinese: 我在三一学院教创意写作。

sentences.chinese: 他乘坐华盛顿－纽约的往返班机。

trans: 最初的， 初级的； 首要的， 基本的

sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.chinese: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 首要的， 主要的； 基本的； 最初的， 初级的

sentences.chinese: 有些岩石（像灰色的火山浮石）会布满气窝，这是岩石还在熔融态时，内部气体膨胀而成。

sentences.chinese: 早在公元前5000年，埃及人就在制作牙粉，其成分包含牛蹄粉灰、没药、粉状和烧焦了的蛋壳以及浮石。

sentences.chinese: 他总有安静自省的时候。

detailed_translations.english: the process of thinking deeply about your own thoughts, feelings, or behaviour

trans: 北欧人的； 北欧国家的

sentences.chinese: 北欧国家

sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.chinese: 我逐渐掌握了基本的音乐知识。

sentences.chinese: 她尽管接受了治疗，但健康状况还是不稳定。

sentences.chinese: 该剧的概念框架

detailed_translations.english: dealing with ideas, or based on them

sentences.chinese: 基督教承诺的永生

sentences.english: She’s an eternal optimist (= she always expects that good things will happen ).
sentences.chinese: 她永远是个乐观主义者。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for ever and having no end

name: barely
trans: 仅仅， 几乎不； 赤裸裸地， 无遮蔽地

sentences.chinese: 她几乎没有注意到他的存在。

sentences.english: Joe and his brother are barely on speaking terms.
sentences.chinese: 乔和他哥哥几乎不说话。

detailed_translations.english: almost not

sentences.chinese: 对占星术的普遍相信

name: clip
trans: 夹住， 扣住； 剪， 修剪
夹子， 回形针， 别针； 弹夹； 修剪； 剪报， 电影片断

sentences.english: a stack of bills clipped together
sentences.chinese: 夹在一起的一沓钞票

detailed_translations.english: to fasten something together or to be fastened together using a clip

name: crushing
trans: 惨重的， 毁灭性的； 压倒的， 决定性的

sentences.chinese: …自从他们在地方选举中遭到毁灭性的挫败以来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 惨重的， 毁灭性的； 压倒的， 决定性的

sentences.english: The plant absorbs nutrients from the soil.
sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸取养分。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical or food that provides what is needed for plants or animals to live and grow

sentences.english: The internet is an invaluable source of information.
sentences.chinese: 因特网是十分有价值的信息来源。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非常宝贵的， 极为贵重的， 无价的
detailed_translations.english: extremely useful

name: compact
trans: 紧密的，结实的；简明的；紧凑的

sentences.english: The compact design of the machine allows it to be stored easily.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器的设计小巧灵便，易于存放。

sentences.english: The students’ rooms were compact, with a desk, bed, and closet built in.
sentences.chinese: 学生的房间很小巧，配有一张书桌、一张床和一个壁橱。

detailed_translations.english: small, but arranged so that everything fits neatly into the space available – used to show approval
to press something together so that it becomes smaller or more solid
an official contract or agreement

name: outlaw
trans: 亡命之徒，逃犯，被剥夺法律权益者
宣布…为非法， 使…成为非法

sentences.english: Jesse was an outlaw, a bandit, a criminal.
sentences.chinese: 杰西曾是个逃犯、土匪、罪犯。

sentences.english: In some states gambling was outlawed.
sentences.chinese: 在一些州赌博被宣布为非法。

sentences.english: The German government has outlawed some fascist groups.
sentences.chinese: 德国政府已宣布一些法西斯团体为非法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 歹徒；罪犯；亡命之徒；被剥夺法律保护者
detailed_translations.english: someone who has done something illegal, and who is hiding in order to avoid punishment – used especially about criminals in the past

detailed_translations.chinese: 宣布…为不合法；将…放逐；剥夺…的法律保护
detailed_translations.english: When something is outlawed, it is made illegal

name: doom
trans: 毁灭； 厄运， 劫数

sentences.english: A sense of impending doom (= coming very soon ) gripped her.
sentences.chinese: 她心头被一种大难临头的感觉所笼罩。

sentences.english: The plan was doomed from the start.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划一开始就注定要失败。

detailed_translations.english: something very bad that is going to happen, or the fact that it is going to happen
to make someone or something certain to fail, die, be destroyed etc

name: possession
trans: 持有， 拥有； 所有权； 所有物， 财产， 财富； 领土

sentences.english: That information is not in our possession.
sentences.chinese: 那则信息不归我们所有。

sentences.chinese: 这幅画是怎么到你手上的？

sentences.english: The finance company now has possession of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这家金融公司目前拥有这所房子。

sentences.english: We didn’t take possession of (= get and start using ) the car until a few days after the auction.
sentences.chinese: 拍卖会过后几天我们才正式拿到那辆车。

detailed_translations.english: if something is in your possession, you own it, or you have obtained it from somewhere

name: denote
trans: 表示， 指示； 意味着

sentences.english: What does the word ‘curriculum’ denote that ‘course’ does not?
sentences.chinese: curriculum一词的哪些含义是course没有的？

detailed_translations.english: to mean something

sentences.english: These plants bloom in spring.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物在春天开花。

sentences.english: They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.
sentences.chinese: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快。

sentences.english: We noticed that these women began to bloom into greater self-confidence and even to shed unhealthy relationships. At that point we knew we were onto something big.
sentences.chinese: 我们注意到，这些妇女开始开花到更大的自信，甚至摆脱不健康的关系。在这一点上，我们知道我们正在做一件大事。

name: zone
trans: 地区， 地带； 区域

sentences.chinese: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.english: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

detailed_translations.english: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way

sentences.english: The surprise twists in the storyline are the film's greatest strength.
sentences.chinese: 故事情节的曲折离奇是这部电影的精彩之处。

detailed_translations.english: The storyline of a book, movie, or play is its story and the way in which it develops

name: propagate
trans: 繁殖， 增殖； 传播， 宣传， 使普及

sentences.english: The group launched a website to propagate its ideas.
sentences.chinese: 这个团体建了一个网站来宣扬他们的主张。

sentences.english: The plant can be propagated from seed.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物可由种子繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: to spread an idea, belief etc to many people

sentences.english: orthodox medical treatments
sentences.chinese: 传统疗法

sentences.english: He challenged the orthodox views on education.
sentences.chinese: 他对传统的教育观念提出了质疑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正统的；传统的；惯常的；东正教的
detailed_translations.english: orthodox ideas, methods, or behaviour are accepted by most people to be correct and right

sentences.english: The way to bring cost down is to industrialise much of the process.
sentences.chinese: 降低成本的方法是将这个过程的大部分工业化。

sentences.english: It took the west 300 years to industrialise and build a mature society with strong institutions. And even now serious inequalities and social tension remain.
sentences.chinese: 西方花了300年来完成工业化，建立起强大制度构建的成熟社会，而甚至到现在严峻的不平等和社会紧张依然存在。

name: keystone
trans: 拱顶石； 基础， 主旨

sentences.english: The government's determination to beat inflation has so far been the keystone of its economic policy.
sentences.chinese: 政府对通货膨胀的坚决抑制迄今为止一直是其经济政策的根本。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拱顶石； 基础， 主旨
detailed_translations.english: the large central stone in an arch that keeps the other stones in position

name: combination
trans: 结合， 联合； 化合

sentences.english: a combination nightclub and café
sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

name: obtain
trans: 获得， 得到； 通用， 流行

sentences.english: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通用， 流行； 存在
detailed_translations.english: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

name: curiosity
trans: 好奇， 好奇心； 稀奇或罕见的事物或人， 古玩

sentences.english: I opened the packet just to satisfy my curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 我打开包裹只是为了满足我的好奇心。

sentences.english: The news aroused a lot of curiosity among local people.
sentences.chinese: 这条消息在当地人中间引起了很大的好奇心。

sentences.english: She decided to follow him out of curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 她出于好奇决定跟踪他。

sentences.english: Margaret looked at him with curiosity .
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特好奇地看着他。

sentences.english: a man of immense intellectual curiosity
sentences.chinese: 求知欲极强的一个男人

sentences.english: It was idle curiosity that made me ask.
sentences.chinese: 我只是好奇地随便问了一下。

detailed_translations.english: the desire to know about something

sentences.english: Device used to crush or pulverise plastic or solid coating to powder form.
sentences.chinese: 压碎、研磨塑料或固体涂料成粉末形式的设备。

name: format
trans: 安排， 计划； 版式； 格式

sentences.english: The courses were run to a consistent format.
sentences.chinese: 这些课程的编排是有连续性的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计，安排；格式，样式，版式
detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a television show or meeting is organized or arranged
to organize the space on a computer  disk  so that information can be stored on it

name: sacrifice
trans: 牺牲，牺牲品；献祭，供奉；祭品，供物

sentences.english: The minister stressed the need for economic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 部长强调了在经济上作出牺牲的必要性。

sentences.english: The workforce were willing to make sacrifices in order to preserve jobs.
sentences.chinese: 雇员为了保住饭碗情愿作出牺牲。

sentences.english: She brought three children up single-handedly, often at great personal sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人把三个孩子带大，常常需要作出巨大的个人牺牲。

sentences.english: They made sacrifices to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 他们举行献祭以保丰收。

sentences.english: He sacrificed a promising career to look after his kids.
sentences.chinese: 他为了照看孩子牺牲了很有前途的事业。

detailed_translations.english: when you decide not to have something valuable, in order to get something that is more important
to willingly stop having something you want or doing something you like in order to get something more important

name: particular
trans: 特殊的，特别的；特定的，个别的；详细的
详情， 细目， 细节

sentences.english: In this particular case, no one else was involved.
sentences.chinese: 这件事没有其他人牵涉其中。

sentences.english: Most students choose one particular area for research.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生选择一个特定领域进行研究。

sentences.english: Marty’s very particular about his food.
sentences.chinese: 马蒂对食物很挑剔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特别的，特指的；讲究的；挑剔的，吹毛求疵的
detailed_translations.english: a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other

sentences.english: illegal drugs
sentences.chinese: 违禁药品

sentences.english: They were involved in illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 他们参与了非法活动。

detailed_translations.english: not allowed by the law

sentences.english: My corps ! your corps ! our corps ! maring corps !
sentences.chinese: 我的、你的、大家的海军陆战队！

sentences.english: The corps' corn in the corner is scorned by the stubborn corporation.
sentences.chinese: 军团在角落里的谷物受到了顽固的公司司（社团）的嘲笑。

detailed_translations.english: a trained army unit made of two or more  divisions (= groups of soldiers )

name: savour
trans: 品尝，品味；欣赏；体会，体味
味道， 风味； 情趣， 吸引力

sentences.english: She sipped her wine, savouring every drop.
sentences.chinese: 她慢慢地啜着酒，细细地品尝每一滴的滋味。

detailed_translations.chinese: 品尝，品味；欣赏；体会，体味
detailed_translations.english: to fully enjoy the taste or smell of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 味道， 风味； 情趣， 吸引力
detailed_translations.english: a pleasant taste or smell

sentences.english: He never even stopped to congratulate me.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至没有过来向我祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: formal recognition of the reformed church
sentences.chinese: 改革后的教会所获得的官方承认

sentences.english: a formal agreement between the countries
sentences.chinese: 两国间的正式协议

sentences.english: There is no formal structure for negotiating pay increases.
sentences.chinese: 加薪谈判没有正式的框架可循。

detailed_translations.english: made or done officially or publicly

sentences.english: a grassy bank
sentences.chinese: 长满青草的河岸

detailed_translations.english: covered with grass

name: cohesion
trans: 结合， 团结； 凝聚力

sentences.english: a sense of community and social cohesion
sentences.chinese: 社区意识和社会凝聚力

detailed_translations.chinese: 凝聚；结合；[力] 内聚力
detailed_translations.english: if there is cohesion among a group of people, a set of ideas etc, all the parts or members of it are connected or related in a reasonable way to form a whole

name: entertain
trans: 欢乐， 娱乐； 招待

sentences.english: A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.english: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.chinese: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.english: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?
sentences.chinese: 你招待客户有补助吗？

detailed_translations.english: to amuse or interest people in a way that gives them pleasure
(of plants) to grow again and produce new tissue, esp to produce new growth on bare ground

name: critical
trans: 批评的， 评论的； 危急的， 紧要的； 临界的； 挑剔的

sentences.english: He made some highly critical remarks.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了一些严厉的批判性言论。

detailed_translations.english: if you are critical, you criticize someone or something

sentences.english: Hepatitis A occurs sporadically and in epidemics worldwide, with a tendency for cyclic recurrences.
sentences.chinese: 甲型肝炎属偶发疾病，在世界各地流行，有循环复发的趋势。

name: principal
trans: 校长； 资本； 主角

sentences.english: His principal reason for making the journey was to visit his family.
sentences.chinese: 他那次旅程的首要目的是探访家人。

sentences.english: Teaching is her principal source of income.
sentences.chinese: 教书是她主要的收入来源。

sentences.english: the principal character in the book
sentences.chinese: 书里的主人公

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 负责人， 校长； 资本， 本金； 主要演员， 主角
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in charge of a school

sentences.english: Who could have perpetrated such a dreadful crime?
sentences.chinese: 谁会犯下如此可怕的罪行？

detailed_translations.english: to do something that is morally wrong or illegal

name: tend
trans: 倾向于， 趋于； 照料； 招待

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 照管， 照料， 护理
detailed_translations.english: to look after someone or something
if something tends to happen, it happens often and is likely to happen again

name: specimen
trans: 范例， 样品； 样本， 标本

sentences.english: a blood specimen
sentences.chinese: 血样

detailed_translations.english: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined

name: exotic
trans: 外来的； 奇异的； 醒目的， 吸引人的

sentences.english: exotic birds
sentences.chinese: 外国的奇异鸟类

sentences.english: exotic places
sentences.chinese: 有异国风情的地方

detailed_translations.chinese: 异国的；外来的；异国情调的
detailed_translations.english: something that is exotic seems unusual and interesting because it is related to a foreign country – use this to show approval

name: relief
trans: 减轻， 解除； 援救， 救济； 安慰； 缓合剂

sentences.english: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.english: money raised for the relief effort
sentences.chinese: 为赈灾筹集的钱款

detailed_translations.english: when something reduces someone’s pain or unhappy feelings

name: introduction
trans: 介绍； 传入， 引进； 导言， 绪论

sentences.english: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.chinese: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.english: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.english: the introduction of Buddhism to China nearly 2,000 years ago
sentences.chinese: 约2,000年前佛教传入中国

sentences.english: In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.chinese: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

detailed_translations.english: the act of formally telling two people each other’s names when they first meet

name: herbal
trans: 草本植物志； 药草书

sentences.english: ...herbal remedies for colds.
sentences.chinese: …感冒的草药疗法。

detailed_translations.english: Herbal means made from or using herbs

detailed_translations.chinese: 草本植物志； 药草书

sentences.english: distilled water
sentences.chinese: 蒸馏水

detailed_translations.english: to make a liquid such as water or alcohol more pure by heating it so that it becomes a gas and then letting it cool. Drinks such as  whisky  are made this way.

name: subscribe
trans: 订阅， 订购； 申请， 预订

sentences.english: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.chinese: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.english: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.english: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

sentences.english: new drug therapies
sentences.chinese: 新的药物疗法

sentences.english: radiation therapy for cancer treatment
sentences.chinese: 治疗癌症的放射疗法

detailed_translations.english: the treatment of an illness or injury over a fairly long period of time

name: concentration
trans: 集中； 专心， 专注； 浓缩， 浓度

sentences.english: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.chinese: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.english: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.english: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩； 浓度
detailed_translations.english: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time

name: velocity
trans: 速度， 速率； 迅速， 快速

sentences.english: the velocity of light
sentences.chinese: 光速

sentences.english: The speedboat reached a velocity of 120 mph.
sentences.chinese: 快艇的时速达到了120英里。

sentences.english: a high velocity bullet
sentences.chinese: 高速子弹

detailed_translations.english: the speed of something that is moving in a particular direction

sentences.english: When I lost, he commiserated with me.
sentences.chinese: 我失败时，他同情我。

detailed_translations.english: to express your sympathy for someone who is unhappy about something

name: interfere
trans: 干涉， 干扰， 妨碍

sentences.english: My daughter-in-law said that I was interfering, but I was only trying to help.
sentences.chinese: 我的儿媳说我多管闲事，但我只是想帮忙。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately get involved in a situation where you are not wanted or needed

name: encapsulate
trans: 装入胶囊； 压缩； 总结， 概述

sentences.english: The words of the song neatly encapsulate the mood of the country at that time.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌的歌词言简意赅地表现出国家当时的氛围。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装入胶囊； 压缩； 总结， 概述
detailed_translations.english: to express or show something in a short way

sentences.english: I thought the memorial was a fitting tribute to the President.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这座纪念碑恰如其分地表达了对总统的敬意。

sentences.english: new light fittings
sentences.chinese: 新款灯具配件

detailed_translations.english: right for a particular situation or occasion
an outside part of a piece of equipment that makes it possible to use or handle it

name: tolerate
trans: 容忍， 宽容； 容许， 承认

sentences.english: We simply will not tolerate vigilante groups on our streets.
sentences.chinese: 我们决不容许有自行惩办犯罪的组织出现在我们的街头。

sentences.english: This sort of behaviour will not be tolerated.
sentences.chinese: 这种行为是不能容许的。

detailed_translations.english: to allow people to do, say, or believe something without criticizing or punishing them

name: stack
trans: 把…叠成堆， 堆放于； 堆积， 堆起

sentences.english: stacks of dirty dishes
sentences.chinese: 一摞摞脏盘子

sentences.english: Mrs. Cathiard was stacking the clean bottles in crates.
sentences.chinese: 卡提亚夫人当时正在把干净的瓶子堆放到板条箱里。

detailed_translations.english: a neat pile of things
If you stack a number of things, you arrange them in neat piles

sentences.english: This tragic incident underlines the need for immediate action.
sentences.chinese: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

detailed_translations.english: to draw a line under a word to show that it is important

name: resent
trans: 愤恨； 对…表示愤恨， 感到气愤

sentences.english: Paul resented the fact that Carol didn’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 保罗非常气愤，因为卡萝尔不信任他。

detailed_translations.english: to feel angry or upset about a situation or about something that someone has done, especially because you think that it is not fair

name: mime
trans: 哑剧表演； 哑剧演员

sentences.english: The children learn through role-play, dance and mime.
sentences.chinese: 儿童通过角色表演、舞蹈和哑剧来学习。

sentences.english: They will perform a short mime later.
sentences.chinese: 稍后他们将表演一个哑剧小品。

sentences.english: a professional mime artist
sentences.chinese: 专业的哑剧表演艺术家

detailed_translations.english: the use of movements to express what you want to say without using words, or a play where the actors use only movements
to describe or express something, using movements not words

sentences.english: ...underlings who do the dirty work.
sentences.chinese: ...干肮脏勾当的走卒们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 部下， 下属， 手下
detailed_translations.english: an insulting word for someone who has a low rank – often used humorously

sentences.english: They demanded a free parliament and press.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求议会自由和新闻自由。

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who are elected to make a country’s laws and discuss important national affairs

name: ambiguous
trans: 含糊其辞的； 不明确的， 模棱两可的

sentences.english: The language in the Minister’s statement is highly ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 部长的声明措辞很含糊。

sentences.english: His role in the affair is ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 他在这起事件中的角色并不明确。

detailed_translations.english: that can be understood in more than one way; having different meanings

name: crack
trans: 破裂； 发出爆裂声； 重击； 崩溃， 瓦解

sentences.english: Don’t put boiling water in the glass or it will crack.
sentences.chinese: 不要把沸水倒进这个玻璃杯里，否则它会破裂的。

sentences.english: Concrete is liable to crack in very cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 在严寒的天气条件下混凝土可能会开裂。

sentences.english: He picked up a piece of rock and cracked it in half.
sentences.chinese: 他捡起一块石头，把它击碎成两半。

sentences.english: She fell and cracked a bone in her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她摔了一跤，结果一根腿骨骨折。

sentences.english: He cracked a couple of eggs into a pan.
sentences.chinese: 他往平底锅里打了几个鸡蛋。

detailed_translations.english: to break or to make something break, either so that it gets lines on its surface, or so that it breaks into pieces
a very narrow space between two things or two parts of something

name: bind
trans: 捆绑， 系； 约束； 凝结

sentences.english: The monks are bound by vows of silence.
sentences.chinese: 僧侣们必须遵守保持缄默的誓言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合；装订；有约束力；过紧
detailed_translations.english: if you are bound by an agreement, promise etc, you must do what you have agreed to do or promised to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 捆绑；困境；讨厌的事情；植物的藤蔓
detailed_translations.english: an annoying or difficult situation

sentences.english: a sugar cube
sentences.chinese: 一块方糖

sentences.english: an ice cube
sentences.chinese: 一小方块冰

sentences.english: Cut the meat into small cubes.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: a solid object with six equal square sides

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积
detailed_translations.english: to multiply a number by itself twice

sentences.english: She kicked at the crisp leaves at her feet.
sentences.chinese: 她踢着脚边松脆的树叶。

sentences.english: He stepped carefully through the crisp deep snow.
sentences.chinese: 他小心地走在松脆的、厚厚的雪地里。

detailed_translations.english: something that is crisp is hard, and makes a pleasant sound when you break it or crush it
a very thin flat round piece of potato that is cooked in oil and eaten cold
to become crisp or make something become crisp by cooking or heating it

sentences.english: The patient's blood refused to clot.
sentences.chinese: 病人的血液无法凝结。

detailed_translations.english: if a liquid such as blood or milk clots, or if something clots it, it becomes thicker and more solid
a thick almost solid mass formed when blood or milk dries

name: mild
trans: 温柔的； 温和的； 轻微的

sentences.english: His voice was soft and mild.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音轻柔温和。

sentences.english: a mild herbicide
sentences.chinese: 药力温和的除草剂

detailed_translations.english: a mild person has a gentle character and does not easily get angry

name: impact
trans: 影响， 作用； 冲击

sentences.english: Such schemes mean little unless they impact people.
sentences.chinese: 除非能对人们造成影响，否则这样的计划意义不大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 影响， 作用， 冲击
detailed_translations.english: to have an important or noticeable effect on someone or something
the effect or influence that an event, situation etc has on someone or something

name: profile
trans: 面部的侧影，侧面轮廓；传略，人物简介

sentences.english: Dani has a lovely profile.
sentences.chinese: 达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

detailed_translations.chinese: 侧面；人物简介；轮廓，形象；姿态，引人注目的状态
detailed_translations.english: a side view of someone’s head
to write or give a short description of someone or something

to fasten something or someone in place with one or more straps

sentences.english: She sipped her lemonade through a straw.
sentences.chinese: 她用吸管吸着柠檬水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 稻草；吸管；一文不值的东西
detailed_translations.english: a thin tube of paper or plastic for sucking up liquid from a bottle or a cup

sentences.chinese: 我们要使经济多元化。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大

name: inventive
trans: 发明的， 创造的； 善于发明创造的

sentences.english: It inspired me to be more inventive with my own cooking.
sentences.chinese: 它激励我在自己烹饪时更具创造力。

detailed_translations.english: An inventive person is good at inventing things or has clever and original ideas

name: graph
trans: 图， 图表， 曲线图

sentences.chinese: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

sentences.english: Regarding your recent inquiry, I have enclosed a copy of our new brochure.
sentences.chinese: 关于你最近的咨询，我随信附上一本我们最新的手册。

detailed_translations.english: a word used especially in letters or speeches to introduce the subject you are writing or talking about

sentences.english: unleaded petrol
sentences.chinese: 无铅汽油

sentences.english: petrol prices
sentences.chinese: 汽油价格

sentences.english: The petrol tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 油箱漏了。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid obtained from  petroleum that is used to supply power to the engine of cars and other vehicles

sentences.english: After the war, prisoners were repatriated.
sentences.chinese: 战后，战俘被遣返。

detailed_translations.english: to send someone back to their own country

name: pretentious
trans: 自命不凡的， 自负的； 炫耀的； 做作的

sentences.chinese: 矫饰的电影

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something is pretentious, they try to seem more important, intelligent, or high class than they really are in order to be impressive

name: tackle
trans: 对付，处理；向某人提起；抢截，抢球
用具， 器具； 滑轮， 滑车； 抢截

sentences.english: There is more than one way to tackle the problem.
sentences.chinese: 解决这个问题不止一个办法。

sentences.english: fishing tackle
sentences.chinese: 渔具

detailed_translations.english: to try to deal with a difficult problem

name: large-scale
trans: 大规模的， 大范围的

sentences.english: a large-scale rescue operation
sentences.chinese: 大规模的营救行动

detailed_translations.chinese: 大规模的， 大范围的
detailed_translations.english: using or involving a lot of effort, people, supplies etc

sentences.english: persistent truants
sentences.chinese: 老是逃学的学生

detailed_translations.english: a student who stays away from school without permission

sentences.chinese: 尽量不要让其他学生分心。

detailed_translations.english: to take someone’s attention away from something by making them look at or listen to something else

sentences.english: All the medical workers in the region helped to put down the influenza epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区的所有医务工作者参加了消灭流行性感冒的工作。

sentences.english: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

detailed_translations.english: an infectious disease that is like a very bad cold

name: occasion
trans: 时刻，时候；场合；重大活动，盛会；时机，机会；起因，理由

sentences.chinese: 我要把这瓶香槟酒留到特别的日子喝。

sentences.english: This was the occasion for expressions of friendship by the two presidents.

detailed_translations.english: an important social event or ceremony

trans: 压榨，榨取；捏，挤压；挤入，挤过；向…勒索
挤压， 捏； 紧缺， 拮据， 经济困难； 减少， 削减

sentences.chinese: 他捏了捏她的手，她笑了。

sentences.english: He squeezed the trigger, but nothing happened.
sentences.chinese: 他扣动扳机，但没有反应。

detailed_translations.english: to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 挤； 握手； 拮据， 紧缺
detailed_translations.english: an act of pressing something firmly with your fingers or hand

sentences.english: We obtained a loan from the government.
sentences.chinese: 我们得了一笔政府贷款。

sentences.english: If you ask him for a loan, he'll come through.
sentences.chinese: 如果你向他贷款，他会满足你的要求的。

sentences.english: The company won't keep going unless we can get some loan.
sentences.chinese: 除非我们能搞到贷款，否则公司就维持不下去了。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you borrow from a bank etc

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

sentences.english: A couple of other books are worthy of mention.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些其他的书值得一提

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

name: guzzle
trans: 狂饮， 暴饮； 大量消耗

sentences.chinese: 他们整个晚上都在狂饮啤酒。

detailed_translations.english: to eat or drink a lot of something, eagerly and quickly – usually showing disapproval

sentences.english: Having raised expectations (= made people more hopeful ), he went on to help only a few people.
sentences.chinese: 他唤起了大家的希望，但接着只是帮助了几个人。

sentences.english: The show exceeded all expectations (= was much better than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 这场演出比人们预期的要好得多。

sentences.english: The number of people who attended fell short of expectations (= was lower than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 出席的人数比预期的要少。

detailed_translations.english: what you think or hope will happen

sentences.english: Nutrition education can help with some problems and may prevent improper storage or spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 营养教育可以解决一些问题，并能防止不当的贮存或腐坏发生。

sentences.english: Nutrition education can help with some problems and may prevent improper storage or spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 营养教育可以解决一些问题，并能防止食物的不当贮存或腐坏发生。

sentences.english: They have real difficulty trying to tell the difference in quality changes and safety spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 他们真的很难区分真正的变质和无关紧要的损坏之间的区别。

detailed_translations.english: waste resulting from something being spoiled

trans: 药剂师， 配药师； 分配者， 施予者； 自动售货机

sentences.english: a paper towel dispenser
sentences.chinese: 纸巾自动售卖机

detailed_translations.english: a machine which provides a particular amount of a product or substance when you press a button or put money into it

trans: 持续， 持续的时间， 期间

sentences.english: The course is of three years’ duration.
sentences.chinese: 该课程为期三年。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that something continues

sentences.english: Have you finished loading up?
sentences.chinese: 你装完货了吗？

sentences.english: It took an hour to load the van.
sentences.chinese: 给小型货车装货花了一小时。

sentences.english: Will you help me load the dishwasher?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我把碗碟放进洗碗机好吗？

sentences.english: The plane was carrying afull loadof fuel.
sentences.chinese: 飞机载满燃料。

detailed_translations.english: to put a large quantity of something into a vehicle or container
a large quantity of something that is carried by a vehicle, person etc

name: sophisticate
trans: 久经世故的人； 精通者

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄复杂；使变得世故；曲解

detailed_translations.english: someone who is sophisticated

sentences.chinese: 他们乘船又一次渡过了冈比亚河。

sentences.english: The ship was used to ferry supplies to Russia during the war.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船在战时被用来往俄罗斯 运送补给。

detailed_translations.english: a boat that carries people or goods across a river or a narrow area of water
to carry people or things a short distance from one place to another in a boat or other vehicle

name: acclimatise
trans: 服水土； 适应新环境

sentences.english: This year he has left for St Louis early to acclimatise himself.
sentences.chinese: 今年他早早地前往圣路易斯以便适应新环境。

detailed_translations.chinese: 服水土； 适应新环境

name: ignore
trans: 不顾， 不理， 忽视

sentences.english: The phone rang, but she ignored it.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃响了，但她只当没听见。

sentences.english: Sam rudely ignored the question.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆粗鲁地对这个问题不予理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to behave as if you had not heard or seen someone or something

sentences.chinese: 北半球

detailed_translations.english: a half of the Earth, especially one of the halves above and below the equator

sentences.english: France’s reliance on nuclear energy
sentences.chinese: 法国对核能的依赖

sentences.english: a nuclear power station
sentences.chinese: 核电站

sentences.english: a nuclear-powered submarine
sentences.chinese: 核动力潜艇

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving the nucleus of an atom, or the energy produced when the nucleus of an atom is either split or joined with the nucleus of another atom

trans: 鼓掌， 喝彩； 称赞

sentences.chinese: 观众掌声雷动。

sentences.english: A crowd of 300 supporters warmly applauded her speech.
sentences.chinese: 300名支持者为她的演讲热烈鼓掌。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your open hands together, to show that you have enjoyed a play, concert, speaker etc

sentences.chinese: 对月球表面的研究

sentences.english: a lunar eclipse
sentences.chinese: 月食

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

sentences.chinese: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

detailed_translations.english: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

sentences.chinese: 他马上就把这个消息转告给了其他员工。

sentences.english: The game was relayed by satellite to audiences all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛通过卫星向全世界的观众进行了转播。

detailed_translations.english: to pass a message from one person or place to another

sentences.english: Welcome to my humble abode.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临寒舍。

sentences.chinese: 居无定所的无家可归者

detailed_translations.chinese: 遵守；停留；忍受（abide的过去分词）

sentences.chinese: 他请求离开房间的许可。

sentences.english: They cannot leave the country without permission.
sentences.chinese: 没有许可他们不得离开这个国家。

detailed_translations.english: the act of allowing sb to do sth, especially when this is done by sb in a position of authority

sentences.chinese: 但是直到现在，没有试验能在统计学上有力的标明它对生存率的影响。

sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，从这个方面思考你我之间，统计意义上说我们的寿命只有大约28，470天。

sentences.chinese: 因为你们可以全面地评估实验证据，而且据统计数据显示，历史系的女生最有可能主动出击。

sentences.chinese: 豪华的乡间大宅

sentences.english: The party was a grand affair.
sentences.chinese: 这个聚会场面隆重。

sentences.english: New Yorkers build on a grand scale.

detailed_translations.english: big and very impressive

trans: 扩散， 弥漫； 渗透， 渗入

sentences.chinese: 空气里充斥着柴油的气味。

detailed_translations.english: if liquid, gas etc permeates something, it enters it and spreads through every part of it

sentences.chinese: 他是怎么把所有的事情都排进自己忙碌的时间表的？

sentences.english: I’m going to be working to a very tight schedule (= including a lot of things that must be done in a short time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的工作安排将会非常紧。

sentences.chinese: 这一指数高于50表明制造业处于扩张状态，低于50时则反映制造业状况在恶化。

sentences.chinese: 但潜在的通胀压力仍是非常微弱，特别是考虑到迅速而持续恶化的就业市场，这种状况很可能会持续下去。

name: interpret
trans: 解释， 说明； 口译， 翻译

sentences.english: They spoke good Spanish, and promised to interpret for me.
sentences.chinese: 他们西班牙语说得很好，答应替我翻译。

sentences.english: Freud’s attempts to interpret the meaning of dreams
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德对梦的含义的解析

detailed_translations.english: to translate spoken words from one language into another

name: universe
trans: 宇宙， 天地万物； 世界； 领域

sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在扩大。

detailed_translations.english: all space, including all the stars and planets

sentences.english: She huddled herself in the blanket.
sentences.chinese: 她用毯子紧紧裹住自己。

sentences.english: They muffled up her head with a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。

sentences.english: He lapped his daughter in a warm blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他把女儿裹在一个暖和的毯子里。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

name: grant
trans: 同意， 承认； 给予， 授予
授予物；补助金，助学金，津贴；授权

sentences.english: Britain could grant Spain’s request .
sentences.chinese: 英国可能会同意西班牙的请求。

sentences.english: I would love to be able to grant her wish.
sentences.chinese: 我很希望能够满足她的愿望。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something or allow them to have something that they have asked for

name: newsletter
trans: 时事通讯， 业务通讯

sentences.english: The society publishes a newsletter twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 该社团一年出版两次简报。

detailed_translations.english: a short written report of news about a club, organization etc that is sent regularly to people who are interested

name: conductive
trans: 能传导电的， 导电的

sentences.english: Copper is a very conductive metal.
sentences.chinese: 铜是一种传导性极强的金属。

detailed_translations.chinese: 能传导电的， 导电的
detailed_translations.english: able to conduct electricity, heat etc

name: discount
trans: 给…打折； 漠视， 低估

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

sentences.english: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要建造一条新的跨河公路桥。

detailed_translations.english: to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑物； 构想； 观念
detailed_translations.english: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge

name: convert
trans: 改变信仰， 皈依； 转变， 转化； 改装

sentences.english: a 19th-century converted barn
sentences.chinese: 由19世纪谷仓改建的房子

detailed_translations.english: to change something into a different form, or to change something so that it can be used for a different purpose or in a different way

name: attempt
trans: 尝试， 试图； 努力

sentences.english: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.chinese: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尝试， 试图， 努力
detailed_translations.english: to try to do something, especially something difficult

name: division
trans: 分开， 分隔； 分配； 分歧； 除； 部门， 科， 司

sentences.english: the division sign (÷)
sentences.chinese: 除号

sentences.english: the Computer Services Division
sentences.chinese: 电脑维修部

detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out how many times one number is contained in another

name: navigation
trans: 航空， 航海， 航行； 导航， 领航

sentences.english: compasses and other instruments of navigation
sentences.chinese: 罗盘及其他导航仪器

detailed_translations.chinese: 航行， 航海， 航空； 导航， 领航
detailed_translations.english: the science or job of planning which way you need to go when you are travelling from one place to another

sentences.english: stale jokes
sentences.chinese: 老掉牙的笑话

detailed_translations.english: not interesting or exciting any more

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

sentences.english: His fingerprints were all over the gun.
sentences.chinese: 枪上到处是他的指纹。

sentences.english: He was careful not to leave any fingerprints .
sentences.chinese: 他小心地不留下指纹。

sentences.english: The police questioned Beresford and took his fingerprints (= made a record of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 警察审问了贝雷斯福德，并提取了他的指纹。

sentences.english: He took her to jail, where she was fingerprinted and booked.
sentences.chinese: 他将她带到监狱，她在那里被提取了指纹并登记在册。

detailed_translations.english: a mark made by the pattern of lines at the end of a person’s finger, which is used by the police to find out who has committed a crime
If someone is fingerprinted, the police take their fingerprints

name: pitch
trans: 沥青； 场地； 程度； 最高点； 音高

sentences.english: She crumpled up the page and pitched it into the fire.
sentences.chinese: 她把那页纸揉成团，扔进了火里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投掷， 扔； 猛然倒下； (船、 飞机)颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

detailed_translations.chinese: 球场；程度，强度；高度，高音；沥青；顶点
detailed_translations.english: a marked out area of ground on which a sport is played

detailed_translations.chinese: 销售；投掷，扔；使猛然倒下；表达；把…定于特定程度；定调；架设，搭，营
detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

sentences.english: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
sentences.chinese: 旧系统相当复杂，而新系统却很简单。

sentences.english: Whereas the city spent over $1 billion on its museums and stadium, it failed to look after its schools.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市花了十亿美元建造博物馆和体育馆，但是却忽略了对学校的建设。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another

name: torrent
trans: 洪流； 爆发； 连发

sentences.english: After five days of heavy rain the Telle river was a raging torrent (= a very violent torrent ) .
sentences.chinese: 下了五天的大雨之后，泰勒河急流汹涌。

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of water moving very quickly and strongly in a particular direction

name: electrical
trans: 电的， 电学的， 有关电的

sentences.english: The fire was caused by an electrical fault.

sentences.english: So what should we do to promote peace, in addition to the proposals mentioned above?
sentences.chinese: 那么，除了上述提到的方案外，我们应该采取什么行动来促进和平呢？

sentences.chinese: 那么为什么你想降低你的胆固醇呢？
