sentences.chinese: 若确实如此，您应该与您的医生讨论其他控制胆固醇方法。

sentences.english: "In order to prevent this oxidation of cholesterol, we need to consume antioxidants, preferably natural antioxidants that you get from fruits and vegetables, " he said in an interview.
sentences.chinese: “为了防止这种胆固醇氧化，我们需要消耗抗氧化剂，最好是从水果和蔬菜得到的天然抗氧化剂， ”他在接受采访时说道。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance found in your blood. Too much cholesterol in your body may cause heart disease.

name: orbit
trans: 沿轨道运行； 围绕…运动
轨道；影响范围，势力范围

sentences.english: Mars and Earth have orbits which change with time.
sentences.chinese: 火星和地球的轨道随着时间而发生改变。

detailed_translations.english: the curved path travelled by an object which is moving around another much larger object such as the Earth, the Sun etc
to travel in a curved path around a much larger object such as the Earth, the Sun etc

name: band
trans: 乐队； 群， 伙； 带， 箍； 条纹； 波段， 频带

sentences.english: The band was playing old Beatles songs.
sentences.chinese: 乐队正在演奏披头士的老歌。

sentences.english: I grew up playing in rock bands.
sentences.chinese: 我是在摇滚乐队里玩音乐长大的。

sentences.english: Smith joined the band in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯在1989年加入这个乐队。

sentences.english: They formed a band when they were still at school.
sentences.chinese: 他们还在读书的时候就组建了一个乐队。

sentences.english: The entertainment includes a disco and live band .
sentences.chinese: 娱乐活动有跳迪斯科和乐队现场演奏。

sentences.english: interviews with band members
sentences.chinese: 对乐队成员的采访

detailed_translations.english: a group of musicians, especially a group that plays popular music

sentences.english: As one local resident put it in May, "By day there is government.
sentences.chinese: 正如一位当地居民在五月份对它的描述”白天有政府。

sentences.english: A resident said, "I think we should write it down on paper or tell our family members.
sentences.chinese: 一位居民说：“我觉得我们应该把遗嘱写在纸上或者告诉给自己的家人。

sentences.english: Few of her former comrades enjoy this comfort; but, as another resident explained, the authorities like them to live there "to do propaganda and education work".
sentences.chinese: 她以前的同志，很少人能享受能这种舒适生活；不过另一个居民解释说，当局希望他们住在那以“进行宣传教育工作”。

sentences.english: The house comprises two bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子有两间卧室、一间厨房和一间起居室。

sentences.english: Women comprise a high proportion of part-time workers.
sentences.chinese: 兼职人员中妇女占了很大一部分。

detailed_translations.english: to consist of particular parts, groups etc

sentences.english: Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆现在身高和他姐姐差不多了。

sentences.english: State your age, height, and weight.
sentences.chinese: 说出你的年龄、身高和体重。

sentences.english: Rachel had always been scared of heights.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔过去一直恐高。

detailed_translations.english: how tall someone or something is

name: moderate
trans: 减轻， 缓和； 使适中

sentences.english: Even moderate amounts of alcohol can be dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 喝酒即使不多也会有危险。

sentences.english: a moderate degree of success
sentences.chinese: 一定程度上的成功

sentences.english: a student of moderate ability
sentences.chinese: 能力一般的学生

sentences.english: Moderate exercise, such as walking, is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 建议适度锻炼，比如散步。

sentences.english: Bake the pie for 30 minutes in a moderate oven.
sentences.chinese: 馅饼用中火烘烤30分钟。

sentences.english: moderate to strong winds
sentences.chinese: 中到大风

detailed_translations.english: not very large or very small, very hot or very cold, very fast or very slow etc
someone whose opinions or beliefs, especially about politics, are not extreme and are considered reasonable by most people
to make something less extreme or violent, or to become less extreme or violent

sentences.english: a satellite receiver
sentences.chinese: 卫星信号接收器

sentences.english: She picked up the receiver and dialled his number.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起听筒，拨了他的电话号码。

sentences.english: The business is in the hands of the receivers .
sentences.chinese: 公司现在由破产管理人接管。

detailed_translations.chinese: 电话听筒；接收器；〔破产企业或公司的〕管理人，接管人
detailed_translations.english: the part of a telephone that you hold next to your mouth and ear

sentences.english: Without Leaders, we would be spinning in a hamster wheel with no real vision.
sentences.chinese: 没有领导型的人，我们就会像仓鼠在轮子里旋转那样，没有远见。

sentences.english: In laboratory experiments, for instance, cancer cells have been transferred by mosquitoes from one hamster to another.
sentences.chinese: 比如，在实验室里，癌细胞通过蚊子从一只仓鼠转移到另一只身上。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal that looks like a mouse with no tail

name: module
trans: 模块； 模式； 舱； 组件； 单元

sentences.english: Switch from one module to another.
sentences.chinese: 从一个模块转换到另一个模块。

sentences.english: In this step, you create a new module for the selector.
sentences.chinese: 在此步骤中，您将为选择器创建一个新的模块。

sentences.english: You then iterate the modules that depended on you and remove this module from their lists.
sentences.chinese: 然后迭代具有依赖性的模块，并将这个模块从这些列表中删除。

detailed_translations.english: one of several parts of a piece of computer software that does a particular job

sentences.english: In the winter I head for the mall.
sentences.chinese: 在冬日里,我前往这个购物商场。

sentences.english: If you see something you like at the mall, walk away.
sentences.chinese: 如果在商城里看见某件你喜欢的东西，（别买）走开。

name: substantial
trans: 可观的， 大量的； 坚固的， 结实的； 实质的； 大体上的

sentences.english: We have the support of a substantial number of parents.
sentences.chinese: 我们有相当多家长的支持。

sentences.english: a substantial salary
sentences.chinese: 丰厚的薪水

sentences.english: a substantial breakfast
sentences.chinese: 丰盛的早餐

sentences.english: The document requires substantial changes.
sentences.chinese: 文件需要作大量修改。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可观的， 大量的； 物质的， 坚固的； 实质的， 真实的
detailed_translations.english: large in amount or number

name: execute
trans: 将…处死； 实施， 执行

sentences.english: 13 people were summarily executed (= killed without any trial or legal process ) by the guerrillas.
sentences.chinese: 有13人被游击队员就地处决。

sentences.english: The job involves drawing up and executing a plan of nursing care.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作包括拟订和实施一个护理计划。

detailed_translations.english: to kill someone, especially legally as a punishment

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

name: malt
trans: 把…制成麦芽； 变成麦芽

sentences.english: Water, malt, hop and yeast are main components of the beer production process.
sentences.chinese: 泉水、麦芽、啤酒花和酵母是啤酒酿制过程中的主要成分。

sentences.english: Yes, I enjoyed the single malt they gave me, but I enjoyed the conversation much more.
sentences.chinese: 不错，我喜欢这种特别的麦芽酒，但是我更喜欢这种形式的聊天。

detailed_translations.english: grain, usually  barley  , that has been kept in water for a time and then dried. It is used for making beer,  whisky  etc.

detailed_translations.chinese: 麦芽的；含麦芽的，用麦芽作的

name: booth
trans: 小房间； 公用电话亭； 售货棚

sentences.english: I called her from a public phone booth near the entrance to the bar.
sentences.chinese: 我在酒吧入口附近的一个公用电话亭给她打了电话。

detailed_translations.english: A booth is a small area separated from a larger public area by screens or thin walls where, for example, people can make a telephone call or vote in private

name: unique
trans: 唯一的， 独一无二的； 极不寻常的， 极好的

sentences.english: Each person’s fingerprints are unique.
sentences.chinese: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

detailed_translations.english: being the only one of its kind

name: boost
trans: 使增长，使兴旺；鼓励，促进；为…作宣传，宣扬
增加， 提高； 帮助， 激励

sentences.english: The new resort area has boosted tourism.
sentences.chinese: 新的度假区促进了旅游业的发展。

detailed_translations.chinese: 推动， 促进， 激励； 替…做广告， 宣扬； 提高， 使增长
detailed_translations.english: to increase or improve something and make it more successful
something that gives someone more confidence, or that helps something increase, improve, or become successful

name: sincere
trans: 真挚的， 诚挚的， 真诚的， 诚恳的

sentences.english: Please accept my sincere apologies .
sentences.chinese: 请接受我真诚的道歉。

sentences.english: his sincere desire to find out the truth
sentences.chinese: 他想查明真相的真切愿望

detailed_translations.english: a feeling, belief, or statement that is sincere is honest and true, and based on what you really feel and believe

sentences.english: The sea got very rough and the boat capsized.
sentences.chinese: 海的风浪变得很大，船翻了。

detailed_translations.english: if a boat capsizes, or if you capsize it, it turns over in the water

sentences.english: the Ministry of Agriculture
sentences.chinese: 农业部

sentences.english: Converted in his early teens, he entered the ministry (= started working as a church leader ) in 1855.
sentences.chinese: 他十三四岁皈依基督教，1855年当上牧师。

sentences.english: the ministry of Jesus
sentences.chinese: 耶稣的传道工作

detailed_translations.chinese: （政府的）部；；（全体）牧师；牧师的职责
detailed_translations.english: a government department that is responsible for one of the areas of government work, such as education or health

sentences.english: Annie was wonderfully warm and maternal.
sentences.chinese: 安妮非常亲切慈爱。

sentences.english: She seems to have a strong maternal instinct (= desire to have babies and take care of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 她似乎有很强的母性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 母亲的；母性的；母系的；母体遗传的
detailed_translations.english: typical of the way a good mother behaves or feels

sentences.english: Two girls were expelled from school for taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 两名女生因吸毒而被学校开除。

sentences.english: Foreign priests were expelled from the country.
sentences.chinese: 外国牧师被驱逐出境。

sentences.english: As the lungs exhale this waste, gas is expelled into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 当肺呼出这股废气，气体就被排到空气中。

detailed_translations.english: to officially force someone to leave a school or organization

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.chinese: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
If a place or thing is sheltered by something, it is protected by that thing from wind and rain

name: examine
trans: 检查； 调查， 研究； 测验

sentences.english: A team of divers was sent down to examine the wreck.
sentences.chinese: 一组潜水员被送到水下检查沉船。

sentences.english: Hegel’s philosophy will be examined in detail in Chapter 4.
sentences.chinese: 黑格尔的哲学将在第4章作详细探讨。

detailed_translations.english: to look at something carefully and thoroughly because you want to find out more about it

sentences.english: The birds breed in northern latitudes.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在北纬地区繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: The latitude of a place is its distance from the equator.

sentences.english: He scanned the horizon, but there was no sign of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 他朝地平线处仔细眺望，但是找不到那艘船的踪影。

sentences.english: She scanned his face, looking for signs of what he was thinking.
sentences.chinese: 她端详着他的脸，想知道他在想些什么。

sentences.english: Video cameras scanned the car park.
sentences.chinese: 摄像机监视着停车场。

sentences.english: She scanned through the paper.
sentences.chinese: 她浏览了一下报纸。

sentences.english: 英文例句:You scan the text into the computer, then edit it.
sentences.chinese: 把文本扫描进电脑，然后进行编辑。

detailed_translations.english: to examine an area carefully but quickly, often because you are looking for a particular person or thing

sentences.english: Scotland has all kinds of happy associations for me.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰给我各种各样愉快的联想。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship with a particular person, organization, group etc

name: eliminate
trans: 消灭， 消除； 淘汰

sentences.english: a ruthless dictator who eliminated all his rivals
sentences.chinese: 铲除所有异己的残酷独裁者

detailed_translations.english: to completely get rid of something that is unnecessary or unwanted

name: landfill
trans: 垃圾堆； 垃圾填筑地， 废渣埋填地

sentences.english: ...the environmental costs of landfill.
sentences.chinese: …垃圾填埋法对环境的损害。

detailed_translations.english: Landfill is a method of getting rid of very large amounts of rubbish by burying it in a large deep hole

name: augment
trans: 增加， 提高， 扩大

sentences.english: Any surplus was sold to augment their income.
sentences.chinese: 所有多余的东西被售卖一空来增加他们的收入。

detailed_translations.english: to increase the value, amount, effectiveness etc of something

name: identifiable
trans: 可辨认的， 可识别的； 可确定的， 可证明是同一的

sentences.english: In the corridor were four dirty, ragged bundles, just identifiable as human beings.
sentences.chinese: 走廊里有4堆脏兮兮、衣衫褴褛的东西，依稀可辨出人形。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可辨认的；可认明的；可证明是同一的
detailed_translations.english: able to be recognized

sentences.english: ...the development of the fetus in the womb.
sentences.chinese: …胎儿在子宫里的发育。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a woman’s or female animal’s body where her baby grows before it is born

name: destruction
trans: 破坏， 毁灭， 摧毁

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["weapons of mass destruction"]}
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the environmental destruction caused by the road building programme
sentences.chinese: 筑路工程造成的环境破坏

sentences.english: The floods brought death and destruction to the area.
sentences.chinese: 洪水给该地区带来了死亡和破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 破坏， 毁灭； 消灭
detailed_translations.english: the act or process of destroying something or of being destroyed

sentences.english: I never felt stiff after training until I was in my thirties.
sentences.chinese: 三十岁之前，我训练后从不会感到身体发僵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 呆板的；坚硬的；严厉的；拘谨的
detailed_translations.english: a stiff punishment is great or severe

detailed_translations.chinese: 死尸；令人讨厌者；流通票据；劳动者
detailed_translations.english: the body of a dead person

name: prosper
trans: 繁荣， 兴旺； 成功

sentences.english: His business continued to prosper.
sentences.chinese: 他的生意持续兴隆。

detailed_translations.english: If people or businesses prosper, they are successful and do well

sentences.english: Danny, don’t bother Ellen while she’s reading.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼，埃伦看书的时候不要去打扰她 。

sentences.english: You seem to have got yourself into a spot of bother.
sentences.chinese: 你似乎让自己遇上了点麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: to annoy, worry or upset sb
trouble or difficulty

name: renewal
trans: 更新， 恢复； 重新开始； 重建； 复兴； 续期； 重申

sentences.english: Mark’s contract comes up for renewal at the end of this year.
sentences.chinese: 马克的合同将在今年年末到期，需要续签。

detailed_translations.chinese: 更新，恢复；复兴；补充；革新；续借；重申
detailed_translations.english: when an activity, situation, or process begins again after a period when it had stopped

name: appeal
trans: 上诉， 申诉； 呼吁； 感染力， 吸引力

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important
to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

sentences.english: cardiovascular disease
sentences.chinese: 心血管疾病

detailed_translations.english: relating to the heart and  blood vessel s (= tubes through which blood flows around your body )

sentences.english: I spent one whole night by a swamp behind the road listening to frogs.
sentences.chinese: 我整个晚上都在这条路后面的一个沼泽地旁听蛙鸣。

sentences.english: Their electronic navigation failed and a rogue wave swamped the boat.
sentences.chinese: 他们的电子导航装置失灵了，一个巨浪吞没了那只船。

detailed_translations.english: land that is always very wet or covered with a layer of water

detailed_translations.chinese: 使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境
detailed_translations.english: If something swamps a place or object, it fills it with water

sentences.english: “You have to be an optimist to be an inventor or entrepreneur, ” he concludes.
sentences.chinese: 要成为一位发明家或企业家，你必须得是个乐天派。

sentences.english: If any of you end up being entrepreneur, which I hope you will be, what do you have in store for yourself, and what does that journey look like?
sentences.chinese: 如果你们当中任何一个人成了企业家，这也是我希望你们做到的，你自己会有什么样的储备，那样的一段旅程又将是什么样的？

sentences.english: How would you define personal growth as an entrepreneur?
sentences.chinese: 你会如何定义,一个企业家的个人成长？

detailed_translations.english: someone who starts a new business or arranges business deals in order to make money, often in a way that involves financial risks

name: transportation
trans: 运输， 运输系统， 运输工具

sentences.english: The city needs to improve its public transportation (= buses, trains etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 这座城市需要改善公共交通。

detailed_translations.english: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another

sentences.english: The actress now dedicates herself to children’s charity work.
sentences.chinese: 这名女演员现在致力于儿童慈善工作。

detailed_translations.english: to give all your attention and effort to one particular thing

name: appear
trans: 出现， 显露， 公开露面； 出场， 问世； 仿佛， 似乎

sentences.english: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.english: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.english: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.chinese: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

sentences.english: Two faces appeared at our window.
sentences.chinese: 两张面孔出现在我们的窗口。

sentences.english: The car seemed to appear from nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

name: extensive
trans: 广大的， 广阔的； 广泛的

sentences.english: The house stands in extensive grounds.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子占地面积很大。

sentences.english: Fire has caused extensive damage to the island’s forests.
sentences.chinese: 大火严重毁坏了岛上的森林。

sentences.english: the extensive use of pesticides
sentences.chinese: 杀虫剂的大量使用

sentences.english: The exhibition has received extensive coverage in the national press.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览会被全国媒体广泛报道。

detailed_translations.english: large in size, amount, or degree

name: residential
trans: 居住的， 住宅的； 寄宿的

sentences.english: a quiet residential neighbourhood
sentences.chinese: 安静的住宅区

detailed_translations.chinese: 居住的， 住宅的； 寄宿的， 住在住所的
detailed_translations.english: a residential part of a town consists of private houses, with no offices or factories

sentences.english: He was stabbed to death in a fight.
sentences.chinese: 他在一次打斗中被捅死了。

detailed_translations.english: to push a knife into someone or something
an act of stabbing or trying to stab someone with a knife

sentences.english: a monotonous diet
sentences.chinese: 单调的饮食

sentences.english: a little boy who wet his bed with monotonous regularity
sentences.chinese: 一个老是尿床的小男孩

detailed_translations.english: boring because of always being the same

name: inspire
trans: 鼓舞， 激起； 给…以灵感

sentences.english: We need someone who can inspire the team.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

sentences.english: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
sentences.chinese: 阳光明媚的天气令人振奋，我决定到森林里寻幽探胜。

sentences.english: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事的创作灵感来自与一位俄国老公爵的不期而遇。

detailed_translations.english: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something

name: impart
trans: 给予， 赋予； 传授； 告知， 透露

sentences.english: Use a piece of fresh ginger to impart a East Asian flavour to simple ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 用一片鲜姜给简单的原料添上东亚的风味。

sentences.english: She had information that she couldn’t wait to impart.
sentences.chinese: 她得到了消息，迫不及待地想告诉别人。

detailed_translations.english: to give a particular quality to something

name: collaboration
trans: 合作， 协作； 勾结， 通敌

sentences.english: The company is building the centre in collaboration with the Institute of Offshore Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 该公司正与海洋工程学院合建这座中心。

detailed_translations.chinese: 合作， 协作； 勾结
detailed_translations.english: when you work together with another person or group to achieve something, especially in science or art

name: bureaucracy
trans: 官僚主义； 官僚机构

sentences.english: the reduction of unnecessary bureaucracy
sentences.chinese: 消除不必要的官僚体制

detailed_translations.english: a complicated official system that is annoying or confusing because it has a lot of rules, processes etc

name: legitimize
trans: 使合法； 赋予合法权利

sentences.english: Acceptance by the UN would effectively legitimize the regime.
sentences.chinese: 联合国的认可实际上就使这个政权合法化了。

detailed_translations.english: to make something official or legal

sentences.english: the very ordered way in which mathematics and geometry describe nature
sentences.chinese: 数学和几何学描述自然的条理性

detailed_translations.english: the study in  mathematics  of the angles and shapes formed by the relationships of lines, surfaces, and solid objects in space

sentences.english: Waiters glide between tightly packed tables bearing trays of pasta.
sentences.chinese: 侍者们托着一盘盘的意大利面食在拥挤的餐桌间自如穿行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝
detailed_translations.english: to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
a smooth quiet movement that seems to take no effort

name: overwork
trans: 使劳累过分；对…使用过度；滥用
过重的工作； 工作过度

sentences.english: You’ve been overworking – why don’t you take a week off?
sentences.chinese: 你最近在超强度工作——为什么不休息一周呢？

sentences.english: Have they been overworking you again?
sentences.chinese: 他们又让你超负荷工作了？

detailed_translations.english: to work too much or to make someone work too much
too much hard work

sentences.english: He decided to devote the rest of his life to scientific investigation.
sentences.chinese: 他决定把余生奉献给科学研究。

detailed_translations.english: to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone

name: invest
trans: 投资； 投入； 授予， 赋予

sentences.english: I’ve got a few thousand dollars I’m looking to invest.
sentences.chinese: 我有几千美元想作投资。

sentences.english: It was very difficult to leave a home we had invested so much in.
sentences.chinese: 那个家我们投入得太多，要离开真的很难。

detailed_translations.english: to buy shares, property, or goods because you hope that the value will increase and you can make a profit

sentences.english: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.english: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.chinese: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.english: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

detailed_translations.english: to be close to a particular number
an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it

name: project
trans: 放映； 投射， 发射； 突出， 伸出； 设计， 规划
计划，方案；课题，项目；工程[prə'dʒekt]

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

sentences.english: The wall is weak and requires lateral support.
sentences.chinese: 墙体不坚固，需要从侧面加以支撑。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the sides of something, or movement to the side

name: hinterland
trans: 内地， 腹地， 内陆

sentences.english: the rural hinterland
sentences.chinese: 内地乡村

detailed_translations.chinese: 内地；穷乡僻壤；靠港口供应的内地贸易区
detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is far from the coast, large rivers, or the places where people live

detailed_translations.chinese: 使凸出；在……上作浮雕图案；装饰
detailed_translations.english: to mould or carve (a decoration or design) on (a surface) so that it is raised above the surface in low relief

sentences.english: Tax increases now might imperil economic recovery.
sentences.chinese: 目前提高税收可能会危及经济的复苏。

detailed_translations.english: to put something or someone in danger

sentences.english: Draw a circle six centimetres in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径为六厘米的圆。

detailed_translations.english: a straight line from one side of a circle to the other side, passing through the centre of the circle, or the length of this line

name: stationary
trans: 静止的， 不动的， 固定的； 稳定的

sentences.english: How did you manage to drive into a stationary vehicle?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么开车的，竟会撞上一辆停着的车子？

detailed_translations.chinese: 固定的， 静止不动的
detailed_translations.english: standing still instead of moving

sentences.english: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.chinese: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.english: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.chinese: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.english: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.chinese: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

detailed_translations.english: the outer covering of a tree

name: loop
trans: 成环， 成圈； 成环形运动

sentences.english: He looped the rope over the wood.
sentences.chinese: 他把绳子打了环系在木头上。

detailed_translations.english: to fly a plane up and around in a circle so that the plane is  upside down  for a time
a shape like a curve or a circle made by a line curving back towards itself, or a piece of wire, string etc that has this shape

sentences.english: a ragged child with bare feet
sentences.chinese: 一个衣衫褴褛、光着脚的小孩

sentences.english: She felt the sun warm on her bare arms.
sentences.chinese: 她感觉到阳光照在她裸露双臂上的暖意。

sentences.english: He got 40% – a bare pass.
sentences.chinese: 他得了40分，勉强及格。

detailed_translations.english: not covered by clothes

name: formidable
trans: 可怕的； 难以应付的， 难以克服的

sentences.english: The building is grey, formidable, not at all picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 那幢建筑呈灰色，气势凛然，与漂亮沾不上边。

sentences.english: The new range of computers have formidable processing power.
sentences.chinese: 该系列的新型计算机处理能力惊人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可怕的；令人敬畏的，令人惊叹的
detailed_translations.english: very powerful or impressive, and often frightening

sentences.english: Rumors of such coordination abound, but as with many rumors, they have no basis in fact.
sentences.chinese: 关于这类协调的谣传很多；但如同许多其他谣传一样，它们没有事实根据。

sentences.english: Finally, offer this closing prayer to the Lord: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 最后，将结束的祷告告诉主：愿在你拥有信仰的时候希望的上帝用快乐与和平充满你的人生，让你在圣灵的力量下富于希望。

sentences.english: It did not take Andrew long to pack a suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁没有用多长时间就整理好了手提箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large case with a handle, used for carrying clothes and possessions when you travel

sentences.english: Invert the cake onto a serving plate.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕倒扣过来放到一个盘子上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…转化；使…颠倒；使…反转；使…前后倒置
detailed_translations.english: to put something in the opposite position to the one it was in before, especially by turning it upside down (= the bottom is on the top and the top is on the bottom )

detailed_translations.chinese: 颠倒的事物；倒置物；倒悬者

sentences.english: He was idly turning a crank on a strange mechanism strapped to his chest.
sentences.chinese: 他漫不经心地转着绑在他胸前的一个古怪装置上面的曲柄。

sentences.english: Try cranking the engine.
sentences.chinese: 试试用曲轴发动引擎。

detailed_translations.english: a handle on a piece of equipment, that you can turn in order to move something
to make something move by turning a crank

name: sucker
trans: 吸盘； 吸根， 根出条

detailed_translations.chinese: 吸盘； 吸根， 根出条
detailed_translations.english: a part of an insect or of an animal’s body that it uses to hold on to a surface

sentences.english: the Norman Conquest (= the conquest of England by the Normans )
sentences.chinese: 诺曼征服

detailed_translations.english: the act of getting control of a country by fighting

sentences.english: They have used the same process for almost 50 years with only minor modifications.
sentences.chinese: 同样的工序他们用了将近50年，期间只做过很小的改动。

detailed_translations.english: a small change made in something such as a design, plan, or system

sentences.english: a dense rurally-based population
sentences.chinese: 居住在乡村的密集人口

sentences.english: dense fog/smoke/fumes
sentences.chinese: 浓雾 / 烟；浓烈的气体

detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of people, things, plants, etc. with little space between them

name: assurance
trans: 信心； 保证； 保险

sentences.english: Despite my repeated assurances, Rob still looked very nervous.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我再三保证，罗布看起来还是很紧张。

detailed_translations.english: a promise that something will definitely happen or is definitely true, made especially to make someone less worried

sentences.english: a fortnight’s holiday
sentences.chinese: 十四天的假期

sentences.english: in a fortnight’s time
sentences.chinese: 两周后

sentences.english: a fortnight ago
sentences.chinese: 两周前

detailed_translations.english: two weeks

sentences.english: Traffic was disrupted by a hoax bomb.
sentences.chinese: 有人虚报有炸弹，造成了交通混乱。

sentences.english: Climate change could disrupt the agricultural economy.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化可能给农业经济带来不良影响。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something from continuing in its usual way by causing problems

name: goggles
trans: 护目镜； 风镜； 游泳镜

sentences.english: And protect your eyes from snow and ice glare with dark glasses or goggles.
sentences.chinese: 使用深色眼镜或者护目镜来保护你的眼镜不受冰雪眩光的影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 护目镜； 风镜； 游泳镜
detailed_translations.english: a pair of  glasses  made of glass or plastic with a rubber or plastic edge that fit against your skin and protect your eyes

name: hypothetical
trans: 假设的， 假定的； 爱猜想的

sentences.english: The question is purely hypothetical .
sentences.chinese: 这个问题完全基于假设。

detailed_translations.english: based on a situation that is not real, but that might happen

sentences.english: It lets me converse with the distinct voices of my past and quilt together a narrative about movement in place.
sentences.chinese: 它让我能够用可以彰显我的过去的独特声音与人交谈，并拼凑出一通有关地点变换的叙述。

sentences.english: From outside, from those who you love, converse, and make community with, telling you that you belong with them, if only you will give up those annoying, unacceptable parts, please.
sentences.chinese: 来自外界，来自那些你爱的、与你谈话的、与你团结在一起并告诉你你属于他们的人，只要你将放弃那些恼人的、无法接受的部分。

detailed_translations.english: to have a conversation with someone
opposite
the converse of a fact, word, statement etc is the opposite of it

sentences.english: His eccentric behaviour lost him his job.
sentences.chinese: 他古怪的行为使他丢了工作。

sentences.english: Aunt Nessy was always a bit eccentric.
sentences.chinese: 内西姑妈总是有点古怪。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that is unusual and different from most people
someone who behaves in a way that is different from what is usual or socially accepted

sentences.english: Mourners gathered to bid farewell to the victims of the plane tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 哀悼者来向空难受害者告别。

sentences.english: a farewell speech
sentences.chinese: 告别演说

detailed_translations.english: the action of saying goodbye

detailed_translations.chinese: 别了！（常含有永别或不容易再见面的意思）；再会！
detailed_translations.english: the action of saying goodbye

sentences.english: The device most often used to do this is a load balancer, which is an appliance that accepts requests from the outside world and hands them off to the next available application server.
sentences.chinese: 进行这一操作最常用的设备是一个负载均衡器，这是一个从外部接收请求并将它们移交给下一个可用应用程序服务器的装置。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, such as a  cooker  or  washing machine  , used in people’s homes

sentences.english: a mass protest
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抗议

sentences.english: weapons of mass destruction
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the problem of mass unemployment
sentences.chinese: 大批人失业的问题

detailed_translations.english: involving or intended for a very large number of people
to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group

detailed_translations.chinese: 众多，大量；团，块，堆；群众；质量
detailed_translations.english: a large crowd

name: renaissance
trans: [the R-] 文艺复兴， 文艺复兴时期； 复兴， 新生

sentences.english: ...the Renaissance masterpieces in London's galleries.
sentences.chinese: …伦敦美术馆里文艺复兴时期的杰作。

detailed_translations.english: a new interest in something, especially a particular form of art, music etc, that has not been popular for a long period

name: poisonous
trans: 有毒的， 有害的； 恶毒的， 邪恶的

sentences.english: Some mushrooms are extremely poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 一些蘑菇有剧毒。

sentences.english: poisonous gases such as hydrogen sulfide
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢等有毒气体

sentences.english: poisonous substances
sentences.chinese: 有毒物质

sentences.english: She was bitten on the ankle by a poisonous snake .
sentences.chinese: 她被毒蛇咬了脚踝。

detailed_translations.english: containing poison or producing poison

sentences.english: In this article I will focus on data collected using a nominal scale of measurement and the inferential techniques appropriate for nominal data.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，我将主要讨论通过使用测量的定类尺度收集的数据，以及适用于定类数据的推论技术。

sentences.english: There might be a market for inferential power like that, especially if it could be yoked to some of the autonomous semi-intelligent agents that are already buzzing around on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 如果像那样的话，推论力也可能有市场，尤其是如果它能跟一些在互联网上已经流传开的、自发的半智能力量结合在一起时更可能有市场。

detailed_translations.english: of, relating to, or derived from inference

sentences.english: Jim raised his hands in a despairing gesture.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆举起双手，做出绝望的手势。

sentences.english: The Queen has now made a gesture towards public opinion.
sentences.chinese: 女王现在摆出了尊重民意的姿态。

detailed_translations.english: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel

name: admit
trans: 承认； 准许…进入； 准许…加入

sentences.english: ‘Okay, so maybe I was a little bit scared,’ Jenny admitted.
sentences.chinese: “行了，也许我是有点害怕。”珍妮承认道。

sentences.english: I must admit , I didn’t actually do anything to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，实际上我并没有帮她什么忙。

sentences.english: Admit it! I’m right, aren’t I?
sentences.chinese: 承认吧！我对了，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to agree unwillingly that something is true or that someone else is right
to agree unwillingly that something is true or that someone else is right

name: propel
trans: 推进， 推动； 驱使

sentences.english: a boat propelled by a small motor
sentences.chinese: 由小马达驱动的小船

sentences.english: One of our students was unable to propel her wheelchair up the ramp.
sentences.chinese: 我们有名学生无法把她的轮椅推上坡道。

detailed_translations.english: to move, drive, or push something forward

name: rampant
trans: 猖獗的， 肆虐的， 泛滥的； 蔓生的， 疯长的

sentences.english: Pickpocketing is rampant in the downtown area.
sentences.chinese: 闹市区扒窃活动猖獗。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["rampant inflation"]}
sentences.chinese: 失控的通货膨胀

detailed_translations.chinese: 猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的
detailed_translations.english: if something bad, such as crime or disease, is rampant, there is a lot of it and it is very difficult to control

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

name: organic
trans: 器官的； 有机的； 有机体的； 组织的

sentences.english: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.english: organic gardening
sentences.chinese: 有机园艺

detailed_translations.english: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

name: apply
trans: 申请； 应用， 使用； 涉及

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

detailed_translations.chinese: 应用，实施，使用；适用；申请，请求
detailed_translations.english: to make a formal request, usually written, for something such as a job, a place at a university, or permission to do something
to put or spread something such as paint, liquid, or medicine onto a surface

name: jargon
trans: 行话， 行业术语； 黑话

sentences.english: Keep it simple and avoid the use of jargon.
sentences.chinese: 简单点，避免使用术语。

detailed_translations.english: words and expressions used in a particular profession or by a particular group of people, which are difficult for other people to understand – often used to show disapproval

name: incredible
trans: 不可信的； 难以置信的

sentences.english: It’s incredible that he survived the fall.
sentences.chinese: 他跌下去竟然能够生还，真不可思议。

sentences.english: It’s incredible how much Tom has changed since he met Sally.
sentences.chinese: 自从遇见萨莉后，汤姆的变化之大简直令人难以置信。

sentences.english: I find it almost incredible that no one noticed these errors.
sentences.chinese: 没人发现这些错误，真让我无法相信。

detailed_translations.english: too strange to be believed, or very difficult to believe

sentences.english: ethereal beauty
sentences.chinese: 超凡的美丽

sentences.english: His music is ethereal.
sentences.chinese: 他的音乐超凡脱俗。

detailed_translations.chinese: 优雅的；轻飘的；缥缈的；超凡的
detailed_translations.english: very delicate and light, in a way that does not seem real

name: layout
trans: 布局， 安排， 设计

sentences.english: All the flats in the building had the same layout.
sentences.chinese: 大楼里所有的公寓布局都是一样的。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a town, garden, or building is arranged

sentences.english: Barr strongly disagreed with Kronfeld’s statement.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔强烈反对克龙费尔德的说法。

sentences.english: The statements of several witnesses disagree.
sentences.chinese: 几名证人的证词不一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express a different opinion from someone else

sentences.english: Just after the avalanche.
sentences.chinese: 就在这雪崩后不久。

sentences.english: But what if the avalanche happened?
sentences.chinese: 不过，要是发生雪崩怎么办呢？

sentences.english: If the value was much lower than one, on the other hand, the avalanche would soon die out.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，如果结果是一个比一小很多的数字，那么雪崩很快就会停止。

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of snow, ice, and rocks that falls down the side of a mountain

name: formula
trans: 公式； 配方； 准则

sentences.english: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.english: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.chinese: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.english: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.chinese: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。

sentences.english: the formula for calculating distance
sentences.chinese: 计算距离的公式

detailed_translations.english: a series of numbers or letters that represent a mathematical or scientific rule

name: tribute
trans: 贡品； 颂词， 称赞； 礼物

sentences.english: The players wore black armbands as a tribute to their late teammate.
sentences.chinese: 球员们戴着黑纱悼念已故的队友。

sentences.english: I’d like to pay tribute to (= praise and admire publicly ) the party workers for all their hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我谨向党内工作人员致敬，感谢他们的辛苦努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 礼物；[税收] 贡物；颂词；（尤指对死者的）致敬，悼念，吊唁礼物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say, do, or give in order to express your respect or admiration for someone

sentences.english: Smoking during pregnancy endangers your baby’s life.
sentences.chinese: 孕期吸烟会危及胎儿生命。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in danger of being hurt, damaged, or destroyed

name: stem
trans: 止住， 抑止， 堵住， 阻止

sentences.english: ‘Writ ’ is the stem of the forms ‘writes ’, ‘writing ’ and ‘written ’.
sentences.chinese: writ是writes、writing和written三个词的词干。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a word that stays the same when different endings are added to it, for example ‘driv-’ in ‘driving’

name: simplistic
trans: 过分单纯化的， 过分简单化的

sentences.english: This is a very simplistic approach to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 这应该对该问题过分简单化的处理办法。

detailed_translations.english: treating difficult subjects in a way that is too simple

name: subordinate
trans: 使处于次要地位， 把…列在下级； 使服从

sentences.english: a subordinate officer
sentences.chinese: 下级官员

detailed_translations.chinese: 下级的，级别低的；次要的，从属的
detailed_translations.english: in a less important position than someone else
someone who has a lower position and less authority than someone else in an organization

detailed_translations.chinese: 使处于次要地位， 使从属于
detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something in a less important position

sentences.english: The current trend is towards more part-time employment.
sentences.chinese: 当前的趋势是雇用更多的兼职人员。

sentences.english: the general trend towards the centralization of political power
sentences.chinese: 政治权力集中化的普遍趋势

sentences.english: A disturbing trend is that victims of violence are getting younger.
sentences.chinese: 一个令人担心的趋势是，暴力行为的受害者越来越年轻。

sentences.english: The growing trend is for single mothers to bring up children by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 单身母亲独自抚养孩子的趋势在上升。

sentences.english: Even so, the underlying trend is positive.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，基本趋势仍是乐观的。

sentences.english: national and international economic trends
sentences.chinese: 国内和国际的经济趋势

sentences.english: the downward trend in the price of gold
sentences.chinese: 黄金价格的下滑势头

sentences.english: Successive presidents have tried to reverse this trend , but without success.
sentences.chinese: 连续几任总统都试图扭转这一趋势，但均未成功。

detailed_translations.english: a general tendency in the way a situation is changing or developing

sentences.english: ...a requisition for a replacement photocopier.
sentences.chinese: ...一份更换复印机的授权书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 征用；要求；申请书；引渡要求
detailed_translations.english: A requisition is a written document which allows a person or organization to obtain goods
if someone in authority, especially the army, requisitions a building, vehicle, or food, they officially demand to have it during an  emergency  such as a war

name: achievement
trans: 成就， 成绩； 达到， 完成， 实现

sentences.english: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.chinese: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

sentences.english: As we climbed the final few metres, we felt a sense of achievement.
sentences.chinese: 我们攀登最后几米的时候，有一种成就感。

detailed_translations.english: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts

name: mechanic
trans: 机修工； [-s] 力学， 机械学

sentences.english: a garage mechanic
sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂的技工

detailed_translations.english: someone who is skilled at repairing motor vehicles and machinery

name: itinerary
trans: 行程表； 旅行路线， 旅行计划

sentences.english: The next place on our itinerary was Sedona.
sentences.chinese: 我们旅行计划的下一站是塞多纳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅程，路线； 旅行日程
detailed_translations.english: An itinerary is a plan of a trip, including the route and the places that you will visit

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅程的； 巡回的，流动的

name: revolution
trans: 革命； 巨变， 大变革

sentences.english: the French Revolution of 1789
sentences.chinese: 1789年法国大革命

sentences.english: the planets’ revolution around the sun
sentences.chinese: 行星围绕太阳的公转

detailed_translations.english: an attempt, by a large number of people, to change the government of a country, especially by violent action

name: relation
trans: 关系， 联系； 亲属， 亲戚

sentences.english: diplomatic/international/foreign relations
sentences.chinese: 外交 / 国际 / 对外关系

sentences.english: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.chinese: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other

sentences.english: a birth control method that is cheap and reliable
sentences.chinese: 既便宜又可靠的避孕方法

sentences.english: Miller was a quiet and reliable man.
sentences.chinese: 米勒是个话不多且可靠的人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is reliable can be trusted or depended on

sentences.english: As an added incentive, there’s a bottle of champagne for the best team.
sentences.chinese: 给最优秀的队发一瓶香槟作为额外的鼓励。

detailed_translations.english: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc

name: relate
trans: 有关联； 讲述， 叙述

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

name: workforce
trans: 受雇的或现有的工作人员总数； 劳动人口

sentences.english: Women now represent almost 50% of the workforce.
sentences.chinese: 如今女性几乎占全部劳动人口的 50%。

sentences.english: The company is cutting its workforce.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正在裁员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 劳动力；工人总数，职工总数
detailed_translations.english: all the people who work in a particular industry or company, or are available to work in a particular country or area

sentences.english: the preliminary stages of the competition
sentences.chinese: 竞赛的预赛阶段

sentences.english: a preliminary draft
sentences.chinese: 初稿

detailed_translations.english: happening before something that is more important, often in order to prepare for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 初步做法， 起始行为

name: obstacle
trans: 障碍， 妨碍物， 干扰

sentences.english: The tax puts obstacles in the way of companies trying to develop trade overseas.
sentences.chinese: 这项税收为想在海外发展贸易的公司设置了障碍。

sentences.english: Women still have to overcome many obstacles to gain equality.
sentences.chinese: 妇女要获得平等仍需克服重重障碍。

sentences.english: We want to remove all obstacles to travel between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要消除在这两个国家之间旅行的所有障碍。

sentences.english: the single biggest obstacle to a Conservative victory in the next election
sentences.chinese: 保守党在下一届大选中获胜的最大障碍

sentences.english: There are formidable obstacles on the road to peace.
sentences.chinese: 通往和平的道路上存在难以逾越的障碍。

detailed_translations.english: something that makes it difficult to achieve some­thing

sentences.english: an unpredictable and fickle lover
sentences.chinese: 一个捉摸不透、三心二意的情人

detailed_translations.chinese: 浮躁的；易变的；变幻无常的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is fickle is always changing their mind about people or things that they like, so that you cannot depend on them – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: a delivery van
sentences.chinese: 运货车

sentences.english: a van driver
sentences.chinese: 小型货车司机

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle used especially for carrying goods, which is smaller than a truck and has a roof and usually no windows at the sides

name: worm
trans: 虫， 蠕虫； 蜗杆， 螺纹

sentences.english: ...a new computer worm that disables security software.
sentences.chinese: …一种使安全软件失灵的新型计算机蠕虫病毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虫，蠕虫；蜗杆；螺纹；小人物
detailed_translations.english: a long thin creature with no bones and no legs that lives in soil

detailed_translations.chinese: 使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进

name: dizzy
trans: 头晕目眩的， 眩晕的； 人头晕的

sentences.english: The heat and the champagne made him feel dizzy .
sentences.chinese: 高温和香槟酒使他感到眩晕。

sentences.english: She started to suffer from dizzy spells (= a short period when you feel dizzy ) .
sentences.chinese: 她开始感到一阵阵的眩晕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 晕眩的；使人头晕的；昏乱的；心不在焉的；愚蠢的
detailed_translations.english: feeling unable to stand steadily, for example because you are looking down from a high place or because you are ill

detailed_translations.chinese: 使头晕眼花；使混乱；使茫然

sentences.english: an exceptional student
sentences.chinese: 出类拔萃的学生

sentences.english: A review panel concluded that there were no exceptional circumstances that would warrant a lesser penalty for him.
sentences.chinese: 一个评估小组作出结论：没有什么例外情况可使他获得从轻惩罚。

detailed_translations.english: unusually good

name: constitute
trans: 组成； 构成； 设立， 成立

sentences.english: We must redefine what constitutes a family.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须对家庭的构成重新定义。

detailed_translations.english: to be the parts that together form sth

sentences.english: He continues to cite the article as evidence of his legitimacy.
sentences.chinese: 他不断引用该文章作为自己研究合法性的证据。

sentences.english: Iraq and Afghanistan were lessons in the impotence of force without legitimacy.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克和阿富汗正是没有合法授权下动武的教训。

sentences.english: Freedom of speech and assembly – because true legitimacy can only come from the people, who must never be silenced.
sentences.chinese: 言论和集会自由——因为真正的合法性只可能源于人民，他们永远不应保持沉默。

name: mate
trans: 配偶； 伙伴； 大副

sentences.english: He has found his ideal mate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

sentences.english: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists

sentences.english: I could spend each day gorging on chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 我可以将每一天都花在狂吃巧克力上。

detailed_translations.english: If you gorge on something or gorge yourself on it, you eat lots of it in a very greedy way
a deep narrow valley with steep sides

name: registration
trans: 登记， 注册； 挂号； 登记或注册的项目

sentences.english: Student registration (= for a course of study ) starts the first week in September.
sentences.chinese: 学生注册在9月份的第一个星期开始。

sentences.english: The registration fee is $75.
sentences.chinese: 注册费是75美元。

detailed_translations.english: the act of recording names and details on an official list

name: theory
trans: 理论， 原理； 学说； 意见， 看法

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

sentences.english: the warming-up of continental interiors
sentences.chinese: 内陆地区的变暖

detailed_translations.english: relating to a large mass of land

sentences.english: We have no interest in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们对干涉其他国家内政不感兴趣。

sentences.english: the threat to internal security
sentences.chinese: 对国内安全的威胁

sentences.english: internal markets
sentences.chinese: 国内市场

sentences.english: There’s to be an internal inquiry into the whole affair.
sentences.chinese: 对整个事件将进行内部调查。

detailed_translations.english: within a particular country

name: extension
trans: 伸展； 延长部分； 电话分机

sentences.english: Can I have extension 316, please?
sentences.chinese: 能帮我接316号分机吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of many telephone lines connected to a central system in a large building, which all have different numbers

sentences.english: people of the same gender
sentences.chinese: 同性别的人

sentences.english: Discrimination on grounds of race or gender is forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentences.english: There may be gender differences in attitudes to paid work.
sentences.chinese: 对待有偿劳动的态度可能存在着性别差异。

sentences.english: traditional gender roles
sentences.chinese: 传统的性别角色

sentences.english: toys that do not reinforce gender stereotypes
sentences.chinese: 不强化性别模式化观念的玩具

sentences.english: a science fiction story dealing with gender issues
sentences.chinese: 以性别问题为题材的科幻故事

detailed_translations.english: the fact of being male or female

name: signature
trans: 签名， 签字； 签署

sentences.english: Her signature is totally illegible (= cannot be read ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

sentences.english: The school collected 4,000 signatures for the petition.
sentences.chinese: 学校为这份请愿书收集到了四千个签名。

sentences.english: The Ukrainians put their signatures to the Lisbon Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰签署了《里斯本协议》。

sentences.english: Someone’s forged my signature (= made an illegal copy of my name to deceive people ) on this letter.
sentences.chinese: 有人在这封信中伪造了我的签名。

sentences.english: Each child must obtain the signature of his or her parents.
sentences.chinese: 每个小孩都必须得到父母的签字。

detailed_translations.english: your name written in the way you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter, or on a cheque etc, to show that you have written it

name: architect
trans: 建筑师， 设计师； 创造者

sentences.english: But I am an architect.
sentences.chinese: 但是我是一名建筑师。

sentences.english: They commissioned an architect to design the new library.
sentences.chinese: 他们委托一位建筑师设计这座新图书馆。

sentences.english: The building was constructed from the design of that architect.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼是按那位建筑师的设计建造的。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to design buildings

sentences.english: ...dirt roads now churned into mud by the annual rains.
sentences.chinese: …土路现在被一年一度的雨水搅和得一片泥泞。

detailed_translations.english: If something churns water, mud, or dust, it moves it about violently
a container used for shaking milk in order to make it into butter

name: foundation
trans: 基础； 地基； 创立

sentences.english: It took the builders three weeks to lay the foundations .
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人花了三星期的时间打地基。

sentences.english: The earthquake shook the foundations of the house.
sentences.chinese: 地震动摇了那幢房子的地基。

sentences.english: the British Heart Foundation
sentences.chinese: 英国心脏病基金会

detailed_translations.english: the solid layer of  cement  , bricks, stones etc that is put under a building to support it

sentences.english: Astronomy inherits from astrology.
sentences.chinese: 天文学的前身是占星术。

sentences.english: This should be contrasted with nonscientific programs and the best example of a nonscientific program is astrology.
sentences.chinese: 这点与非科学假说正好相反,非科学假说最好的例子便是占星术了。

sentences.english: It was a great innovator in medicine, astronomy, astrology, mathematics and banking; the Babylonians may even have believed that the world was round.
sentences.chinese: 它在医药，天文学，占星术，数学和银行业方面都堪称一个伟大的改革者。 甚至，古巴比伦人可能已经相信地球是圆的。

detailed_translations.english: the study of the positions and movements of the stars and how they might influence people and events

sentences.english: In our world, not only do we have variability, we've got unpredictability.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的世界不仅有可变性，还有不可预见性。

sentences.english: There are many problems with rankings, especially the metrics used and the variability.
sentences.chinese: 排名有很多问题，特别是排名所依据的指标和排名的可变性。

sentences.english: Abstract: : housing demand and housing adaptability, variability is not coordination problem of current our country city housing is very serious.
sentences.chinese: 摘要： 当前我国城市住宅中居住需求与住宅适应性、可变性不相协调的问题十分突出。

sentences.english: Invaders ransacked the town.
sentences.chinese: 侵略军洗劫了小镇。

detailed_translations.english: a soldier or a group of soldiers that enters a country or town by force in order to take control of it

name: punch
trans: 猛击； 冲床， 穿孔机； 力量， 效力

sentences.english: The guard punched my ticket and I got on.
sentences.chinese: 守卫在我的票上打孔后，我就上去了。

sentences.english: a hole punch
sentences.chinese: 打孔器

detailed_translations.english: to make a hole in something, using a metal tool or other sharp object
a metal tool for cutting holes or for pushing something into a small hole

name: naturally
trans: 当然， 自然； 天生地

sentences.english: After a while, we naturally started talking about the children.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我们自然而然地谈起了孩子。

sentences.english: naturally occurring chemicals
sentences.chinese: 天然存在的化学物质

detailed_translations.english: in a way that you would expect

name: flexibility
trans: 柔韧， 有弹性； 柔顺， 温顺； 灵活性； 适应性

sentences.english: Employees expect flexibility in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 员工们盼望工作安排有弹性。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to change or be changed easily to suit a different situation

name: identity
trans: 身份； 特性； 同一性

sentences.english: The identity of the killer is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 凶手的身份仍未查明。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s identity is their name or who they are

sentences.english: Switzerland is a federal republic.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

detailed_translations.english: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc

sentences.english: I verified the source from which I had that information.
sentences.chinese: 我核实了我获知那条信息的来源。

sentences.english: His statement was verified by several witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 他的说法得到了几位证人的证实。

detailed_translations.english: to discover whether something is correct or true

name: excursion
trans: 远足， 短途旅游； 【物】 偏移， 漂移

sentences.english: They've gone on an excursion to York.
sentences.chinese: 他们到约克旅游去了。

detailed_translations.english: a short journey made for pleasure, especially one that has been organized for a group of people

name: snobbish
trans: 势利的， 谄上欺下的； 自命不凡的

sentences.english: Her family seems snobbish.
sentences.chinese: 她家里人好像挺势利的。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a way that shows you think you are better than other people because you are from a higher social class or know more than they do

name: inaugurate
trans: 开始， 开创； 为…举行就职典礼； 为…举行开幕式； 为…举行落成仪式

sentences.english: He will be inaugurated (as) President in January.
sentences.chinese: 他将于一月份就任总统。

sentences.english: The moon landing inaugurated a new era in space exploration.
sentences.chinese: 登陆月球开创了太空探索的新纪元。

detailed_translations.english: to introduce a new public official or leader at a special ceremony

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.english: The club’s directors rewarded him with a free season ticket.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

detailed_translations.english: something that you get because you have done something good or helpful or have worked hard
to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked fo

name: include
trans: 包括， 包含； 计入

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.english: His job includes looking after under-21 teams.
sentences.chinese: 他的职责包括照管21岁以下球队。

sentences.english: The curriculum includes courses in computing.
sentences.chinese: 课程内容包括计算机技术。

detailed_translations.english: if one thing includes another, the second thing is part of the first

sentences.english: ...a new hockey arena.
sentences.chinese: …一个新的冰球场。

detailed_translations.english: a game played on grass by two teams of 11 players, with sticks and a ball

sentences.english: He swallowed the last of his coffee and asked for the bill.
sentences.chinese: 他喝完最后一口咖啡，要求结账。

sentences.english: Most snakes swallow their prey whole .
sentences.chinese: 大多数蛇都是把猎物囫囵吞下。

detailed_translations.english: to make food or drink go down your throat and towards your stomach

sentences.english: In so many countries that I covered in Southeast Asia it was a given that the elites would take over public land as a kind of perquisite of power.
sentences.chinese: 在我报道过的许多东南亚国家，精英阶层拥有将公有土地挪为私用的特权，是人尽皆知的常态。

detailed_translations.english: to provide or use too little of something

sentences.english: Enable users to submit consolidation nodes, even if not all leaf nodes have been opened.
sentences.chinese: 允许用户提交合并结点，即使并非所有的叶子节点都已打开。

sentences.english: This allows the user greater flexibility in planning for server consolidation or expansion by having the option of adding more users or additional applications.
sentences.chinese: 通过增加更多用户或附加的应用程序，允许用户在服务器合并或扩展的规划中具有更大的灵活性。

sentences.english: NAS is a consolidation of storage over a network for access by heterogeneous clients at the file level.
sentences.chinese: NAS 是通过网络的存储合并，以便不同类型客户端在文件级别进行访问。

detailed_translations.english: the act of consolidating or state of being consolidated

sentences.english: plants nurtured in the greenhouse
sentences.chinese: 在温室里培育的植物

detailed_translations.english: to feed and take care of a child or a plant while it is growing
the education and care that you are given as a child, and the way it affects your later development and attitudes

sentences.english: the destructive power of modern weapons
sentences.chinese: 现代武器的破坏力

detailed_translations.english: causing damage to people or things

name: tillable
trans: 适宜耕种的， 可耕种的

detailed_translations.chinese: 适宜耕种的， 可耕种的

sentences.english: Inactivity can make your joints stiff, and the bones may begin to degenerate.
sentences.chinese: 不活动会使关节僵硬，骨骼因此可能会开始退化。

detailed_translations.english: to become worse
morally unacceptable
someone whose behaviour is considered to be morally unacceptable

name: buckle
trans: 扣紧； 变形； 弯曲

sentences.english: The steel pillars began to buckle.
sentences.chinese: 这些钢柱开始变形了。

detailed_translations.english: to become bent or curved because of heat or pressure, or to make something bend or curve in this way
a piece of metal used for fastening the two ends of a belt, for fastening a shoe, bag etc, or for decoration

sentences.english: He soon regretted his hasty decision.
sentences.chinese: 他很快就对自己仓促作出的决定感到后悔了。

sentences.english: a hasty breakfast
sentences.chinese: 匆忙吃下的一顿早餐

detailed_translations.chinese: 轻率的；匆忙的；草率的；懈怠的
detailed_translations.english: done in a hurry, especially with bad results

sentences.english: The information given to the press was carefully censored by the Ministry of Defence.
sentences.chinese: 发布给报界的信息经过了国防部的仔细审查。

detailed_translations.english: to examine books, films, letters etc to remove anything that is considered offensive, morally harmful, or politically dangerous etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 检查员；[心理] 潜意识压抑力；信件检查员
detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to examine books, films, letters etc and remove anything considered to be offensive, morally harmful, or politically dangerous

name: stir
trans: 搅动； 摇动； 激动

sentences.english: Give that pan a stir , will you?
sentences.chinese: 把那锅东西搅一搅，好吗？

detailed_translations.english: an act of stirring something
to move a liquid or substance around with a spoon or stick in order to mix it together

name: craft
trans: 工艺， 手艺； 船； 航空器

sentences.english: traditional rural crafts
sentences.chinese: 传统的乡村手工艺

sentences.english: arts and crafts
sentences.chinese: 手工艺

detailed_translations.english: a job or activity in which you make things with your hands, and that you usually need skill to do
to make something using a special skill, especially with your hands

sentences.english: Scientists have many theories about how the universe first came into existence (= started to exist ).
sentences.chinese: 关于宇宙的起源，科学家有多种理论。

sentences.english: Pablo led a miserable existence when he first moved to San Juan.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗刚搬到圣胡安时，生活很悲惨。

detailed_translations.english: the state of existing

name: migratory
trans: 迁徙的， 移居的； 流动的， 游牧的

sentences.english: migratory birds
sentences.chinese: 候鸟

detailed_translations.english: involved in or relating to migration

name: threshold
trans: 入门， 门槛； 界限； 开端， 起点

sentences.english: She opened the door and stepped across the threshold.
sentences.chinese: 她打开门，跨过门槛。

sentences.english: The creature is on the threshold of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 这种生物已濒临灭绝。

detailed_translations.english: the entrance to a room or building, or the area of floor or ground at the entrance

name: unwrap
trans: 打开， 解开； 除去包装

sentences.english: Brigitte was unwrapping her birthday presents.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特正在拆她的生日礼物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 打开， 解开； 除去包装
detailed_translations.english: to remove the paper, plastic etc that is around something

name: defendant
trans: 处于被告地位的； 为自己辩护的

sentences.english: We find the defendant not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 我们裁定被告无罪。

detailed_translations.english: the person in a court of law who has been  accused  of doing something illegal

name: coarse
trans: 粗的； 粗糙的； 粗劣的

sentences.english: a jacket of coarse wool
sentences.chinese: 粗羊毛夹克衫

detailed_translations.english: having a rough surface that feels slightly hard

sentences.english: The alley led to the railway bridge.
sentences.chinese: 这条小巷通往铁路桥。

sentences.english: She found the side alley where the stage door was located.
sentences.chinese: 她找到了剧场后门所在的小巷。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow street between or behind buildings, not usually used by cars

sentences.english: I couldn’t sleep for three days – I’m not exaggerating.
sentences.chinese: 我三天没睡觉了——一点不夸张。

detailed_translations.english: to make something seem better, larger, worse etc than it really is

name: discover
trans: 发现， 找到； 发觉

sentences.english: The body was discovered in a field.
sentences.chinese: 尸体是在一块田地里找到的。

sentences.english: Forest Service crews often discover campfires that have not been put out completely.
sentences.chinese: 林务局工作人员常常发现未完全熄灭的营火。

detailed_translations.english: to find someone or something, either by accident or because you were looking for them

sentences.english: All candidates are carefully vetted by Central Office.
sentences.chinese: 所有候选人都由总部仔细审查。

detailed_translations.english: to check someone’s past activities, relationships etc in order to make sure that person is suitable for a particular job, especially an important one
someone who is trained to give medical care and treatment to sick animals

name: offset
trans: 抵消， 补偿， 弥补

sentences.english: He was able to offset his travel expenses against tax.
sentences.chinese: 他可以用旅费抵税。

sentences.english: What expenses can you offset against tax ?
sentences.chinese: 什么开支可以获得税项减免？

detailed_translations.english: to use one cost, payment or situation in order to cancel or reduce the effect of another

sentences.english: Her thick black hair cascaded down below her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她那浓密的黑发瀑布般垂过腰际。

sentences.english: Gallons of water cascaded over the side of the bath.
sentences.chinese: 大量的水从浴缸边溢出来。

detailed_translations.english: a small steep  waterfall  that is one of several together

detailed_translations.chinese: 像瀑布般大量倾泻下来
detailed_translations.english: to flow, fall, or hang down in large quantities

sentences.english: Government troops have succeeded in capturing the rebel leader.
sentences.chinese: 政府军已经成功抓获叛乱分子的头目。

sentences.english: 40 captured French soldiers
sentences.chinese: 40名被俘虏的法国士兵

detailed_translations.english: to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner

name: literate
trans: 有读写能力的； 有文化的； 博学的

sentences.english: The drawback of the internet is that you have to be literate to use it.
sentences.chinese: 互联网的缺点就是人们必须得有文化才能使用它。

detailed_translations.english: able to read and write

name: qualification
trans: 资格， 合格； 技能； 限定， 条件； 合格证

sentences.english: He left school without any qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 他离校时没有拿到任何文凭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a qualification, you have passed an examination or course to show you have a particular level of skill or knowledge in a subject

name: sequence
trans: 一系列， 一连串； 顺序， 次序

sentences.english: Be careful to perform the actions in the correct sequence.
sentences.chinese: 注意要按正确的顺序来完成动作。

detailed_translations.english: the order that something happens or exists in, or the order it is supposed to happen or exist in

sentences.english: The energy is released by combustion on the application of a match.
sentences.chinese: 能量通过点火柴燃烧释放出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process of burning

name: provision
trans: 供应， 供应品； 准备， 预备； 条款， 规定； 给养， 口粮

sentences.english: The agreement includes a provision for each side to check the other side’s weapons.
sentences.chinese: 协议有项规定，允许双方互查武器。

sentences.english: Under the provisions of the Act, employers must supply safety equipment.
sentences.chinese: 该法令规定，雇主必须提供安全设备。

detailed_translations.english: a condition in an agreement or law

name: recruit
trans: 招募，招收；复原，恢复；补充
新兵， 新成员， 新会员

sentences.english: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.chinese: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

sentences.english: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.chinese: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

sentences.english: Drill sergeants have eight weeks to turn fresh recruits into soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 操练军士要在八个星期之内把新兵训练成真正的士兵。

detailed_translations.english: to find new people to work in a company, join an organization, do a job etc
someone who has just joined the army, navy, or  air force

sentences.english: Work will commence on the new building immediately.
sentences.chinese: 新大楼即将破土动工。

detailed_translations.english: to begin or to start something

name: configuration
trans: 结构， 配置； 轮廓， 外形

sentences.english: ...Stonehenge, in southwestern England, an ancient configuration of giant stones.
sentences.chinese: …史前巨石柱群，位于英国西南部，是一座古代巨石阵列。

detailed_translations.chinese: 配置， 布局， 构造
detailed_translations.english: the shape or arrangement of the parts of something

name: chunk
trans: 大块； 相当大的部分

sentences.english: ice chunks
sentences.chinese: 大冰块

detailed_translations.chinese: 厚片， 大块； 相当大的部分
detailed_translations.english: a large thick piece of something that does not have an even shape

name: platform
trans: 平台， 站台； 纲领

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

sentences.english: a small raised platform at one end of the room
sentences.chinese: 房间一端凸起的小讲台

sentences.english: an oil exploration platform
sentences.chinese: 石油勘探平台

detailed_translations.english: the raised place beside a railway track where you get on and off a train in a station

name: libel
trans: 诽谤， 中伤， 诬蔑

sentences.english: restrictions on press freedom, such as libel laws
sentences.chinese: 诽谤法之类对新闻自由的限制

detailed_translations.chinese: 诽谤罪；诋毁；毁坏名誉的东西；控诉书
detailed_translations.english: when someone writes or prints untrue statements about someone so that other people could have a bad opinion of them
to write or print a libel against someone

sentences.english: The provenance of the paintings is unknown.
sentences.chinese: 这些画出处不详。

detailed_translations.english: the place where something originally came from

sentences.english: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 恐龙已灭绝数千万年了。

sentences.english: Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫在野生环境中可能会绝种。

sentences.english: an extinct species
sentences.chinese: 已灭绝的一个物种

detailed_translations.english: (of a type of plant, animal, etc.) no longer in existence

sentences.english: The axle doesn't work smoothly. It needs oiling.
sentences.chinese: 轮轴发涩, 该上油了。

sentences.english: They know how to code, but they're also familiar with the smell of axle grease.
sentences.chinese: 他们知道如何写代码，但是他们也非常熟悉车轴机油的气味。

sentences.english: By definition, a fifth wheel is a wheel or a portion of a wheel with two parts rotating on each other that sits on the front axle of a carriage and adds extra support so it doesn’t tip.
sentences.chinese: 通过定义，第五个轮子，是成为一个四轮马车的前车轴上互相旋转的两个部分的一个轮子或一个轮子的一部分，而加上一个额外的辅助轮子，这样它就不会倾斜。

detailed_translations.english: the bar connecting two wheels on a car or other vehicle

name: degrade
trans: 降级； 堕落； 降解； 退化

sentences.english: a movie that degrades women
sentences.chinese: 贬损女性的影片

sentences.english: How can you degrade yourself by writing such trash?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么能写这种垃圾作品来自贬身份呢？

detailed_translations.english: to treat someone without respect and make them lose respect for themselves

sentences.english: the biodiversity of the rainforest
sentences.chinese: 热带雨林中的生物多样性

detailed_translations.english: the variety of plants and animals in a particular place

name: opaque
trans: 不透明的； 晦涩的， 难懂的

sentences.english: a shower with an opaque glass door
sentences.chinese: 装有不透明玻璃门的淋浴间

detailed_translations.chinese: 不透明的；不传热的；迟钝的
detailed_translations.english: opaque glass or liquid is difficult to see through and often thick

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

sentences.english: One of the many advantages of living in New York is that you can eat out at almost any time of day.
sentences.chinese: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

sentences.english: a clerical assistant
sentences.chinese: 文书助理

sentences.english: ...the assistant secretary of defence.
sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.

sentences.english: He tends to overestimate his own abilities.
sentences.chinese: 他往往高估自己的能力。

sentences.english: The importance of training in health and safety cannot be overestimated (= is extremely important ).
sentences.chinese: 对健康和安全方面的培训极为重要。

detailed_translations.english: to think something is better, more important etc than it really is

name: humid
trans: 湿的， 潮湿的， 湿润的， 多潮气的

sentences.english: Tokyo is extremely humid in mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 仲夏的东京十分潮湿。

detailed_translations.english: if the weather is humid, you feel uncomfortable because the air is very wet and usually hot

name: controversy
trans: 争论， 辩论， 论战

sentences.english: a political controversy
sentences.chinese: 政治争议

sentences.english: the controversy surrounding Skinner’s theories
sentences.chinese: 围绕斯金纳的理论的争议

sentences.english: (= began ) over the use of the chemicals on crops.
sentences.chinese: 对庄稼施用化学品的做法引起了争论。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument about something that involves many people and continues for a long time

name: compulsory
trans: 义务的； 必须做的； 强制性的； 必修的

sentences.english: the threat of compulsory redundancies
sentences.chinese: 强制性裁员的威胁

sentences.english: Car insurance is compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 汽车保险是强制性的。

detailed_translations.english: that must be done because of a law or a rule

name: anticipate
trans: 预期， 预料， 期望； 先于…行动

sentences.english: Sales are better than anticipated.
sentences.chinese: 销量比预期要好。

sentences.english: A good speaker is able to anticipate an audience’s needs and concerns.
sentences.chinese: 好的演讲者能够预先考虑到听众需要什么、关注什么。

sentences.english: Daniel was eagerly anticipating her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔热切地期待着她的到来。

detailed_translations.english: to expect that something will happen and be ready for it

name: detach
trans: 分开， 分离； 分遣

sentences.english: Please detach and fill out the application form.
sentences.chinese: 请撕下申请表并填好。

detailed_translations.english: to remove sth from sth larger; to become separated from sth

sentences.english: Someone had slashed the tires.
sentences.chinese: 有人把轮胎割破了。

detailed_translations.english: to cut or try to cut something violently with a knife, sword etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 砍， 砍痕； 斜线号
detailed_translations.english: a line (/) used in writing to separate words, numbers, or letters

name: seduce
trans: 勾引， 引诱； 诱使， 唆使

sentences.english: The head lecturer was sacked for seducing female students.
sentences.chinese: 这个首席讲师因诱奸女学生而被解雇。

sentences.english: Are you trying to seduce me?
sentences.chinese: 你是在勾引我吗？

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone to have sex with you, especially in a way that is attractive and not too direct

name: landscape
trans: 对…作景观美化， 美化

sentences.english: the beauty of the New England landscape
sentences.chinese: 新英格兰风光之美

detailed_translations.english: an area of countryside or land of a particular type, used especially when talking about its appearance
to make a park, garden etc look attractive and interesting by changing its design, and by planting trees and bushes etc

sentences.english: temporary pain relief
sentences.chinese: 疼痛的暂时缓解

sentences.english: I’m living with my parents, but it’s only temporary.
sentences.chinese: 我和父母住在一起，但这只是暂时的。

sentences.english: You might want to consider temporary work until you decide what you want to do.
sentences.chinese: 在你定下来想做什么之前，也许可以考虑干点临时性工作。

sentences.english: She was employed on a temporary basis .
sentences.chinese: 她是受雇干临时性工作的。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for only a limited period of time

sentences.english: watching monkeys in their natural habitat
sentences.chinese: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

sentences.english: The grassland is an important habitat for many wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 这片草原是很多野花的重要生长地。

detailed_translations.english: the natural home of a plant or animal

name: desperate
trans: 绝望的； 拼命的， 不顾一切的； 极度渴望的； 危急的

sentences.english: I had no money left and was desperate.
sentences.chinese: 我身无分文，已经走投无路了。

sentences.english: Time was running out and we were getting desperate .
sentences.chinese: 时间越来越少，我们越来越感到绝望。

sentences.english: the missing teenager’s desperate parents
sentences.chinese: 失踪少年绝望的父母

detailed_translations.english: willing to do anything to change a very bad situation, and not caring about danger

sentences.english: The weather was awful.
sentences.chinese: 天气很糟糕。

detailed_translations.english: very bad or unpleasant

name: handy
trans: 方便的； 手边的； 手巧的

sentences.english: It’s quite a handy little tool.
sentences.chinese: 这件小工具非常有用。

detailed_translations.english: useful

trans: 树枝； 分部， 分科

sentences.chinese: 暴风雨过后，满地都是大大小小的树枝。

sentences.english: The topmost branches were full of birds.
sentences.chinese: 树梢上停满了鸟儿。

sentences.english: She now works in our Denver branch.
sentences.chinese: 现在她在我们的丹佛分部工作。

sentences.english: a branch of mathematics/physics/biology etc

sentences.chinese: 你是不是在看心理辅导员？

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to help and support people with problems

sentences.chinese: 对比以前的电影与现在的高科技电影，您更倾向于哪一类?为什么?。

sentences.chinese: 不过这些使用高科技的志愿者的灵敏度，很大程度上还依赖于他们个人的人际关系，以及对侨居在北美的海地居民的动员。

sentences.english: Boyun micro intelligent, high-tech intelligent life experience! No matter when and where, you can control appliance and video surveillance through software, do wireless life, enjoy unlimited!
sentences.chinese: 博云微智能，体验高科技智能生活！无论何时何地，您都可以通过软件控制家电和视频监控，做到无线生活，无限享受！

sentences.english: the enclosure of arable land for pasture
