detailed_translations.english: an area surrounded by a wall or fence, and used for a particular purpose

to not go to a place or take part in an event where people expect you to be

sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，我有一个非常通情达理的上司。

sentences.chinese: 他们不仅有优质的健身器材，精心设计的有氧运动课程，而且对个人专业健身问题和需求也作出详尽的解答。

sentences.chinese: 当然我有偏心，但我还是认为我女儿的画最好。

trans: 社会； 社区； 团体； 群落； 共同体

sentences.chinese: ...一批核火箭燃料。

遗弃物； 无家可归者， 社会弃儿

sentences.chinese: 一些年青人在青春期早期突然变得害羞结舌。

sentences.chinese: 通告发布的时机很合适。

sentences.chinese: 例如，在认知测试中，青少年做得几乎和成人一样好。

sentences.chinese: 理查德正沿路走来。

sentences.chinese: 并根据我国多条高速公路标志板面设计成果的统计分析，得出了适合我国实际情况的标准装配板条宽度。

sentences.chinese: 房东拒绝和他续签租约。

sentences.english: He sprang to his feet (= stood up suddenly ) and rushed after her.
sentences.chinese: 他腾地站起身，冲过去追她。

sentences.chinese: 希望科西嘉有更多自治权的活动家

detailed_translations.english: freedom that a place or an organization has to govern or control itself

sentences.chinese: 他质疑麦克尼尔是否适合身居高位。

sentences.english: female voters
sentences.chinese: 女性选民

sentences.english: Over half of the staff is female.
sentences.chinese: 半数以上的员工是女性。

sentences.chinese: 催眠后的恍惚状态

detailed_translations.chinese: 催眠的，催眠术的；易于催眠的

name: minister
trans: 部长； 外交使节； 牧师

sentences.chinese: 资深的内阁部长

sentences.chinese: 他在华盛顿与丹麦公使达成了一项协议。

sentences.chinese: 他的死是个无情的打击。

sentences.chinese: 有时候生活残酷得让人无法承受。

name: shade

遮蔽， 遮光； 把…涂暗

sentences.english: a delicate/pale/rich/soft shade of red
sentences.chinese: 淡 / 浅 / 艳 / 柔和的红色

detailed_translations.english: connected with the way plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment

name: contradict
trans: 反驳， 驳斥； 与…发生矛盾； 相抵触

sentences.chinese: 黛博拉张口想要反驳，但又把嘴闭上了。

sentences.english: Dad just can’t bear to be contradicted.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸就是受不了有人反驳他。

sentences.chinese: 款项将在规定的几个月内支付。

sentences.english: They specified a spacious entrance hall.
sentences.chinese: 他们明确要求门厅要宽敞。

detailed_translations.english: to state something in an exact and detailed way

trans: 离去， 外出； 向前； 向某处

sentences.chinese: 房子仍在燃烧，冒出浓浓的黑烟。

detailed_translations.english: going out from a place or point, and moving forwards or outwards

name: relevance
trans: 中肯， 适当； 相关性

sentences.chinese: 我想，我们大家现在都能领会这句话中肯。

sentences.english: The leopard's skin is marked with black spots.
sentences.chinese: 豹皮上有黑色斑点。

sentences.english: The young leopard separated from its mother would be eaten by other beast.
sentences.chinese: 与母亲离散的幼豹很可能被其他的野兽吃掉。

sentences.english: Her talent was not in gathering information but in analyzing and assessing—a meticulous organizer who plotted and planned with the cunning of a leopard.
sentences.chinese: 她的才华不在信息收集，而在于分析和评估，一个细微谨慎的组织者，策划着，盘算着有如美洲豹般的狡猾。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family, with yellow fur and black spots, which lives in Africa and South Asia

sentences.english: Alice submerged herself in work to try and forget about Tom.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯埋头工作，试图忘记汤姆。

name: compose
trans: 组成， 构成； 写， 创作； 使安定

sentences.english: Barrington has composed the music for a new production of ‘A Midsummer Night’s Dream’.
sentences.chinese: 巴林顿为新版的《仲夏夜之梦》谱了曲。

sentences.english: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 水由氢和氧组成。

detailed_translations.english: to write a piece of music

name: liaise
trans: 做联络人； 联络， 联系

sentences.english: Detectives are liaising with police following the bomb explosion early today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天早些时候炸弹爆炸之后侦探们就一直在联络警方。

detailed_translations.chinese: 做联络人； 联络， 联系
detailed_translations.english: to exchange information with someone who works in another organization or department so that you can both be more effective

sentences.english: The President’s power is circumscribed by Congress and the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 总统的权力受到国会和最高法院的制约。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外切，外接；限制；在…周围画线
detailed_translations.english: to limit power, rights, or abilities

sentences.english: a paint roller
sentences.chinese: 刷漆滚筒

sentences.english: a garden roller
sentences.chinese: 碾草坪机

sentences.english: The boats are taken down to the sea on rollers.
sentences.chinese: 船只用滚柱移到海里。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment consisting of a tube-shaped piece of wood, metal etc that rolls over and over, used for painting, crushing, making things smoother etc

sentences.english: There are grounds for cautious optimism.
sentences.chinese: 有理由保持谨慎乐观。

detailed_translations.english: a tendency to believe that good things will always happen

name: cell
trans: 细胞； 小房间； 电池

sentences.chinese: 癌细胞

sentences.english: Embryos grow by cell division (= the splitting of cells ) .
sentences.chinese: 胚胎通过细胞分裂而成长。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest part of a living thing that can exist independently

trans: 膨胀； 增长， 增强

sentences.chinese: 她的脚踝已经开始肿起来了。

sentences.chinese: 窗框膨胀变形，关得死死的。

detailed_translations.english: to become larger and rounder than normal – used especially about parts of the body
the roundness or curved shape of something
very good

name: landward
trans: 向陆的/地， 近陆的/地

sentences.english: The more mixing that occurs in the estuary the greater is the landward flow in the subsurface layer.
sentences.chinese: 在河口湾出现的混合越强烈，次表层向陆地方向的流量就越大。

sentences.english: The part of a shore between the foreshore and the landward edge that is above High water except in the most severe storms.
sentences.chinese: 后海岸海岸的一部分，位于前滩和除最强烈的暴风雨之外，高出水面的向陆地边缘地区之间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向陆的/地， 近陆的/地

name: crude
trans: 天然的； 粗糙的； 粗俗的

sentences.english: a crude wooden bridge
sentences.chinese: 粗糙的木桥

sentences.english: crude oil/metal
sentences.chinese: 原油；未经提炼的金属

detailed_translations.english: not developed to a high standard, or made with little skill

name: remind
trans: 提醒， 使想起； 使发生联想

sentences.english: Yes, I’ll be there. Thanks for reminding me.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我会去那里的。 谢谢提醒。

sentences.english: He made a few notes to remind himself of what he wanted to say.
sentences.chinese: 他记了几条，提醒自己要说些什么。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone remember something that they must do

trans: 制造商， 制造厂， 生产者

sentences.chinese: 使用新洗碗机之前，请先阅读厂家的说明书。

sentences.english: The fridge was sent back to the manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 那台冰箱被退还给厂家了。

detailed_translations.english: a company that makes large quantities of goods

name: valid
trans: 有效的， 具有法律效力的； 正当的； 有根据的， 有理的

sentences.chinese: 有效信用卡

sentences.english: Your return ticket is valid for three months.
sentences.chinese: 你的往返票有效期为三个月。

sentences.english: Police officers must have a valid reason for stopping motorists.
sentences.chinese: 警察拦下驾车者必须有正当理由。

detailed_translations.english: that is legally or officially acceptable

sentences.english: The Chancellor has withstood the criticism and held firm.
sentences.chinese: 总理顶住批评，坚持立场。

detailed_translations.english: to defend yourself successfully against people who attack, criticize, or oppose you

sentences.chinese: 我今天用吸尘器清洁地毯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集； 用真空吸尘器打扫
detailed_translations.english: to clean using a vacuum cleaner
a space that is completely empty of all gas, especially one from which all the air has been taken away

name: encourage
trans: 鼓励； 促进， 激发

sentences.chinese: 我要感谢每一位鼓励和支持过我的人。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone the courage or confidence to do something

sentences.english: His death marked the end of an era.
sentences.chinese: 他的去世标志着一个时代的终结。

sentences.english: the Victorian era
sentences.chinese: 维多利亚时代

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in history that is known for a particular event, or for particular qualities

sentences.english: the decline in standards of personal morality
sentences.chinese: 个人道德标准的下降

sentences.english: The authorities are protectors of public morality.
sentences.chinese: 当权者是公众道德的捍卫者。

detailed_translations.english: beliefs or ideas about what is right and wrong and about how people should behave

sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将由当地慈善机构管理。

sentences.english: Our office administers the affairs of the Society.
sentences.chinese: 我们办公室管理协会的事务。

detailed_translations.english: to manage the work or money of a company or organization

name: transplant
trans: 移栽，移种；移植；使迁移，使移居['trænsplaːnt]

sentences.chinese: 移植肾脏的手术如今相当常见。

detailed_translations.english: to move an organ, piece of skin etc from one person’s body and put it into another as a form of medical treatment

sentences.chinese: 该国以出产独特动物群和植物群闻名，如今开放专业申请将其保育类动物出口到海外的动物园去。

sentences.chinese: 一只衰弱的大猫刷一声从梯子上摔下来，盯着有香草味的罐子并粗鲁地叫着，可厦门动物园的工作员对此置之不理！

trans: 证明合格， 鉴定合格

detailed_translations.chinese: 证明合格， 鉴定合格

sentences.english: The full picture has not yet been elucidated.
sentences.chinese: 详细情况还没有解释清楚。

detailed_translations.english: to explain something that is difficult to understand by providing more information

sentences.chinese: 这个国家日益严重的预算赤字

sentences.english: the US’s foreign trade deficit

detailed_translations.english: the difference between the amount of something that you have and the higher amount that you need

trans: 向上， 往上； 上坡； 艰难地

sentences.chinese: 这条路弯弯曲曲通向山上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 向上， 往上； 上坡； 艰难地
detailed_translations.english: towards the top of a hill

sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

sentences.english: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

detailed_translations.english: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans

sentences.chinese: …躲避一场突如其来的瓢泼大雨。

detailed_translations.english: a lot of rain that falls in a short time

trans: 继续逗留； 缓慢消失

sentences.chinese: 他拖了几个星期才去世，让所有的医生都很惊讶。

sentences.chinese: 兽医学

detailed_translations.english: relating to the medical care and treatment of sick animals

sentences.english: Learning is a cumulative process.
sentences.chinese: 学习是个逐渐积累的过程。

name: slip
trans: 滑倒，失足；减退；摆脱，闪开；塞入
差错， 疏漏； 滑倒； 纸片

sentences.chinese: 本悄悄地溜出了房间。

sentences.chinese: 警察到来时，一个男子设法溜出了俱乐部。

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

trans: 抛锚； 使固定， 系牢； 使基于； 主持
锚；给人安全感的人；精神支柱；顶梁柱

sentences.chinese: 我们在离岸几码远的地方抛锚停航。

sentences.chinese: 第二天早上他们起锚，又开始向南航行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 锚；抛锚停泊；靠山；新闻节目主播
detailed_translations.english: a piece of heavy metal that is lowered to the bottom of the sea, a lake etc to prevent a ship or boat moving

sentences.english: There is a certain logic in their choice of architect.
sentences.chinese: 他们对建筑师的选择是有一定道理的。

detailed_translations.english: a way of thinking about something that seems correct and reasonable, or a set of sensible reasons for doing something

sentences.english: He had a problem with his eyesight.
sentences.chinese: 他的视力有问题。

detailed_translations.english: your ability to see

name: spice
trans: 使增添趣味； 往…加香料

sentences.chinese: 香草和香料

detailed_translations.english: a type of powder or seed, taken from plants, that you put into food you are cooking to give it a special taste

name: screen
trans: 屏幕， 银幕； 遮蔽； 屏风， 帘； 筛子
掩蔽， 遮蔽； 包庇； 筛选； 放映， 播放

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

sentences.english: MasterCard says its index reflects the interconnectedness of major global cities and tracks the ways in which business and leisure jet-setters spend their money.
sentences.chinese: 万事达公司表示，其数据反映出世界主要大城市的互联性，并追踪了商务和休闲飞机乘客的消费方式。

sentences.english: The children ran naked through the yard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们光着身子跑过院子。

sentences.chinese: 裸体男子的照片

sentences.chinese: 他们发现尸体半裸着躺在草丛中。

sentences.chinese: 监狱长下令将那个犯人剥光衣服进行鞭笞。

detailed_translations.english: not wearing any clothes or not covered by clothes

sentences.chinese: 她感到有些想家了。

detailed_translations.english: feeling unhappy because you are a long way from your home

sentences.english: The trial is due to start next week.
sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a legal process in which a judge and often a  jury  in a court of law examine information to decide whether someone is guilty of a crime

name: perception
trans: 看法； 感觉； 洞察力

sentences.english: And when they do, what do you think their perception will be?
sentences.chinese: 当他们这样做时，你觉得他们的知觉是怎样的？

detailed_translations.english: Perception is the recognition of things using your senses, especially the sense of sight

name: exploitation
trans: 开采， 开发； 剥削， 榨取； 自私的利用

detailed_translations.english: the development and use of minerals, forests, oil etc for business or industry

name: undertake
trans: 承担， 负起责任； 同意或答应做某事

sentences.english: University professors both teach and undertake research.
sentences.chinese: 大学教授既要教学又要从事研究工作。

sentences.english: He undertook to pay the money back in six months.
sentences.chinese: 他保证在六个月之内还钱。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself responsible for sth and start doing it

name: pronounceable
trans: 发得出的； 可发音的

detailed_translations.chinese: 发得出的； 可发音的
detailed_translations.english: a word, name etc that is pronounceable is easy to say

name: indigenous
trans: 土产的， 本地的， 本土的

sentences.english: the many indigenous cultures which existed in Siberia
sentences.chinese: 存在于西伯利亚的许多当地文化

detailed_translations.chinese: 本土的；土著的；国产的；固有的
detailed_translations.english: indigenous people or things have always been in the place where they are, rather than being brought there from somewhere else

name: bureau
trans: 办公室； 机构； 局； 处； 所

sentences.english: an employment bureau
sentences.chinese: 职业介绍所

sentences.english: the Citizens Advice Bureau
sentences.chinese: 公民咨询局

detailed_translations.english: an office or organization that collects or provides information

sentences.english: I sympathize with the introvert as I would with the sickly, but both are missing a lot of life.
sentences.chinese: 我会像体谅体弱病残的人那样，体谅性格内向的人，但两者都失去许多人生体验。

sentences.english: I sympathize with the introvert as I would with the sickly, but both are missing a lot of life.
sentences.chinese: 我同情那些内向的人正如我会同情病人一样，因为他们的生活中都有缺失的部分。

sentences.english: How do you think the introvert and the extrovert will behave in such an environment?
sentences.chinese: 在完全相同的环境下，你认为内向的人和外向的人都会如何表现呢？

detailed_translations.english: someone who is quiet and shy, and does not enjoy being with other people

sentences.english: Make sure the soil is moist before planting the seeds.
sentences.chinese: 播种之前要确保土壤湿润。

sentences.english: a rich, moist chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 香浓软润的巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: warm moist air
sentences.chinese: 温暖湿润的空气

sentences.english: Her eyes were moist (= she was almost crying ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的眼睛湿润了。

detailed_translations.english: slightly wet, especially in a way that is pleasant or suitable

sentences.english: The miners rode a conveyance attached to a cable made of braided steel wire.
sentences.chinese: 矿工们乘坐连着钢索的缆车。

sentences.english: cables and switches for computers
sentences.chinese: 电脑的缆线和开关

sentences.english: She sent a cable to her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她给母亲发了封电报。

detailed_translations.english: a thick strong metal rope used on ships, to support bridges etc

name: nasty
trans: 令人讨厌的； 不友好的， 恶意的， 下流的； 恶劣的

sentences.english: a nasty temper
sentences.chinese: 坏脾气

sentences.english: the nasty things that were being written about her
sentences.chinese: 人们描述的那些关于她的坏事情

sentences.english: There’s a nasty streak in her character.
sentences.chinese: 她性格中有令人讨厌的一面。

sentences.english: Drivers often have a nasty habit of driving too close to cyclists.
sentences.chinese: 司机常有一个坏习惯，就是车开得离骑自行车的人太近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下流的；肮脏的；脾气不好的；险恶的
detailed_translations.english: nasty behaviour or remarks are extremely unkind and unpleasant

name: intense
trans: 强烈的， 剧烈的； 紧张的； 热情的， 热切的

sentences.chinese: 如今的年轻人面临要出人头地的巨大压力。

sentences.english: the intense heat of the desert
sentences.chinese: 沙漠的炽热

sentences.english: The pain was so intense I couldn’t sleep.
sentences.chinese: 疼得我都睡不着觉。

sentences.english: He took an intense interest in all religious matters.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有宗教事宜都很感兴趣。

sentences.english: a look of intense dislike
sentences.chinese: 极端厌恶的表情

sentences.chinese: 柔韧的皮革做成的鞋子
