detailed_translations.english: able to bend without breaking or cracking

sentences.english: Two flashes mean danger.
sentences.chinese: 两次闪光表示危险。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

detailed_translations.english: a bright light that shines for a short time and then stops shining
to shine suddenly and brightly for a short time, or to make something shine in this way

sentences.english: the continents of Asia and Africa
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及非洲大陆

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of land surrounded by sea
able to control your sexual desires

sentences.english: The ten young people sleep between two hard, narrow beds and one large mattress on the floor with no privacy at all.
sentences.chinese: 十个年轻人就睡在两张窄小的硬板床和地板上的一张大床垫上，没有任何隐私可言。

sentences.english: If someone pokes fun at your mattress on the floor, or teases you about your empty cabinets, smile and take it in stride.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人取笑你放在地板上的床垫，或揶揄你空空的橱柜，请面带微笑从容应对此事。

sentences.english: She laid a spring mattress under the sheet.
sentences.chinese: 她在床单下面铺了一个弹簧床垫。

detailed_translations.english: the soft part of a bed that you lie on

name: complexity
trans: 复杂， 复杂性； 复杂的事物

sentences.english: a design of great complexity
sentences.chinese: 一项非常复杂的设计

detailed_translations.english: the state of being complicated

name: disturbance
trans: 扰乱， 打扰； 骚乱， 混乱； 心神不安， 烦恼

sentences.english: There were disturbances in the crowd as fans left the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 球迷离开体育场时，人群中发生了骚乱。

sentences.english: When a helicopter lands, it can cause a disturbance to local residents.
sentences.chinese: 直升机降落会惊扰当地居民。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people behave violently in public

name: simultaneous
trans: 同时的， 同时发生的， 同时存在的； 同步的

sentences.english: They grabbed each other’s hands in simultaneous panic.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩同时惊慌起来，相互抓住对方的手。

sentences.english: Up to twenty users can have simultaneous access to the system.
sentences.chinese: 最多可有20名用户同时登该系统。

sentences.english: The speeches will be broadcast live, with simultaneous translation (= immediate translation, as the person is speaking ) into English.
sentences.chinese: 这些演讲将作现场直播，并配有英语同声传译。

detailed_translations.english: things that are simultaneous happen at exactly the same time

sentences.english: Join now and you will automatically receive 50% off your first purchase.
sentences.chinese: 现在加入，立即享受首次购物五折优惠。

detailed_translations.english: as the result of a situation or action, and without you having to do anything more

sentences.english: The bank will only lend me money if my parents guarantee the loan.
sentences.chinese: 只有我父母作担保，银行才会给我贷款。

sentences.english: I’m afraid there’s no guarantee of success.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕不能保证一定会成功。

detailed_translations.english: to promise that you will pay back money that someone else has borrowed, if they do not pay it back themselves
a formal promise that something will be done

name: recommend
trans: 推荐； 劝告； 使受欢迎

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

sentences.english: In many cases, the people there are fighting, in a literal sense, for their homes.
sentences.chinese: 多数情况下，那里的人们实际上都是在为他们的家园而战斗。

detailed_translations.english: the literal meaning of a word or expression is its basic or original meaning

sentences.english: They walked together with their arms entwined.
sentences.chinese: 他们挽着胳膊一起走。

detailed_translations.english: to twist two things together or to wind one thing around another

name: indolent
trans: 懒惰的， 倦怠的； 不活跃的， 无行动的

sentences.english: The former investment banker has not been indolent: his department has been a factory for acronyms since the crisis began.
sentences.chinese: 这位前投资银行家并非懒惰，自危机开始以来，他的部门已成为加工厂的代称。

sentences.english: In a 1942 presentation at the New York Academy of Medicine, the scientists reported that after lobotomy, patients did sometimes become “indolent” or “outspoken.
sentences.chinese: 在1942年纽约医学专科学院的一个介绍会中，一些科学家提出，额叶切除术后，病人的确有时变得“懒惰”或“直言”。

detailed_translations.english: lazy

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

sentences.english: Beer is a beverage of the remotest time.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒是一种最古老的饮料。

sentences.english: And not only food: frequently there must be a beverage.
sentences.chinese: 而且不仅仅为了食物，还常常必须有饮料。

sentences.english: In this case, you want to provide the user with a way to say the desired beverage.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，您想为用户提供一种方法，让他们说出自己想要的饮料。

name: advertisement
trans: 广告， 公告； 广告活动， 宣传

sentences.english: They put an advertisement in ‘The Morning News’, offering a high salary for the right person.
sentences.chinese: 他们在《晨报》上刊登了一则启事，出高薪寻找合适的人选。

sentences.english: The organizers of the concert had taken out a full page advertisement in ‘The New York Times’.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会筹办者在《纽约时报》上刊登了整版广告。

sentences.english: Only a handful of people answered the advertisement .
sentences.chinese: 只有寥寥数人对该广告作出了回应。

detailed_translations.english: a picture, set of words, or a short film, which is intended to persuade people to buy a product or use a service, or that gives information about a job that is available, an event that is going to happen etc

name: ripe
trans: 成熟的； 时机成熟的

sentences.english: Those tomatoes aren’t ripe yet.
sentences.chinese: 那些番茄还没熟。

sentences.english: The conditions were ripe for social change.
sentences.chinese: 社会变革的时机已经成熟。

detailed_translations.english: fully grown and ready to be eaten

name: backbone
trans: 脊椎； 骨干； 支柱

sentences.english: Farmers are the backbone of this community.
sentences.chinese: 农场主是这个团体的中坚力量。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支柱；主干网；决心，毅力；脊椎
detailed_translations.english: the row of connected bones that go down the middle of your back

name: insane
trans: 蠢极的， 荒唐的； 精神病的， 精神失常的， 疯狂的

sentences.english: That’s an insane risk.
sentences.chinese: 那是疯狂的冒险之举。

sentences.english: The whole idea sounds absolutely insane to me.
sentences.chinese: 整个主意在我看来荒谬至极。

sentences.english: Why did you do that? Have you gone insane?
sentences.chinese: 为什么这么做？你疯了吗？

detailed_translations.english: completely stupid or crazy, often in a way that is dangerous

sentences.english: Women tend to attribute their success to external causes such as luck.
sentences.chinese: 女性往往把她们的成功归因于外因，如运气。

detailed_translations.english: If you attribute something to an event or situation, you think that it was caused by that event or situation
a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful

name: mechanism
trans: 机械装置； 机制， 机理； 办法

sentences.english: the brake mechanism
sentences.chinese: 刹车装置

sentences.english: a clock mechanism
sentences.chinese: 钟表机件

detailed_translations.english: part of a machine or a set of parts that does a particular job

sentences.english: genetic defects
sentences.chinese: 遗传性缺陷

sentences.english: each person’s genetic make-up
sentences.chinese: 每个人的遗传特征

sentences.english: genetic research
sentences.chinese: 基因研究

detailed_translations.english: relating to genes or genetics

sentences.english: People watched in horror as the plane crashed to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 人们惊恐地看着飞机坠落到地面上。

sentences.english: The thought of being left alone filled her with horror.
sentences.chinese: 想到被孤零零地留下，她就不寒而栗。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great shock, fear or disgust

sentences.english: Belladonna and red arsenic are deadly poisons .
sentences.chinese: 颠茄和雄黄都是致命的毒物。

sentences.english: a box of rat poison
sentences.chinese: 一盒鼠药

sentences.english: He killed several people by poisoning their tea.
sentences.chinese: 他在茶里下毒杀死了几个人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that can cause death or serious illness if you eat it, drink it etc
to give someone poison, especially by adding it to their food or drink, in order to harm or kill them

sentences.english: He passed into a deep slumber.
sentences.chinese: 他酣然入梦。

detailed_translations.english: sleep
to sleep

name: inculcate
trans: 谆谆教诲， 反复灌输

sentences.english: Not all schools manage to successfully inculcate a love of learning.
sentences.chinese: 不是所有的学校都能培养出学生爱学习的热情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 教育；谆谆教诲；教授；反覆灌输
detailed_translations.english: to fix ideas, principles etc in someone’s mind

sentences.english: optimum conditions for growth
sentences.chinese: 最适宜生长的条件

sentences.english: This design makes the optimum use of the available space.
sentences.chinese: 这一设计最大限度地利用了现有的空间。

detailed_translations.english: the best or most suitable for a particular purpose or in a particular situation

name: persuade
trans: 说服， 劝说； 使相信

sentences.english: He was fairly easily persuaded .
sentences.chinese: 他很轻易就被说服了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事
detailed_translations.english: to make someone decide to do something, especially by giving them reasons why they should do it, or asking them many times to do it

sentences.english: The EU Council of Finance Ministers failed to reach a consensus on the pace of integration.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

sentences.english: the current consensus of opinion
sentences.chinese: 目前观点上的一致

sentences.english: The general consensus was that technology was a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 大家都认为科技是好东西。

sentences.english: the consensus politics of the fifties
sentences.chinese: 50年代的共识政治

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that everyone in a group agrees with or accepts

name: disorientate
trans: 使失去方向感； 使迷茫， 使不知所措

sentences.english: An overnight stay at a friend's house disorientates me.
sentences.chinese: 在朋友家睡了一觉，醒来我不知自己身在何处。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使失去方向感； 使迷茫， 使不知所措
detailed_translations.english: If something disorientates you, you lose your sense of direction, or you generally feel lost and uncertain, for example, because you are in an unfamiliar environment

sentences.english: Meantime, continuation of low tropospheric jet produces plentiful vapor for formation and continuation of rain gush.
sentences.chinese: 同时，低空西南急流的维持，为暴雨的产生和维持提供了充足的水汽。

sentences.english: With the data of GPS meteorology network in Wuhan region, the article discussed the study of directly calculating precipitable water vapor with GPS zenith tropospheric delay.
sentences.chinese: 本文针对武汉地区GPS气象网资料，进行了GPS对流层延迟直接推算可降水量的研究。

name: absolute
trans: 完全的， 绝对的， 纯粹的

sentences.english: I have absolute confidence in her.
sentences.chinese: 我对她充满信心。

sentences.english: Some of the stuff on TV is absolute rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 电视上播放的有些东西简直就是垃圾。

sentences.english: How did you do that? You’re an absolute genius.
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么做的？ 你绝对是个天才。

sentences.english: That meal last night cost an absolute fortune.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚那顿饭花了一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: complete or total

name: describe
trans: 描述， 描写， 形容

sentences.english: The police asked her to describe the man.
sentences.chinese: 警察叫她描述一下那名男子。

sentences.english: Another approach to the problem is described in Chapter 3.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一种解决方法在第三章有所阐述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形容， 描写； 画出
detailed_translations.english: to say what something or someone is like by giving details about them

sentences.english: I grabbed my bag and ran off.
sentences.chinese: 我抓起我的包就跑。

sentences.english: Two men grabbed her and pushed her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子抓住她，把她推倒在地上。

sentences.english: Kay grabbed hold of my arm to stop herself falling.
sentences.chinese: 凯抓住我的手臂，以免自己摔倒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓取，攫取；赶紧做；抓住；抓，夺
detailed_translations.english: to take hold of someone or something with a sudden or violent movement
to suddenly try to take hold of something

sentences.english: The slum must be inside you.
sentences.chinese: 贫民窟一定是在你内心.

sentences.english: But, she added, even after she had a classroom, she had no idea what might come of her effort to teach kids from the slum.
sentences.chinese: 但她补充说，即使她有了教室后，她并不知道她对贫民窟的孩子施教会得出什么样的结果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 贫民窟；陋巷；脏乱的地方
detailed_translations.english: a house or an area of a city that is in very bad condition, where very poor people live

name: wealthy
trans: 富的， 富裕的； 充裕的

sentences.english: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上的富国

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, possessions etc

sentences.english: a foam mattress
sentences.chinese: 海绵橡胶床垫

detailed_translations.english: a type of soft rubber with a lot of air in it, used in furniture

detailed_translations.chinese: 起泡沫；吐白沫；起着泡沫流动
detailed_translations.english: to produce foam

name: navigable
trans: 可通航的； 适于航行的

sentences.english: ...the navigable portion of the Nile.
sentences.chinese: ...尼罗河的适航河段。

detailed_translations.chinese: (江河、海洋)可航行的，可通航的
detailed_translations.english: a river, lake etc that is navigable is deep and wide enough for ships to travel on

sentences.english: We’re looking for someone with experience in administration.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找一个有管理经验的人。

sentences.english: The health service spends too much on administration.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务部门在行政方面花费太多。

detailed_translations.english: the activities that are involved in managing the work of a company or organization

sentences.english: They dwelt in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在森林里。

sentences.english: So you made a mistake, but there's no need to dwell on it.
sentences.chinese: 你是错了，不过不必老是想着这事儿。

detailed_translations.english: to live in a particular place

name: incorporate
trans: 把…合并， 纳入； 包含， 吸收

sentences.english: It allows you to harness existing technologies and incorporate them into one application.
sentences.chinese: 它允许您利用现有的技术并将它们合并到同一个应用程序中。

sentences.english: The next step is to generate the report and then incorporate it as an affiliated document of the master document.
sentences.chinese: 紧接着的步骤就是产生这个报告，然后将它作为主文档的附属文档与主文档合并。

sentences.english: an attempt to recapture the city
sentences.chinese: 收复这座城市的尝试

detailed_translations.chinese: 夺回；拿回；再体验；政府征收再经历
detailed_translations.english: to take control of a place again by fighting for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 夺回；取回；政府对公司超额收益或利润的征收

sentences.english: The city boasts two excellent museums.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市以拥有两个优秀的博物馆而自豪。

sentences.english: The Society boasts 3,000 members worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 这个协会以拥有3,000名来自世界各地的会员而自豪。

sentences.english: It is the charity's proud boast that it has never yet turned anyone away.
sentences.chinese: 该慈善机构自吹自擂，声称从来没有拒绝过任何人。

detailed_translations.english: if a place, object, or organization boasts something, it has something that is very good

detailed_translations.chinese: 自夸，吹嘘；以拥有…而自豪
detailed_translations.english: to talk too proudly about your abilities, achievements, or possessions

detailed_translations.chinese: 自吹自擂， 自夸的话
detailed_translations.english: Boast is also a noun

name: refresher
trans: 提神物； 帮助记忆的东西或人； 补习课程

sentences.english: In addition, picking up some excellent people to take a refresher course is also a good measure.
sentences.chinese: 此外，挑选一些优秀人才去进修也是一个很好的方法。

name: reiterate
trans: 重复， 反复； 反复地说， 重申

sentences.english: Let me reiterate the most important points.
sentences.chinese: 我来把最重要的几点重申一遍。

detailed_translations.english: to repeat a statement or opinion in order to make your meaning as clear as possible

sentences.english: I helped him choose the furniture for his house.
sentences.chinese: 我帮他挑选房子里用的家具。

sentences.english: I can’t think of a single piece of furniture in my house that I bought new.
sentences.chinese: 我想不出家里有哪件家具是新买的。

sentences.english: office furniture
sentences.chinese: 办公室家具

detailed_translations.english: large objects such as chairs, tables, beds, and cupboards

name: counterpart
trans: 与对方地位相当的人； 配对物； 副本

sentences.english: As soon as he heard what was afoot, he telephoned his German and Italian counterparts to protest.
sentences.chinese: 他一听到在进行中的事，马上就给德国和意大利相应人员打电话抗议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 副本；配对物；极相似的人或物
detailed_translations.english: Someone's or something's counterpart is another person or thing that has a similar function or position in a different place

name: sinister
trans: 不吉祥的， 凶兆的； 险恶的， 邪恶的

sentences.english: There is a sinister side to these events.
sentences.chinese: 这些事件有邪恶的一面。

sentences.english: He was a handsome man, in a sinister sort of way.
sentences.chinese: 他英俊的外貌中带着一点阴险。

sentences.english: a sinister atmosphere
sentences.chinese: 不祥的气氛

detailed_translations.chinese: 阴险的；凶兆的；灾难性的；左边的
detailed_translations.english: making you feel that something evil, dangerous, or illegal is happening or will happen

name: segment
trans: 片段； 部分； 节； 线段； 瓣

sentences.english: Decorate with orange segments.
sentences.chinese: 用几瓣橙子作点缀。

detailed_translations.english: a part of something that is different from or affected differently from the whole in some way

sentences.english: a shirt with black and white stripes
sentences.chinese: 黑白条纹衬衫

detailed_translations.english: a line of colour, especially one of several lines of colour all close together
to mark with a stripe or stripes

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

name: attractive
trans: 吸引的， 有吸引力的； 引起注意的

sentences.english: an attractive young woman
sentences.chinese: 妩媚动人的年轻女子

sentences.english: Women seem to find him attractive .
sentences.chinese: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有吸引力的， 引起注意的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is attractive is good looking, especially in a way that makes you sexually interested in them

name: cater
trans: 提供饮食； 迎合； 满足需要

sentences.english: We cater to an exclusive clientele.
sentences.chinese: 我们满足一个特殊客户群的需求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 投合，迎合；满足需要；提供饮食及服务
detailed_translations.english: to provide and serve food and drinks at a party, meeting etc, usually as a business

sentences.english: The food was superb.
sentences.chinese: 食物好吃极了。

sentences.english: superb weather
sentences.chinese: 极好的天气

detailed_translations.english: extremely good

sentences.english: A duplicate copy should be made for the county record office.
sentences.chinese: 应该制作一个副本呈交县档案室。

sentences.english: a duplicate key
sentences.chinese: 配制的钥匙

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的， 复制的
detailed_translations.english: exactly the same as something, or made as an exact copy of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 完全一样的东西，复制品
detailed_translations.english: an exact copy of something that you can use in the same way

detailed_translations.chinese: 复制， 复印； 重复
detailed_translations.english: to copy something exactly

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

sentences.english: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 气温在持续下降。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less

sentences.english: A glossary of terms is included for the reader's convenience.
sentences.chinese: 为了方便读者，还收录了术语汇编。

detailed_translations.english: a list of special words and explanations of their meanings, often at the end of a book

name: flutter
trans: 振， 拍打； 飘动， 晃动； 跳动

sentences.english: Dead leaves fluttered slowly to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 枯叶缓缓飘落到地上。

sentences.english: The flag fluttered in the light breeze.
sentences.chinese: 旗帜在微风中飘动。

detailed_translations.english: to make small gentle movements in the air

name: ignorance
trans: 无知， 愚昧； 不知道

sentences.english: Excuse my ignorance, but how does it actually work?
sentences.chinese: 请原谅我的无知，它究竟是如何运作的？

detailed_translations.english: lack of knowledge or information about something

sentences.english: Is verse 75 true of Joseph? Was the LORD afflicting him? Or was it Potiphar's wife who had afflicted him?
sentences.chinese: 75节是约瑟的真实写照吗？是神在让他受苦吗？或者让他受苦的是波提乏的妻子？

detailed_translations.english: deeply distressing; painful

sentences.english: preventative measures
sentences.chinese: 预防措施

detailed_translations.english: Preventative means the same as

name: germinate
trans: 发芽， 生长； 发展

sentences.english: Some seed varieties germinate fast, so check every day or so.
sentences.chinese: 有一些品种的种子发芽快，所以差不多每天都要察看一下。

detailed_translations.english: if a seed germinates, or if it is germinated, it begins to grow

sentences.english: Now she can reduce the installment size that she can afford to pay, by extending the loan period.
sentences.chinese: 现在，她就可通过展延贷款周期来减小自己有能力支付的分期付款的规模。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分期付款， 分期交付； 部分

sentences.english: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work.
sentences.chinese: 人们移居到雅加达这样的城市找工作。

sentences.english: Most birds have to fly long distances to migrate.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的鸟类不得不飞行很长的距离进行迁徙。

detailed_translations.english: if people migrate, they go to live in another area or country, especially in order to find work

sentences.english: a crocodile briefcase
sentences.chinese: 鳄鱼皮公文包

detailed_translations.english: a large  reptile  with a long mouth and many sharp teeth that lives in lakes and rivers in hot wet parts of the world

sentences.english: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.chinese: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从， 听从； 忍受； 甘心
detailed_translations.english: If you submit to something, you unwillingly allow something to be done to you, or you do what someone wants, for example because you are not powerful enough to resist

detailed_translations.chinese: 屈从，听从，服从；呈送，提交；主张，建议
detailed_translations.english: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve

name: occupy
trans: 占用， 占领； 忙碌于； 从事

sentences.english: Football occupies most of my leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 足球占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。

detailed_translations.english: if something occupies you or your time, you are busy doing it

name: string
trans: 缚； 扎； 挂； 串起； 使排成一列

sentences.english: Her key hung on a string around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她的钥匙穿了根绳子挂在脖子上。

sentences.english: a ball of string
sentences.chinese: 一团细绳

sentences.english: I need a piece of string to tie this package.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一根绳子来捆这个包裹。

sentences.english: a string of pearls
sentences.chinese: 一串珍珠

detailed_translations.english: a strong thread made of several threads twisted together, used for tying or fastening things

sentences.english: affluent families
sentences.chinese: 富裕的家庭

sentences.english: The diet of the affluent has not changed much over the decades.
sentences.chinese: 富人的饮食数十年来没怎么变。

detailed_translations.english: having plenty of money, nice houses, expensive things etc
The affluent are people who are affluent

name: simplicity
trans: 简单， 简易； 朴素； 直率， 单纯

sentences.english: Mona wrote with a beautiful simplicity of style.
sentences.chinese: 莫娜的文笔朴实优美。

sentences.english: For the sake of simplicity, the tax form is divided into three sections.
sentences.chinese: 为简明起见，税单分成三个部分。

sentences.english: James’ solution to this problem was simplicity itself (= very simple ) .
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯对这个问题的解决办法十分简单。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being simple and not complicated, especially when this is attractive or useful

sentences.english: the European summit
sentences.chinese: 欧洲首脑会议

sentences.english: The two presidents agreed to hold a summit in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 两位总统商定在春天举行一次首脑会议。

sentences.english: a five-nation summit meeting
sentences.chinese: 五国峰会

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高点， 峰顶； 最高级会议
detailed_translations.english: an important meeting or set of meetings between the leaders of several governments

sentences.english: At the Sheffield arena, the speakers were magnified ten times on a giant screen.
sentences.chinese: 在谢菲尔德体育馆，演讲者在一个巨大的屏幕上被放大了十倍。

sentences.english: A public address system magnifies all the little noises and coughs.
sentences.chinese: 扩音系统会放大任何细小的噪音和咳嗽声。

sentences.english: The report tends to magnify the risks involved
sentences.chinese: 这份报告有夸大所涉风险的倾向。

detailed_translations.english: to make something seem bigger or louder, especially using special equipment

name: redundant
trans: 被解雇的； 多余的， 过剩的； 累赘的， 冗长的

sentences.english: Seventy factory workers were made redundant in the resulting cuts.
sentences.chinese: 在继而发生的裁员中，70名工厂工人被解雇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过剩的；失业的，被解雇的
detailed_translations.english: if you are redundant, your employer no longer has a job for you

name: vested
trans: 法律规定的； 既定的

sentences.english: Shareholders have a vested right to 10% per annum.
sentences.chinese: 股东享有每年10%分红的既定权利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法律规定的； 既定的
detailed_translations.english: vested rights, powers, property etc belong to you and cannot be removed

name: conclusion
trans: 结论， 推论； 结束， 结尾； 【法】 缔结， 议定

sentences.english: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.english: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.english: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.english: At the conclusion of the meeting, little progress had been made.
sentences.chinese: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

detailed_translations.english: something you decide after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: Wood is a durable material.
sentences.chinese: 木头是耐用材料。

detailed_translations.english: staying in good condition for a long time, even if used a lot

name: impose
trans: 把…强加于； 征； 处以

sentences.english: Parents should beware of imposing their own tastes on their children.
sentences.chinese: 父母应该提防把自己的兴趣强加给孩子。

sentences.english: A new tax was imposed on fuel.
sentences.chinese: 当局开始对燃油征收一项新税。

detailed_translations.english: If you impose your opinions or beliefs on other people, you try and make people accept them as a rule or as a model to copy

sentences.english: A whale is a kind of mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸是一种哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The whale is a mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼是哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The problem with that theory is that no other mammal has resorted to this method of cooling down.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论的问题在于，没有其他的哺乳动物采取了这种降低体温的方式。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that drinks milk from its mother’s body when it is young. Humans, dogs, and whales are mammals.

sentences.english: He used his sleeve to wipe the condensation off the glass.
sentences.chinese: 他用袖子擦去眼镜上凝结的水滴。

detailed_translations.english: when a gas becomes a liquid

name: statement
trans: 陈述； 声明； 报表

sentences.english: In an official statement, she formally announced her resignation.
sentences.chinese: 在一份官方声明中，她正式宣布辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陈述， 声明； 结算单， 报表
detailed_translations.english: something you say or write, especially publicly or officially, to let people know your intentions or opinions, or to record facts

name: delivery
trans: 投递， 交付； 分娩

sentences.english: Most Indian restaurants offer free delivery.
sentences.chinese: 大多数印度餐馆提供免费外送服务。

sentences.english: You can expect delivery in a week to ten days.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在一周至十天内收到货物。

sentences.english: fresh milk deliveries
sentences.chinese: 新鲜牛奶递送

sentences.english: Mrs Howell had an easy delivery.
sentences.chinese: 豪厄尔太太的分娩很顺利。

detailed_translations.english: the act of bringing goods, letters etc to a particular person or place, or the things that are brought

name: conquer
trans: 征服， 战胜， 占领； 克服， 破除

sentences.english: The Normans conquered England in 1066.
sentences.chinese: 诺曼人于 1066 年征服英格兰。

sentences.english: Egypt was conquered by the Persian king Kambyses.
sentences.chinese: 埃及被波斯国王冈比西斯征服。

detailed_translations.english: to get control of a country by fighting

sentences.english: We should ensure continuity of care between hospital and home.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当保证医院护理和家庭护理的连续性。

detailed_translations.english: the state of continuing for a period of time, without problems, interruptions, or changes

sentences.english: a sculpture of an elephant
sentences.chinese: 一尊大象雕塑

sentences.english: the techniques of sculpture in stone
sentences.chinese: 石雕技艺

detailed_translations.english: an object made out of stone, wood, clay etc by an artist

name: manipulative
trans: 操纵别人的； 老于世故的

sentences.english: Before a child can learn a musical instrument he or she first needs to acquire the necessary manipulative skills.
sentences.chinese: 儿童先要掌握一些必需的操作技能，然后才能学习演奏一种乐器。

detailed_translations.chinese: 操纵别人的； 老于世故的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the ability to handle objects in a skilful way

name: wax
trans: 给…上蜡， 给…打蜡； 渐圆， 渐满

sentences.english: wax crayons
sentences.chinese: 蜡笔

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance made of fat or oil and used to make candles, polish etc
to rub a layer of wax into a floor, surface etc to protect it or make it shine

sentences.english: arable farming
sentences.chinese: 耕作农业

sentences.english: arable land (=  land that is suitable for growing crops  )
sentences.chinese: 可耕地

detailed_translations.english: relating to growing crops

name: sensation
trans: 感觉能力； 感觉， 知觉； 轰动， 引起轰动的事件

sentences.english: One sign of a heart attack is a tingling sensation in the left arm.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病发作的一个征兆是左臂有刺痛感。

sentences.english: The sex scenes in the film caused a sensation.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片中的性爱镜头引起了轰动。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that you get from one of your five senses, especially the sense of touch

name: urban
trans: 都市的； 住在都市的

sentences.english: unemployment in urban areas
sentences.chinese: 城市地区的失业状况

sentences.english: the deprived sections of the urban population
sentences.chinese: 城市人口中的贫困群体

detailed_translations.english: relating to towns and cities

name: refer
trans: 参考， 查阅， 查询； 提到， 谈及； 引用； 提交， 上呈

sentences.english: In his speech, he referred to a recent trip to Canada.
sentences.chinese: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

detailed_translations.english: If you refer to a particular subject or person, you talk about them or mention them

sentences.english: The Secretary of Education is right to seek a bigger departmental budget.
sentences.chinese: 教育部长寻求更多的部门预算是对的。

detailed_translations.english: Departmental is used to describe the activities, responsibilities, or possessions of a department in a government, company, or other organization

sentences.english: Flames poured out of the windows of the building.
sentences.chinese: 火焰从大楼窗口冒出来。

sentences.english: They rushed past us with buckets of water and tried to douse the flames .
sentences.chinese: 他们提着一桶桶水跑过我们身边去灭火。

sentences.english: They sat around the campfire, watching the flickering flames .
sentences.chinese: 他们围坐在篝火旁，看着跳动的火焰。

sentences.english: Flames quickly engulfed the building.
sentences.chinese: 火焰很快吞噬了大楼。

sentences.english: a candle flame
sentences.chinese: 烛焰

detailed_translations.english: hot bright burning gas that you see when something is on fire
to burn brightly

sentences.english: Sunlight can refrain the growth of melatonin in the body.
sentences.chinese: 阳光能抑制身体中褪黑激素的生长。

sentences.english: So make your room dark and sleep early in the night allowing your body to produce melatonin.
sentences.chinese: 所以晚上睡觉要保证房间黑暗并且早睡，这样能促进褪黑激素的产生。

sentences.english: To explain how light exposure at night might affect the moods of both hamsters and people, the researchers turn to a hormone called melatonin.
sentences.chinese: 为了解释夜间曝光是如何影响仓鼠和人类心情的，研究人员转向了一种叫褪黑激素的荷尔蒙。

detailed_translations.english: a  hormone  that is sometimes used as a drug to help you sleep

sentences.english: Read the manufacturer's guidelines before discarding the box.
sentences.chinese: 先阅读制造商的说明书再把盒子丢掉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丢弃， 抛弃， 遗弃
detailed_translations.english: If you discard something, you get rid of it because you no longer want it or need it

sentences.english: European farmers are planning a massive demonstration against farm subsidy cuts.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的农场主们正在策划一场反对削减农场补贴的大游行。

detailed_translations.english: money that is paid by a government or organization to make prices lower, reduce the cost of producing goods etc

name: obscene
trans: 淫秽的， 猥亵的， 下流的； 可憎的， 可恶的； 大得惊人的， 骇人听闻的

sentences.english: Bradford made an obscene gesture.
sentences.chinese: 布拉德福德做了个下流手势。

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["calls from an unknown person saying obscene things"],"COLLOINEXA":["obscene phone calls"]}
sentences.chinese: 下流骚扰电话

sentences.english: obscene photographs
sentences.chinese: 淫秽照片

detailed_translations.english: relating to sex in a way that is shocking and offensive

name: prohibitive
trans: 禁止的， 抑制的； 令人望而却步的

sentences.english: prohibitive regulations
sentences.chinese: 禁律

detailed_translations.chinese: 禁止的，禁止性的；抑制的；（费用，价格等）过高的；类同禁止的
detailed_translations.english: a prohibitive rule prevents people from doing things

name: attentive
trans: 注意的， 专心的； 关心的， 体贴的； 留意的

sentences.english: an attentive audience
sentences.chinese: 聚精会神的听众

detailed_translations.english: listening to or watching someone carefully because you are interested

sentences.english: the director of merchandising
sentences.chinese: 销售总监

detailed_translations.english: the way in which shops and businesses try to sell their products

name: moribund
trans: 垂死的， 即将灭亡的； 即将结束的

sentences.english: The patient was moribund by the time the doctor arrived.
sentences.chinese: 医生赶到的时候病人已经奄奄一息。

detailed_translations.english: slowly dying

name: crush
trans: 碾碎； 压服， 压垮； 镇压， 制服； 压碎， 压坏

sentences.english: His leg was crushed in the accident.
sentences.chinese: 他的腿在事故中被压断。

sentences.english: Two people were crushed to death in the rush to escape.
sentences.chinese: 两个人在逃生过程中被踩死。

detailed_translations.english: to press something so hard that it breaks or is damaged

name: embed
trans: 把…嵌入， 扎牢； 使深留脑中

sentences.english: Feelings of guilt are deeply embedded in her personality.
sentences.chinese: 负罪感在她的性格里根深蒂固。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…嵌入， 扎牢； 使深留脑中
detailed_translations.english: to put something firmly and deeply into something else, or to be put into something in this way

name: promising
trans: 有希望的； 有前途的

sentences.english: a promising career in law
sentences.chinese: 很有前途的法律职业

sentences.english: a promising young actor
sentences.chinese: 大有前途的年轻演员

sentences.english: a promising start
sentences.chinese: 良好的开端

detailed_translations.chinese: 有希望的， 有前途的
detailed_translations.english: showing signs of being successful or good in the future

name: counsel
trans: 律师，法律顾问；建议，忠告

sentences.english: He assisted me with good counsel and encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 他以良好的忠告和鼓励帮助我。

sentences.english: Those who counsel US privately, point out that we are wrong, are true friends.
sentences.chinese: 那些私下忠告我们，指出我们错误的人，才是真正的朋友。

sentences.english: Their free guidance and counsel will be the most priceless gift you can receive.
sentences.chinese: 他们的免费指导和忠告，将是你能够收到的最无价的礼物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 劝告， 忠告；法律顾问； 辩护人
detailed_translations.english: a type of lawyer who represents you in court

name: liver
trans: 生活者， 居住者； 肝脏

sentences.english: Three weeks ago, it was discovered the cancer had spread to his liver.
sentences.chinese: 三周前，发现癌已扩散到了他的肝脏。

detailed_translations.english: a large organ in your body that produces bile and cleans your blood

sentences.english: You must decide whether, on the balance of probabilities , he committed the crime.
sentences.chinese: 你们一定要权衡正反两方面的可能性，然后再裁定他是否犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: how likely something is, sometimes calculated in a mathematical way

name: stainless
trans: 不锈的； 无污点的， 无瑕疵的

sentences.english: stainless steel

detailed_translations.chinese: 不锈的；纯洁的，未被玷污的；无瑕疵的
detailed_translations.english: resistant to discoloration, esp discoloration resulting from corrosion; rust-resistant

name: consequential
trans: 结果的， 随之发生的

sentences.english: redundancy and the consequential loss of earnings
sentences.chinese: 裁员以及随之而来的收入损失

detailed_translations.chinese: 结果的， 随之发生的
detailed_translations.english: happening as a direct result of a particular event or situation

sentences.english: the Paris Metro
sentences.chinese: 巴黎地铁系统

sentences.english: It’ll be quicker to go on the metro.
sentences.chinese: 乘地铁更快。

sentences.english: a metro station
sentences.chinese: 地铁站

detailed_translations.english: a railway system that runs under the ground below a city

name: prevail
trans: 流行， 盛行； 占优势， 战胜

sentences.english: 英文编辑：the economic conditions which prevail in England and Wales
sentences.chinese: 英格兰和威尔士普遍的经济状况

sentences.english: Justice will prevail.
sentences.chinese: 正义终将获胜。

detailed_translations.english: if a belief, custom, situation etc prevails, it exists among a group of people at a certain time

sentences.english: We all like the tranquility of the country life.
sentences.chinese: 我们都喜欢乡村生活的宁静。

sentences.english: For this brings not only the tranquility which comes from doing well, but also that which comes from doing few things.
sentences.chinese: 因为这不仅带来由于做事适当而产生的宁静，而且带来由于做很少的事而产生的宁静。

sentences.english: And while I love my family to death, this time of tranquility is one of absolute bliss for me.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我对我的家庭爱得要死，但这片刻的宁静绝对是我的幸福之一。

name: minimise
trans: 使减到最低限度； 最小化

detailed_translations.chinese: 使减到最低限度； 最小化

name: browse
trans: 嫩叶， 嫩芽； 吃草； 浏览

sentences.english: a feature that allows you to browse your hard drive and choose the graphic you want to display
sentences.chinese: 让你可以浏览硬盘驱动器选择自己想要显示的图像的一个功能

sentences.english: ...a browse around the shops.
sentences.chinese: …在商店的一番闲逛。

detailed_translations.english: to look through the pages of a book, magazine etc without a particular purpose, just looking at the most interesting parts
Browse is also a noun

sentences.english: In Junethe civil war intensified.
sentences.chinese: 6月份内战更加激烈了。

sentences.english: His mother’s death intensified his loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 母亲的过世使他感到更加孤单。

detailed_translations.english: to increase in degree or strength, or to make something do this

sentences.english: The front portion of the rocket breaks off.
sentences.chinese: 火箭的前部脱落了。

sentences.english: Do you have any children’s portions?
sentences.chinese: 你们有儿童餐吗？

detailed_translations.english: a part of something larger, especially a part that is different from the other parts

name: futile
trans: 无效的， 无用的， 无意义的； 没出息的； 琐细的

sentences.english: My efforts to go back to sleep proved futile.
sentences.chinese: 我努力想再次入睡，但怎么也睡不着。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无用的；无效的；没有出息的；琐细的；不重要的
detailed_translations.english: actions that are futile are useless because they have no chance of being successful

name: engross
trans: 使全神贯注， 占去全部注意力和时间

sentences.english: The scene was stunning, and for a time engrossed all our attention.
sentences.chinese: 景色非常美丽，一时间把我们都完全吸引住了。

detailed_translations.english: if something engrosses you, it interests you so much that you do not notice anything else

name: confuse
trans: 使混乱， 混淆； 使迷惑， 使糊涂

sentences.english: People might well confuse the two products.
sentences.chinese: 人们很容易混淆这两种产品。

detailed_translations.english: to think wrongly that a person or thing is someone or something else

sentences.english: His business acumen helped him to succeed where others had failed.
sentences.chinese: 他在商业上的敏锐帮他在其他人失败的地方获得成功。

sentences.english: Science considers to make clear, the baby is to comparative to outside information of acumen, acceptance rate is quite rapid also.
sentences.chinese: 科学研究表明，婴儿对外界信息是相当敏锐的，接受的速度也相当快。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to think quickly and make good judgments

sentences.english: We waited for the storm to abate.
sentences.chinese: 我们等风暴减弱。

detailed_translations.english: to become less strong or decrease

sentences.english: The parents were not to blame for the tragic death of their son.
sentences.chinese: 儿子的惨死不是他父母的错。

sentences.english: a great tragic actor
sentences.chinese: 一名伟大的悲剧演员

detailed_translations.english: making you feel very sad, usually because sb has died or suffered a lot

sentences.english: your family physician
sentences.chinese: 你的家庭医生

detailed_translations.english: a doctor

sentences.english: For 25 years, Darwin amassed evidence to support his theories.
sentences.chinese: 25年间，达尔文收集了大量证据来支持自己的理论。

sentences.english: He amassed a fortune after the war.
sentences.chinese: 战后，他积累了大量财富。

detailed_translations.english: if you amass money, knowledge, information etc, you gradually collect a large amount of it

sentences.english: a souvenir shop
sentences.chinese: 纪念品商店

detailed_translations.english: an object that you buy or keep to remind yourself of a special occasion or a place you have visited

sentences.english: He grins, delighted at the memory.
sentences.chinese: 想起往事，他咧嘴笑了。

detailed_translations.english: to smile widely
a wide smile

name: grip
trans: 握紧，抓牢；吸引住…的注意力
紧握， 抓牢； 掌握， 控制

sentences.english: Hold the microphone in a firm grip and keep it still.
sentences.chinese: 紧紧握住麦克风不要让它动。

sentences.english: She felt her wrist caught in a vice-like grip .
sentences.chinese: 她觉得手腕像是卡在铁钳里被牢牢地抓住了。

sentences.english: Don’t loosen your grip on the rope or you’ll fall.
sentences.chinese: 抓住绳索别松手，不然你会掉下去。

sentences.english: He released his grip and stepped back.
sentences.chinese: 他放开手往后退去。

detailed_translations.english: the way you hold something tightly, or your ability to do this

name: explore
trans: 探险， 探索； 仔细检查， 探究

sentences.english: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.english: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探险， 探索； 仔细查阅， 探究
detailed_translations.english: to discuss or think about something carefully

sentences.english: He was in bed with bronchitis.
sentences.chinese: 他身患支气管炎，卧病在床。

detailed_translations.english: an illness that affects your bronchial tubes and makes you cough

name: climate
trans: 气候； 风气， 思潮

sentences.english: Los Angeles’ warm dry climate
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

detailed_translations.chinese: 气候； 风土， 地带； 风气， 气氛
detailed_translations.english: the typical weather conditions in a particular area

name: crust
trans: 硬层， 硬表面， 地壳； 面包皮

sentences.english: sandwiches with the crusts cut off
sentences.chinese: 切去边皮的三明治

detailed_translations.chinese: 地壳；外壳；面包皮；坚硬外皮
detailed_translations.english: the hard brown outer surface of bread

name: grid
trans: 格子， 栅格； 地图上的坐标方格； 输电网， 煤气输送网

sentences.english: the national grid
sentences.chinese: 国家电网

detailed_translations.english: the network of electricity supply wires that connects  power stations  and provides electricity to buildings in an area

sentences.english: Include your ferret's medical records and veterinarian information in the package.
sentences.chinese: 救济包里面记得包含貂儿的医疗记录和兽医的信息。

sentences.english: This is not normally an issue that needs professional treatment by a veterinarian.
sentences.chinese: 小小的崩坏通常不需要兽医来为貂儿提供专业的诊疗。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to give medical care and treatment to sick animals

sentences.english: The last eruption of this volcano lasted over a year, so this cannot be ruled out.
sentences.chinese: 该火山上次爆发持续了一年，所以现在也不能排除这个可能性。

sentences.english: Our work was like that of geologists who compile the signs of an imminent earthquake or volcanic eruption.
sentences.chinese: 我们的工作如同地质学家，我们收集一场即将到来的地震或火山爆发的迹象。

sentences.english: If a volcanic eruption wipes out all of the plain mice, the island will be repopulated by striped mice.
sentences.chinese: 假设一次火山爆发消灭了所有的普通老鼠，那么这个小岛将是斑纹鼠的天下。

name: economic
trans: 经济的； 经济上的， 经济学的

sentences.english: Economic growth is slow.
sentences.chinese: 经济增长缓慢。

sentences.english: the government’s economic policy
sentences.chinese: 政府的经济政策

sentences.english: Economic reform is needed.
sentences.chinese: 经济改革势在必行。

sentences.english: In the current economic climate (= conditions ), we must keep costs down.
sentences.chinese: 在当前的经济形势下，我们一定要控制好成本。

detailed_translations.english: relating to trade, in-dustry, and the management of money

sentences.english: a board meeting
sentences.chinese: 董事会会议

sentences.english: a board member
sentences.chinese: 董事会成员

detailed_translations.english: a group of people in a company or other organization who make the rules and important decisions

name: grim
trans: 严厉的； 可怕的； 讨厌的

sentences.english: ‘I’ll survive,’ he said with a grim smile.
sentences.chinese: “我死不了。”他阴笑着说。

sentences.english: The police officers were silent and grim-faced.
sentences.chinese: 警察默不作声，神情严肃。

detailed_translations.english: looking or sounding very serious

name: statistics
trans: 统计数字， 统计资料； 统计学

sentences.english: crime/unemployment, etc. statistics
sentences.chinese: 犯罪、失业等统计资料

sentences.english: According to official statistics the disease killed over 500 people.
sentences.chinese: 根据官方的统计数字，500多人死于这种疾病。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of information shown in numbers

sentences.english: I’ve got some sticky stuff on my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我鞋子上有什么黏糊糊的东西。

sentences.english: How do you think you’re going to fit all that stuff into the car?
sentences.chinese: 你说这么多东西你怎么装进车里？

sentences.english: I felt sorry for the ones who had to eat the awful stuff.
sentences.chinese: 我很同情那些只能吃这种难吃东西的人。

sentences.english: Where’s all the camping stuff?
sentences.chinese: 野营用的东西都在哪儿？

detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about things such as substances, materials, or groups of objects when you do not know what they are called, or it is not important to say exactly what they are

name: offspring
trans: 子女， 后代； 产物

sentences.english: a young mother trying to control her offspring
sentences.chinese: 一个想管住自己孩子的年轻妈妈

detailed_translations.english: someone’s child or children – often used humorously

name: section
trans: 部分； 部门； 截面

sentences.english: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.english: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )
sentences.chinese: 吸烟区

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

sentences.english: He talked constantly about his work.
sentences.chinese: 他不断地谈到他的工作。

sentences.english: The English language is constantly changing .
sentences.chinese: 英语在不断地变化。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, or very often

sentences.english: If there are people cowboy coding in your company, or even worse—on your team—do everything you can to change that for the sake of your customers.
sentences.chinese: 如果在您的公司（或者更糟糕，在您的团队）存在进行牛仔编码的人员，为了客户的利益着想，您应该竭尽全力地改变这种情况。

name: threaten
trans: 威胁， 恐吓； 预示快要来临， 是…的征兆， 可能发生

sentences.english: Postal workers are threatening a strike if they don’t receive a pay increase.
sentences.chinese: 邮政工人威胁如果不加薪，他们就要罢工。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you will cause someone harm or trouble if they do not do what you want

name: enrich
trans: 充实， 使丰富； 使富裕

sentences.english: Add fertilizer to enrich the soil.
sentences.chinese: 施上肥料使土壤肥沃。

sentences.english: Education can greatly enrich your life.
sentences.chinese: 教育可以大大充实生活。

detailed_translations.english: to improve the quality of something, especially by adding things to it

sentences.english: A massive arms-smuggling plan has been foiled by the CIA.
sentences.chinese: 一项大规模的军火走私计划已被中央情报局挫败。

detailed_translations.chinese: 衬托；阻止，挡开；挫败；贴箔于
detailed_translations.english: to prevent something bad that someone is planning to do

detailed_translations.chinese: 箔，金属薄片；衬托，烘托；叶形片
detailed_translations.english: metal sheets that are as thin as paper, used for wrapping food

detailed_translations.chinese: 面向文件的翻译语言（file-Oriented interpretive language）

name: strain
trans: 拉紧， 绷紧； 扭伤， 拉伤； 过劳， 极度紧张

sentences.english: I’ve strained a muscle in my leg.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿有一处肌肉拉伤。

sentences.english: You’ll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的光线下看书会伤眼睛的。

detailed_translations.english: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard
to try very hard to do something using all your strength or ability

name: otherwise
trans: 另样，用别的方法；在其他方面

sentences.english: He was tired but otherwise in good health.
sentences.chinese: 他除了累身体很好。

sentences.english: I could hear the distant noise of traffic. Otherwise all was still.
sentences.chinese: 我能听见远处车流的声音，除此之外，一切都很安静。

sentences.english: This spoiled an otherwise excellent piece of work.
sentences.chinese: 这就把本来很出色的一件作品毁掉了。

sentences.english: Their arrival livened up an otherwise dull afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 他们的到来使原本沉闷的午后活跃起来了。

detailed_translations.english: except for what has just been mentioned

name: visible
trans: 可见的， 看得见的； 有形的； 明显的， 显而易见的

sentences.english: The comet is visible to the naked eye (= can be seen without using special equipment ).
sentences.chinese: 这颗彗星肉眼看得见。

sentences.english: Check the plant for any visible signs of disease.
sentences.chinese: 检查一下植物是否有患病的迹象。

detailed_translations.english: something that is visible can be seen

name: intrigue
trans: 密谋，施诡计；引起极大兴趣，迷住['ɪntrɪːg]
阴谋， 诡计； 密谋

sentences.english: Other people’s houses always intrigued her.
sentences.chinese: 别人的房子总令她好奇。

detailed_translations.english: to make secret plans to harm someone or make them lose their position of power
if something intrigues you, it interests you a lot because it seems strange or mysterious

detailed_translations.chinese: 阴谋， 诡计， 密谋
detailed_translations.english: the making of secret plans to harm someone or make them lose their position of power, or a plan of this kind

name: voyage
trans: 旅行， 航行， 飞行

sentences.english: The voyage from England to India used to take six months.
sentences.chinese: 过去从英格兰到印度要航行六个月。

sentences.english: the Titanic’s maiden voyage
sentences.chinese: “泰坦尼克”号的首航

sentences.english: I don’t want to make the voyage single-handed.
sentences.chinese: 我不想独自航行。

sentences.english: These are the voyages of the starship Enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是“企业”号星舰几次航行的经历。

detailed_translations.english: a long journey in a ship or spacecraft
to travel to a place, especially by ship

name: keen
trans: 热衷的， 热心的， 渴望的； 敏锐的， 敏捷的； 激烈的， 紧张的； 锋利的

sentences.english: keen students
sentences.chinese: 求知若渴的学生

sentences.english: The kids in my class are all very keen.
sentences.chinese: 我班上的学生都很好学。

sentences.english: She was new in the job and keen as mustard (= very keen ).
sentences.chinese: 她刚开始做这工作，热情很高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热心的； 激烈的； 敏锐的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is keen is eager to work or learn, and enjoys doing it

sentences.english: Nutrition and exercise are essential to fitness and health.
sentences.chinese: 营养和运动是保持健康所必不可少的。

sentences.english: a nutrition expert
sentences.chinese: 营养专家

detailed_translations.english: the process of giving or getting the right type of food for good health and growth

sentences.english: His boss discharged him for habitual absenteeism.
sentences.chinese: 他的老板因他习惯性旷工而解雇了他。

sentences.english: School refusal — any kind of absenteeism, from phobia to truancy, that can be traced to the child’s own actions and wishes — is at the very intersection of education, psychology and pediatrics.
sentences.chinese: 拒学症---任何一种旷课，从恐惧到逃学，都能从孩子自身的品行和愿望上找到根源---而且是教育，心理学和儿科学等因素交织在一起。

detailed_translations.english: Absenteeism is the fact or habit of frequently being away from work or school, usually without a good reason

name: cereal
trans: 谷类植物； 谷物； 谷类食物

sentences.english: a bowl of breakfast cereal
sentences.chinese: 一碗早餐麦片

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷类，谷物；谷类食品；谷类植物
detailed_translations.english: a breakfast food made from grain and usually eaten with milk

sentences.english: People have become indifferent to the suffering of others.
sentences.chinese: 人们已经变得对别人的痛苦漠不关心。

detailed_translations.english: If you accuse someone of being indifferent to something, you mean that they have a complete lack of interest in it

sentences.english: He buried the bodies in a single grave with a wooden cross as a marker.
sentences.chinese: 他把尸体都埋在一个坟墓里，用一个木十字架作为标记。

detailed_translations.chinese: 记分员；书签；标识物；作记号的人
detailed_translations.english: something which shows that a quality or feature exists or is present

name: effect
trans: 使产生， 招致； 实现

sentences.english: the long-term effects of the drug
sentences.chinese: 这种毒品的长期影响

sentences.english: I could feel the effects of the thin mountain air.
sentences.chinese: 我能感觉到山上稀薄空气产生的影响。

sentences.english: This ingredient also has the effect of making your skin look younger.
sentences.chinese: 这种成分还有使皮肤看上去更年轻的效果。

sentences.english: A system failure has a knock-on effect throughout the whole hotel.
sentences.chinese: 系统故障会给整个酒店带来连锁反应。

sentences.english: the cumulative effect of human activities on the global environment
sentences.chinese: 人类活动对全球环境日积月累的影响

sentences.english: A much lower dose of the painkiller can still produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 大量减少该止痛药的服用剂量依然能产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: In mental illness, there is a complex relationship between cause and effect.
sentences.chinese: 精神疾病有复杂的因果关系。

detailed_translations.english: a change that is caused by an event, action etc

sentences.english: We were cruising along at 50 miles per hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们以每小时50英里的速度平稳行驶。

sentences.english: We fly at a cruising speed of 500 mph.
sentences.chinese: 我们以每小时500英里的巡航速度平稳飞行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 巡航；以节省燃料的速度前进
detailed_translations.english: to move at a steady speed in a car, aircraft etc
a holiday on a large ship

name: solemn
trans: 庄严的， 隆重的； 严肃的， 认真的

sentences.english: a solemn expression
sentences.chinese: 严肃的表情

sentences.english: Their faces suddenly grew solemn.
sentences.chinese: 他们的脸突然变得严肃起来。

sentences.english: a solemn procession of mourners
sentences.chinese: 庄重的送葬队伍

sentences.english: solemn ritual/ceremony
sentences.chinese: 隆重的仪式/典礼

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，庄重的；庄严的,隆重的
detailed_translations.english: very serious and not happy, for example because something bad has happened or because you are at an important occasion

sentences.english: It is dangerous to inhale ammonia fumes.
sentences.chinese: 吸入氨气是很危险的。

sentences.english: Myra lit another cigarette and inhaled deeply  (= breathed in a lot of smoke ).
sentences.chinese: 迈拉又点上一支烟，深深地吸了一口。

detailed_translations.english: to breathe in air, smoke, or gas

name: perceive
trans: 感知， 察觉； 认识到， 理解

sentences.english: That morning, he perceived a change in Franca’s mood.
sentences.chinese: 那天早上，他注意到弗兰卡情绪的变化。

sentences.english: Cats are not able to perceive colour.
sentences.chinese: 猫不能辨别颜色。

detailed_translations.english: to notice, see, or recognize something

name: option
trans: 选择； 选择的物； 选课

sentences.english: There are a number of options available.
sentences.chinese: 有多种选择。

sentences.english: He had two options.
sentences.chinese: 他有两种选择。

sentences.english: This was not the only option open to him.
sentences.chinese: 这并非是他的唯一选择。

sentences.english: Teenage mothers often have no option but to (= have no other choice except to ) live with their parents.
sentences.chinese: 少女妈妈往往别无选择，只能与父母同住。

detailed_translations.chinese: 选择， 选择权， 选择自由； 选择的事物， 选课
detailed_translations.english: a choice you can make in a particular situation

name: weigh
trans: 称重； 认真考虑， 权衡

sentences.english: The young birds weigh only a few grams.
sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.english: Do you know how much it weighs?
sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

name: acute
trans: 灵敏的； 剧烈的， 猛烈的

sentences.english: Young children have a particularly acute sense of smell.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的嗅觉特别灵敏。

detailed_translations.english: acute senses such as hearing, taste, touch etc are very good and sensitive

sentences.english: I to the kindergarten at the age of three.
sentences.chinese: 在我记忆中，我三岁就被送去幼儿园了。

sentences.english: She took me to the kindergarten and home every day, in spite of rain and wind.
sentences.chinese: 无论是下雨还是刮风，她每天带我在幼儿园和家之间穿梭。

detailed_translations.english: a school for children aged two to five

sentences.english: One person may show lots of pathology in their brain while another shows very little, yet both may have had dementia.
sentences.chinese: 即使两人都患有痴呆症，但一人的大脑可能在病理现象中呈现较多，而另一个人可能较少。

sentences.english: According to the scientific team, only one of these four categories of gamblers actually shows signs of a significant pathology.
sentences.chinese: 根据科学小组得知，事实上在这四种赌徒里只有一种显示出明显的病理学的迹象。

sentences.english: It makes sense to leave the ovaries if there is no risk factors or pathology at the time of surgery, especially in young women since those are the ones who seem to be most affected.
sentences.chinese: 斯科西亚说，“如果在手术时没有出现危险因素或病理原因，那么保留卵巢就是合理的，尤其是那些年轻妇女，因为她们似乎是受到影响最大的人群。”

detailed_translations.english: the study of the causes and effects of illnesses

sentences.english: The experiment produced some unexpected results.
sentences.chinese: 这次试验产生了一些意想不到的结果。

sentences.english: Her death was totally unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 她的死完全出人意料。

sentences.english: Hague’s announcement was not entirely unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 黑格的声明并非完全出乎意料。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe something that is surprising because you were not expecting it

name: crucial
trans: 决定性的； 至关重要的

sentences.english: The conservation of tropical forests is of crucial importance .
sentences.chinese: 保护热带雨林至关重要。

detailed_translations.english: something that is crucial is extremely important, because everything else depends on it

name: unveil
trans: 揭去面纱或覆盖物； 揭幕； 首次公开、 揭露或展示

sentences.english: The statue was unveiled by the Queen.
sentences.chinese: 这尊雕塑由女王揭幕。

detailed_translations.english: to remove the cover from something, especially as part of a formal ceremony

name: contribute
trans: 捐赠， 捐助； 起作用， 影响

sentences.english: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.chinese: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.english: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.
sentences.chinese: 当地的公司已经同意捐助了。

detailed_translations.english: To contribute money or resources to something means to give money or resources to help pay for something or to help achieve a particular purpose

name: faith
trans: 信任， 信用； 信仰， 信条

sentences.english: People have lost faith in the government.
sentences.chinese: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

sentences.english: deep religious faith
sentences.chinese: 坚定的宗教信仰

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of trust or confidence in someone or something

sentences.english: to make a remark
sentences.chinese: 发表评论

sentences.english: Critics remarked that the play was not original.
sentences.chinese: 评论家们指出这部戏剧缺乏创意

detailed_translations.english: something that you say when you express an opinion or say what you have noticed
to say or write a comment about sth/sb

name: sluttish
trans: 懒惰的， 邋遢的； 放荡的

detailed_translations.chinese: 懒惰的， 邋遢的； 放荡的

sentences.english: The slightest movement will defocus the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 最轻微的运动都会使显微镜散焦。

sentences.english: The microscope magnified the object two hundred times.
sentences.chinese: 这架显微镜把实物放大了200倍。

sentences.english: The microscope capacitates small objects to be observed.
sentences.chinese: 显微镜可以观察到微小的物体。

detailed_translations.english: a scientific instrument that makes extremely small things look larger

sentences.english: The care of old people necessarily involves quite a lot of heavy lifting.
sentences.chinese: 照顾老年人必定要干很多搬重物的活儿。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that cannot be different or be avoided

name: candidate
trans: 候选人， 候补者； 申请求职者； 报考者

sentences.english: a presidential candidate
sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

sentences.english: Candidates are not allowed to use a calculator in this exam.
sentences.chinese: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election

sentences.english: "Given the level of competition in law, I definitely think that my postgraduate degree helped to distinguish me from the crowd, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“考虑到在法律行业的竞争水平，我确实认为我的研究生学位让我从众人中脱颖而出”。

sentences.english: Attracted by the greatness of English language, Gu even changed her major from accounting to English in her postgraduate study.
sentences.chinese: 顾秋蓓被英语这门语言的魅力所吸引，她甚至将自己的研究生专业从会计转到了英语专业。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is studying at a university to get a  master’s degree  or a  phd

sentences.english: ...a scandalous inversion of the truth.
sentences.chinese: ...一个令人愤慨的是非颠倒。

detailed_translations.english: the act of changing something so that it is the opposite of what it was before, or of turning something upside down (= the bottom is on the top and the top is on the bottom )

name: intelligible
trans: 可理解的， 明白易懂的， 清楚的

sentences.english: His reply was barely intelligible.
sentences.chinese: 他的回复几乎让人听不懂。

detailed_translations.english: if speech, writing, or an idea is intelligible, it can be easily understood

name: parallel
trans: 平行的；类似的，相对应的；并行的
可相比拟的事物，相似处；纬线

sentences.english: Lines AB and CD are parallel. AB
sentences.chinese: 线与CD线平行。

sentences.english: two parallel roads
sentences.chinese: 两条平行的道路

sentences.english: Take the road running parallel to the main road just after the village.
sentences.chinese: 过那个村子后走与主干道平行的路。

detailed_translations.chinese: 并列的，平行的；类似的；对应的；并联的
detailed_translations.english: two lines, paths etc that are parallel to each other are the same distance apart along their whole length

detailed_translations.chinese: 可相比拟的事物，相似处；平行线，平行面；纬线
detailed_translations.english: a relationship or similarity between two things, especially things that exist or happen in different places or at different times

detailed_translations.chinese: 与…相似， 与… 相当， 比得上
detailed_translations.english: if one thing parallels another, they happen at the same time or are similar, and seem to be related

name: hospitality
trans: 友好款待， 好客； 盛情； 招待礼节

sentences.english: Thanks for your hospitality over the past few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你几周来的热情款待。

detailed_translations.english: friendly behaviour towards visitors

sentences.english: the scorching desert heat
sentences.chinese: 沙漠里的酷热

sentences.english: a scorching hot day
sentences.chinese: 酷热的一天

detailed_translations.chinese: 灼热的；激烈的；讽刺的；过早硫化的
detailed_translations.english: extremely hot

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…烧焦；严厉批评；切割；过早硫化（scorch的ing形式）

sentences.english: Decompression blew out a window in the plane.
sentences.chinese: 机舱内减压吹掉了一块玻璃窗。

detailed_translations.english: Decompression is the reduction of the force on something that is caused by the weight of the air

name: water-borne
trans: 水运的， 水传播的， 饮水传染的

sentences.english: ...a waterborne safari down the Nile.
sentences.chinese: ...一次尼罗河水上观光游。

detailed_translations.chinese: 水运的， 水传播的， 饮水传染的
detailed_translations.english: A waterborne disease or infection is one that people can catch from infected water

sentences.english: Tax cuts provided the stimulus which the slow economy needed.
sentences.chinese: 减税为不景气的经济带来了其所需的刺激。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps a process to develop more quickly or more strongly

sentences.english: He was bewildered by his daughter’s reaction.
sentences.chinese: 他被女儿的反应弄糊涂了。

detailed_translations.english: to confuse someone

sentences.english: a law firm with an unblemished reputation
sentences.chinese: 声誉良好的律师事务所

detailed_translations.english: not spoiled by any mistake or bad behaviour

name: terminal
trans: 终点，终端；终点站，航站楼

sentences.english: a terminal branch of a tree
sentences.chinese: 树顶枝条

sentences.english: terminal examinations (= at the end of a course, etc.)
sentences.chinese: 期终考试

sentences.english: the airport’s passenger terminal
sentences.chinese: 机场航站楼

detailed_translations.english: at the end of sth

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔飞机、公共汽车、轮船客运或货物运输的〕集散站，终点站
detailed_translations.english: a big building where people wait to get onto planes, buses, or ships, or where goods are loaded

name: diminish
trans: 减少； 降低； 贬低， 轻视

sentences.english: The party’s share of the electorate has diminished steadily.
sentences.chinese: 支持这个政党的选民比例持续下降。

sentences.english: These drugs diminish blood flow to the brain.
sentences.chinese: 这些药物会减少流向脑部的血液量。

detailed_translations.english: to become or make something become smaller or less

detailed_translations.chinese: 减少， 减小， 降低
detailed_translations.english: to become or make something become smaller or less

name: surpass
trans: 超过， 超越， 优于， 胜过； 超过…的界限， 非…所能办到

sentences.english: He had surpassed all our expectations .
sentences.chinese: 他超越了我们所有的预期。

sentences.english: The number of multiple births has surpassed 100,000 for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 多胎产首次突破了 10 万例。

detailed_translations.english: to be even better or greater than someone or something else

sentences.english: Growth is expected to stagnate next year.
sentences.chinese: 预计明年增长会停滞。

sentences.english: His career had stagnated.
sentences.chinese: 他的事业停滞不前了。

detailed_translations.english: to stop developing or making progress

sentences.english: The job is mainly administrative.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作主要是行政方面的。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the work of managing a company or organization

name: various
trans: 各种各样的； 不同的； 多方面的

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

name: attention
trans: 注意， 留心； 立正

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

sentences.english: So fulfillment of desires is a prerequisite to unity.
sentences.chinese: 所以实现愿望是到达统一的先决条件。 。

sentences.english: Ensure an effective operation planning and process to support the order fulfillment and delivery requirement.
sentences.chinese: 确保有效的运作计划和流程来支持订单的履行和交货要求。

sentences.english: Who, I thought, wants to know about the other's earlier relationships, if he or she is not the fulfillment of their promise?
sentences.chinese: 如果他或她不只履行他们的承诺的话，我认为，谁想去知道别人以前跟另一个异性的关系呢？

name: succumb
trans: 屈服， 屈从； 死亡

sentences.english: Don't succumb to the temptation to have just one cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 不要屈服于只抽一支烟的诱惑。

detailed_translations.english: to stop opposing someone or something that is stronger than you, and allow them to take control

sentences.english: However, scientists do not believe that the new gelatin product would pose any risk.
sentences.chinese: 然而，科学家们并不认为这种新的明胶产品会带来任何风险。

sentences.english: Vegans avoid eating any animal products. They don't eat any meat products, milk, cheese, eggs, honey, or gelatin.
sentences.chinese: 绝对素食主义者不吃任何畜产品，不吃肉制品，牛奶，乳酪，蛋类，蜂蜜，或者是动物胶。

detailed_translations.english: a clear substance obtained from boiled animal bones, used for making jelly

name: extent
trans: 范围； 面积； 广度， 长度； 程度

sentences.english: Things are not yet carried to that extent.
sentences.chinese: 事情还没有发展到那种程度。

sentences.english: When the smoke blew away, we could see the extent of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 浓烟消散后， 我们就能看清破坏的程度了。

sentences.english: The extent of human cooperation is unique, but not cooperation itself.
sentences.chinese: 人类的合作程度，而非合作本身，是独一无二的。

sentences.english: In those days the land was plowed by oxen.
sentences.chinese: 在那个年代是用公牛来犁地的。

sentences.english: a ploughed field
sentences.chinese: 犁过的地

detailed_translations.english: to turn over the earth using a plough so that seeds can be planted
a piece of farm equipment used to turn over the earth so that seeds can be planted

sentences.english: American consumers prefer white eggs; conversely, British buyers like brown eggs.
sentences.chinese: 美国的消费者喜欢白色的鸡蛋，而英国的消费者却相反，他们喜欢棕色的鸡蛋。

detailed_translations.english: used when one situation is the opposite of another

sentences.english: The volcano threw new showers of magma and ash into the air.
sentences.chinese: 这座火山向空气中喷发了新的岩浆和火山灰。

detailed_translations.english: hot melted rock below the surface of the Earth

sentences.english: a society run on the principles of equity and justice
sentences.chinese: 以公平、正义为原则的社会

detailed_translations.chinese: 公平，公正；衡平法；普通股；抵押资产的净值
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which all people are treated equally and no one has an unfair advantage

sentences.english: I like to sit down and do the crossword .
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢坐下来做纵横字谜游戏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纵横字谜；纵横填字谜（等于cross puzzle）
detailed_translations.english: a word game in which you write the answers to questions in a pattern of numbered boxes

name: interrelationship
trans: 相互关联， 相互影响

sentences.english: ...the interrelationships between unemployment, crime, and imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: ...失业、犯罪和监禁之间的相互关系。

detailed_translations.english: a connection between two things that makes them affect each other

name: assumption
trans: 假定， 假设； 担任， 承担

sentences.english: You would be making an assumption that's not based on any fact that you could report.
sentences.chinese: 你会做出不以你能报道的任何事实为依据的一种假设。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think is true although you have no definite proof

name: pension
trans: 养老金， 抚恤金； 年金

sentences.english: At what age can you start drawing your pension ?
sentences.chinese: 从多少岁可以开始领取养老金？

sentences.english: If you are self-employed, you should think about taking out a private pension .
sentences.chinese: 如果你是自由职业者，应该考虑办理私人养老金事宜。

sentences.english: Many people find it hard to live on a basic state pension .
sentences.chinese: 许多人发现仅凭国家基本养老金不能养活自己。

sentences.english: She pays a quarter of her salary into a pension plan.
sentences.chinese: 她将每月工资的四分之一用于养老金计划。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money paid regularly by the government or company to someone who does not work any more, for example because they have reached the age when people stop working or because they are ill
to grant a pension to

sentences.english: There were several pairs of riding boots ranked neatly in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 门厅里整齐地摆放着几双马靴。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange objects in a line or row

detailed_translations.chinese: 军衔，职衔；地位，社会阶层；排，行列
detailed_translations.english: the position or level that someone holds in an organization, especially in the police or the army, navy etc
to have a particular position in a list of people or things that have been put in order of quality or importance

name: neglect
trans: 忽视； 疏忽； 遗漏

sentences.english: She smoked and drank, neglected the children, and left the clothes unmended.
sentences.chinese: 她抽烟喝酒，既不照顾孩子，也不缝补衣服。

sentences.english: a neglected garden
sentences.chinese: 疏于打理的花园

sentences.english: The building has been badly neglected.
sentences.chinese: 这栋大楼严重疏于维护。

detailed_translations.english: to fail to look after someone or something properly

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

sentences.english: I'm going to buy a surfboard and learn to surf.
sentences.chinese: 我要去买个冲浪板来学冲浪。

detailed_translations.english: to ride on waves while standing on a special board

sentences.english: ...the cosmic laws governing our world.
sentences.chinese: …主宰我们世界的宇宙法则。

detailed_translations.english: relating to space or the universe

sentences.english: Some investigators regarded her as the brains of the gang.
sentences.chinese: 一些调查人员认为她是团伙的决策者。

sentences.english: The language angel hanged up the gang and banged them at the angle of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 语言天使举起了一伙人并把他们猛撞到三角形的一个角上。

detailed_translations.english: a group of criminals who work together

sentences.english: carved wooden chairs
sentences.chinese: 木雕椅子

sentences.english: Carve the meat into slices.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成片。

detailed_translations.english: to make an object or pattern by cutting a piece of wood or stone

sentences.english: The word has a metaphorical as well as a literal meaning.
sentences.chinese: 这个单词除了字面意思还有一层比喻意思。

detailed_translations.english: a metaphorical use of a word is not concerned with real objects or physical events, but with ideas or events of a non-physical kind

sentences.english: She lifted her veil with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 她用双手揭开面纱。

sentences.english: a bridal veil
sentences.chinese: 新娘的面纱

detailed_translations.chinese: 面纱，面罩；遮盖物，掩饰物
detailed_translations.english: a thin piece of material that women wear to cover their faces at formal occasions or for religious reasons
to cover something with a veil

sentences.english: Gina’s grades have improved marginally since last term.
sentences.chinese: 从上学期开始吉娜的成绩略有提高。

sentences.english: The new system is only marginally more efficient than the old one.
sentences.chinese: 新系统的效率比旧系统只有略微提高。

detailed_translations.english: not enough to make an important difference

sentences.english: I’m worried about washing that shirt in case it shrinks.
sentences.chinese: 我不太敢洗那件衬衫，怕它会缩水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 起皱； 收缩； 退缩， 畏缩
detailed_translations.english: to become smaller, or to make something smaller, through the effects of heat or water

name: hierarchy
trans: 领导层； 层次， 等级

sentences.english: a rigid social hierarchy
sentences.chinese: 严格的社会等级制度

sentences.english: She worked her way up through the corporate hierarchy to become president.
sentences.chinese: 她在公司一步一步升到了总裁的位置。

detailed_translations.english: a system of organization in which people or things are divided into levels of importance

sentences.english: Their main exports are textiles, especially silk and cotton.
sentences.chinese: 他们的主要出口商品是纺织品，尤其是丝绸和棉布。

detailed_translations.english: any type of woven cloth that is made in large quantities, used especially by people in the business of making clothes etc

sentences.english: weather reports from several different localities
sentences.chinese: 来自几个不同地区的天气报告

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a country, city etc

sentences.english: the former Soviet Union
sentences.chinese: 前苏联

sentences.english: Their farm has been reduced to half its former size.
sentences.chinese: 他们的农场已缩小到以前的一半。

sentences.english: Of the two possibilities, the former seems more likely.
sentences.chinese: 在这两种可能性中，前者似乎更有可能。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing before, but not now
the first of two people or things that you have just mentioned
