sentences.chinese: 她的脸因恐慌而变相了。

sentences.english: The panic-stricken fled in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 惊慌的人群向四面八方逃去。

sentences.english: They ascribed courage to me for something I did out of sheer panic.
sentences.chinese: 由于我纯粹因惊慌而做的事，他们认为我很有勇气。

sentences.english: Management have agreed to extend the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 管理层已同意延长最后期限。

detailed_translations.english: to continue for a longer period of time, or to make something last longer

sentences.english: Fold the paper along the dotted line.
sentences.chinese: 沿虚线将纸折起来。

sentences.english: It’ll fit in if you fold it in half .
sentences.chinese: 对折的话就能放下了。

detailed_translations.english: to bend a piece of paper, cloth etc by laying or pressing one part over another
a line made in paper or material when you fold one part of it over another

name: interpretation
trans: 口译； 解释， 诠释； 艺术处理

sentences.english: One possible interpretation is that they want you to resign.
sentences.chinese: 一种可能的解释是，他们想要你辞职。

sentences.english: It’s difficult to put an accurate interpretation on (= explain ) the survey results.
sentences.chinese: 对调查结果难以作出确切的解释。

sentences.english: What exactly the author meant by that statement is open to interpretation (= able to be understood or explained in different ways ).
sentences.chinese: 作者这句话的确切含义可有各种理解。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which someone explains or understands an event, information, someone’s actions etc

name: hurl
trans: 猛投， 猛摔； 大声叫骂

sentences.english: Demonstrators were hurling bricks through the windows.
sentences.chinese: 示威者在向窗里掷砖块。

sentences.english: He hurled a chair across the set, smashing lamps and vases.
sentences.chinese: 他抓起一把椅子扔向片场的那头，把灯和花瓶都砸得粉碎。

detailed_translations.english: to throw something with a lot of force, especially because you are angry

sentences.english: an intermediate coursebook
sentences.chinese: 中级课本

sentences.english: an intermediate stage/step in a process
sentences.chinese: 中间阶段 / 步骤

detailed_translations.english: having more than a basic knowledge of sth but not yet advanced

name: presuppose
trans: 预先假定…属实； 认为， 假设； 以…为先决条件， 以…为前提

sentences.english: The idea of heaven presupposes the existence of God.
sentences.chinese: 天堂的说法首先认定了上帝的存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 假定；预料；以…为先决条件
detailed_translations.english: to depend on something that is believed to exist or to be true

name: consideration
trans: 考虑； 思考； 体谅

sentences.english: proposals put forward for consideration
sentences.chinese: 提请考虑的建议

sentences.english: They’ve got no consideration for others.
sentences.chinese: 他们一点都不为别人着想。

detailed_translations.english: careful thought and attention, especially before making an official or important decision

name: sentient
trans: 有感觉能力的， 有知觉力的； 知悉的

sentences.english: Man is a sentient being.
sentences.chinese: 人是有感知力的生命。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有感情的；有感觉力的；意识到的
detailed_translations.english: able to experience things through your senses

sentences.english: To be perfectly frank, I think it’s a bad idea.
sentences.chinese: 老实说，我认为这个主意不好。

detailed_translations.english: honest and truthful

name: inscribe
trans: 写、 题、 铭刻； 牢记， 铭记

sentences.english: Inside the cover someone had inscribed the words ‘To Thomas, with love’.
sentences.chinese: 在书的内封上，有人题写了“托马斯惠存”几个字。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully cut, print, or write words on something, especially on the surface of a stone or coin

sentences.english: The recession has exacerbated this problem.
sentences.chinese: 经济衰退使这个问题更加严重。

sentences.english: I don’t want to exacerbate the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我不想使情况变得更糟。

detailed_translations.english: to make a bad situation worse

sentences.english: Most computer users have never received any formal keyboard training. Consequently, their keyboard skills are inefficient.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的电脑使用者都没有经过正规的键盘操作训练，因此他们的键盘技巧不够熟练。

sentences.english: The molecules are absorbed into the bloodstream and consequently affect the organs.
sentences.chinese: 这些分子被吸收到血液里，从而影响到器官。

detailed_translations.english: as a result

sentences.english: children infected with the Aids virus
sentences.chinese: 感染艾滋病病毒的儿童

sentences.english: a virus infection
sentences.chinese: 病毒感染

detailed_translations.english: a very small living thing that causes infectious illnesses

name: recourse
trans: 依靠； 求助， 求援

sentences.english: We may conclude that he never had recourse to this simple experiment.
sentences.chinese: 我们也许可以断定，他根本就没有试过这个简单的实验。

sentences.english: Surgery may be the only recourse.
sentences.chinese: 手术可能是唯一的办法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 求援，求助；[经] 追索权；依赖；救生索
detailed_translations.english: something that you do to achieve something or deal with a situation, or the act of doing it

name: multinational
trans: 多国的，多民族的；跨国公司的

sentences.english: a multinational media corporation
sentences.chinese: 跨国传媒公司

detailed_translations.english: a multinational company has factories, offices, and business activities in many different countries
a large company that has offices, factories etc in many different countries

name: extinction
trans: 灭绝， 绝种； 熄灭

sentences.english: species in danger of extinction
sentences.chinese: 有灭绝危险的物种

sentences.english: They were hunted almost to extinction.
sentences.chinese: 它们遭受猎杀，几近灭绝。

sentences.english: Conservationists are trying to save the whale from extinction.
sentences.chinese: 生态环境保护工作者正努力挽救鲸类以防止其灭绝。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular type of animal or plant stops existing

sentences.english: She uses some wonderful images and metaphors in her writing.
sentences.chinese: 她在作品中用了一些绝妙的比喻和暗喻。

sentences.english: a very creative use of metaphor
sentences.chinese: 隐喻的独到运用

detailed_translations.english: a way of describing something by referring to it as something different and suggesting that it has similar qualities to that thing

sentences.english: The president’s popularity has declined considerably.
sentences.chinese: 总统的支持率大大下降了。

detailed_translations.english: when something or someone is liked or supported by a lot of people

name: inhumane
trans: 不近人情的， 残忍的， 不人道的

sentences.english: the inhumane treatment of political prisoners
sentences.chinese: 对政治犯的虐待

sentences.english: I was shocked by the inhumane conditions.
sentences.chinese: 我对这非人的条件感到震惊。

detailed_translations.english: extremely cruel and causing unacceptable suffering

name: attainable
trans: 可获得的， 可达到的， 可实现的

sentences.english: It is unrealistic to believe perfection is an attainable goal.
sentences.chinese: 相信可以达到完美是不现实的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可获得的， 可达到的， 可实现的
detailed_translations.english: Something that is attainable can be achieved

sentences.english: We want a clean healthy environment for all humanity .
sentences.chinese: 我们希望全人类拥有一个干净健康的生存环境。

sentences.english: crimes against humanity
sentences.chinese: 反人类罪

sentences.english: We must never forget our common humanity.
sentences.chinese: 我们永远不要忘记共同的人性。

detailed_translations.english: people in general

sentences.english: We must encourage innovation if the company is to remain competitive.
sentences.chinese: 公司要想保持竞争力，就必须鼓励革新。

sentences.english: recent innovations in English teaching
sentences.chinese: 英语教学的新创举

detailed_translations.english: the introduction of new ideas or methods

name: charge
trans: 索取， 要价； 控告， 指控； 委以； 指示； 充电
价钱，费用；管理；照管；掌管；控告，指控；电荷，电量

sentences.english: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

detailed_translations.english: electricity that is put into a piece of electrical equipment such as a battery
to fill a glass
a short bar hanging from two ropes high above the ground, used by  acrobats

sentences.english: There are a few things you should check before pressing the shutter release.
sentences.chinese: 在按快门之前，有几件事情你应该检查。

detailed_translations.chinese: 快门；百叶窗；关闭物；遮板
detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of wooden or metal covers on the outside of a window that can be closed to keep light out or prevent thieves from coming in

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…装百叶窗；以百叶窗遮闭

name: alternate
trans: 轮流的； 间隔的； 交替的

sentences.english: The two patterns alternate over periods of two to seven years in the tropical Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 在热带的太平洋地区，这两种现象的交替周期超过了两到七年。

sentences.english: To make the tiger blink, you alternate the transparency between the two areas by locating both the areas and paths in the corresponding XML.
sentences.chinese: 要让老虎眨眼，可以通过在相应的 XML 中定位这两个区域及其路径来在两个区域间交替透明性。

sentences.english: In most jurisdictions, twelve jurors and two alternates are chosen.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数审判中，12名陪审员和2名替补人员会被选出。

detailed_translations.english: if two things alternate, or if you alternate them, they happen one after the other in a repeated pattern
two alternate things are placed one after the other in a regular pattern
An alternate is a person or thing that replaces another, and can act or be used instead of them

sentences.english: ...a few blocks of adobe houses.
sentences.chinese: …几个由土坯房组成的街区。

detailed_translations.english: earth and  straw  that are made into bricks for building houses

sentences.english: You can never recreate the feeling of winning for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 你永远无法再次体会第一次获胜时的心情。

sentences.english: the tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 热带雨林

sentences.english: tropical fruit
sentences.chinese: 热带水果

detailed_translations.english: coming from or existing in the hottest parts of the world

sentences.english: She studied the envelope, trying to decipher the handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 她仔细地看信封，试图辨认上面的字迹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 解释（过去式deciphered，过去分词deciphered，现在分词deciphering，第三人称单数deciphers，名词decipherer，形容词decipherable）；译解
detailed_translations.english: to find the meaning of something that is difficult to read or understand

sentences.english: When spring is coming all trees begin to burgeon .
sentences.chinese: 当春天到来的时候，所有树开始发芽。

sentences.english: The brain-drain effect of studying abroad has started to burgeon due to flaws in the domestic academic environment.
sentences.chinese: 由于国内学术环境恶劣，出国留学造成人才外流的现象已经初显萌芽。

sentences.english: The seed of friendship and cooperation we sow today will burgeon and harvest in the future and China-US partnership of cooperation will definitely enjoy a better tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天播下的友好合作种子一定能够生根发芽、开花结果，中美合作伙伴关系一定能够迎来更加美好的明天。

name: interview
trans: 接见， 会见； 采访； 面试

sentences.english: a portfolio of work presented at interview
sentences.chinese: 在面试时呈递的工作成果样本

sentences.english: a police interview
sentences.chinese: 警方问讯

sentences.english: We’re interviewing six candidates for the job.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作我们要面试六名申请人。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting at which someone is asked questions in order to find out whether they are suitable for a job, course of study etc
to ask someone questions during an interview

name: naive
trans: 幼稚的， 天真的， 不成熟的

sentences.english: a naive young girl
sentences.chinese: 天真的小女孩

sentences.english: Jim can be so naive sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆有时候非常幼稚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幼稚的； 天真的； 轻信的
detailed_translations.english: not having much experience of how complicated life is, so that you trust people too much and believe that good things will always happen

name: essential
trans: 本质的，基本的；必要的，必不可少的；极其重要的
要素； 实质， 本质； 要点

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

sentences.english: Expansion of the company has continued apace .
sentences.chinese: 该公司继续迅速扩张。

detailed_translations.english: happening quickly

name: encode
trans: 把译成电码， 把…编码

sentences.english: As previously mentioned, the main thing this renderer does is decode input and encode output.
sentences.chinese: 正如前面提到的，渲染器做的主要工作就是解码输入和编码输出。

sentences.english: Decoder - This feature can be used to decode data to get back the original form, or to encode and encrypt data.
sentences.chinese: 这个特性用来解码数据，从而得到数据的原始形式。或者用来编码和加密数据。

sentences.english: Obviously, if you wanted to encode and decode in some other format, I would suggest extending the input and output stream.
sentences.chinese: 如果您希望以其他格式进行编码和解码，我建议您继承输入和输出流，这是很自然的事情。

detailed_translations.english: to put a message or other information into code

sentences.english: Reporters asked him to clarify his position (= say exactly what his beliefs are ) on welfare reform.
sentences.chinese: 记者们要求他阐明他在福利改革问题上的立场。

detailed_translations.english: to make something clearer or easier to understand

sentences.english: The metal glowed in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 金属在熔炉里发出灼热的光。

sentences.english: An adjustable plate, as in the flue of a furnace or stove, for controlling the draft.
sentences.chinese: 挡板，调节风门一种可调节的薄片，如在熔炉或火炉的通气管中的，用来控制气流。

sentences.english: The graceful preface was laced by a commonplace maid near the furnace in the palace without any trace of embrace.
sentences.chinese: 这份优雅的前言是由一个平凡的侍女在宫殿里的火炉边，不留住拥抱过的痕迹而系上带子的。

detailed_translations.english: a large container for a very hot fire, used to produce power, heat, or liquid metal

name: scare
trans: 吓， 使害怕； 受惊吓， 感到害怕

sentences.english: You really gave us a scare !
sentences.chinese: 你真的吓了我们一跳！

detailed_translations.english: a sudden feeling of fear

sentences.english: We were woken in the night by thunder.
sentences.chinese: 晚上我们被雷声惊醒。

detailed_translations.english: the loud noise that you hear during a storm, usually after a flash of lightning
if it thunders, there is a loud noise in the sky, usually after a flash of lightning
to make a very loud deep noise

name: murky
trans: 浑浊的； 黑暗的； 朦胧的； 隐晦的

sentences.english: murky water
sentences.chinese: 浊水

detailed_translations.chinese: 黑暗的， 昏暗的； 朦胧的
detailed_translations.english: dark and difficult to see through

name: observe
trans: 察觉； 观察； 遵守

sentences.english: Scientists have observed a drop in ozone levels over the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.english: Predators have been observed to avoid attacking brightly coloured species.
sentences.chinese: 据观察发现，食肉动物会避免袭击色彩鲜艳的物种。

sentences.english: The army was observing a ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 军队当时在遵守一项停火协议。

sentences.english: ‘Sid looks ill,’ Doherty observed.
sentences.chinese: “锡德看上去病了。”多尔蒂说道。

detailed_translations.english: to see and notice something

name: meaningful
trans: 有目的的； 有意义的

sentences.english: Sam and Barbara exchanged meaningful glances.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆和芭芭拉交换了会意的眼神。

detailed_translations.english: a look that clearly expresses the way someone feels, even though nothing is said

name: furnish
trans: 布置， 为…配备家具； 供应， 提供； 装备

sentences.english: Will these finds furnish more information on prehistoric man?
sentences.chinese: 这些发现是否能提供更多有关史前人类的资料？

sentences.english: Having bought the house, they couldn’t afford to furnish it.
sentences.chinese: 买下房子后，他们没有钱买家具了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装备，布置 （房间、建筑物）；供应，提供
detailed_translations.english: to put furniture and other things into a house or room

name: exploratory
trans: 探测的； 勘探的； 探索的

sentences.english: He’s going to have exploratory surgery on his knee.
sentences.chinese: 他的膝盖要做探查性手术。

detailed_translations.english: done in order to find out more about something

name: criticise
trans: 批评， 非难， 责备； 评论

sentences.english: If you or your partner criticise each other habitually, you are attacking their personality.
sentences.chinese: 如果你或你的伴侣习惯性地批评对方，其实你们是在攻击对方的人格。

sentences.english: The more we criticise a nation in motion the less we have to say about our own sad lost little island.
sentences.chinese: 我们对运转中的国家的批评越多，我们就能更少地谈到我们所在的迷失的小岛。

sentences.english: These papers found it to their advantage, during the unpopularity of Darling, to criticise severely the acts of that Governor, who was defended by the Gazette with intemperate zeal.
sentences.chinese: 这两份报纸发现，基于达令总督的不得人心，他们拥有一大优势：严词批评总督的法令，和《公报》的过分阿谀拍马对着干。

name: excavation
trans: 挖掘， 发掘； 出土文物

sentences.english: A second excavation, in 1985, lasted a year and was cut short for technical reasons.
sentences.chinese: 第二次挖掘是在1985年，因为技术原因持续了一年就突然停止了。

sentences.english: If he thinks I’m particular about excavation records, you should see him taking pictures!
sentences.chinese: 如果他觉得我对挖掘纪录很挑剔，你应该看看他是怎么拍照的。

sentences.english: Blue flags define the excavation perimeter, while yellow ones mark the location of fossils or stone tools.
sentences.chinese: 蓝旗用来显示发掘地的周长，而黄旗用来标明发掘出化石或石制工具的地点。

name: exclude
trans: 把…排斥在外； 将排除， 不包括

sentences.english: a special diet that excludes dairy products
sentences.chinese: 不包含奶制品的特别食谱

sentences.english: The judges decided to exclude evidence which had been unfairly attained.
sentences.chinese: 法官裁决不接纳以不正当手段获取的证据。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately not include something

name: enlighten
trans: 启发； 开导； 阐明

sentences.english: Baldwin enlightened her as to the nature of the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 鲍德温给她讲解了这个实验的性质。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone more knowledge and greater understanding about something

name: image
trans: 形象； 印象； 图像

sentences.english: attempts to improve the image of the police
sentences.chinese: 提升警察形象的努力

sentences.english: He had the clearest image in his mind of his mother and father.
sentences.chinese: 他脑海中对父母的印象极其清晰。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion people have of a person, organization, product etc, or the way a person, organization etc seems to be to the public

sentences.english: I gave the floor a good scrub .
sentences.chinese: 我把地板仔细刷洗了一遍。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矮树；洗擦；擦洗者；矮小的人（或物）
detailed_translations.english: low bushes and trees that grow in very dry soil
to rub something hard, especially with a stiff brush, in order to clean it

detailed_translations.chinese: 矮小的；临时凑合的；次等的
detailed_translations.english: small, stunted, or inferior

name: homogeneous
trans: 同种类的， 由相同事物组成的

sentences.english: a homogeneous society
sentences.chinese: 同种族人组成的社会

detailed_translations.english: consisting of people or things that are all of the same type

name: profound
trans: 深切的， 深远的； 知识渊博的， 见解深刻的， 深奥的

sentences.english: a profound question
sentences.chinese: 深刻的问题

sentences.english: Jenner is a profound thinker.
sentences.chinese: 詹纳是个思想深刻的人。

detailed_translations.english: showing great knowledge and understanding

sentences.english: The columns were of white marble.
sentences.chinese: 柱子是白色的大理石。

sentences.english: a marble statue
sentences.chinese: 大理石雕像

detailed_translations.chinese: 大理石；大理石制品；弹珠
detailed_translations.english: a type of hard rock that becomes smooth when it is polished, and is used for making buildings,  statue s  etc

name: collate
trans: 对照； 核对； 整理

sentences.english: Shall we collate the accounts today?
sentences.chinese: 今天我们要核对帐目吗？

name: clench
trans: 握紧； 咬紧； 牢牢抓住

sentences.english: a cigar clenched between his teeth
sentences.chinese: 他叼在嘴里的一支雪茄

detailed_translations.english: to hold something tightly in your hand or between your teeth

sentences.english: Finding enough money for the project was the first hurdle.
sentences.chinese: 第一道难关是为该项目筹措足够的资金。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or difficulty that you must deal with before you can achieve something

sentences.english: For my unconquerable soul.
sentences.chinese: 不可征服的灵魂。

sentences.english: She died on June 1, 1968, an outstanding example of the unconquerable human spirit.
sentences.chinese: 海伦·凯勒于1968年6月1日与世长辞，她可以说是人类不屈不挠精神的最佳典范。

sentences.english: One of those myths, for example, is that Afghanistan is inherently unconquerable thanks to the fierceness of its inhabitants and the formidable nature of its terrain.
sentences.chinese: 例如，众多谜团之一：由于其原住民的彪悍和其地势的险恶，阿富汗从本质上就是不可征服的。

name: formality
trans: 认真遵循规范、 礼节等； 例行公事； 正式手续

sentences.english: the formalities necessary for a valid marriage
sentences.chinese: 有效婚姻所需的正式手续

detailed_translations.chinese: 遵守礼节；正式手续；例行公事
detailed_translations.english: something that you must do as a formal or official part of an activity or process

sentences.english: The trial has rekindled painful memories of the war.
sentences.chinese: 这场审判又唤起了人们对战争的痛苦回忆。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone have a particular feeling, thought etc again

name: personalize
trans: 使成为私人的； 在上标出主人姓名； 个人化

sentences.english: Why not do something to personalize your office?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不做点什么使你的办公室有些个性呢？

detailed_translations.english: to put your name or  initial s  on something, or to decorate it in your own way, to show that it belongs to you

sentences.english: Three plus six equals nine (3+6=9).
sentences.chinese: 3 加6等于9。

sentences.english: The total cost was $10,000, plus 14% interest.
sentences.chinese: 全部费用是1万美元，外加14%的利息。

sentences.english: Daytime temperatures barely reached plus 5˚.
sentences.chinese: 白天的气温仅零上5度。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that one number or amount is added to another
more than zero – used especially when talking about temperatures

sentences.english: The industry underwent a period of rapid expansion.
sentences.chinese: 该产业经历了一轮快速扩张。

detailed_translations.english: when something increases in size, range, amount etc

sentences.english: No special license will be regranted to anyone from now on.
sentences.chinese: 特殊许可证今后不得向任何人再行发放。

sentences.english: Remind me to renew the driver's license.It will lapse next month.
sentences.chinese: 提醒我更换驾驶执照，它下个月就失效了。

sentences.english: The next time the client connects to the server, it will obtain another license.
sentences.chinese: 在客户端下一次连接到服务器时，它将获得另一个许可证。

detailed_translations.english: to give official permission for someone to do or produce something, or for an activity to take place

name: expand
trans: 膨胀， 扩张； 张开， 展开； 详述

sentences.english: Water expands as it freezes.
sentences.chinese: 水结冰时会膨胀。

sentences.english: Sydney’s population expanded rapidly in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪60年代，悉尼的人口迅速增加。

sentences.english: exercises that expand the chest muscles
sentences.chinese: 扩展胸肌的运动

sentences.english: his expanding waistline
sentences.chinese: 他那逐渐增大的腰围

detailed_translations.english: to become larger in size, number, or amount, or to make something become larger

name: headquarters
trans: 总部， 总公司； 大本营； 司令部

sentences.english: the headquarters of the United Nations
sentences.chinese: 联合国总部

sentences.english: Headquarters in Dublin has/have agreed.
sentences.chinese: 都柏林总部已经同意了

detailed_translations.english: the main building or offices used by a large company or organization
a metal or wooden frame that holds a book upright so that you can read it without holding it in your hands

sentences.english: ...the perimeter of the airport.
sentences.chinese: …机场周边。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周长；周界；[眼科] 视野计
detailed_translations.english: the whole length of the border around an area or shape

name: prediction
trans: 预言， 预料， 预报

sentences.english: The data can be used to make useful economic predictions .
sentences.chinese: 这些数据可用于进行有用的经济预测。

detailed_translations.english: a statement about what you think is going to happen, or the act of making this statement

name: essay
trans: 短文， 文章； 评论文

sentences.english: an essay on Bernard Shaw
sentences.chinese: 关于萧伯纳的文章

sentences.english: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of writing about a particular subject by a student as part of a course of study

name: survey
trans: 调查， 勘察； 测量， 勘测； 审视
调查， 检视； 测量， 勘测； 俯瞰， 眺望

sentences.english: Of the 100 companies surveyed, 10% had a turnover of £50 m to £99 m.
sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.english: She turned to survey her daughter’s pale face.
sentences.chinese: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

sentences.english: We conducted a survey of parents in the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们对这个村子的孩子父母作了一次调查。

sentences.english: a geological survey
sentences.chinese: 地质勘察

detailed_translations.english: to ask a large number of people questions in order to find out their attitudes or opinions
a set of questions that you ask a large number of people in order to find out about their opinions or behaviour

name: devastating
trans: 毁灭性的； 强有力的

sentences.english: It will be a devastating blow for the town if the factory closes.
sentences.chinese: 如果工厂关闭，对该镇来说将是沉重的打击。

detailed_translations.english: badly damaging or destroying something

sentences.english: The match had to be postponed until next week.
sentences.chinese: 比赛不得不推迟到下周举行。

sentences.english: His trial has been postponed indefinitely (= no one knows when it will happen ) .
sentences.chinese: 对他的审判被无限期推迟了。

detailed_translations.english: to change the date or time of a planned event or action to a later one

sentences.english: I've been to see an internist, a nutritionist, and a chiropractor.
sentences.chinese: 我已经求诊过一位内科医生、一位营养学家和一位按摩师了。

detailed_translations.english: a doctor who has a general knowledge about all illnesses and medical conditions of organs inside your body, and who treats illnesses that do not need operations

sentences.english: She received a small legacy from her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她从姨妈那里继承了一小笔遗产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产，遗赠；先人(或过去)留下的东西
detailed_translations.english: money or property that you receive from someone after they die

sentences.english: The spy sent his message in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个间谍用密码发送情报。

sentences.english: But we have not yet implemented this in the code.
sentences.chinese: 但我们在代码中尚未实现此功能。

sentences.english: The hacker came smack up against the company's policy of keeping its records in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个计算机黑客突然碰壁了，因这家公司实行了用密码保存公司纪录的政策。

name: displace
trans: 取代； 迫使离开家园； 撤职， 使失业

sentences.english: Coal has been displaced by natural gas as a major source of energy.
sentences.chinese: 作为一种主要能源，煤的地位已为天然气所取代。

sentences.english: immigrants who displace US workers in the job market
sentences.chinese: 在就业市场上取代美国工人的移民

detailed_translations.english: to take the place or position of something or someone

name: passionate
trans: 充满激情的， 热切的， 狂热的

sentences.english: He had a brief but passionate love affair with an older woman.
sentences.chinese: 他和一个比他年长的女子有过一段短暂而炽热的情史。

sentences.english: a very passionate young man
sentences.chinese: 一位感情热烈的年轻人

sentences.english: a passionate lover
sentences.chinese: 富有激情的爱人

sentences.english: a passionate kiss
sentences.chinese: 激情的一吻

detailed_translations.english: showing or involving very strong feelings of sexual love

name: counterproductive
trans: 产生相反效果的， 适得其反的

sentences.english: In practice, however, such an attitude is counterproductive.
sentences.chinese: 然而在实际中，这种态度会适得其反。

detailed_translations.chinese: 反生产的；使达不到预期目标的
detailed_translations.english: Something that is counterproductive achieves the opposite result from the one that you want to achieve

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization
to close an entrance or a container with something that stops air, water etc from coming in or out of it

sentences.english: And on the sledge sat a person whom everyone knew the moment they set eyes on him.
sentences.chinese: 雪橇上坐着一个人，大家一见这人就认识了。

sentences.english: Then, holding out her arm, she let one drop fall from it on the snow beside the sledge.
sentences.chinese: 然后，她伸出手臂，从瓶里倒出一滴东西滴在雪橇旁边的雪地上。

sentences.english: But behind him, on a much higher seat in the middle of the sledge sat a very different person - a great lady, taller than any woman that Edmund had ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 在他后面，在雪橇中间一个高得多的座位上，坐着一个与众不同的女人，她比爱德蒙以前见过的任何一个女人都要高大。

detailed_translations.english: to travel on a sledge
a small vehicle used for sliding over snow, often used by children or in some sports

sentences.english: The state police are investigating the incident.
sentences.chinese: 州警察正调查此事。

sentences.english: The study investigates the impact of violent TV programming on children.
sentences.chinese: 该研究调查暴力电视节目对儿童的影响。

sentences.english: I heard a noise and went downstairs to investigate.
sentences.chinese: 我听见响声，就下楼去看个究竟。

detailed_translations.english: to try to find out the truth about something such as a crime, accident, or scientific problem

sentences.english: She was repairing Billy’s trousers, where the seam had come undone.
sentences.chinese: 她在补比利裤子的开线处。

sentences.english: Join the shoulder seams together.
sentences.chinese: 把肩部缝起来。

detailed_translations.english: a line where two pieces of cloth, leather etc have been stitched together

name: illusion
trans: 幻想中的事物， 错误的观念； 错觉， 幻觉， 假象

sentences.english: She was under no illusion that he loved her.
sentences.chinese: 她不再幻想他爱她了。

sentences.english: It is an illusion that the Arctic is dark in winter.
sentences.chinese: 认为北极冬天一片黑暗是错误的。

sentences.english: She had no illusions about her physical attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 她对自己外表的吸引力不抱幻想。

sentences.english: ‘I hate to shatter your illusions,’ he said.
sentences.chinese: “我不愿意打破你的幻想。”他说。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幻想， 错误的观念； 错觉， 幻觉， 假象
detailed_translations.english: an idea or opinion that is wrong, especially about yourself

name: considerable
trans: 相当大的， 可观的； 值得考虑的， 重要的

sentences.english: Michael has already spent considerable time in Barcelona.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔在巴塞罗那已经待了相当长的时间了。

sentences.english: issues of considerable importance
sentences.chinese: 相当重要的问题

sentences.english: The series has aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 这套系列节目引起了观众相当浓厚的兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: fairly large, especially large enough to have an effect or be important

sentences.english: Tests showed increased levels of toxin in shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 测试表明贝类中的毒素级别上升了。

detailed_translations.english: a poisonous substance, especially one that is produced by  bacteria  and causes a particular disease

sentences.english: high productivity levels in manufacturing
sentences.chinese: 制造业中的高生产率

sentences.english: It cost the country $4 million in lost productivity .
sentences.chinese: 它对该国造成了400万美元的生产力损失。

detailed_translations.english: the rate at which goods are produced, and the amount produced, especially in relation to the work, time, and money needed to produce them

name: heal
trans: 治愈， 康复； 调停

sentences.english: a preacher who claims that he can heal the sick
sentences.chinese: 自称可以治病的传道士

sentences.english: The rift between the two younger men never healed.
sentences.chinese: 两个较年轻者之间的裂痕从未得以弥合。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone who is ill become healthy again, especially by using natural powers or prayer

sentences.english: Do you have to reserve tickets in advance?
sentences.chinese: 你必须预先订票吗？

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

detailed_translations.chinese: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区
detailed_translations.english: a supply of something kept to be used if it is needed

sentences.english: a rubbish heap
sentences.chinese: 垃圾堆

sentences.english: We piled the branches into heaps for burning.
sentences.chinese: 我们把树枝堆起来烧。

detailed_translations.english: a large untidy pile of things
to put a lot of things on top of each other in an untidy way

name: sympathy
trans: 同情； 赞同， 支持

sentences.english: Our sympathies are with the families of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sorry for someone who is in a bad situation

sentences.english: Survivors of the crash were rescued by helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 空难的生还者被直升机救了出来。

sentences.english: a daring rescue at sea
sentences.chinese: 英勇的海上营救行动

detailed_translations.english: to save someone or something from a situation of danger or harm
when someone or something is rescued from danger

name: brief
trans: 短时间的，短暂的；简短的，

sentences.english: We stopped by Alice’s house for a brief visit.
sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Let’s keep this conversation brief; I have a plane to catch.
sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.english: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.chinese: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…介绍基本情况，做…的提要
detailed_translations.english: If someone briefs you, especially about a piece of work or a serious matter, they give you information that you need before you do it or consider it
a short spoken or written statement giving facts about a law case

name: recover
trans: 重新获得， 重新得到； 使复原， 使康复； 收回， 换回

sentences.english: After a few days of fever, she began to recover.
sentences.chinese: 发烧几天之后，她开始恢复。

sentences.english: Two bodies were recovered from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 残骸中找到了两具尸体

detailed_translations.english: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

name: determine
trans: 确定； 决定； 下决心

sentences.english: Investigators are still trying to determine the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员仍在设法弄清失火的原因。

detailed_translations.english: to find out the facts about something

sentences.english: a one-year cookery course
sentences.chinese: 为期一年的烹饪课程

sentences.english: French cookery
sentences.chinese: 法式烹调

detailed_translations.english: the art or skill of cooking

sentences.english: He's embarking on a new career as a writer.
sentences.chinese: 他正开始一个当作家的新生涯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上船； 着手， 开始工作
detailed_translations.english: to go onto a ship or a plane, or to put or take something onto a ship or plane

name: devastate
trans: 破坏， 毁坏； 使震惊， 使极为悲痛

sentences.english: The city centre was devastated by the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 市中心被这枚炸弹摧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: to damage something very badly or completely

name: friction
trans: 摩擦； 矛盾， 冲突

sentences.english: Check your rope frequently, as friction against the rock can wear it away.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查绳索，因为与岩石摩擦会使它磨损。

detailed_translations.english: when one surface rubs against another

sentences.english: a group of highly intelligent (= very intelligent )students
sentences.chinese: 一组聪明异常的学生

sentences.english: Sontag was once famously described as the most intelligent woman in America.
sentences.chinese: 桑塔格曾被称为美国最聪明的女人，这是众人皆知的事。

detailed_translations.english: an intelligent person has a high level of mental ability and is good at understanding ideas and thinking clearly

name: equip
trans: 装备， 配备； 使有能力， 使有准备

sentences.english: They try to equip their vehicles with gadgets to deal with every possible contingency.
sentences.chinese: 他们尽量给他们的车辆配备各种小装置以应付任何可能的突发状况。

detailed_translations.english: to provide a person or place with the things that are needed for a particular kind of activity or work

sentences.english: He was leading a life of luxury in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚过着豪华舒适的生活。

sentences.english: The dress is lambswool – pure luxury.
sentences.chinese: 礼服是用羔羊毛制作的——绝对奢华。

sentences.english: luxuries like chocolate and perfume
sentences.chinese: 巧克力、香水之类的奢侈品

detailed_translations.english: very great comfort and pleasure, such as you get from expensive food, beautiful houses, cars etc

name: spiritual
trans: 精神的； 心灵的； 宗教的

sentences.english: Painting helps fill a spiritual need for beauty.
sentences.chinese: 绘画可以满足对美的精神需求。

sentences.english: spiritual values
sentences.chinese: 精神价值

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神的， 心灵的； 宗教的
detailed_translations.english: relating to your spirit rather than to your body or mind

name: transmute
trans: 改变； 变化， 变形， 变质

sentences.english: A radioactive atom could transmute itself into an entirely different kind of atom.
sentences.chinese: 放射性原子本身能嬗变为性质完全不同的另一种原子。

sentences.english: At that time, the CSO was heavily involved in trying to transmute dangerous chemicals via nuclear reactions.
sentences.chinese: 当时，中央安全机构正积极参与通过核反应嬗变危险的化学物质。

detailed_translations.english: to change one substance or type of thing into another

name: splendid
trans: 壮观的， 壮丽的， 极好的； 堂皇的， 豪华的； 灿烂的， 辉煌的

sentences.english: a splendid idea
sentences.chinese: 很妙的主意

sentences.english: a splendid opportunity
sentences.chinese: 绝佳的机会

sentences.english: The staff are doing a splendid job.
sentences.chinese: 员工们干得非常棒。

detailed_translations.english: very good

name: adaptation
trans: 适应； 改编； 改制物

sentences.english: Branagh won two awards for his screen adaptation of Shakespeare's Henry the Fifth.
sentences.chinese: 布拉纳因他对莎士比亚的《亨利五世》的荧幕改编而获了两次奖。

detailed_translations.chinese: 适应；改编；改编本，改写本
detailed_translations.english: a film or television programme that is based on a book or play

sentences.english: Ready meals sell well because of their convenience.
sentences.chinese: 即食餐因为方便销路好。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being suitable or useful for a particular purpose, especially by making something easier or saving you time

sentences.english: Martial arts teach respect, discipline, and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 武术能教人尊重他人、遵守纪律并且相互合作。

sentences.english: Learning poetry is a good discipline for the memory.
sentences.chinese: 背诗是训练记忆力的一种好方法。

sentences.english: Different cultures have different ways of disciplining their children.
sentences.chinese: 不同的文化有不同的管教孩子的方法。

detailed_translations.english: a way of training someone so that they learn to control their behaviour and obey rules
to teach someone to obey rules and control their behaviour

sentences.english: the emission of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere
sentences.chinese: 向大气排放二氧化碳

sentences.english: Britain agreed to cut emissions of nitrogen oxide from power stations.
sentences.chinese: 英国同意减少发电站氮氧化物的排放量。

detailed_translations.english: the production or sending out of light, heat, gas, etc.

name: estimate
trans: 估计， 估量； 估价； 评价

sentences.english: Try to estimate how many steps it will take to get to a close object.
sentences.chinese: 估计一下需要多少步才能到达一个近距目标。

detailed_translations.english: to try to judge the value, size, speed, cost etc of something, without calculating it exactly

detailed_translations.chinese: 估计； 评价； 看法
detailed_translations.english: a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something made using the information that you have, which may not be complete

sentences.english: I went to the hospital for a check-up this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我到医院去做了一次检查。

sentences.english: Conclusion Taking full advantage of media and personal communication measures, we should strengthen health education for TB patients during check-up, treatment and supervision.

sentences.chinese: …校准温度计的说明。

sentences.chinese: “如果能用一小分子或化学物质阻止这一酶的活性过程，”德明说，“这种化学物质就能够用来做抗生素。”

sentences.chinese: 费舍尔，生物人类学家，说她的最新著作的出发点是缘于她想揭开“为什么你会爱上你的爱人，这也许会帮助人们找到爱人”背后的科学依据。

sentences.chinese: 他们新的前哨阵地设在一座小山包顶上。

sentences.chinese: 忙碌而有成效的一段时间

sentences.english: a fruitful source of information
sentences.chinese: 有用的信息来源

detailed_translations.chinese: 富有成效的；多产的；果实结得多的
detailed_translations.english: producing good results

name: beyond
trans: 在…较远的一边； 超出， 除…之外

sentences.english: They crossed the mountains and headed for the valleys beyond.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻过山，向更远处的山谷进发。

sentences.english: Beyond the river, cattle were grazing.
sentences.chinese: 河的那边，牛在吃草。

sentences.english: She drove through Westport, and stopped a few miles beyond at a wayside inn.
sentences.chinese: 她驱车穿过西港，在几英里外的一个路边旅馆停了下来。

detailed_translations.english: on or to the further side of something

sentences.english: Careless drivers hazard other people's lives as well as their own.
sentences.chinese: 粗心大意的驾驶者拿他人和自己的生命冒险。

sentences.english: Polluted water sources are a hazard to wildlife.
sentences.chinese: 受污染的水源会对野生生物构成危险。

detailed_translations.english: to risk sth or put it in danger
something that may be dangerous, or cause accidents or problems

sentences.english: Workers are being encouraged to take voluntary redundancy.
sentences.chinese: 工人被鼓励主动离职。

detailed_translations.english: done willingly and without being forced

sentences.english: Police have so far failed to establish a connection between the two murders.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止警方尚未确定两宗凶杀案之间有关联。

sentences.english: The evidence was there in the file but no one made the connection .
sentences.chinese: 证据就在档案里，但没有人把它们联系起来。

sentences.english: Students often see little connection between school and the rest of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 学生往往看不到上学和今后生活的联系。

sentences.english: He demonstrated the close connection between social conditions and health.
sentences.chinese: 他证明了社会条件和健康之间的密切联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连接； 联系； 连接物， 连接点； 亲戚
detailed_translations.english: the way in which two facts, ideas, events etc are related to each other, and one is affected or caused by the other

sentences.english: Their defences are proof against most weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们的防卫工事可以抵挡大多数武器的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: facts, information, documents etc that prove something is true

name: militant
trans: 好斗的人， 激进分子

sentences.english: militant political activists
sentences.chinese: 激进的政治活动家

sentences.english: a militant animal rights group
sentences.chinese: 激进的动物权利保护团体

sentences.english: After the assassination of Martin Luther King, black leaders became more militant.
sentences.chinese: 马丁•路德•金遇刺后，黑人领袖变得更为激进了。

sentences.english: Even now we could not be sure that the militants would not find some new excuse to call a strike the following winter.
sentences.chinese: 即使到现在，我们也不能确定这些激进分子不会找到某个新的借口在下一年冬天号召一场罢工。

detailed_translations.english: a militant organization or person is willing to use strong or violent action in order to achieve political or social change

detailed_translations.chinese: 富有战斗性的人；好斗者；激进分子
detailed_translations.english: Militant is also a noun

name: presence
trans: 出席； 存在； 仪态

sentences.english: Your presence is requested at the club meeting on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 敬请出席于周五举行的俱乐部会议。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is present in a particular place

sentences.english: Employees who refuse to relocate are in breach of contract (= have done something not allowed by their contracts ) .
sentences.chinese: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement between two or more people, stating what each will do

name: profitable
trans: 有利可图的， 赚钱的； 有益的

sentences.english: The advertising campaign proved very profitable.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，这次广告宣传活动卓有成效。

sentences.english: a highly profitable business
sentences.chinese: 盈利高的企业

sentences.english: a profitable afternoon
sentences.chinese: 有收获的下午

detailed_translations.english: producing a profit or a useful result

sentences.english: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
sentences.chinese: 等到调查结束后，结果会被送到联邦检察官办公室。

sentences.english: Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯完成了和詹姆斯的买卖后就去了迈阿密。

detailed_translations.english: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断出，推论出；缔结，议定
detailed_translations.english: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have

name: susceptible
trans: 易受影响的， 易受伤害的； 易受感染的； 敏感的， 易动感情的； 能经受…的， 容许…的

sentences.english: A lot of TV advertising is aimed at susceptible young children.
sentences.chinese: 很多电视广告瞄准了易受影响的幼儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易受影响的； 过敏的； 能经受的， 容许的
detailed_translations.english: likely to suffer from a particular illness or be affected by a particular problem

sentences.english: The prominent coin was called the shilling and it was a silver coin.
sentences.chinese: 那种著名的硬币名叫先令,并且它是一种银质的硬币。

sentences.english: We wanted this to be a twenty shilling coin but now in the market it's trading at twenty-one.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望它是一个值二十先令的硬币,但现在它在市场上以二十一个先令的价值来交换。

sentences.english: Walter Scott wanted to give him a six penny piece to reward him for this service; but not finding any in his purse he presented him with a shilling saying, "You will owe me six pence, my good fellow.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔特•司各脱想奖赏给他一枚六便士的硬币,但他在钱包里找不到便士,于是他给了他一个先令,说:"你将欠我六便士,我亲爱的朋友.

detailed_translations.english: an old British coin or unit of money. There were 20 shillings in one pound.

sentences.english: The inside of the bag was lined with soft leather.
sentences.chinese: 这包的里面衬了软皮。

sentences.english: elegant leather boots
sentences.chinese: 精美的皮靴

detailed_translations.english: animal skin that has been treated to preserve it, and is used for making shoes, bags etc

name: comb
trans: 梳理； 搜寻， 彻底搜查

sentences.english: Your hair needs a good comb.
sentences.chinese: 你的头发需要好好梳理一下。

sentences.english: Melanie ran upstairs to comb her hair.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮跑上楼去梳头发。

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of plastic, metal etc with a row of thin teeth on one side, used for making your hair tidy
to make hair look tidy using a comb

sentences.english: The custom of arranged marriages still exists in many countries.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家仍存在包办婚姻的习俗。

sentences.english: Opportunities exist for students to gain sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 学生有机会获得资助。

sentences.english: Stop pretending that the problem doesn’t exist.
sentences.chinese: 别再假装这个问题不存在了。

sentences.english: We existed on a diet of rice.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃大米过活。

detailed_translations.english: to be present in a place or situation

name: innovative
trans: 革新的， 创新的， 新颖的； 富有革新精神的

sentences.english: an innovative approach to language teaching
sentences.chinese: 创新的语言教学法

sentences.english: innovative schemes for recycling waste materials
sentences.chinese: 废物回收利用的创新计划

detailed_translations.english: an innovative idea or way of doing something is new, different, and better than those that existed before

sentences.english: There was undisguised contempt in his voice.
sentences.chinese: 他的语气中带着不加掩饰的轻蔑。

detailed_translations.english: an undisguised feeling is clearly shown and not hidden

name: insight
trans: 洞察力， 深刻的了解； 顿悟

sentences.english: a writer of great insight
sentences.chinese: 有深刻洞察力的作家

sentences.english: The book gives us fascinating insights into life in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 这本书生动地表现了墨西哥的生活。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to understand and realize what people or situations are really like

name: instrumental
trans: 有帮助的， 起作用的； 用乐器演奏的

sentences.english: ...a CD of vocal and instrumental music.
sentences.chinese: …一张声乐和器乐光盘。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乐器的；有帮助的；仪器的，器械的
detailed_translations.english: instrumental music is for instruments, not for voices
a piece of music in which no voices are used, only instruments

sentences.english: Police are still investigating the exact cause of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 警方还在调查这起事故的确切原因。

sentences.english: What were his exact words?
sentences.chinese: 他的原话是什么？

sentences.english: The timing had to be exact.
sentences.chinese: 对时机的把握必须精确。

sentences.english: Some concepts in Chinese medicine have no exact equivalent in Western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中医的一些概念在西医中没有完全一样的对应观念。

detailed_translations.english: completely correct in every detail
to demand and get something from someone by using threats, force etc

sentences.english: Closure of the plant means 80 workers are facing unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂的关闭意味着 80 个工人面临失业。

sentences.english: a town where there is high unemployment
sentences.chinese: 高失业率城镇

detailed_translations.english: when someone does not have a job

sentences.english: Westerly gales forced the ship off course.
sentences.chinese: 强劲的西风将那艘船吹离了航道。

sentences.english: Firemen entering the building were forced back by flames.
sentences.chinese: 冲进大楼的消防队员被火焰挡了回来。

sentences.english: She tried to keep the door shut but the man forced it open .
sentences.chinese: 她不想打开门，但那男人硬是把它推开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强迫；用力推动，用力打开
detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something move in a particular direction or into a different position, especially through or using great strength

detailed_translations.chinese: 军队， 兵力； 暴力， 武力； 力， 力气； 影响力， 效力
detailed_translations.english: military action used as a way of achieving your aims

name: centigrade
trans: 百分度的； 摄氏度的

sentences.english: ...daytime temperatures of up to forty degrees centigrade.
sentences.chinese: …高达40摄氏度的日间气温。

sentences.english: The number at the bottom is the recommended water temperature in centigrade.
sentences.chinese: 底部的数字为建议性摄氏度水温。

detailed_translations.english: Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.
Centigrade is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.

sentences.english: He accused me of slandering him and trying to undermine his position.
sentences.chinese: 他指控我诽谤他并想削弱他的地位。

detailed_translations.english: to say false things about someone in order to damage other people’s good opinion of them
a false spoken statement about someone, intended to damage the good opinion that people have of that person

name: distribution
trans: 分发， 分配； 配给物； 散布， 分布

sentences.english: a distribution centre
sentences.chinese: 经销中心

detailed_translations.english: the act of sharing things among a large group of people in a planned way

name: sedentary
trans: 需要久坐的； 惯于久坐不动的； 定居的， 不迁徙的； 沉积的

sentences.english: a sedentary people living north of the Danube
sentences.chinese: 多瑙河北面的一个定居民族

detailed_translations.chinese: 久坐的；坐惯的；定栖的；静坐的
detailed_translations.english: spending a lot of time sitting down, and not moving or exercising very much

name: capacity
trans: 容量， 容积； 能量， 能力

sentences.english: The room had seating capacity for about 80.
sentences.chinese: 这房间能坐80个人左右。

sentences.english: The orchestra played to a capacity crowd (= the largest number of people who can fit into a hall, theatre etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 管弦乐队为满场的观众演奏。

sentences.english: All the hotels were filled to capacity.
sentences.chinese: 所有的宾馆都住满了。

sentences.english: a child’s capacity for learning
sentences.chinese: 孩子的学习能力

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space a container, room etc has to hold things or people

sentences.english: Sometimes I find it hard to cope.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我觉得很难应付。

sentences.english: He coped quite well as manager while still captaining the team.
sentences.chinese: 他是球队的主教练，同时兼任队长，干得相当好。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in dealing with a difficult problem or situation

name: inescapable
trans: 不可逃避的； 难免的

sentences.english: She didn’t want to confront the inescapable fact that she would have to sell the house.
sentences.chinese: 她不想面对必须卖掉房子这一无法逃避的事实。

sentences.english: The inescapable conclusion is that he was murdered by someone in his own family.
sentences.chinese: 必然的结论就是: 他是被自己的家人谋杀的。

detailed_translations.english: an inescapable fact or situation is one that you cannot avoid or ignore

name: transcript
trans: 抄本， 副本； 文字记录

sentences.english: A transcript of this PBS programme is available through our website, pbs.com.
sentences.chinese: 这个公共广播公司节目的文字本可通过我们的网址查阅。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成绩单；抄本，副本；文字记录
detailed_translations.english: a written or printed copy of a speech, conversation etc

name: saturate
trans: 使湿透， 浸透； 使充满， 使饱和

sentences.english: Water poured through the hole, saturating the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 水从洞里流进来，浸湿了地毯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 浸透，使湿透；使饱和，使充满
detailed_translations.english: to make something very wet

detailed_translations.chinese: 浸透的，饱和的；深颜色的

name: course
trans: 追猎； 运行； 流动
过程，进程；路线，方针；跑道；课程

sentences.english: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.chinese: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.english: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.english: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主菜是鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a series of lessons in a particular subject

sentences.english: a waterproof jacket
sentences.chinese: 防水上衣

sentences.english: waterproof adhesive
sentences.chinese: 防水黏合剂

sentences.english: Rub the wax in to make the shoe waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 在鞋子上抹点蜡使其防水。

detailed_translations.english: not allowing water to enter
a jacket or coat that does not allow rain and water through it

sentences.english: ...a rectangular table.
sentences.chinese: …一张长方形的桌子。

detailed_translations.english: having the shape of a rectangle

sentences.english: In addition, you can elect to share your files with others.
sentences.chinese: 另外，您可以决定与其他的用户共享 您的文件。

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to mention another person or thing after sth else

name: precise
trans: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的

sentences.english: precise sales figures
sentences.chinese: 准确的销售数据

sentences.english: It was difficult to get precise information.
sentences.chinese: 很难得到确切的消息。

sentences.english: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise .’
sentences.chinese: “她比你大很多，是不是？”“准确地说，大了15岁。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的
detailed_translations.english: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct

name: sensible
trans: 明智的； 合情理的； 能觉察到的

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.english: sensible advice
sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.english: It’s sensible to keep a note of your passport number.
sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.english: Moving house seemed like the sensible thing to do .
sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

detailed_translations.english: reasonable, practical, and showing good judgment

name: ulterior
trans: 较远的； 不可告人的， 隐秘的， 秘密的

sentences.english: He’s just being nice. I don’t think he has any ulterior motives.
sentences.chinese: 他就是好心，我不认为他别有用心。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将来的，较远的；在那边的；隐秘不明的

name: industrious
trans: 勤奋的， 勤勉的， 勤劳的

sentences.english: She was an industrious and willing worker.
sentences.chinese: 她是个勤劳肯干的工人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is industrious works hard

sentences.english: She strongly suspected he was lying to her.
sentences.chinese: 她非常怀疑他在对她撒谎。

sentences.english: She’s not going to be very happy about this, I suspect .
sentences.chinese: 我想对于此事她不会太高兴。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is probably true, especially something bad
someone who is thought to be guilty of a crime

sentences.english: Eighteen percent of 30-year-olds claim they are workaholics.
sentences.chinese: 18％的30岁的人声称他们是工作狂。

detailed_translations.chinese: 专心工作的人；醉心于工作的人；为免遭辞退而工作过份卖力的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who chooses to work a lot, so that they do not have time to do anything else

name: abide
trans: 停留， 逗留； 容忍， 忍受

sentences.english: I can't abide people with no sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌和没有幽默感的人打交道。

sentences.english: You'll have to abide by the rules of the club.
sentences.chinese: 你必须遵守俱乐部的规定。

detailed_translations.english: bear, stand

name: contrive
trans: 计划， 图谋； 设计； 发明

sentences.english: In 1862, a technique was contrived to take a series of photographs showing stages of movement.
sentences.chinese: 1862年时发明了一种技术，可以拍出一连串展示连续动作的照片。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明; 设计; 设法；造成
detailed_translations.english: to succeed in doing something in spite of difficulties

name: massive
trans: 大而重的， 厚实的， 粗大的； 大量的， 大规模的

sentences.english: The bell is massive, weighing over 40 tons.
sentences.chinese: 那口钟非常大，有40多吨重。

sentences.english: the castle’s massive walls
sentences.chinese: 城堡高大厚实的围墙

detailed_translations.chinese: (尺寸、数量、规模) 非常大的
detailed_translations.english: very large in size, quantity, or extent

name: mingle
trans: 混合， 联结； 相往来； 混杂其中

sentences.english: Add the mint and allow the flavours to mingle.
sentences.chinese: 加入薄荷，把各种味道混合起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 混合起来， 相混合； 相交往， 相往来
detailed_translations.english: if two feelings, sounds, smells etc mingle, they mix together with each other
if two feelings, sounds, smells etc mingle, they mix together with each other

sentences.english: These berries are edible, but those are poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 这些浆果可以吃，但那些有毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可以吃的， 可食用的
detailed_translations.english: something that is edible can be eaten

name: chorus
trans: 合唱，合唱曲；合唱队；副歌，叠句；齐声，齐声说的话

sentences.english: I sing with the university chorus.
sentences.chinese: 我在大学合唱队里唱歌。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of people who sing together
if people chorus something, they say it at the same time

sentences.english: How much do I owe you (= often used to show that you want to pay for something )?
sentences.chinese: 我该付你多少钱？

sentences.english: He owes his success to hard work.
sentences.chinese: 他的成功是靠勤奋工作。

detailed_translations.english: to need to pay someone for something that they have done for you or sold to you, or to need to give someone back money that they have lent you

sentences.english: the value of a company’s assets
sentences.chinese: 公司的资产价值

detailed_translations.chinese: 资产， 财产； 有价值的特性或技能， 优点
detailed_translations.english: the things that a company owns, that can be sold to pay debts

sentences.english: This will take a minimum of one hour.
sentences.chinese: 这最少要用一个小时。

sentences.english: The minimum number of students we need to run the course is fifteen.
sentences.chinese: 我们开这门课程最少要有15个学生。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest amount of something or number of things that is possible or necessary
the minimum number, degree, or amount of something is the smallest or least that is possible, allowed, or needed

sentences.english: a book of magic spells
sentences.chinese: 一本关于魔法的书

sentences.english: a magic sword
sentences.chinese: 一把魔剑

detailed_translations.english: in stories, a magic word or object has special powers that make the person using it able to do impossible things
the power to make impossible things happen by saying special words or doing special actions

name: unyielding
trans: 顽强的； 坚硬的； 不能弯曲的， 坚固的

sentences.english: an unyielding resistance to change
sentences.chinese: 固执己见，不愿改变

detailed_translations.chinese: 不屈的；坚强的；[材] 不易弯曲的
detailed_translations.english: not willing to change your ideas or beliefs

name: reveal
trans: 揭露； 泄露； 展现

detailed_translations.english: a place where people can stay and eat fairly cheaply

sentences.english: Some of the more extreme contacts give you "cat eyes" or how about "owl eyes"?
sentences.chinese: 一些更酷的隐形眼镜可以给你一双"猫眼"或者是"猫头鹰的眼睛"。

sentences.chinese: 一只长着黄色硫磺的巨大眼睛的猫头鹰，呼唤着他的名字，但他没有应答。

if something vibrates, or if you vibrate it, it shakes quickly and continuously with very small movements

sentences.chinese: 软木公告板

sentences.chinese: 许多男人，甚至女人，都把谈论问题的需要视为很严肃、正经的事，因为他们不知该怎么治疗这种需要。

sentences.english: Mare and most of all from the founder and director, Marie: I am praying like crazy for you that your graft took and all is healing 100% well.
sentences.chinese: 还有，最最重要的，来自创办人和董事，玛丽：我由衷企求你所接受的治疗，以及其他所有的都100%有疗效。祝你好运，我的灵魂与你同在。

trans: 现实的， 实际的； 恰如其分的； 逼真的

trans: 创造， 创作；  产生

sentences.chinese: 他还指出，在干旱增加意味着饲料缺乏的尼日利亚北部，干旱正驱使牧民南移到种植玉米的地区。

detailed_translations.chinese: 植被；植物，草木；呆板单调的生活
detailed_translations.english: plants in general

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.english: The Security Commission investigates breaches of security .
sentences.chinese: 安全委员会对违反安全规定的事项进行调查。

sentences.english: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.chinese: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.chinese: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.chinese: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.chinese: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

sentences.chinese: 无力的握手

sentences.chinese: 他突然身子一软。

sentences.chinese: 这一课程是由一家培训公司组织的。

sentences.english: We are learning about how genes are organized.

sentences.chinese: 每个卡片不仅记有日期，还有每个数据点的纬度和经度，盐度，温度和深度的测量。

sentences.chinese: 渡边刚表示，这些同位素比例为珊瑚生长环境的海水温度及盐度情况提供了线索。

sentences.chinese: 还有其他的因素影响着浮游植物的生长率，包括水温、盐度、水深、风，以及猎食它们的天敌的种类。

sentences.english: Refreshments will be served after the meeting.

sentences.chinese: 大脑主管记忆与认知的区域

sentences.chinese: 这些图片很相似，但它们之间有细微的差别。

sentences.chinese: 例如, 就有这样一种情况， 在只有几个旁观者需要联合起来才能压倒一个罪犯的情况下, 他们就可能会更多地采取集体行动。

detailed_translations.english: if water overwhelms an area of land, it covers it completely and suddenly

sentences.chinese: 管理顾问

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to give advice on a particular subject

sentences.english: environmental contaminants

detailed_translations.english: a substance that makes something dirty

sentences.english: cooking over a charcoal fire
sentences.chinese: 在炭火上做饭

sentences.chinese: 我还有一些圣诞礼物要包起来。

sentences.chinese: 学生必须达到某一标准，否则无法通过。

sentences.chinese: 空气中有些微的寒意。

sentences.chinese: 我开了厅里的暖气给屋子驱寒。

sentences.chinese: 她是个出色的模仿者，喜欢模仿温斯顿·丘吉尔。

name: institution
trans: 协会； 机构； 制度； 习俗； 团体； 设立， 制定

sentences.chinese: 工作时间每周不得超过42小时。

sentences.chinese: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.chinese: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.chinese: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.chinese: 玛   丽：我参加一个接待家庭留学计画。

sentences.chinese: 苏联为形势所迫同纳粹德国签订了一项条约。

sentences.chinese: 情有可原的恼怒反应

detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is excusable can be forgiven

sentences.chinese: 由于地方上的反对，学院已经修改了计划。

sentences.chinese: 美国和哥伦比亚当局的一份协议

sentences.chinese: 政府错误地判断了选民的情绪。

sentences.chinese: 我想你是错看她了。

sentences.chinese: 战争时期国家利益是首要的，个人利益置于最后。

sentences.chinese: 他一直向前，走到湖泊源头。

name: regional

sentences.chinese: 地方及区域治理

sentences.chinese: 农耕方式的地区性差异

sentences.chinese: 轻微的地方口音

sentences.chinese: 他们会在一天中最热的时候小憩一会儿。

name: avenge

sentences.chinese: 他要为弟弟的死复仇。

detailed_translations.english: to do something to hurt or punish someone because they have harmed or offended you

name: instrument
trans: 仪器； 手段； 工具； 乐器

sentences.english: surgical instruments
sentences.chinese: 外科(手术)器械

detailed_translations.chinese: 仪器， 工具； 乐器
detailed_translations.english: a small tool used in work such as science or medicine

sentences.english: Advertising is a powerful medium.
sentences.chinese: 广告是具有强大影响力的传播媒介。

sentences.chinese: 中等长短的头发

name: interface
trans: 界面； 接口； 接合点

sentences.chinese: …更好用户界面的开发。

detailed_translations.english: if you interface two parts of a computer system, or if they interface, you connect them

name: remove
trans: 排除，消除；搬迁，移动；开除，解除

sentences.chinese: 可去除葡萄酒酒渍的清洁剂

sentences.chinese: 这所大学取消了禁止女性入学的规定。
