sentences.chinese: 一些法官作出的宽大判决

sentences.english: School examiners say that marking has become more lenient in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 学校的阅卷人称近年来评分标准放宽了。

detailed_translations.english: not strict in the way you punish someone or in the standard you expect

name: fatal
trans: 致命的； 重大的； 命中注定的； 灾难性的

sentences.english: potentially fatal diseases
sentences.chinese: 潜在致命的疾病

sentences.english: If it is not treated correctly, the condition can prove fatal (= be fatal ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果治疗不当，这种病可能会致命。

detailed_translations.english: resulting in someone’s death

name: wrestle
trans: 摔跤； 全力对付； 用力移动

sentences.english: They run races; they wrestle; and sometimes they have mock fights together.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁参加各种赛跑，摔跤，有时还在一起模拟战斗。

detailed_translations.english: to fight someone by holding them and pulling or pushing them

sentences.english: Years passed, happy years when the roses bloomed and the copper coffer grew.
sentences.chinese: 几年过去了，幸福的几年过去了，这几年玫瑰开放，铜保险箱在变大。

detailed_translations.english: a large strong box used to hold valuable or religious objects

name: authorise
trans: 批准， 认可； 授权

sentences.english: I authorise Immigration New Zealand to provide information about my health and my immigration status to any health service agency.
sentences.chinese: 我授权新西兰移民局可于任何时间将本人健康情况及移民身份提供给任何相关的医疗机构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 批准， 认可； 授权

name: audacious
trans: 大胆的； 有冒险精神的； 鲁莽的； 厚颜无耻的

sentences.english: the risks involved in such an audacious operation
sentences.chinese: 如此大胆的行动中存在的风险

detailed_translations.chinese: 厚颜无耻的；大胆鲁莽的
detailed_translations.english: showing great courage or confidence in a way that is impressive or slightly shocking

name: perform
trans: 履行， 执行， 完成； 表演， 演出； 运作

sentences.english: Chenier and the band are performing at the Silver Palace tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 车尼尔和乐队明天将在银宫演出。

sentences.english: The children perform two plays each school year.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们一学年表演两部话剧。

sentences.english: She was fired for not performing the duties outlined in her contract.
sentences.chinese: 由于没有履行合同中规定的职责，她被解雇了。

detailed_translations.english: to do something to entertain people, for example by acting a play or playing a piece of music

sentences.english: the theory of evolution
sentences.chinese: 进化论

detailed_translations.english: the scientific idea that plants and animals develop and change gradually over a long period of time

sentences.english: It might be the exhilaration of that potent cordial, which is distilled only in the furnace-glow of earnest and long-continued thought.
sentences.chinese: 那力量可能是潜在热情的兴奋表现，是从长期不断的诚挚思想的熔炉中蒸馏出来的。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being happy, excited, and full of energy

sentences.english: the four main acupuncture points
sentences.chinese: 四大穴位

detailed_translations.chinese: 针刺；[中医] 针刺疗法
detailed_translations.english: a treatment for pain and disease that involves pushing special needles into parts of the body

name: complaint
trans: 抱怨； 投诉； 控告； 疾病

sentences.english: If you wish to make a complaint, you should see the manager.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要投诉，应该去找经理。

sentences.english: The sales assistants are trained to deal with customer complaints in a friendly manner.
sentences.chinese: 售货员都受过培训，要以友好的态度处理顾客的投诉。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which someone complains about something

name: service
trans: 服务，帮助；公共设施，公用事业；维修，保养；行政部门，服务机构

sentences.english: the health service
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务

sentences.english: the postal service
sentences.chinese: 邮政服务

sentences.english: the police service
sentences.chinese: 警察部门

sentences.english: the prison service
sentences.chinese: 监狱系统

sentences.english: Workers in the emergency services (= the police, hospital, and the fire service ) are forbidden from striking.
sentences.chinese: 紧急服务机构的工作人员是禁止罢工的。

sentences.english: There has been a decline in public services in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来公共服务减少了。

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["the police, hospitals, fire service, and organizations that provide basic things such as water, gas, or electricity"],"COLLOINEXA":["the essential services"]}
sentences.chinese: 基础服务部门

detailed_translations.english: the official system for providing something, especially something that everyone in a country needs to have, or the official organization that provides it

detailed_translations.chinese: 服务性的；耐用的；服现役的

detailed_translations.english: if someone services a machine or vehicle, they examine it and do what is needed to keep it working well

name: inject
trans: 注射； 注入， 灌输

sentences.english: His son was injected with strong drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子被注射了强效的药。

detailed_translations.english: to put liquid, especially a drug, into someone’s body by using a special needle

sentences.english: the news on Channel 4
sentences.chinese: 第四频道播出的新闻

sentences.english: The kids are watching cartoons on the Disney Channel.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在看迪士尼频道的卡通片。

sentences.english: What channel is ‘ER’ on?
sentences.chinese: 《仁心仁术》在哪个频道播放？

sentences.english: He changed channels to watch the basketball game.
sentences.chinese: 他转换频道看篮球比赛。

detailed_translations.english: a television station and all the programmes that it broadcasts

detailed_translations.chinese: 把〔钱、精力等〕导向〔特定目的〕；引导；把…用于
detailed_translations.english: to control and direct something such as money or energy towards a particular purpose

name: focus
trans: 焦点， 焦距； 中心

sentences.english: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: The house was surrounded by trees, and invisible from the road.
sentences.chinese: 这所房子树木环绕，从路上是看不见的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is invisible cannot be seen

name: hamper
trans: 有盖的大篮子； 盒装食物

sentences.english: She tried to run, but was hampered by her heavy suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 她想跑，但沉重的旅行箱拖累了她。

sentences.english: An attempt to rescue the men has been hampered by bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 对那几名男子的营救行动受到恶劣天气的阻碍。

detailed_translations.english: to make it difficult for someone to do something
a basket with a lid, which is used for carrying food or sending it to someone as a present

sentences.english: It was the worst day in my entire life.
sentences.chinese: 那是我一生中最糟糕的一天。

sentences.english: The entire staff agreed.
sentences.chinese: 全体员工都同意了。

sentences.english: Have you drunk the entire bottle?
sentences.chinese: 你把整瓶酒都喝了吗？

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to emphasize that you mean all of a group, period of time, amount etc

name: approach
trans: 靠近， 接近； 方法， 途径

sentences.english: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.chinese: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.english: This book takes an unorthodox approach to art criticism.
sentences.chinese: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

sentences.english: organizations which take a positive approach to creative thinking
sentences.chinese: 对创造性思维采取积极态度的组织

detailed_translations.english: a method of doing something or dealing with a problem

name: overshadow
trans: 给…蒙上阴影； 使扫兴； 使黯然失色

sentences.english: Hester is overshadowed by her younger and more attractive sister.
sentences.chinese: 她那更年轻而且更有魅力的妹妹使赫斯特黯然失色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使失色；使阴暗；遮阴；夺去…的光彩
detailed_translations.english: If you are overshadowed by a person or thing, you are less successful, important, or impressive than they are

sentences.english: a decisive factor/victory/battle
sentences.chinese: 决定性的因素 / 胜利 / 战役

sentences.english: a decisive leader
sentences.chinese: 果断的领袖

detailed_translations.english: very important for the final result of a particular situation

sentences.english: flowers pollinated by bees
sentences.chinese: 由蜜蜂授粉的花

detailed_translations.english: to give a flower or plant pollen so that it can produce seeds

sentences.english: The favorite, of course, is camel.
sentences.chinese: 最受欢迎的自然是驼色。

sentences.english: I wonder what the ECL on a half-camel is.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道半骆驼的有效人物等级是多少。

sentences.english: Earth tones are definitely big for this season, and camel will fit in with trends such as Queen's Country, Town meets Country and the like seamlessly.
sentences.chinese: 大地色无疑是这一季的主打，驼色也非常适合“王室风范”“大都市遭遇乡村风尚”这些流行系列，并且配合得天衣无缝。

detailed_translations.english: a large desert animal with a long neck and either one or two  hump s (= large raised parts )  on its back

sentences.english: Cynthia’s still working on her thesis.
sentences.chinese: 辛西娅还在写论文。

sentences.english: Their main thesis was that the rise in earnings was due to improvements in education.
sentences.chinese: 他们的主要论点是收入增加得益于教育状况的改善。

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of writing about a particular subject that you do as part of an advanced university degree such as an MA or a PhD

sentences.english: She has a bump on the back of her head.
sentences.chinese: 她的后脑勺上肿起了一块。

sentences.english: He had a few injuries, mostly bumps and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 他有几处受了伤，大都是肿块和瘀青。

detailed_translations.english: an area of skin that is raised because you have hit it on something
to hit or knock against something

name: embankment
trans: 筑堤； 堤岸， 路基

sentences.english: They climbed a steep embankment.
sentences.chinese: 他们爬上了一个陡峭的堤岸。

detailed_translations.english: a wide wall of earth or stones built to stop water from flooding an area, or to support a road or railway

name: revive
trans: 苏醒， 复活； 重新使用

sentences.english: Local people have decided to revive this centuries-old tradition.
sentences.chinese: 当地人决定复兴这一延续了数个世纪的传统。

sentences.english: an attempt to revive the steel industry
sentences.chinese: 复苏钢铁工业的努力

sentences.english: The doctors revived her with injections of glucose.
sentences.chinese: 医生给她注射葡萄糖，使她苏醒过来。

detailed_translations.english: to bring something back after it has not been used or has not existed for a period of time

sentences.english: The police are waging war on drug pushers in the city.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在市内开展一场打击毒贩的斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to be involved in a war against someone, or a fight against something

name: amorphous
trans: 无固定形状的； 无组织的

sentences.english: an amorphous mass of twisted metal
sentences.chinese: 一堆扭曲变形的金属

detailed_translations.chinese: 无定形的；无组织的；[物] 非晶形的
detailed_translations.english: having no definite shape or features

name: proceed
trans: 进行； 前进； 继续

sentences.english: Before proceeding further, we must define our terms.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须先定义术语，然后再往下展开。

detailed_translations.english: to continue to do something that has already been planned or started

sentences.english: a 100-watt bulb
sentences.chinese: 一个100瓦的灯泡

detailed_translations.english: the glass part of an electric light, that the light shines from

sentences.english: Elizabeth understood her husband’s loyalty to his sister.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白理解丈夫对他姐姐的一片忠心。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of remaining faithful to your friends, principles, country etc

name: dismiss
trans: 解雇， 解散； 驳回， 不受理

sentences.english: He just laughed and dismissed my proposal as unrealistic.
sentences.chinese: 他只是笑了笑，认为我的建议不切实际，拒绝考虑。

sentences.english: Bryant was unfairly dismissed from his post.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩特被无理免职了。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to consider someone’s idea, opinion etc, because you think it is not serious, true, or important

name: underlying
trans: 表面下的， 下层的， 在下面的； 根本的； 潜在的， 隐含的

sentences.english: To stop a problem you have to understand its underlying causes.
sentences.chinese: 要解决问题，你得了解其潜在原因。

detailed_translations.english: The underlying features of an object, event, or situation are not obvious, and it may be difficult to discover or reveal them

name: confirmation
trans: 证实， 确认； 批准

sentences.english: There has still been no official confirmation of the report.
sentences.chinese: 这则报道仍未得到官方证实。

detailed_translations.english: a statement, document etc that says that something is definitely true

name: intelligence
trans: 智力， 理解力； 情报

sentences.english: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

sentences.english: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
sentences.chinese: 根据我们的情报，还会有更进一步的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things

name: enrolment
trans: 登记， 注册； 入学， 入伍； 登记簿， 名册

sentences.english: Enrolment will take place in September.
sentences.chinese: 注册将于9月进行。

detailed_translations.english: the process of arranging to join a school, university, course etc

name: install
trans: 安顿， 安置； 安装， 设置； 正式任命， 使正式就职

sentences.english: They’ve installed the new computer network at last.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于安装了新电脑网络。

sentences.english: Security cameras have been installed in the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 在市中心已安装了一些监控摄像机。

detailed_translations.english: to put a piece of equipment somewhere and connect it so that it is ready to be used

sentences.english: I couldn’t believe the arrogance of the man!
sentences.chinese: 我真不敢相信那个男人那么傲慢！

detailed_translations.english: when someone behaves in a rude way because they think they are very important

sentences.english: a 50 mph speed restriction
sentences.chinese: 每小时50英里的限速

detailed_translations.english: a rule or law that limits or controls what people can do

sentences.english: Could you give me some indication as to when I am likely to receive a reply?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我透露一下什么时候我能收到回复吗？

sentences.english: Indications are that the situation hasn’t improved much.
sentences.chinese: 迹象表明局势并没有多大好转。

sentences.english: There is every indication (= there are very clear signs ) that it is true.
sentences.chinese: 很明显这是真的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指示， 表示， 表明； 象征， 迹象
detailed_translations.english: a sign, remark, event etc that shows what is happening, what someone is thinking or feeling, or what is true

sentences.english: The bulk of consumers are based in towns.
sentences.chinese: 大多数消费者都是城镇居民。

sentences.english: The dough will rise until it is double in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

detailed_translations.english: the main or largest part of something

name: vacancy
trans: 空位， 空房间； 空缺， 空职； 无主意， 空虚， 茫然若失

sentences.english: There are still two vacancies on the school board.
sentences.chinese: 学校董事会还有两个职位空缺。

sentences.english: The council is making every effort to fill the vacancies.
sentences.chinese: 地方议会正想方设法填补这些职缺。

sentences.english: information about job vacancies
sentences.chinese: 招聘信息

detailed_translations.english: a job that is available for someone to start doing

sentences.english: the world heavyweight boxing champion
sentences.chinese: 世界重量级拳击冠军

sentences.english: the Olympic champion
sentences.chinese: 奥运会冠军

sentences.english: He passionately championed the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他曾热情地捍卫穷人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that has won a competition, especially in sport
If you champion a person, a cause, or a principle, you support or defend them

sentences.english: This takes a little while to switch all of your plastic storage containers over to ceramic, glass or stainless steel but its definitely worthwhile.
sentences.chinese: 把你所有的塑料存储容器换成陶瓷的，玻璃的，或者不锈钢的你会浪费你一点时间。 但这绝对是值得的。

sentences.english: ...ceramic tiles.
sentences.chinese: …瓷砖。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陶瓷的；陶器的；制陶艺术的

detailed_translations.english: Ceramic is clay that has been heated to a very high temperature so that it becomes hard

name: artefact
trans: 人工制品， 手工艺品

sentences.english: ancient Egyptian artefacts
sentences.chinese: 古埃及手工艺品

detailed_translations.chinese: 人工制品， 手工艺品
detailed_translations.english: an object such as a tool, weapon etc that was made in the past and is historically important

sentences.english: a free booklet on drug abuse
sentences.chinese: 关于嗜毒问题的免费小册子

detailed_translations.english: a very short book that usually contains information on one particular subject

name: magnificent
trans: 壮丽的， 宏伟的， 华丽的； 高尚的

sentences.english: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.chinese: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.chinese: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧。

sentences.english: The new law restricts the sale of hand guns.
sentences.chinese: 新法规限制手枪的销售。

sentences.english: You may need to restrict access to certain files (= limit the number of people who can read them ) .
sentences.chinese: 某些档案可能需要限制查阅。

sentences.english: The agreement will restrict competition.
sentences.chinese: 这个协议将限制竞争。

sentences.english: The cramped living conditions severely restricted the children’s freedom to play.
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的居住条件严重限制了孩子们玩耍的自由。

detailed_translations.english: to limit or control the size, amount, or range of something

name: prevalence
trans: 普及， 流行， 盛行

sentences.english: The report says climate change could also increase the prevalence of dengue fever.
sentences.chinese: 报告表示，气候变化还有可能增加登革热的流行强度。

sentences.english: Generating epidemiological data on the prevalence and risk factors of obesity in dogs.
sentences.chinese: 针对狗肥胖症的流行程度和风险因素获得流行病学数据。

sentences.english: The prevalence of these widgets means they can report on almost all your browsing activity, which can then be linked to databases full of the social data you intentionally share.
sentences.chinese: 这些小工具的流行意味着它们能上报几乎所有的你的浏览行为，通过这些行为就能链接到你主动共享出来，满是你社交信息的数据库。

sentences.english: Singapore has many native species of palm.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡有很多土生的棕榈树种。

sentences.english: You can always tell the difference between the tourists and the natives.
sentences.chinese: 游客与当地人之间的区别一望即知。

detailed_translations.english: growing, living, produced etc in one particular place
someone who lives in a place all the time or has lived there a long time

name: motivational
trans: 动机的， 有关动机的

sentences.english: It may well be the case that the people raising the concerns have a personal or motivational problem with the improvement but don't feel comfortable voicing it.
sentences.chinese: 很可能那些提出个人担忧的人就有某种个人或动机问题需要改进，这是好事，但说出来以后并不一定会感到舒服一些。

sentences.english: My motivational system ensures that when I imagine the objectively better future it looks really great, far better than all the other options -- I'll be so happy!
sentences.chinese: 我的动机系统确保当我想象客观上更好的未来时，会感觉这种选择很棒，比其他所有选择都要棒得多──我会非常快乐！

detailed_translations.chinese: 动机的， 有关动机的

sentences.english: a species of fish hitherto unknown in the West
sentences.chinese: 迄今在西方还不为人知的一种鱼

detailed_translations.english: up to this time

name: violence
trans: 暴力行为； 激烈， 猛烈

sentences.english: There is too much sex and violence on TV these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今电视上性爱和暴力场面太多。

detailed_translations.english: behaviour that is intended to hurt other people physically

sentences.english: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions

name: robust
trans: 健壮的， 强壮的； 坚定的

sentences.english: a robust man of six feet four
sentences.chinese: 一个身高六英尺四英寸的壮汉

detailed_translations.english: a robust person is strong and healthy

sentences.english: Steve was in a particularly bad mood when he got back.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫回来时情绪特别不好。

sentences.english: The restaurant is particularly popular with young people.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅尤其受到年轻人的欢迎。

sentences.english: We are hoping to expand our business, particularly in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望扩大业务，尤其是在欧洲。

sentences.english: British farmers, particularly those producing lamb, are very worried.
sentences.chinese: 英国农场主，尤其是养羊羔的农场主，非常担忧。

detailed_translations.english: more than usual or more than others

name: dominant
trans: 占优势的； 统治的； 居高临下的

sentences.english: The dominant male gorilla is the largest in the group.
sentences.chinese: 领头的公猩猩是这群大猩猩中体形最大的一个。

sentences.english: Japan became dominant in the mass market during the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪80年代日本在大众市场上开始占据优势。

sentences.english: its dominant position within the group
sentences.chinese: 它在该组织中的突出地位

detailed_translations.chinese: 显性的；占优势的；支配的，统治的
detailed_translations.english: more powerful, important, or noticeable than other people or things

sentences.english: Nigeria has just devalued its currency .
sentences.chinese: 尼日利亚刚刚令自己的货币贬值。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce the value of one country’s money when it is exchanged for another country’s money

sentences.english: A thousand thoughts were jostling around inside my mind.
sentences.chinese: 千头万绪在我脑海中翻涌。

detailed_translations.english: to push or knock against someone in a crowd, especially so that you can get somewhere or do something before other people

sentences.english: noise levels exceeding 85 decibels
sentences.chinese: 超过85分贝的噪声强度

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring the loudness of sound

sentences.english: His face had been disfigured in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 在一次意外事故中他毁了容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使变丑；损毁…的外形；使大为减色
detailed_translations.english: to spoil the appearance that something naturally has

sentences.english: The influence of light stabilizer depletion in the agricultural film processing on product quantity is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析光稳定剂在农膜生产过程中的消耗对产品质量的影响。

sentences.english: Nitrogen oxides releases directly by supersonic aircraft into the stratosphere contribute directly to the depletion of the ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 由超音速飞机直接排放到平流层中的氧化氮会直接导致臭氧的消耗。

sentences.english: This decreases the device thickness and depletion voltage and consequently reduces material quality requirements and cost of the detector material.
sentences.chinese: 这减少了设备的厚度和电压损耗，从而降低材料的质量要求和探测器的材料成本。

sentences.english: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the factory.
sentences.chinese: 厂区严禁吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that an action is illegal or not allowed

name: conduce
trans: 有益于， 有助于； 导致

detailed_translations.chinese: 有益于， 有助于； 导致
detailed_translations.english: to lead or contribute (to a result)

sentences.english: The noise of the aeroplane deafened us.
sentences.chinese: 飞机的噪声使我们耳朵听不见了。

sentences.english: An aeroplane offers you an unusual and breathtaking view of the world.
sentences.chinese: 一架飞机提供了你一个不寻常的和惊人的世界观。

sentences.english: With your own aeroplane you fly where and when you want to , often to and from airfields that are not served by airlines .
sentences.chinese: 用自己的飞机，你可以随时去你想去的地方，起降的机场通常也不对航空公司开放。

detailed_translations.english: a flying vehicle with wings and at least one engine

sentences.english: I’ve put your name on the list and I don’t foresee any problems.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的名字写在名单上了，估计不会有什么问题。

sentences.english: The disaster could not have been foreseen.
sentences.chinese: 这场灾难是始料未及的。

detailed_translations.english: to think or know that something is going to happen in the future

name: associate
trans: 使联合； 使有联系； 交往
副的； 联合的， 合伙的

sentences.english: Through science we've got the idea of associating progress with the future.
sentences.chinese: 通过科学我们已有了将进步与未来联系起来的观念。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…联系在一起；使联合，结合；交往	[ə'səuʃiət]
detailed_translations.english: to make a connection in your mind between one thing or person and another
someone who is a member etc of something, but who is at a lower level and has fewer rights
someone who you work or do business with

name: scrupulous
trans: 多顾虑的， 谨慎的； 一丝不苟的， 严谨的

sentences.english: scrupulous attention to detail
sentences.chinese: 对细节的一丝不苟

detailed_translations.chinese: 细心的；小心谨慎的；一丝不苟的
detailed_translations.english: doing something very carefully so that nothing is left out

sentences.english: a kidney transplant
sentences.chinese: 肾脏移植

detailed_translations.english: one of the two organs in your lower back that separate waste products from your blood and make urine

sentences.english: They saw a sudden gleam of light.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到一道微光一闪而过。

sentences.english: The wooden panelling was gleaming with wax polish.
sentences.chinese: 木嵌板上过蜡显得很光亮。

detailed_translations.english: a small pale light, especially one that shines for a short time
to shine softly

sentences.english: They feared that the publicity surrounding him would detract from their own election campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心围绕他的宣传会有损他们自已的竞选活动。

detailed_translations.english: If one thing detracts from another, it makes it seem less good or impressive

name: judgment
trans: 意见； 审判； 判断

sentences.english: I’ve known him for years and I trust his judgment.
sentences.chinese: 我与他相识多年，相信他的判断力。

sentences.english: a decision based on sound judgment
sentences.chinese: 以良好的判断力为基础的决定

sentences.english: Watch carefully and use your judgment.
sentences.chinese: 仔细观察并运用自己的判断力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 判断；裁判；判决书；辨别力
detailed_translations.english: the ability to make sensible decisions about what to do and when to do it

name: charity
trans: 慈善； 施舍； 慈善机构

sentences.english: Several charities sent aid to the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 有几家慈善机构已向洪灾灾民送去了救援物资。

detailed_translations.english: an organization that gives money, goods, or help to people who are poor, sick etc

sentences.english: The Roman Catholic Church has issued a compendium of its teachings.
sentences.chinese: 罗马天主教会已经发行了一份其教义的概略。

detailed_translations.english: A compendium is a short but detailed collection of information, usually in a book

sentences.english: a letter on hotel stationery
sentences.chinese: 用酒店信纸写的信

sentences.english: envelopes and other office stationery
sentences.chinese: 信封及其他办公文具

detailed_translations.english: paper for writing letters, usually with matching envelopes

sentences.english: The area is very rich in minerals .
sentences.chinese: 该地区矿产非常丰富。

sentences.english: a country with few mineral resources
sentences.chinese: 矿产资源稀少的国家

sentences.english: mineral water
sentences.chinese: 矿泉水

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is formed naturally in the earth, such as coal, salt, stone, or gold. Minerals can be dug out of the ground and used
of or containing or derived from minerals

sentences.english: We stock a wide range of kitchen equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我们备有各种厨房用品。

detailed_translations.english: if a shop stocks a particular product, it keeps a supply of it to sell
something that is available in a shop and does not have to be ordered

detailed_translations.chinese: 原料，库存品；股本，公债；世系，血统；汤汁；家畜，牲畜
detailed_translations.english: a liquid made by boiling meat or bones and vegetables, which is used to make soups or to add  flavour  to other dishes

sentences.english: Prepare - Research what you want to sell using Completed Listings. Have credit card and bank information ready for verification.
sentences.chinese: 准备-通过调查已经发布的广告确认你究竟要卖什么，拥有供查证的信用卡和银行信息。

sentences.english: The General Dynamics-led team will provide training for hardware and software, and also furnish independent verification and validation of sensors and systems.
sentences.chinese: 通用动力公司领导的团队将提供硬件和软件训练，也将提供传感器和系统的独立查证和确认。

name: suspend
trans: 吊， 悬挂； 推迟； 暂停， 中止

sentences.english: Sales of the drug will be suspended until more tests are completed.
sentences.chinese: 这种药品在完成进一步检验之前将暂停销售。

sentences.english: Talks between the two countries have now been suspended.
sentences.chinese: 两国间的对话现已中止。

detailed_translations.english: to officially stop something from continuing, especially for a short time

sentences.english: The top layer should now point down to the layer beneath.
sentences.chinese: 现在，顶部图层应当有小箭头指向下面的图层。

sentences.chinese: 山上的炮楼把下面的海港地区置于射程之内。

sentences.english: They must all be drowning beneath him, in the watery caves of the rock!
sentences.chinese: 他们一定是在他下面的水里，就在那岩石充满了水的洞中游泳了！

detailed_translations.english: in or to a lower position than something, or directly under something

sentences.english: a fair swap
sentences.chinese: 公平交换

sentences.english: We can do a swap if you like.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意我们可以交换。

to give something to someone and get something in return

sentences.chinese: 一台计算机电涌保护设备

detailed_translations.chinese: 汹涌；大浪，波涛；汹涌澎湃；巨涌
detailed_translations.english: a sudden quick movement of a liquid, electricity, chemical etc through something
if a feeling surges or surges up, you begin to feel it very strongly

sentences.chinese: 古老的异教仪式

sentences.english: the importance of religion and ritual in our lives
sentences.chinese: 我们生活中宗教和宗教仪式的重要性

sentences.english: The lady of the house performs the sacred ritual of lighting two candles.
sentences.chinese: 由女主人来完成点燃两根蜡烛的神圣仪式。

detailed_translations.english: a ceremony that is always performed in the same way, in order to mark an important religious or social occasion

name: dispense
trans: 分发， 分配； 提供

sentences.english: a machine for dispensing cash
sentences.chinese: 取款机

detailed_translations.english: to give something to people, especially in fixed amounts

name: basis
trans: 基础； 根据； 原则

sentences.english: Their claim had no basis in fact (=  it was not true  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的说法没有事实根据。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基础， 根据； 原则
detailed_translations.english: the facts, ideas, or things from which something can be developed

sentences.english: He was privately tutored.
sentences.chinese: 他是由家庭教师教的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who gives private lessons to one student or a small group, and is paid directly by them

sentences.chinese: 如果把贵重物品留在车上，会招来小偷的。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone want to have or do something, even though they know they really should not

name: clinical
trans: 临床的； 冷静客观的； 简朴的， 不装饰的

sentences.english: The drug has undergone extensive clinical trials (= tests to see if it is effective in treating people ) .
sentences.chinese: 该药已经过大量的临床试验。

sentences.english: The therapy has helped people with clinical depression (= a strong feeling of sadness, for which you need medical help ) .
sentences.chinese: 该疗法对临床抑郁症病人有帮助。

detailed_translations.english: relating to treating or testing people who are sick

name: reciprocate
trans: 回报， 回应； 报答

sentences.english: When he spoke I was expected to reciprocate with some remark of my own.
sentences.chinese: 他在说话时，我也应该说点什么回应他。

detailed_translations.english: to do or give something, because something similar has been done or given to you

sentences.english: Her hands began to twist the handles of the bag she carried.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手开始拧她拎着的那个包的拎柄。

sentences.english: He smiled, a slow cynical twist of his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了，嘴巴慢慢一歪，带着嘲笑的意味。

detailed_translations.english: to bend or turn something, such as wire, hair, or cloth, into a particular shape
a twisting action or movement

sentences.english: the forthcoming elections
sentences.chinese: 即将到来的选举

sentences.english: Keep an eye on the noticeboards for forthcoming events .
sentences.chinese: 请注意布告牌上的活动预告。

detailed_translations.english: a forthcoming event, meeting etc is one that has been planned to happen soon

sentences.chinese: 谢伊的症状令医生们困惑。

detailed_translations.english: if something perplexes you, it makes you feel confused and worried because it is difficult to understand

sentences.english: Imagine trying to balance a chest of drawers on just one of its legs, on top of a boulder, and you get an idea of what Gray gets up to.
sentences.chinese: 想像自己尝试仅仅依靠衣柜的一个腿把它平稳地放到一个大圆石上，你就知道格雷达到了什么境界。

sentences.english: People often procrastinate when it comes to paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 遇到文书工作，人们常常会拖拖拉拉。

detailed_translations.english: to delay doing something that you ought to do, usually because you do not want to do it

name: locate
trans: 找到； 位于； 使坐落于； 把…设置在

sentences.chinese: 这家商店就在市中心。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or place

name: combat
trans: 战斗， 与…搏斗； 防止

sentences.chinese: 在译成战役的情况下，这场战斗仅仅持续了短短的一天。

sentences.chinese: 我们会在明年夏末从伊拉克撤回我们的战斗旅，在2011年末，我们所有军队都将从伊拉克撤出。

sentences.english: These people would then be given training in vigilance and combat not just to defend themselves but also the borders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人会被提供警戒和战斗训练，不仅是为了保护自己，而且要保护边界安全。

detailed_translations.english: fighting, especially during a war

sentences.english: carbon/sulphur dioxide
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳／硫

detailed_translations.english: a chemical compound that contains two atoms of oxygen and one atom of another chemical element

name: indulge
trans: 沉溺于， 纵情于； 满足； 放纵， 听任

sentences.english: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine.
sentences.chinese: 她只是偶尔才会喝上杯葡萄酒。

sentences.english: He returned to Ohio so that he could indulge his passion for football.
sentences.chinese: 他重返俄亥俄以释放自己对足球的激情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 沉溺， 纵容自己， 肆意从事
detailed_translations.english: If you indulge in something or if you indulge yourself, you allow yourself to have or do something that you know you will enjoy

detailed_translations.chinese: 使沉溺于，满足；纵容，迁就
detailed_translations.english: to let someone have or do whatever they want, even if it is bad for them

sentences.english: Now the questions are: why should northern European taxpayers be required to subsidise Greek voters given their failure to control their own government?
sentences.chinese: 现在的问题是：希腊的选民未能看管好自己的政府，为什么要北欧国家的纳税人去资助他们？

name: vulgar
trans: 庸俗的， 粗俗的， 下流的， 缺乏教养的； 大众的， 通俗的

sentences.english: vulgar behaviour
sentences.chinese: 粗俗的行为

detailed_translations.english: remarks, jokes etc that are vulgar deal with sex in a very rude and offensive way

sentences.english: From all points of view, war would be a catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 从各个方面来看，战争都会是一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: a terrible event in which there is a lot of destruction, suffering, or death

name: extra
trans: 额外地， 另外； 特别地

sentences.english: Could you get an extra loaf of bread?
sentences.chinese: 你能多拿一条面包吗？

sentences.english: Allow extra time for your journey.
sentences.chinese: 要给你的旅程多留出点时间。

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to take extra care.
sentences.chinese: 建议司机开车要格外小心。

sentences.english: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number
used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

name: convey
trans: 传送， 运送； 表达， 传递

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

name: design
trans: 设计； 谋划， 构思
设计，构想；图样，图案；企图，图谋

sentences.english: The tower was designed by Gilbert Scott.
sentences.chinese: 这座塔楼是吉尔伯特·斯科特设计的。

detailed_translations.english: to make a drawing or plan of something that will be made or built

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计， 构想； 图样； 企图
detailed_translations.english: the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like

sentences.english: The victim received head injuries from which she died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 受害人头部受伤，一周后死亡。

sentences.english: a credit card fraud ring that stole millions of dollars from unsuspecting victims
sentences.chinese: 从毫无戒心的受害者手中盗取数百万美元的信用卡诈骗团伙

detailed_translations.english: someone who has been attacked, robbed, or murdered

sentences.english: Stale. Lack of bouquet and freshness of a wine through too much aeration or infection with film yeasts.
sentences.chinese: 走味的、沉滞的：由于通风过度或受产膜酵母的侵染，葡萄酒变得缺乏香气及新鲜爽口感。

sentences.english: high rates of remuneration
sentences.chinese: 很高的报酬

detailed_translations.english: the pay you give someone for something they have done for you

sentences.english: We must act in conformity with local regulations.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须按当地的法规行事。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that obeys rules, customs etc

sentences.english: Her husband was later treated for a fractured skull.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫后来因颅骨碎裂而接受治疗。

detailed_translations.english: the bones of a person’s or animal’s head

sentences.english: Drinking water supplies are believed to have been contaminated.
sentences.chinese: 据信饮用水已受到污染。

detailed_translations.english: to make a place or substance dirty or harmful by putting something such as chemicals or poison in it

sentences.english: a quiet country lane
sentences.chinese: 一条宁静的乡间小路

sentences.english: ...after being disqualified for running out of his lane in the 200 metres.
sentences.chinese: …在200米比赛中由于冲出跑道而被取消比赛资格以后。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow road in the countryside

name: predator
trans: 捕食性动物； 食肉动物； 奴役他人者； 剥削者， 掠夺者

sentences.english: With no natural predators on the island, the herd increased rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 由于岛上没有天然食肉动物，牧群的数量迅速增加。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that kills and eats other animals

name: penetration
trans: 进入， 穿过； 洞察力， 领悟力

sentences.english: The floor is sealed to prevent water penetration.
sentences.chinese: 地板加了密封涂料防止渗水。

sentences.english: the company's successful penetration of overseas markets
sentences.chinese: 公司对海外市场的顺利开拓

detailed_translations.english: the act or process of making a way into or through sth

sentences.english: One of the chief causes of crime today is drugs.
sentences.chinese: 毒品是如今犯罪的主要诱因之一。

sentences.english: Safety is our chief concern .
sentences.chinese: 安全问题是我们的头等大事。

sentences.english: The chief reason for this is that people are living longer.
sentences.chinese: 这主要是因为人们更长寿了。

sentences.english: his chief rival for the job
sentences.chinese: 和他竞争这份工作的主要对手

sentences.english: the prosecution’s chief witness
sentences.chinese: 控方的主要证人

sentences.english: She had many reasons for taking the money, but chief among them was revenge.
sentences.chinese: 她拿这笔钱的原因有很多，但最主要的是为了报复。

detailed_translations.english: most important

detailed_translations.chinese: 首领， 长官； 酋长， 族长
detailed_translations.english: the ruler of a tribe

sentences.english: The company’s property may even be forfeit.
sentences.chinese: 公司财产甚至可能被没收。

detailed_translations.chinese: 罚金；没收物；丧失的东西
detailed_translations.english: something that is taken away from you or something that you have to pay, because you have broken a rule or made a mistake

detailed_translations.chinese: 因受罚而丧失的；被没收的
detailed_translations.english: to be legally or officially taken away from you as a punishment

detailed_translations.chinese: （因犯罪、失职、违约等）丧失（权利、名誉、生命等）

sentences.english: Economic concerns are foremost on many voters’ minds.
sentences.chinese: 经济是许多选民关心的首要问题。

sentences.english: Rostropovich was long considered the world’s foremost cellist.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，罗斯特罗波维奇一直被视为世界上首屈一指的大提琴家。

detailed_translations.english: in a leading position among a group of people or things

sentences.english: ...her prodigious entrepreneurial flair.
sentences.chinese: …她惊人的创业天赋。

detailed_translations.chinese: 企业家的，创业者的；中间商的

name: disintegrate
trans: 碎裂， 瓦解， 解体

sentences.english: The plane just disintegrated in mid-air.
sentences.chinese: 飞机就在半空中解体了。

detailed_translations.english: to break up, or make something break up, into very small pieces

sentences.english: Despite all our efforts to save the school, the authorities decided to close it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我们竭力想保住这所学校，当局还是决定把它关闭。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something happens or is true even though something else might have prevented it

name: consecutive
trans: 连续不断的， 连贯的

sentences.english: It had rained for four consecutive days.
sentences.chinese: 雨接连下了四天。

sentences.english: Can they win the title for the third consecutive season?
sentences.chinese: 他们能连续第三个赛季赢得冠军称号吗？

detailed_translations.english: consecutive numbers or periods of time follow one after the other without any interruptions

name: assimilation
trans: 吸收； 吸收和同化的过程

sentences.english: Process of soaking up or assimilation of one substance by another.
sentences.chinese: 一种介质向另一种介质渗透和同化的过程。

sentences.english: The first period of the English Renaissance was one of imitation and assimilation.
sentences.chinese: 英国文艺复兴初期只是一个学习模仿与同化的阶段。

sentences.english: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.chinese: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

detailed_translations.english: the process of understanding and using new ideas

sentences.english: The kids all groaned when I switched off the TV.
sentences.chinese: 我关掉电视时，孩子们都发出不满的抱怨声。

sentences.english: Richard’s jokes make you groan rather than laugh.
sentences.chinese: 理查德的笑话让你哭笑不得。

detailed_translations.english: to make a long deep sound because you are in pain, upset, or disappointed, or because something is very enjoyable
a long deep sound that you make when you are in pain or do not want to do something

name: conduct
trans: 指导； 管理， 实施； 指挥

sentences.english: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.chinese: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.english: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.chinese: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.english: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.chinese: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
detailed_translations.english: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
detailed_translations.english: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

name: bury
trans: 埋葬； 埋藏， 掩藏

sentences.english: Electric cables are buried beneath the streets.
sentences.chinese: 电缆埋在街道的下面。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone who has died in a  grave

detailed_translations.chinese: (Bury)人名；(法)比里；(英、西)伯里；(德、意、罗、波、捷、匈)布里；(俄)布雷

sentences.english: It’s difficult to earn a livelihood as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 搞艺术很难谋生。

sentences.english: Bates says he will lose his livelihood if his driving licence is taken away.
sentences.chinese: 贝茨说，如果驾照被吊销，他就没有了谋生的手段。

detailed_translations.english: the way you earn money in order to live

name: reunion
trans: 重聚， 团聚； 聚会， 联谊活动

sentences.english: an annual reunion
sentences.chinese: 一年一度的聚会

sentences.english: a family reunion
sentences.chinese: 家庭聚会

sentences.english: a high-school reunion
sentences.chinese: 高中同学联谊聚会

detailed_translations.english: a social meeting of people who have not met for a long time, especially people who were at school or college together

name: fantastic
trans: 极好的； 荒诞的， 奇异的； 不切实际的

sentences.english: You look fantastic!
sentences.chinese: 你看上去棒极了！

sentences.english: It’s a fantastic place, really beautiful!
sentences.chinese: 这真是个好地方，漂亮极了！

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的， 极出色的， 了不起的； 极大的； 难以相信的； 异想天开的， 不实际的； 奇异的， 古怪的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good, attractive, enjoyable etc

sentences.english: A handful of pebbles in the bottom of a flowerpot will help drainage.
sentences.chinese: 在花盆底下放一把鹅卵石能够帮助排水。

sentences.english: a plan to improve the town’s drainage system
sentences.chinese: 改善城里排水系统的计划

detailed_translations.english: the process or system by which water or waste liquid flows away

name: triumphant
trans: 得胜的； 得意洋洋的； 狂欢的

sentences.english: the triumphant army
sentences.chinese: 得胜的军队

sentences.english: I feel exhausted, but also triumphant.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很疲倦，但也很得意。

detailed_translations.english: having gained a victory or success

name: apparatus
trans: 器械， 器具， 仪器； 机构， 组织

sentences.english: Astronauts have special breathing apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 航天员有专门的呼吸装装备。

sentences.english: The tax will require a massive administrative apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 税收需要大规模的行政机构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 器械，器具，仪器；机构，组织
detailed_translations.english: the set of tools and machines that you use for a particular scientific, medical, or technical purpose

name: decay
trans: 腐烂， 腐朽； 衰败， 衰退

sentences.english: Her body was already starting to decay.
sentences.chinese: 她的尸体已经开始腐烂。

sentences.english: Most archaeological finds are broken, damaged, or decayed.
sentences.chinese: 大部分考古发现物都已破裂、损坏或腐烂。

sentences.english: decaying organic matter
sentences.chinese: 腐烂的有机物

sentences.english: In Orthodox Europe, mass religion seems to have decayed less.
sentences.chinese: 在正教会流行的欧洲地区，集体宗教信仰的影响力似乎衰退得没那么严重。

sentences.english: tooth decay
sentences.chinese: 蛀牙

detailed_translations.english: to be slowly destroyed by a natural chemical process, or to make something do this
the natural chemical change that causes the slow destruction of something

sentences.english: People need time to grieve after the death of a loved one.
sentences.chinese: 人们在所爱之人去世后会有一段悲伤期。

sentences.english: She grieved the loss of her only son.
sentences.chinese: 她因为失去唯一的儿子而悲痛。

detailed_translations.english: to feel extremely sad, especially because someone you love has died
if something grieves you, it makes you feel very unhappy

sentences.english: a stress fracture in his left knee
sentences.chinese: 他左膝上的应力性骨折

sentences.english: a hairline fracture
sentences.chinese: 细小的裂缝

sentences.english: The immense pressure causes the rock to fracture.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的压力造成岩石断裂。

detailed_translations.english: a crack or broken part in a bone or other hard substance
if a bone or other hard substance fractures, or if it is fractured, it breaks or cracks

sentences.english: the fight for liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 争取自由和平等的斗争

detailed_translations.english: the freedom and the right to do whatever you want without asking permission or being afraid of authority

sentences.english: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.
sentences.chinese: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

detailed_translations.english: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new

sentences.english: He led them away from a marsh.
sentences.chinese: 他把他们带离沼泽。

sentences.english: My urine and excrement are recycled by a system of ducts, pipes, wires, plants, and marsh-microbes, and redeemed into water and food which I can eat.
sentences.chinese: 由众多的导管、管线、植物和沼泽微生物构成的系统回收了我的尿液和粪便，并将其还原成水和食物供我食用。

detailed_translations.english: an area of low flat ground that is always wet and soft

detailed_translations.chinese: 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

sentences.english: The country was plunged into economic chaos.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家陷入了经济大混乱。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which everything is happening in a confused way and nothing is organized or arranged in order

sentences.english: Stir in the ground almonds and egg.
sentences.chinese: 拌入碾碎的扁桃仁和鸡蛋。

detailed_translations.english: a flat pale nut with brown skin that tastes sweet, or the tree that produces these nuts

name: forecast
trans: 预报； 预测； 预想

sentences.english: The weather forecast is good for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报说明天是晴天。

sentences.english: Rain was forecast for the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 预报周末有雨。

detailed_translations.english: a description of what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now
to make a statement saying what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now

name: deteriorate
trans: 变坏， 恶化； 退化

sentences.english: Ethel’s health has deteriorated.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞尔的健康状况恶化了。

sentences.english: America’s deteriorating economy
sentences.chinese: 美国日渐恶化的经济

detailed_translations.english: to become worse

name: recognize
trans: 认出； 承认， 认可

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize you in your uniform.
sentences.chinese: 你穿上制服我认不出你了。

sentences.english: It was malaria, but Dr Lee hadn’t recognized the symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 这是疟疾，但李医生没有认出症状。

sentences.english: One must recognise that homesickness is natural.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须承认思乡是正常的。

detailed_translations.english: to know who someone is or what something is, because you have seen, heard, experienced, or learned about them in the past

name: processor
trans: 加工机； 加工工人； 处理器

sentences.english: US tuna processors
sentences.chinese: 美国的金枪鱼加工厂商

detailed_translations.chinese: [计] 处理器；处理程序；加工者
detailed_translations.english: the central part of a computer that deals with the commands and information it is given

sentences.english: Everything there is made of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 那里什么都是竹子做的。

sentences.english: Do you like bamboo?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢竹子吗?

detailed_translations.english: a tall tropical plant with hollow stems that is used for making furniture

sentences.english: to input text/data/figures
sentences.chinese: 把文本 / 数据 / 数字输入计算机

sentences.english: data input
sentences.chinese: 数据输入

detailed_translations.english: to put information into a computer
the act of putting information into a computer; the information that you put in

name: induce
trans: 引诱， 劝使； 引起， 导致； 感应

sentences.english: Nothing would induce me to vote for him again.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么能诱使我再投他的票了。

sentences.english: Doctors said surgery could induce a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 医生们说手术可能导致心脏病。

detailed_translations.english: to persuade someone to do something, especially something that does not seem wise

sentences.english: That is one electron volt.
sentences.chinese: 就是一单位的电子伏特。

sentences.english: If I multiply these two, what is the coulomb times a volt?
sentences.chinese: 如果我把这两个乘起来，库仑乘以伏特是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring the force of an electric current

sentences.english: Malcolm is a shrewd businessman.
sentences.chinese: 马尔科姆是个精明的商人。

sentences.english: She was shrewd enough to guess who was responsible.
sentences.chinese: 她很精明，一猜就知道是谁干的。

sentences.english: Capra looked at her with shrewd eyes.
sentences.chinese: 卡普拉眼神犀利地看着她。

detailed_translations.english: good at judging what people or situations are really like

sentences.english: The question baffled me completely.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题把我彻底难倒了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…困惑；使…受挫折；用挡板控制
detailed_translations.english: if something baffles you, you cannot understand or explain it at all

sentences.english: The molecules of oxygen gas contain just two atoms.
sentences.chinese: 氧分子中只有两个原子。

detailed_translations.english: the smallest unit into which any substance can be divided without losing its own chemical nature, usually consisting of two or more atoms

name: demonstration
trans: 论证， 证明； 示范； 显示， 表露； 示威游行

sentences.english: Supporters staged a demonstration outside the US embassy.
sentences.chinese: 支持者在美国大使馆外举行了示威游行。

sentences.english: Police opened fire on a peaceful demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 警察朝和平示威的人群开了枪。

detailed_translations.english: an event at which a large group of people meet to protest or to support something in public

name: offend
trans: 冒犯； 使厌恶； 违犯

sentences.english: His remarks deeply offended many Scottish people.
sentences.chinese: 他的话严重冒犯了许多苏格兰人。

sentences.english: The careful language is designed not to offend.
sentences.chinese: 使用谨慎的语言是为了不得罪人。

sentences.english: In Western countries girls are far less likely to offend than boys.
sentences.chinese: 在西方国家，女孩们远不像男孩们那样容易犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone angry or upset by doing or saying something that they think is rude, unkind etc
to commit a crime or crimes

name: circle
trans: 圈出； 盘旋， 环绕…移动
圆；圈，环状物；圈子，阶层；周期，循环

sentences.english: Draw a circle 10cm in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径10厘米的圆形。

sentences.english: Johnson was part of the President’s inner circle (= the people who have the most influence ) .
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊是总统核心集团的人。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, fashion comes full circle.
sentences.chinese: 时尚迟早会流行回来的。

sentences.english: This is the road that circles the city.
sentences.chinese: 这就是那条环城路。

detailed_translations.english: a completely round shape, like the letter O
to move in the shape of a circle around something, especially in the air

sentences.english: ...a memorandum from the Department of Defense on its role.
sentences.chinese: …一份来自国防部的有关其角色的备忘录。

detailed_translations.english: a  memo

name: resign
trans: 辞职； 辞去； 放弃

sentences.english: A hospital administrator has resigned over claims he lied to get the job.
sentences.chinese: 一位医院主管因为有人声称他的职位是骗来的而辞职了。

detailed_translations.english: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization

name: sophisticated
trans: 老于世故的， 老练的； 精密的， 尖端的， 先进的； 复杂的； 高雅的， 有教养的

sentences.english: sophisticated software
sentences.chinese: 很先进的软件

sentences.english: a highly sophisticated weapons system
sentences.chinese: 非常精密的武器系统

detailed_translations.english: a sophisticated machine, system, method etc is very well designed and very advanced, and often works in a complicated way

name: scrutiny
trans: 详细检查， 细看； 监视

sentences.english: Their activities have come under police scrutiny .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动受到警方的严密监视。

detailed_translations.chinese: 详细检查， 仔细观察
detailed_translations.english: careful and thorough examination of someone or something

name: chase
trans: 追捕； 追求； 雕镂

sentences.english: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.chinese: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.english: kids chasing around the house
sentences.chinese: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

detailed_translations.chinese: 追逐， 追赶， 追求
detailed_translations.english: to quickly follow someone or something in order to catch them

name: inalienable
trans: 不可剥夺的， 不可分割的

sentences.english: inalienable human rights
sentences.chinese: 不可剥夺的人权

detailed_translations.chinese: 不可分割的；不可剥夺的；不能让与的
detailed_translations.english: an inalienable right, power etc cannot be taken from you

name: incompatible
trans: 不兼容的， 不能和谐共存的， 不协调的， 合不来的

sentences.english: Politeness and truth are often mutually incompatible.
sentences.chinese: 礼貌和实话往往互不相容。

sentences.english: Business interests are incompatible with public office.
sentences.chinese: 商业利益与公职不可兼得。

detailed_translations.english: two things that are incompatible cannot exist or be accepted together

name: dredge
trans: 挖掘； 疏浚； 挖出， 吸出； 重提旧事

sentences.english: They dredged for oysters.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挖牡蛎。

detailed_translations.chinese: （用挖泥船等）疏浚；（用拖捞网等）捞取；（在食物上）撒（面粉等）
detailed_translations.english: to cover food lightly with flour, sugar etc
a machine, in the form of a bucket ladder, grab, or suction device, used to remove material from a riverbed, channel, etc

sentences.english: The decline and fall of the American car industry is relatively easy to summarise, and the Hummer is its reductio.
sentences.chinese: 美国汽车业的衰亡相对比较容易概括总结，悍马正是美国汽车业的缩影。

sentences.english: John’s departure had upset their daily routine .
sentences.chinese: 约翰的离去打乱了他们的日常生活。

sentences.english: Try to get into a routine (= develop a fixed order of doing things ) .
sentences.chinese: 尽量养成一套习惯。

sentences.english: my daily exercise routine
sentences.chinese: 我每天的锻炼习惯

sentences.english: Dressing is a task which we do every day as a matter of routine (= done regularly and not unusual ) .
sentences.chinese: 穿衣打扮是我们每天必做的事情。

sentences.english: You mustn’t worry. These are just routine enquiries.
sentences.chinese: 你不必担心，这只是例行的询问。

detailed_translations.english: the usual order in which you do things, or the things you regularly do
happening as a normal part of a job or process

sentences.english: Thus one was the Byron of Bengal, another the Emerson and so forth.
sentences.chinese: 于是，这个是孟加拉的拜论，那个是孟加拉的爱默生，如此等等①。

sentences.english: It well reflects the calligrapher 's personal feelings, knowledge, personality, and so forth.
sentences.chinese: 它能很好地反映出书法家的个人感情、知识、个性等等。

sentences.english: Before you move in, you can make a list of any marks, scratches, and so forth that are already there.
sentences.chinese: 在搬进去住之前，您可以先把那里原有的任何污痕、刮伤等等列出一张清单。

name: finitude
trans: 有限； 限定， 界限

sentences.english: To Kierkegaard, the finitude, understood as the body of the self in this paper, and the infinitude, the so-called inward imagination in Kierkegaard s text, is in absolute contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 克尔恺郭尔认为人的有限性（即本文称为肉身的方面）与人的无限性（一种纵深扩张的想象力）是不可调和的，在具体的生存过程中，这不可调和的两方面转化为必然性与可能性之间的对立。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有限； 限定， 界限

sentences.english: He is currently writing a dissertation on the Somali civil war.
sentences.chinese: 他正在写一篇关于索马里内战的论文。

detailed_translations.chinese: (博士学位)论文，学术演讲，专题论文
detailed_translations.english: a long piece of writing on a particular subject, especially one written for a university degree

name: currency
trans: 货币； 通用， 流行

sentences.english: The bank can supply you with foreign currency .
sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.english: There are moves towards a single currency in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有向单一货币发展的趋势。

sentences.english: The local currency is the Swiss franc.
sentences.chinese: 当地的货币是瑞士法郎。

detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money that a country uses

name: tariff
trans: 关税， 税率； 价目表

sentences.english: America wants to eliminate tariffs on items such as electronics.
sentences.chinese: 美国想要取消电子类产品的关税。

detailed_translations.english: a tax on goods coming into a country or going out of a country

name: enlist
trans: 征募； 从军， 参军； 谋取

sentences.english: The man focused some binoculars on the green peninsula ahead .
sentences.chinese: 男人拿起双筒望远镜眺望前面那青翠的半岛。

sentences.english: He raised the binoculars to his eye again, scanning across the scene.
sentences.chinese: 他再一次把双筒望远镜举到眼前，仔细观察整个现场。

sentences.english: Practice thesepaths several times with binoculars, and then repeat the one which works bestfor you using the finder of your telescope.
sentences.chinese: 用双筒望远镜练习这些路径几次，然后使用你的望远镜的寻星镜重复最适合的一个路径。

detailed_translations.english: a pair of special glasses, that you hold up to your eyes to look at objects that are a long distance away

name: correspondence

name: intimate
trans: 亲密的，密切的；私人的，个人的；小圈子内的

sentences.english: an intimate relationship

a close personal friend

sentences.chinese: 你干嘛不去学校的公告牌上打个广告？

sentences.chinese: 他把现款委托给一个生意合伙人投资一系列项目。

sentences.chinese: 一些公司已经主动透露了类似的信息。

sentences.chinese: 他拒绝透露那位政治家的身份。

sentences.chinese: 发布 / 签署公告

sentences.chinese: （美国）独立宣言

sentences.chinese: 美国宪法保证宗教信仰自由。

sentences.chinese: 一个在内存空间中的，包含每个外设的名字和可由处理器设置的地址范围的表格或图表。

detailed_translations.chinese: 图解， 简图， 图表
detailed_translations.english: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works

sentences.chinese: 那些照片勾起了我们到法国度假的深刻回忆。

sentences.chinese: 她的讲话引起了敌对的反应。

sentences.chinese: …凯尔曼小说的前言。

sentences.chinese: 我将引用莎士比亚的几行诗作为我讲话的开场白。

sentences.chinese: 只有12个人出席了会议。

sentences.chinese: 石油公司联合企业

sentences.chinese: 这种飞机将由欧洲的一个财团建造。

sentences.chinese: 我妈妈歪着头笑了。

trans: 得到某物，获得；防护，保卫
安全的； 可靠的， 放心的

sentences.chinese: 如今已经没有铁饭碗了。

name: avenue

sentences.chinese: 第五大街

sentences.english: Shaftesbury Avenue
sentences.chinese: 沙夫茨伯里街

detailed_translations.english: used in the names of streets in a town or city

sentences.chinese: 人们坐火车旅行时仍然会读很多书。

sentences.chinese: ...一份贝多芬音乐手稿的摹本版。

sentences.chinese: 用于医疗保健服务的资源不足。

sentences.chinese: 沿地球轨道飞行的太空舱

sentences.chinese: “我想和弗兰克斯先生谈谈。”“恐怕不行。”

sentences.chinese: 有小孩的会员常觉得没法参加晚上的聚会。

sentences.chinese: 现在找工作很难，对于盲人来说几乎是不可能。

sentences.chinese: 他面临着似乎不可能完成的任务。

sentences.chinese: 六个月前和平还似乎是个无法实现的梦。

sentences.chinese: 他将因擅闯私地而被起诉。

sentences.english: ...a more genuinely internationalist view of U.S. participation in peacekeeping.
sentences.chinese: ...一种美国参与维和的更真诚的国际主义观点。

name: booming

sentences.english: I need to work in pleasant surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在舒适的环境下工作。

sentences.chinese: 它是一个已贫穷化的农民的哀词。

sentences.chinese: 他将黄金扔进烟囱以保留这位穷困的父亲的脸面。

sentences.english: The grants did give new opportunities to many impoverished farmers from the East and Midwest, but much of the land granted under the Homestead Act fell quickly into the hands of speculators.
sentences.chinese: 这些赠拨确实了为来自东部和中西部穷困潦倒的农民带来了一个新的机遇，但是大部分《宅地法》赠拨的土地很快落入了投机者的手中。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the disinfection effect of gastroscope by ozone water.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察臭氧水在胃镜体的消毒效果监测。

sentences.english: Their skin is weathered and tanned, as if they have fossilised themselves in ozone to keep death at bay.
sentences.chinese: 他们的皮肤饱经风霜被晒得黧黑，好像他们在臭氧中变成化石并在海湾边防止死亡。

sentences.english: The synergistic effect of oxygen and (or ) ozone in atmosphere with ultraviolet also led to the adhesion failure of adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 大气中的氧和（或）臭氧与紫外线协同作用是导致该压敏粘合剂失粘的原因。

detailed_translations.english: a poisonous blue gas that is a type of oxygen

sentences.english: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 75%以上的土地用于农耕。

detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of farming

sentences.english: They all had sticks which they planned to use as weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们都持有棍棒，打算当武器用。

detailed_translations.english: something that you use to fight with or attack someone with, such as a knife, bomb, or gun

name: minimal
trans: 最小的， 最低限度的

sentences.chinese: 暴风雨只造成了轻微破坏。

sentences.english: The cost to taxpayers would be minimal.
sentences.chinese: 纳税人的支出将是最少的。

sentences.english: This is a practical course, with only a minimal amount of theory.
sentences.chinese: 这是实践课程，只有少量理论。

detailed_translations.english: very small in degree or amount, especially the smallest degree or amount possible

sentences.english: Mexico's Mount Colima began spewing lava and ash last night.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥科利马山昨晚开始喷发熔岩和火山灰。

detailed_translations.english: hot liquid rock that flows from a volcano,or this rock when it has become solid

name: ecology
trans: 生态， 生态学； 生态环境

sentences.english: the natural ecology of the Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球的自然生态

sentences.english: plant ecology
sentences.chinese: 植物生态学

detailed_translations.english: the way in which plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment, or the scientific study of this

sentences.english: He was wrong, and courageous enough to admit it.
sentences.chinese: 他是错了，而且有勇气承认自己错了。

sentences.english: a courageous decision
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的决定

detailed_translations.english: brave

name: venomous
trans: 有毒的； 分泌毒液的； 恶意的， 狠毒的

sentences.english: Lisa shot him a venomous glance.
sentences.chinese: 莉萨恶狠狠地瞪了他一眼。

if you soak something, or if you let it soak, you keep it covered with a liquid for a period of time, especially in order to make it softer or easier to clean
