sentences.chinese: 观众挥动着横幅，又是叫喊又是欢呼。

sentences.english: She’d never felt the need to carry the banner of feminism.
sentences.chinese: 她从来都不觉得有必要打出女权主义的旗号。

detailed_translations.english: a long piece of cloth on which something is written, often carried between two poles

sentences.english: The doctor had encountered several similar cases in the past.
sentences.chinese: 那位医生过去曾碰到过好几个类似病例。

detailed_translations.english: to experience something, especially problems or opposition
an occasion when you meet someone, or do something with someone you do not know

sentences.english: eco-friendly products
sentences.chinese: 对环境无害的产品

detailed_translations.english: not harmful to the environment

name: extrovert
trans: 性格外向的人； 爱交际的人

sentences.english: Her sister was always more of an extrovert.
sentences.chinese: 她妹妹总是更外向些。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外向；外倾者；性格外向者（等于extravert）
detailed_translations.english: someone who is active and confident, and who enjoys spending time with other people

name: approve
trans: 赞成； 批准， 同意

sentences.english: You've never approved of Henry, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你从未赞赏过亨利，是吧？

detailed_translations.english: to think that someone or something is good, right, or suitable

name: chew
trans: 咀嚼； 回味； 熟思

sentences.english: This meat’s so tough I can hardly chew it!
sentences.chinese: 这肉太老了，我几乎嚼不动！

detailed_translations.english: the act of biting something many times with your teeth
to bite food several times before swallowing it

name: pedestrian
trans: 徒步的； 缺乏想象力的

sentences.english: More than a third of all pedestrian injuries are to children.
sentences.chinese: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is walking, especially along a street or other place used by cars

name: attendance
trans: 到场， 出席； 出勤； 伺候， 照料

sentences.english: We have an average attendance of 4,000 fans per game.
sentences.chinese: 每场比赛平均有4,000名球迷来观战。

sentences.english: Last year’s fair saw attendance figures of 32,000.
sentences.chinese: 去年的交易会有3.2万人参加。

detailed_translations.chinese: 出席；到场；出席人数；考勤
detailed_translations.english: the number of people who attend a game, concert, meeting etc

sentences.english: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.english: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.english: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

name: uneasy
trans: 心神不安的； 担心的

sentences.english: She eventually fell into an uneasy sleep.
sentences.chinese: 她终于睡着了，但睡得并不踏实。

sentences.english: Ninety percent of those questioned felt uneasy about nuclear power.
sentences.chinese: 受访者中有90%的人对核能感到忧虑。

detailed_translations.english: worried or slightly afraid because you think that something bad might happen

sentences.english: Information must be encrypted and privacy maintained in accordance with established policies, according to the role of the consumer.
sentences.chinese: 信息必须根据客户的角色按照确立的策略进行加密和以保密方式进行维护。

sentences.english: They aim to provide detailed editorial feedback in accordance with the standards of journals such as Nature and Science — where many of them have been published.
sentences.chinese: 他们的目标是按照《自然》和《科学》等期刊的标准提供详细的编辑反馈——他们之中的许多人在这些杂志上发表过论文。

sentences.english: I spun around in my swivel chair and chatted with Jim.
sentences.chinese: 我转动着我的旋转椅同一旁的吉姆聊起天来了。

detailed_translations.english: to turn around quickly and face a different direction, or to make something do this

name: innocent
trans: 清白的； 无害的； 天真的

sentences.english: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.english: She had always regarded Greg as a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime
An innocent is someone who is innocent

name: advance
trans: 前进， 前移； 增长， 提高； 预付

sentences.english: I should warn you in advance that I’m not a very good dancer.
sentences.chinese: 我要先提醒你，我跳舞不是很好。

sentences.english: Many thanks, in advance, for your help.
sentences.chinese: 对你的帮助预先表示万分感谢。

sentences.english: Could you distribute copies well in advance of the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 开会前把复印件早早分发下去，好吗？

sentences.english: A line of US tanks slowly advanced.
sentences.chinese: 一列美军坦克缓缓前进。

detailed_translations.english: before something happens or is expected to happen
to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers

sentences.english: We need to carry out a proper evaluation of the new system.
sentences.chinese: 我们要对新系统进行合理的评估。

sentences.english: They took some samples of products for evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 他们抽取了一些产品样本以作评估。

detailed_translations.english: a judgment about how good, useful, or successful something is

name: tenable
trans: 站得住脚的； 可防守的

sentences.english: an idea which is no longer tenable
sentences.chinese: 不再成立的观点

detailed_translations.chinese: （主张等）站得住脚的；可维持的
detailed_translations.english: a belief, argument etc that is tenable is reasonable and can be defended successfully

sentences.english: I met a tramp and gave him some money on my way home.
sentences.chinese: 我回家的路上碰到了一个流浪汉并给了他一些钱。

sentences.english: Five minutes inside the soup-kitchen in Hackney, east London, and I immediately understand what Orwell meant - that the "typical tramp" does not exist.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦东面哈克尼的汤棚里呆了五分钟，我立刻明白了奥威尔那句“‘典型的流浪汉’不存在”是什么意思。

sentences.english: A tramp does not see such a meal twice in the year, in the spike or out of it.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个流浪汉而言，不论是在收容站还是在外面，如此丰盛的饭食他是见不到第二次的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has no home or job and moves from place to place, often asking for food or money

name: appreciate
trans: 赏识， 鉴赏； 感激； 涨价， 增值

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.english: Her abilities are not fully appreciated by her employer.
sentences.chinese: 她的才干没有得到雇主的充分赏识。

sentences.english: I’m not an expert, but I appreciate fine works of art.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：我不是专家，但我欣赏优秀的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done

sentences.english: Pete was trimming the lawn around the roses.
sentences.chinese: 皮特在修剪玫瑰丛周围的草坪。

sentences.english: I have my hair trimmed every six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我每六周剪一次头发。

detailed_translations.english: to make something look neater by cutting small pieces off it
when something is cut to make it look neater
neat and well cared for

name: qualitative
trans: 性质的， 质量的； 定性的

sentences.english: There are qualitative differences in the way children of different ages and adults think.
sentences.chinese: 不同年龄的儿童和成人在思维方式上有着质的差异。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the quality or standard of something rather than the quantity

name: predictable
trans: 可预言的， 可预报的； 按老一套办事的， 墨守成规的

sentences.english: The snow had a predictable effect on traffic.
sentences.chinese: 这场雪对交通造成的影响可以预见。

sentences.english: an entertaining but predictable film
sentences.chinese: 一部有趣但老套的电影

sentences.english: Logan’s reaction was predictable.
sentences.chinese: 洛根的反应可想而知。

detailed_translations.english: if something or someone is predictable, you know what will happen or what they will do – sometimes used to show disapproval

sentences.english: subjects as diverse as pop music and archaeology
sentences.chinese: 像流行音乐和考古学这样各不相同的学科

detailed_translations.english: very different from each other

sentences.english: a French bistro
sentences.chinese: 一间法式小餐馆

detailed_translations.english: a small restaurant or bar

sentences.english: Smoking is the prime cause of lung disease.
sentences.chinese: 抽烟是引发肺部疾病的首要原因。

sentences.english: Our prime concern is providing jobs for all young school leavers.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是为所有的年轻毕业生提供工作。

sentences.english: He was named as the prime suspect in the murder investigation.
sentences.chinese: 在那宗谋杀案的调查中他被定为主要嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Good management is of prime importance in business.
sentences.chinese: 良好的经营管理在商业领域尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: most important
the time in your life when you are strongest and most active
to prepare someone for a situation so that they know what to do

sentences.english: The iris of the eye is photographed from up to one meter away.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛的虹膜最远可在一公尺外的距离接受摄影。

sentences.english: The patterns of the iris are translated into digital code, and stored in a PC database, along with personal information.
sentences.chinese: 虹膜的图案转译为数码，然后与个人资料一起储存在个人计算机数据库里。

sentences.english: This small move creates better balance with the iris and pupil of each eye and eliminates the tension on the left eye against the left edge of her face.
sentences.chinese: 这样小小的移动创造了更好的平衡，包括虹膜、瞳孔和每一只眼睛，消除了左眼对她脸部边缘的压迫感。

detailed_translations.english: the round coloured part of your eye, that surrounds the black  pupil

name: preference
trans: 喜爱； 偏爱的事物； 优先

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

name: mainstream
trans: 主要倾向，主要趋势，主流；主流派爵士乐

sentences.english: Genet started as a rebel, but soon became part of the literary mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 热内起初很叛逆，但不久就回归了文学主流。

detailed_translations.english: the most usual ideas or methods, or the people who have these ideas or methods

sentences.english: There are fewer opportunities for new graduates this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年新毕业的大学生就业机会较少。

detailed_translations.english: a chance to do something or an occasion when it is easy for you to do something

sentences.english: Bethan goes to chapel every Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 贝唐每个星期天都去教堂做礼拜。

detailed_translations.english: a small church, or a room in a hospital, prison, big church etc in which Christians pray and have religious services

name: distort
trans: 扭曲； 曲解； 变形

sentences.english: His account was badly distorted by the press.
sentences.chinese: 他的话被报界严重歪曲。

sentences.english: an expensive subsidy which distorts the market
sentences.chinese: 扰乱市场秩序的高价补贴

detailed_translations.english: to report something in a way that is not completely true or correct

sentences.english: business/commercial venture
sentences.chinese: 商业风投

sentences.english: When darkness fell, he would venture out.
sentences.chinese: 天黑以后，他就会壮着胆子出去。

detailed_translations.english: a new business activity that involves taking risks
to go somewhere that could be dangerous

name: subsidiary
trans: 次要的； 辅助的， 附设的

sentences.english: a subsidiary hypothesis
sentences.chinese: 一个附带假设

detailed_translations.english: connected with, but less important than, something else
a company that is owned or controlled by another larger company

sentences.english: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.english: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc

name: enthusiasm
trans: 热情， 热心， 积极性； 热衷的事物

sentences.english: Gillian and Darren greeted the speakers with great enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 吉利恩和达伦非常热情地接待了演讲者。

sentences.english: We went along to the local diving club, full of enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 我们兴高采烈地去了当地的潜水俱乐部。

sentences.english: They go about their tasks with little enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 他们执行任务时没多大干劲。

sentences.english: A delay of two hours did not dampen their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 耽误了两小时没有减弱他们的热情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热情， 热心， 热忱； 巨大兴趣
detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of interest and enjoyment about something and an eagerness to be involved in it

sentences.english: Trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.chinese: 火车正在运送过去由卡车运送的大批货物。

detailed_translations.english: to send something somewhere using a particular route
a way from one place to another

name: flexible
trans: 易弯曲的； 柔韧的； 灵活的

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

sentences.english: Something that can only be seen in America: In the landscaped, ultraclean high-technology parks of northern Orange County there is a personal computer company that seven years ago did not exist.
sentences.chinese: 只有在美国才会出现这种情况：在北部桔县环境作过美化的、超净的高科技园区，有家7年前尚不存在的个人电脑公司。

name: agile
trans: 敏捷的， 灵活的， 机敏的

sentences.english: Dogs are surprisingly agile.
sentences.chinese: 狗出奇地敏捷。

detailed_translations.english: able to move quickly and easily

name: replenish
trans: 再斟满； 添加， 补充

sentences.english: More vaccines are needed to replenish our stocks.
sentences.chinese: 还需要更多的疫苗来补充我们的储备。

detailed_translations.chinese: 补充，再装满；把…装满；给…添加燃料
detailed_translations.english: to put new supplies into something, or to fill something again

sentences.english: the liver, heart, and other internal organs
sentences.chinese: 肝脏、心脏及其他内脏器官

sentences.english: loss of blood flow to his vital organs
sentences.chinese: 他的生命器官供血不足

sentences.english: Extra doses of the hormone caused the animals’ reproductive organs to develop sooner than usual.
sentences.chinese: 额外使用激素使得这些动物的生殖器官比正常情况下发育得更快。

sentences.english: In Arizona, 480 people are waiting for organ transplants.
sentences.chinese: 亚利桑那州有480人在等待器官移植。

sentences.english: dying people who have agreed to be organ donors
sentences.chinese: 愿意捐献器官的垂死的病人

detailed_translations.english: a part of the body, such as the heart or lungs, that has a particular purpose

sentences.english: a book depicting life in pre-revolutionary Russia
sentences.chinese: 描写革命前俄国人生活的一本书

detailed_translations.english: to describe something or someone in writing or speech, or to show them in a painting, picture etc

name: edify
trans: 陶冶， 教化； 启发， 启迪

sentences.english: A sermon, especially one intended to edify a congregation on a practical matter and not intended to be a theological discourse.
sentences.chinese: 布道一次讲道，尤其是旨在于实际问题上启发会众，而不在于成为神学讲演。

detailed_translations.english: to improve the morality, intellect, etc, of, esp by instruction

sentences.english: Others here are more sceptical about the chances for justice being done.
sentences.chinese: 这里的其他人更为怀疑正义能否得到伸张。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀疑的；怀疑论的；习惯怀疑的
detailed_translations.english: If you are sceptical about something, you have doubts about it

name: sustainable
trans: 可以忍受的； 足以支撑的； 养得起的

sentences.english: The government should do more to promote sustainable agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 政府应该做更多工作来推动可持续农业的发展。

sentences.english: the sustainable use of rainforest resources
sentences.chinese: 雨林资源的可持续利用

sentences.english: Cycling is a totally sustainable form of transport.
sentences.chinese: 骑自行车是一种绝对环保的交通方式。

sentences.english: environmentally sustainable development
sentences.chinese: 生态环境的可持续发展

detailed_translations.english: able to continue without causing damage to the environment

name: liquor
trans: 烈性酒； 含酒精饮料

sentences.english: The room was filled with cases of liquor.
sentences.chinese: 房间里满是一箱箱的烈性酒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 酒，含酒精饮料；溶液；液体；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: a strong alcoholic drink such as whisky

name: solidify
trans: 巩固， 确保； 凝固， 固化； 团结

sentences.english: The volcanic lava solidifies as it cools.
sentences.chinese: 火山熔岩冷却后变成固体。

sentences.english: solidified cream
sentences.chinese: 凝固的奶油

detailed_translations.english: to become solid or make something solid

sentences.english: the highly characteristic (= very typical ) flint walls of the local houses
sentences.chinese: 当地房子非常有特色的燧石墙

sentences.english: Violent images are a defining characteristic of his work.
sentences.chinese: 暴力形象是他作品的一个鲜明特征。

detailed_translations.english: very typical of a particular thing or of someone’s character
a quality or feature of something or someone that is typical of them and easy to recognize

sentences.english: The interior walls are all painted white.
sentences.chinese: 室内墙壁都粉刷成了白色。

sentences.english: The interior of the church was dark.
sentences.chinese: 教堂里很暗。

detailed_translations.english: inside or indoors
the inner part or inside of something

sentences.english: You tell the receptionist that you are expecting a call from this client and to put them through.
sentences.chinese: 你告诉传达员你正在等待一个来自这个客户的电话，并允许将他们接进来。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to welcome and deal with people arriving in a hotel or office building, visiting a doctor etc

sentences.english: sparks from the fire
sentences.chinese: 火里飞出的火星

sentences.english: The scrape of metal on metal sent up a shower of sparks .
sentences.chinese: 金属之间互相摩擦，迸出一串火星。

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together
a very small piece of burning material produced by a fire or by hitting or rubbing two hard objects together

name: integral
trans: 不可或缺的， 构成整体所必需的； 完整的， 完备的

sentences.english: Rituals, celebrations, and festivals form an integral part of every human society.
sentences.chinese: 仪式、庆典和节日是每个人类社会不可缺少的组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is an integral part of something is an essential part of that thing

sentences.english: Halley’s comet
sentences.chinese: 哈雷彗星

detailed_translations.english: an object in space like a bright ball with a long tail, that moves around the sun

name: bully
trans: 恐吓； 胁迫， 欺负

sentences.english: Bullies are often cowards.
sentences.chinese: 恃强凌弱者往往是懦夫。

detailed_translations.english: someone who uses their strength or power to frighten or hurt someone who is weaker
to threaten to hurt someone or frighten them, especially someone smaller or weaker

name: parental
trans: 父的； 母的； 父母的

sentences.english: parental responsibility
sentences.chinese: 父母的责任

sentences.english: Opening a new school will increase parental choice.
sentences.chinese: 开办一所新学校将会扩大父母的选择范围。

sentences.english: Parental consent is required before the operation can take place.
sentences.chinese: 手术前须征得父母同意。

detailed_translations.english: relating to being a parent and especially to being responsible for a child’s safety and development

name: spare
trans: 闲置的；备用的，外加的；空闲的
省出，抽出；饶恕，赦免；免去；不吝惜

sentences.english: Sorry, I can’t spare the time.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我抽不出时间。

sentences.english: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.english: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.english: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.chinese: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.english: I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.chinese: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.english: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.chinese: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

detailed_translations.english: to make something such as time, money, or workers available for someone, especially when this is difficult for you to do
not being used or not needed at the present time

name: replicate
trans: 重复， 复现或复制； 再制造； 再生

sentences.english: There is a need for further research to replicate these findings.
sentences.chinese: 需要进一步的研究来验证这些结果。

detailed_translations.english: if you replicate someone’s work, a scientific study etc, you do it again, or try to get the same result again

detailed_translations.chinese: 复制品；八音阶间隔的反覆音

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers

sentences.english: I remember changing cars twice when visiting her bungalow in New Delhi in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 我记得1998年去她在新德里的小平房拜访时，中途两次换车。

sentences.english: Belinda and Clive, who worked on the railways, moved to a bungalow not far from Barry Island.
sentences.chinese: 贝琳达和克里夫在铁路工作，并且搬到离巴厘岛不远的一处平房居住。

sentences.english: It would never have happened if he had stayed in Australia, for Australia is still the land of the bungalow.
sentences.chinese: 要是他居住在澳大利亚的话这种情况绝对不可能发生，因为现在澳大利亚土地上所座落的依然是平房。

detailed_translations.english: a house that is all on ground level

name: emotional
trans: 感情的， 情绪的； 引起情感的， 表示情感的； 情绪激动的， 易动感情的

sentences.english: She provided emotional support at a very distressing time for me.
sentences.chinese: 在我非常痛苦的时候，她是我的情感支柱。

sentences.english: Ann suffered from depression and a number of other emotional problems.
sentences.chinese: 安患了抑郁症，还遇到一些其他的情绪问题。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional state of the patient
sentences.chinese: 患者的生理和情绪状态

sentences.english: The funeral was a very emotional experience for all of us.
sentences.chinese: 那次葬礼对我们大家来说都是一次无比伤感的经历。

sentences.english: He became very emotional when we had to leave.
sentences.chinese: 当我们不得不离开时，他非常伤感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 情绪(上)的，情感(上)的；激起感情的； 敏感的；情绪激动的〔尤指哭泣〕
detailed_translations.english: relating to your feelings or how you control them

sentences.english: A large crowd had assembled outside the American embassy.
sentences.chinese: 一大群人聚集在美国大使馆外。

sentences.english: He looked around at the assembled company (=  all the people who had come there  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他环顾四周聚集的人群。

sentences.english: She had assembled a collection of her favourite songs.
sentences.chinese: 她收集了一些自己最喜欢听的歌。

sentences.english: The aircraft will continue to be assembled in France.
sentences.chinese: 飞机将继续在法国组装。

detailed_translations.english: if you assemble a large number of people or things, or if they assemble, they are gathered together in one place, often for a particular purpose

name: noticeable
trans: 显而易见的； 明显的

sentences.english: Alcohol has a noticeable effect on the body.
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体有明显的影响。

sentences.english: It was noticeable that many of them avoided answering the question.
sentences.chinese: 显而易见，他们中的许多人对这个问题都避而不答。

detailed_translations.english: easy to notice

name: transition
trans: 过渡， 过渡时期； 转变， 转换， 变革

sentences.english: Making the transition from youth to adulthood can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 从青少年过渡到成年有时是一个非常痛苦的过程。

sentences.english: a society that is in transition
sentences.chinese: 一个正在转型的社会

sentences.english: the period of transition to full democracy
sentences.chinese: 向全面民主的过渡时期

detailed_translations.english: when something changes from one form or state to another

sentences.english: I had the gas fire going full blast .
sentences.chinese: 我把煤气取暖器开到最大。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong movement of wind or air
to criticize someone or something very strongly – used especially in news reports

name: repel
trans: 击退， 驱逐； 抵制， 拒绝； 使反感， 使厌恶

sentences.english: The smell repelled him.
sentences.chinese: 这气味让他反感。

detailed_translations.english: if something repels you, it is so unpleasant that you do not want to be near it, or it makes you feel ill

name: series
trans: 一系列， 连续； 丛书

sentences.english: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.chinese: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.english: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.chinese: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.english: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.chinese: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一系列， 连续； 丛书， 连续剧
detailed_translations.english: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other

name: spasm
trans: 痉挛； 抽搐； 突发， 阵发

sentences.english: Maggie felt a muscle spasm in her back.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉觉得背部肌肉一阵抽搐。

sentences.english: Tom’s jaw muscles had gone into spasm .
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的颌部肌肉开始抽搐。

detailed_translations.chinese: [临床] 痉挛；抽搐；一阵发作
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when your muscles suddenly become tight, causing you pain

sentences.english: We cultivated maize and watermelons.
sentences.chinese: 我们种植玉米和西瓜。

detailed_translations.english: to plant and take care of a particular crop

sentences.english: plants that thrive in tropical rain forests
sentences.chinese: 在热带雨林蓬勃生长的植物

sentences.english: a business which managed to thrive during a recession
sentences.chinese: 在经济萧条时期也能顺利发展的一家企业

detailed_translations.english: to become very successful or very strong and healthy

name: imaginative
trans: 富有想象力的； 创新的

sentences.english: an imaginative use of computer technology
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术的妙用

sentences.english: children’s imaginative play
sentences.chinese: 儿童富有想象力的游戏

sentences.english: an imaginative solution to the litter problem
sentences.chinese: 解决乱扔垃圾的问题的有创意的方法

detailed_translations.english: containing new and interesting ideas

name: treadmill
trans: 踏车； 累人的活； 单调的例行工作， 乏味繁重的工作

sentences.english: the treadmill of working in the office
sentences.chinese: 单调枯燥的办公室工作

detailed_translations.chinese: 踏车； 累人的活； 单调的例行工作， 乏味繁重的工作
detailed_translations.english: work or a way of life that seems very boring because you always have to do the same things

name: represent
trans: 代表； 表示； 表现

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

name: goodwill
trans: 友好， 善意； 信誉

sentences.english: A fund was set up as a goodwill gesture to survivors and their families.
sentences.chinese: 成立了基金会，以向幸存者及其家属作出善意的表示。

detailed_translations.english: kind feelings towards or between people and a willingness to be helpful

sentences.english: a sporting celebrity
sentences.chinese: 体育明星

sentences.english: He’s a national celebrity.
sentences.chinese: 他是全国有名的人物。

sentences.english: We invited a number of minor celebrities (= people who are not very famous ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请了一些小有名气的人物。

sentences.english: celebrity chef/gardener etc
sentences.chinese: 名厨/名人园艺师等

detailed_translations.english: a famous living person

sentences.english: The boss dropped an accountant from the payroll.
sentences.chinese: 老板把一名会计师从在职人员名单中除了名。

sentences.english: The accountant checked this unnecessary spending in good time.
sentences.chinese: 会计及时卡住了这笔不必要的开支。

sentences.english: They conferred with the accountant vis-à-vis the proposed budget.
sentences.chinese: 他们与会计商量有关预算提案的事。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to keep and check financial accounts, calculate taxes etc

sentences.english: If they want national freedom, of course we sympathise.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们要求民族自由， 我们当然是同情的。

sentences.english: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend's success.
sentences.chinese: 任何人都能对朋友的不幸感到同情，但要消受一个春风得意的朋友，则需要非常优良的天性。

sentences.english: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend's success.
sentences.chinese: 同情一个朋友的苦难是任何人都能做到的，但同情一个朋友的成功则需要具有十分出色的素质。—— 王尔德。

name: inborn
trans: 天生的， 先天的， 天赋的

sentences.english: Mammals have an inborn fear of snakes.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳动物天生害怕蛇。

sentences.english: Good taste is inborn and cannot be learned.
sentences.chinese: 好的鉴赏力是与生俱来的，无法通过后天习得。

detailed_translations.english: an inborn quality or ability is one you have had naturally since birth

name: corpus
trans: 文集， 文献， 汇编； 语料库

sentences.english: the entire corpus of Shakespeare’s works
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚作品全集

detailed_translations.english: A corpus is a large collection of written or spoken texts that is used for language research

name: promise
trans: 允诺， 保证； 预兆， 预示

sentences.english: If you make a promise, you should keep it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你许下一个诺言，你就应该遵守它。

sentences.english: Last night the headmaster promised a full investigation.
sentences.chinese: 校长昨晚允诺进行全面调查。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will definitely happen
to tell someone that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will happen

name: recreational
trans: 消遣的， 娱乐的； 游戏的

sentences.english: ...parks and other recreational facilities.
sentences.chinese: …公园及其它娱乐设施。

detailed_translations.english: Recreational means relating to things people do in their spare time to relax

name: bulge
trans: 膨胀； 凸出； 塞满

sentences.english: The gun made a bulge under his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 手枪从他的夹克里面鼓了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a curved mass on the surface of something, usually caused by something under or inside it
to stick out in a rounded shape, especially because something is very full or too tight

name: robotic
trans: 机器人的； 像机器人的， 呆板而机械的

sentences.english: the space shuttle’s robotic arm
sentences.chinese: 航天飞机的机械臂

detailed_translations.chinese: 机器人的； 像机器人的， 呆板而机械的
detailed_translations.english: robotic equipment etc is related to robots or is part of a robot

sentences.english: It seems an absurd idea.
sentences.chinese: 这似乎是个荒唐的想法。

detailed_translations.english: completely stupid or unreasonable

sentences.english: Burglars broke into their home.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼闯进了他们家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things

sentences.english: You do not need any prior knowledge of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 你无需事先具备该方面的知识。

sentences.english: Changes may not be made without the prior approval of the council.
sentences.chinese: 未经委员会事先同意，不得作出改变。

sentences.english: Vegetarian meals are provided by prior agreement.
sentences.chinese: 经事先协商可提供素食。

sentences.english: Some prior experience with the software is needed.
sentences.chinese: 要求事先熟悉这个软件。

detailed_translations.english: existing or arranged before something else or before the present situation

name: tangibly
trans: 可触摸地； 可感知地； 有形地

detailed_translations.chinese: 可触摸地； 可感知地； 有形地

name: landmark
trans: 路标， 地标； 里程碑

name: vanish
trans: 突然消失； 不复存在， 消逝

sentences.english: My keys were here a minute ago but now they’ve vanished.
sentences.chinese: 我的钥匙刚刚还在这里，现在却不翼而飞了。

sentences.english: The bird vanished from sight.
sentences.chinese: 那只鸟从视线中消失了。

sentences.english: She seemed to have just vanished into thin air (= suddenly disappeared in a very mysterious way ).
sentences.chinese: 她好像就蒸发了似的。

detailed_translations.english: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained

sentences.english: ...their stepfather, Baron Michael Distemple.
sentences.chinese: …他们的继父迈克尔• 迪斯坦普尔男爵

sentences.english: drug barons
sentences.chinese: 大毒枭

detailed_translations.english: a man who is a member of a low rank of the British nobility or of a rank of European nobility

sentences.english: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.chinese: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.english: Daniel: Yes, like a dolphin.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔: 嗯，像海豚一样。

detailed_translations.english: a very intelligent sea animal like a fish with a long grey pointed nose

sentences.english: But then, zero hour arrives. The AWACS plane becomes the coordinator of the raids.
sentences.chinese: 时钟跳过零点，AWACS飞机立刻成为了空袭的协调中心。

sentences.english: RM Inventory management: Cooperate with supply coordinator for the warehouse management.
sentences.chinese: 原料仓库管理：配合供应协调员做原料仓库管理。

sentences.english: Subsequent requests are treated similarly: the clients always contact the central coordinator node, and the coordinator node retrieves the data from the correct node.
sentences.chinese: 后续请求也被同等对待：客户端总是联系中心协调者节点，而协调者节点会从正确的节点检索数据。

detailed_translations.english: someone who organizes the way people work together in a particular activity

sentences.english: A person with ambition is the prerequisite to success.
sentences.chinese: 一个人有雄心壮志是成功的先决条件。

sentences.english: Historical changes to the production of embroidered shoes with embroidery into a local evaluation of the level of ingenuity of a girl prerequisite.
sentences.chinese: 历史的变革使绣花鞋的制作与刺绣水平成为当地评价一个姑娘心灵手巧的先决条件。

sentences.english: Anyone has the possibility to succeed, but the prerequisite of success is your own, both industry knowledge learning and the cultivation of innovation ability, requires great effort.
sentences.chinese: 任何人都有成功的可能性，但成功的先决条件在于你自身，无论是行业知识的学习还是创新能力的培养，都需要付出极大的努力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 必备的， 作为先决条件的

detailed_translations.english: something that is necessary before something else can happen or be done

name: scholar
trans: 学者； 奖学金获得者

sentences.english: a Shakespearean scholar
sentences.chinese: 研究莎士比亚的学者

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially one that is not a science subject

name: prospectus
trans: 内容说明书， 简章， 简介

sentences.english: ...a prospectus for a new issue of stock.
sentences.chinese: …新发行股票的招股说明书。

detailed_translations.chinese: 内容说明书；样张；创办计划书；学校的入学简介
detailed_translations.english: A prospectus is a detailed document produced by a company, college, or school, which gives details about it

name: vision
trans: 想象力； 视力， 视觉； 梦幻， 幻觉

sentences.english: She suffered temporary loss of vision after being struck on the head.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受撞击以后出现暂时性失明。

sentences.english: Tears blurred her vision (= made it difficult for her to see ).
sentences.chinese: 泪水模糊了她的视线。

sentences.english: The idea came to her in a vision.
sentences.chinese: 她在神示中想到了这个主意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to see

name: accompany
trans: 陪伴； 伴随， 与…同时发生； 伴奏

sentences.english: Children under 14 must be accompanied by an adult.
sentences.chinese: 14岁以下儿童必须有成人陪同。

sentences.english: Wherever her husband went, she would accompany him.
sentences.chinese: 不论丈夫去哪里，她都陪伴左右。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陪同， 伴随； 为…伴奏
detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere with someone

sentences.english: a drug that has a beneficial effect on the immune system
sentences.chinese: 有益于免疫系统的一种药物

sentences.english: an arrangement that is mutually beneficial
sentences.chinese: 一项互惠互利的协定

detailed_translations.english: having a good effect

sentences.english: Don’t blame me – it’s not my fault.
sentences.chinese: 别来怪我——又不是我的错。

sentences.english: I blame his mother. She does everything for him.
sentences.chinese: 怪他母亲不好，她什么事都要为他做。

detailed_translations.english: to say or think that someone or something is responsible for something bad

name: reckon
trans: 认为， 估计； 测算， 测量； 料想， 指望

sentences.english: ‘There’s nothing we can do about it.’ ‘You reckon (= used to express doubt or disagreement ) ?’
sentences.chinese: “这件事我们无能为力。”“是吗？”

detailed_translations.english: spoken to think or suppose something

name: confusion
trans: 困惑， 糊涂； 混淆； 混乱， 杂乱， 无秩序状态， 骚乱

sentences.english: a scene of indescribable confusion
sentences.chinese: 难以形容的混乱场面

sentences.english: To avoid confusion, the teams wore different colours.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免混淆，各队穿着不同颜色的服装。

detailed_translations.english: a very confusing situation, that usually has a lot of noise and action, so that it is difficult for someone to understand it or control it

sentences.english: Your arm should hinge from the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 你的手臂应该像从肩膀铰链住一般。

sentences.english: Each compartment should have a hinged seal door with a concealed or piano-type hinge .
sentences.chinese: 每个隔室应具有一个带暗装或钢琴型铰链的铰接密封门。

sentences.english: GATE: external direct (opposite side of the hinge). Flow direction should climb over the gasket side.
sentences.chinese: 浇口：外部方向（铰链对面）。流向须爬过衬垫侧。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of metal fastened to a door, lid etc that allows it to swing open and shut
to attach something, using a hinge

sentences.english: Anderson was to sing at the Constitution Hall auditorium.
sentences.chinese: 安德森将要在宪法厅的观众席演唱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a theatre where people sit when watching a play, concert etc

sentences.english: Leave the last page blank.
sentences.chinese: 最后一页留空。

sentences.english: a blank cassette
sentences.chinese: 一盒空白磁带

sentences.english: When you’ve filled in the blanks , hand the form back to me.
sentences.chinese: 你填好表格以后把它交还给我。

detailed_translations.english: without any writing, print, or recorded sound
an empty space on a piece of paper, where you are supposed to write a word or letter

name: session
trans: 一场， 一节； 会议； 集会

sentences.english: Board members met in closed session (= with nobody else present ) .
sentences.chinese: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament

sentences.english: Additional information can be obtained from the centre.
sentences.chinese: 可以从中心获取更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: more than what was agreed or expected

name: reception
trans: 接收， 接受； 接待， 招待会； 接收效果

sentences.english: She was unsure of her reception after everything that had happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生了这些事后，她对自己是否还受欢迎没把握。

sentences.english: The plans received a mixed reception from unions (= some people liked them, others did not ) .
sentences.chinese: 各工会对这些计划反响不一。

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of welcome for someone, or a particular type of reaction to their ideas, work etc

sentences.english: This lets us see more of the whole picture, look at problems more holistically, and take corrective action sooner.

sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

sentences.chinese: 辛普森太太负责图书馆新职员的入职培训。

sentences.chinese: 适用于油性发质的洗发液

sentences.chinese: 弯曲的钉子

sentences.chinese: 双膝微曲站立。

sentences.chinese: 她指称该组织中有大量的男性成员吸毒。

sentences.english: Write down all the positive things about your life.
sentences.chinese: 记下生活中所有好的事情。

sentences.english: The rural environment was having a positive effect on the children’s health.
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境对孩子们的健康有好处。

sentences.english: It’s been a very positive experience for her.
sentences.chinese: 那对她来说是一次非常有益的经历。

sentences.english: TV can be a positive influence .
sentences.chinese: 电视也会有好的影响。

sentences.english: the positive contribution to the community made by many older people
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人为社区做出的积极贡献

sentences.english: It’s been a difficult time but, on the positive side , I feel physically fine.
sentences.chinese: 日子过得不容易，不过从好的方面看，我的身体状况还不错。

sentences.english: Women should be portrayed in a more positive light .
sentences.chinese: 应该从更正面的角度来描绘女性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确实的， 明确的； 积极的， 肯定的
detailed_translations.english: good or useful

sentences.english: He took aim and squeezed the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 他瞄准目标，扣动了扳机。

sentences.english: The assassination triggered off a wave of rioting.
sentences.chinese: 这次暗杀事件引发了一阵骚乱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a gun that you pull with your finger to fire it
to make something happen very quickly, especially a series of events

name: favourite
trans: 特别喜欢的人或物； 亲信

sentences.english: a child’s favourite toy
sentences.chinese: 孩子最喜欢的玩具

sentences.english: What’s your favourite colour?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢什么颜色？

sentences.english: a favorite spot for picnickers
sentences.chinese: 野餐者最喜欢的地方

detailed_translations.english: your favourite person or thing is the one that you like the most
something that you like more than other things of the same kind

sentences.english: A large detachment of police was used to segregate the two rival camps of protesters.
sentences.chinese: 一大队分遣警察被派来隔离两群敌对的抗议者。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使隔离；使分离；在…实行种族隔离
detailed_translations.english: to separate one group of people from others, especially because they are of a different race, sex, or religion

sentences.english: Video rental is usually £3.
sentences.chinese: 录像带的租金通常是3英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the money that you pay to use a car, television, or other machine over a period of time

name: rotate
trans: 旋转， 转动； 轮流， 轮换

sentences.english: The Earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 地球每24小时绕地轴自转一周。

sentences.english: Rotate the pan halfway through the baking time.
sentences.chinese: 烘烤到一半时把盘子转一下。

detailed_translations.english: to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this
to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this

name: practically
trans: 几乎， 简直； 实际上

sentences.english: I’ve read practically all of his books.
sentences.chinese: 我差不多读过他所有的书。

sentences.english: She sees him practically every day.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎天天见到他。

sentences.english: It’s practically impossible to predict what will happen.
sentences.chinese: 将会发生什么，几乎不能预料。

sentences.english: The two designs were practically identical.
sentences.chinese: 这两个设计几乎一模一样。

detailed_translations.english: almost

name: inheritance
trans: 遗传； 继承， 继承物； 遗产， 遗赠

sentences.english: Lucinda has to fight for her life and her inheritance in this gripping novel.
sentences.chinese: 在这部扣人心弦的小说里，露辛达不得不为自己的生命与所继承的遗产进行抗争。

detailed_translations.english: money, property etc that you receive from someone who has died

sentences.english: Winning first place must have been quite a thrill.
sentences.chinese: 赢得第一名肯定让人非常激动。

sentences.english: Even though I’ve been acting for years, I still get a thrill out of going on stage.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我演了多年戏，走上舞台我仍然感到十分激动。

sentences.english: It gave Pat a thrill to finally see the group perform live.
sentences.chinese: 帕特终于看到这个乐队现场表演，感到十分激动。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong feeling of excitement and pleasure, or the thing that makes you feel this

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…颤动；使…紧张；使…感到兴奋或激动
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel excited and happy

sentences.english: The treatment may bring short-term benefits to AIDS sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 这种疗法对艾滋病患者可能会有短期效果。

sentences.english: Most of the staff are on short-term contracts.
sentences.chinese: 大部分职员签的都是短期合同。

sentences.english: She’s suffering from short-term memory loss.
sentences.chinese: 她患有短期失忆症。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for only a short time, or relating only to the period that is not very far into the future

name: reptile
trans: 爬行动物， 爬虫类； 卑鄙的人

sentences.english: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.chinese: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

sentences.english: No matter how dry your skin gets, you will never turn into an alligator or any other type of reptile.
sentences.chinese: 不论皮肤多么干燥，你永远不会变成美洲鳄或任何其他一种皮肤粗糙的爬行动物。

sentences.english: This small reptile, which measures just 10 centimeters long, can swim through the sand dunes at up to 15 centimeters per second.
sentences.chinese: 这种身长只有10厘米小型爬行动物，可以在沙子中以最快每秒15厘米的速度游动。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal, such as a snake or  lizard  , whose body temperature changes according to the temperature around it, and that usually lays eggs to have babies

sentences.english: His two albums released on cassette have sold 10 million copies.
sentences.chinese: 他以磁带形式发行的两张专辑已售出1000万份。

detailed_translations.english: a small flat plastic case containing  magnetic tape  , that can be used for playing or recording sound

sentences.english: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们所做的都是我们擅长的事情，我们最终将使自己大吃一惊。

sentences.english: “You astound me!” Mrs. Willoughby said, pressing her clasped hands to her lips, a gesture she normally bestowed upon seniors who were making their final appearance in the spring choral concert.
sentences.chinese: “你真是令我大吃一惊啊！” 威洛比太太说道，双手紧紧的按在嘴唇上——这是她通常在毕业班学生参加春季合唱音乐会上最后献唱时才会做出的姿势。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使惊骇, 使大吃一惊

name: blade
trans: 刀片； 桨叶； 叶片

sentences.english: a razor blade
sentences.chinese: 剃刀刀片

detailed_translations.english: the flat cutting part of a tool or weapon

name: solution
trans: 解答， 解决办法； 溶解， 溶液

sentences.english: The best solution would be for them to separate.
sentences.chinese: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

sentences.english: he solution of glucose in water
sentences.chinese: 葡萄糖在水中的溶解

detailed_translations.english: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation

name: diverge
trans: 分开， 岔开； 分歧， 相异； 偏离， 违背

sentences.english: The two species diverged millions of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这两个物种从数百万年前开始朝不同方向演变。

sentences.english: Global growth rates are diverging markedly.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的增长率在发生明显的分化。

detailed_translations.english: if similar things diverge, they develop in different ways and so are no longer similar

sentences.english: She bowled out her opponent.
sentences.chinese: 她打败了她的对手。

sentences.english: The soldier jabbed at his opponent.
sentences.chinese: 那个战士猛击他的对手。

sentences.english: He avowed himself an opponent of all alliances.
sentences.chinese: 他声称他是所有联盟的反对者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument

name: host
trans: 主人；东道主；主办方；大量，许多

sentences.english: Which country is going to host the next World Cup?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

sentences.english: supplementary information
sentences.chinese: 补充信息

detailed_translations.english: provided in addition to what already exists

sentences.english: measures to accelerate the rate of economic growth
sentences.chinese: 加快经济增长速度的措施

detailed_translations.english: if a process accelerates or if something accelerates it, it happens faster than usual or sooner than you expect

name: regardless
trans: 不顾后果地； 无论如何

sentences.english: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.chinese: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

detailed_translations.english: without being affected or influenced by something

sentences.english: Carrying goods by train costs nearly three times more than carrying them by barge.
sentences.chinese: 通过铁路运货的成本比驳船运货成本高出近3倍。

detailed_translations.english: a large low boat with a flat bottom, used for carrying goods on a canal or river

sentences.english: This is a book about meteorology.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是讲气象的。

sentences.english: It plays an increasingly important part in meteorology for cloud, precipitation, hail and thunderstorm detection as well as the navigation of aircraft and ships.
sentences.chinese: 它在对云层、降水、冰雹和雷暴的气象探测以及在船舰和飞机的导航中，起着日益重要的作用。

sentences.english: All of this depends on certain assumptions and the meteorology, the geology and the hydrology of the area plus the contours of the land around this particular power plant.
sentences.chinese: 所有的这些都是根据某些假设,和气象状态，地质情况，还有，水文请跨国,在加上土地的等高线,在这个特定的核能电站的周围。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of weather conditions

name: illustrate
trans: 说明， 举例说明， 阐明； 给…作插图说明

sentences.english: Let me give an example to illustrate the point.
sentences.chinese: 让我举个例子来说明这一点。

sentences.english: She illustrated her discussion with diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

detailed_translations.english: to make the meaning of something clearer by giving examples

name: specialise
trans: 专门研究， 专攻； 专用于， 使适应特殊目的

sentences.english: 'I never intended to 'specialise' in water balloons,' he added.
sentences.chinese: “我从来都没有打算“专门研究”水球，”他补充道。

sentences.english: 'I never intended to 'specialise' in water balloons,' he added. 'The idea was to create some interesting images and then move on to another subject.
sentences.chinese: “我从来都没有打算“专门研究”水球，”他补充道。“这个主意是为了拍一些有趣的图片然后转移到另外的主题上。”

sentences.english: A third of accidental deaths occur in the home.
sentences.chinese: 有三分之一的意外死亡发生在家里。

sentences.english: The explosion occurred at 5.30 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸发生在清晨5点30分。

detailed_translations.english: to happen

name: notoriety
trans: 声名狼藉， 臭名昭著

sentences.english: He achieved notoriety as chief counsel to President Nixon in the Watergate break-in.
sentences.chinese: 在水门事件中，他作为尼克松总统的首席辩护律师被搞得声名狼藉。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being famous or well-known for something that is bad or that people do not approve of

sentences.english: Water in the engine compartment is sucked away by a hose.
sentences.chinese: 发动机舱里的水由一条软管吸走。

detailed_translations.english: A hose is a pipe made of rubber or plastic, along which a liquid or gas flows, for example from one part of an engine to another
to wash or pour water over something or someone, using a hose

sentences.english: flowers waving in the breeze
sentences.chinese: 在微风中摇曳的花儿

detailed_translations.chinese: 微风；轻而易举的事；煤屑；焦炭渣；小风波
detailed_translations.english: a gentle wind

sentences.english: A postmortem was carried out to establish the cause of death.
sentences.chinese: 进行了尸检以确定死因。

detailed_translations.english: an examination of a dead body to discover why the person died

name: convenient
trans: 方便的， 便利的； 适宜的

sentences.english: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.chinese: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.english: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会打电话给你安排一个方便的时间见面。

sentences.english: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres
sentences.chinese: 靠近商店和剧院的餐厅

detailed_translations.english: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems

sentences.english: A lot can be inferred from these statistics.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些统计资料可以推断出很多事情。

sentences.english: From the evidence, we can infer that the victim knew her killer.
sentences.chinese: 根据证据我们可以推断出受害者认识凶手。

detailed_translations.english: to form an opinion that something is probably true because of information that you have

sentences.english: a heart specialist
sentences.chinese: 心脏专科医生

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, or is very skilled at it

name: troupe
trans: 班子， 团， 队； 马戏团， 芭蕾舞团

sentences.english: ...troupes of travelling actors.
sentences.chinese: …巡回演出的演员剧团。

detailed_translations.english: a group of singers, actors, dancers etc who work together

name: transit
trans: 通过， 经过； 中转

sentences.english: baggage that is lost or damaged in transit
sentences.chinese: 在运输过程中丢失或损坏的行李

sentences.english: transit by air or sea
sentences.chinese: 空运或海运

detailed_translations.english: the process of moving goods or people from one place to another

name: adolescent
trans: 青春期的； 青少年的

sentences.english: It is important that an adolescent boy should have an adult in whom he can confide.
sentences.chinese: 一个青春期男孩应该有一个他能倾吐心声的成年人，这是很重要的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 青春期的； 青少年的
detailed_translations.english: Adolescent is used to describe young people who are no longer children but who have not yet become adults. It also refers to their behaviour.
a young person, usually between the ages of 12 and 18, who is developing into an adult

sentences.english: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
sentences.chinese: 我喉咙疼，四肢酸痛。

sentences.english: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.chinese: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.english: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

detailed_translations.english: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection

name: position
trans: 位置，方位；职位，职务；姿势，姿态；见解，立场

sentences.english: Lie in a comfortable position .
sentences.chinese: 以一个舒服的姿势躺下。

sentences.english: Our hotel was in a superb central position near St Mark’s Square.
sentences.chinese: 我们的酒店处于极佳的中心位置，在圣马克广场附近。

sentences.english: Bruce is thinking of applying for the position.
sentences.chinese: 布鲁斯正在考虑申请那个职位。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone is standing, sitting, or lying

name: curtail
trans: 缩短， 削减； 剥夺

sentences.english: The new law will curtail police powers.
sentences.chinese: 这条新法规将削弱警方的权力。

detailed_translations.english: to reduce or limit something

sentences.english: red velvet curtains
sentences.chinese: 红色的丝绒窗帘

sentences.english: Before the curtain went up, the dancers took their places on stage.
sentences.chinese: 幕拉起之前，舞蹈演员都在舞台上站好了位置。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of hanging cloth that can be pulled across to cover a window, divide a room etc

name: patent
trans: 显而易见的； 有专利的， 受专利保护的

sentences.english: a patent lock
sentences.chinese: 专利锁

sentences.english: He held a number of patents for his many innovations.
sentences.chinese: 他为他的许多革新申请了几项专利。

detailed_translations.english: protected by a patent
A patent is an official right to be the only person or company allowed to make or sell a new product for a certain period of time.

name: abundance
trans: 大量， 丰富， 充足， 充裕

sentences.english: an abundance of wavy red hair
sentences.chinese: 浓密的红色鬈发

sentences.english: One quality the team possessed in abundance was fighting spirit.
sentences.chinese: 该队的一大特点是斗志昂扬。

detailed_translations.english: a large quantity of something

sentences.english: birth/death/marriage certificate (=giving details of someone’s birth, death, or marriage)
sentences.chinese: 出生/死亡/结婚证书

sentences.english: a degree certificate
sentences.chinese: 学位证书

detailed_translations.chinese: 证书，证件，执照；（毕业）文凭，合格证书
detailed_translations.english: an official document that states that a fact or facts are true

name: dispersal
trans: 散布， 分散； 消散， 疏散

sentences.english: the role of birds in the dispersal of seeds
sentences.chinese: 鸟类对传播种子的作用

detailed_translations.english: the process of spreading things over a wide area or in different directions

sentences.english: cervical vertebrae (= the bones in the back of your neck )
sentences.chinese: 颈椎骨

detailed_translations.english: related to the neck

sentences.english: The old machine used to make an awful racket .
sentences.chinese: 这台旧机器以前噪音大得吓人。

detailed_translations.english: a loud noise

sentences.english: What a mess!
sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.english: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.english: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.english: She hates mess.
sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
detailed_translations.english: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty

sentences.english: a meagre diet of bread and beans
sentences.chinese: 不足以果腹的面包和豆子

name: transform
trans: 使改观， 改革， 改善； 变换， 把…转换成

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

name: leadership
trans: 领导， 领导层； 领导能力

sentences.english: The US must now take a firm leadership role.
sentences.chinese: 美国现在必须扮演一个强有力的领导人角色。

sentences.english: the Conservative leadership contest
sentences.chinese: 保守党的领导人角逐

sentences.english: The next leadership election is due in November.
sentences.chinese: 下一届领导人选举将在十一月举行。

detailed_translations.english: the position of being the leader of a group, organization, country etc

name: magnitude
trans: 广大， 巨大； 重要， 重要性； 星体的亮度

sentences.english: an increase of this order of magnitude
sentences.chinese: 如此大幅度的增长

sentences.english: The star varies in brightness by about three magnitudes.
sentences.chinese: 星体的亮度大约分三个星等。

detailed_translations.english: the great size or importance of something

sentences.english: ‘Did he really?’ Her surprise seemed genuine.
sentences.chinese: “他真的这样？”她好像是真的惊讶。

detailed_translations.english: a genuine feeling, desire etc is one that you really feel, not one you pretend to feel

sentences.english: I am not in favour of the Arsenal system.
sentences.chinese: 我并不支持阿森纳的运营方式。

sentences.english: He often pamphleteers and lectures in favour of free trade.
sentences.chinese: 他经常讲演及写小册子支持自由贸易。

sentences.english: So today, we call upon the world leaders to change their strategic policies in favour of peace and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我们呼吁世界各国领袖改变他们的政策方针以支持和平与繁荣。

name: execution
trans: 执行， 实施； 处决

sentences.english: a public execution
sentences.chinese: 当众处死

sentences.english: The two men face execution (= They will be killed as a punishment ).
sentences.chinese: 两名男子面临处决。

sentences.english: Torture and summary execution (= execution without a trial or any legal process ) are common.
sentences.chinese: 严刑拷打和不经审判就地处决相当普遍。

sentences.english: He was granted a stay of execution (= delay in carrying out an execution ).
sentences.chinese: 他被准予缓期处决。

detailed_translations.chinese: 死刑； 实行， 执行， 履行； 演奏， 表演
detailed_translations.english: when someone is killed, especially as a legal punishment

sentences.english: Lose yourself in the play. Be a dinosaur, or a gorilla, or a villain.
sentences.chinese: 放下自己的架子，扮演一只恐龙，或者是大猩猩，甚至是一个坏蛋。

sentences.english: In fact, he found that there was scarcely any information on gorilla cognition at all.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他发现任何有关大猩猩认知的信息都非常稀少。

sentences.english: The most famous albino animal of all was Snowflake the gorilla, who lived at Barcelona Zoo from 1966 until his death from skin cancer in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的白化动物是大猩猩雪花。 自1966年以来，他一直生活在巴塞罗纳动物园，直到2003年死于皮肤癌。

detailed_translations.english: a very large African monkey that is the largest of the  apes

sentences.english: a holiday brochure
sentences.chinese: 度假手册

detailed_translations.english: a thin book giving information or advertising something

name: immune
trans: 免疫的， 有免疫力的； 有抵抗力的； 不受影响的； 免除的， 免除惩罚的， 豁免的

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

name: equation
trans: 方程式， 等式； 平衡； 等同， 相等

sentences.english: When children enter the equation , further tensions may arise within a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 有了孩子以后，婚姻中可能出现新的矛盾。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or situation in which several things must be considered and dealt with

name: impressive
trans: 给人深刻印象的， 令人敬佩的

sentences.english: The figures certainly look impressive.
sentences.chinese: 这些数字看上去确实很可观。

sentences.english: Among the guests was an impressive array of authors and critics.
sentences.chinese: 来宾中有不少出色的作家和评论家。

detailed_translations.english: something that is impressive makes you admire it because it is very good, large, important etc

name: compound
trans: 复合的， 化合的； 综合的
使恶化，加重；使化合，使合成['kɒmpaund]
化合物，复合物；楼群，大院

sentences.english: ...the big compound eyes of dragonflies.
sentences.chinese: …蜻蜓的大复眼。

detailed_translations.english: Compound is used to indicate that something consists of two or more parts or things
a substance containing atoms from two or more  elements

detailed_translations.chinese: 使恶化， 加重； 使化合， 使合成
detailed_translations.english: to make a difficult situation worse by adding more problems

name: discredit
trans: 使怀疑； 使丧失信誉， 使丢脸

sentences.english: However, I believe in questionings, doubtings, searchings, skepticism, and I discredit credulity or blind faith.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我也相信询问、质疑、探索与怀疑，但拒绝轻信或盲从的信仰。

sentences.english: Lily: : But the interviewers don't think so, they discredit the unmarried women above the normal age have mentality defects, although they are turly bright people.
sentences.chinese: 但是面试官却认为年龄这么大了还没结婚也没男朋友，怀疑她们有心理缺陷，尽管她们确实是人才。 。

detailed_translations.english: the loss of other people’s respect or trust

sentences.english: You have the choice of night fishing in the Mediterranean, or windsurfing on a lake in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 你可选择在地中海夜间垂钓，或是在瑞士的湖上玩帆板。

sentences.english: a Mediterranean country
sentences.chinese: 地中海国家

detailed_translations.english: the Mediterranean Sea
relating to the Mediterranean Sea, or typical of the area of southern Europe around it

name: extraordinary
trans: 不同寻常的， 非常的

sentences.english: It took an extraordinary amount of work.
sentences.chinese: 这费了相当多的功夫。

sentences.english: It’s extraordinary that he should make exactly the same mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 真想不到他又犯了完全相同的错误。

sentences.english: The U.S. has called for an extraordinary emergency meeting of the UN Human Rights Commission to examine the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 美国已要求召开一次联合国人权委员特别紧急会议来调查这次危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非同寻常的；特别的（会议）
detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

sentences.english: “What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas, but what happens in California makes the world go round,” says a narrator.
sentences.chinese: 一个解说员说道：“维加斯发生的事就在维加斯，但是加州发生了什么全世界都知道了。”

sentences.english: “I can never look now at the Milky Way”, said the narrator in “The Sentinel”, “without wondering from which of those banked clouds of stars the emissaries are coming.
sentences.chinese: “现在，我再也看不到银河了。” 在《哨兵》中，他借叙述者的口说道，“没错，那层层叠叠的星云中，我们期待的使者正在向这里赶来。

sentences.english: In Benjamin the important thing, as I think we've said, is the idea that the narrator is the apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 本杰明的这个作品，很重要的一点，我觉得我们已经说过了，就是叙述者是机器。

detailed_translations.english: the person who tells the story in a book or a play

name: attraction
trans: 爱慕， 吸引； 吸引力； 具有吸引力的事

sentences.english: Sexual attraction is a large part of falling in love.
sentences.chinese: 堕入爱河很大部分是由于性吸引。

sentences.english: gravitational/magnetic attraction
sentences.chinese: 地心引力；磁力

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of liking sb, especially sexually

name: conventional
trans: 普通的， 习惯的； 常规的， 因循守旧的， 传统的

sentences.english: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.chinese: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.english: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type

sentences.english: sensory stimuli such as music
sentences.chinese: 音乐等的感官刺激

sentences.english: sensory deprivation
sentences.chinese: 感觉丧失

detailed_translations.english: relating to or using your senses of sight, hearing, smell, taste, or touch

sentences.english: I think that is because we unnecessarily complicate it.
sentences.chinese: 我想这是因为我们不必要地将生活复杂化了。

sentences.english: If the answer to all of these questions is no, a framework will only complicate matters.
sentences.chinese: 如果所有这些问题的答案都为否，那么使用框架只会把事情变复杂。

sentences.english: The selection service is one of the more difficult services to implement correctly because it has some valuable features that complicate the implementation.
sentences.chinese: 选择服务是比较难以正确实现的服务之一，因为它具有一些使实现复杂化的有价值的功能。

name: accommodation
trans: 住处， 膳宿； 适应， 调节

sentences.english: The price for the holiday includes flights and accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 度假的价格包括机票和住宿。

sentences.english: living accommodations for the crews
sentences.chinese: 船员的起居舱

sentences.english: travel and hotel accommodations
sentences.chinese: 旅行及酒店住宿

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["rented accommodation"]}
sentences.chinese: 租用的住处

sentences.english: secure accommodation for young offenders
sentences.chinese: 严密看管的少年犯囚室

sentences.english: Universities have to provide student accommodation for first-year students.
sentences.chinese: 大学必须为一年级生提供学生宿舍。

detailed_translations.english: a place for someone to stay, live, or work

sentences.english: She lost the election by a mere 20 votes.
sentences.chinese: 她仅仅以20票之差落选。

sentences.english: a London suburb
sentences.chinese: 一个伦敦郊区

sentences.english: a kid from the suburbs
sentences.chinese: 来自郊区的小孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 郊区， 郊外， 近郊
detailed_translations.english: an area where people live which is away from the centre of a town or city

sentences.english: an attempt to simplify the tax system
sentences.chinese: 简化税制的尝试

sentences.english: The law needs to be simplified.
sentences.chinese: 这部法律需要简化。

sentences.english: a simplified version of the game
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏的简化版

detailed_translations.english: to make something easier or less complicated

sentences.english: He is not doing this to annoy you.
sentences.chinese: 他做这件事并非是要惹你烦恼。

sentences.english: I am convinced that some people complain just to annoy me, for something to do, or they simply enjoy complaining.
sentences.chinese: 我以为身边的人抱怨是为了令我烦恼、是为了解决某些事、又或者他们就是喜欢抱怨。

sentences.english: a tube of glue
sentences.chinese: 一管胶水

sentences.english: The sheets are glued together with strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 薄板用强力胶粘在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a sticky substance used for joining things together
to join two things together using glue

sentences.english: After the first few shots, people started screaming.
sentences.chinese: 几声枪响过后，人们开始尖叫起来。

sentences.english: a screaming baby
sentences.chinese: 尖声哭叫的婴儿

sentences.english: The children were screaming with laughter .
sentences.chinese: 小孩子们在尖声欢笑。

sentences.english: She was screaming her head off (= screaming a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 她不停地尖叫。

sentences.english: She began to scream blue murder (= scream very loudly ) .
sentences.chinese: 她开始高声尖叫。

sentences.english: He was dragged kicking and screaming to a nearby van.
sentences.chinese: 他又踢又叫着被拖到附近的一辆小货车上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尖叫；呼啸；发出尖锐刺耳的声音；令人触目惊心
detailed_translations.english: to make a loud high noise with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 尖叫声；尖锐刺耳的声音；极其滑稽可笑的人
detailed_translations.english: a loud high sound that you make with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc

name: particulate
trans: 粒子状的，微粒的，颗粒的

sentences.chinese: 任何微粒过滤器最终会阻塞，所以当感到呼吸困难时，你必须更换它。

sentences.english: We tell you not only are they teeming with life, but the planets and stars and the space particulate between are themselves all conscious beings.
sentences.chinese: 我们告诉你，不只那些（有形体）上满布着生命体，而且行星、星体和空间微粒之间也满布着有意识的存有。

sentences.english: ...the particulate pollution in our atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: ...我们大气中的颗粒污染。

detailed_translations.english: Particulates are very small particles of a substance, especially those that are produced when fuel is burned

name: cover
trans: 盖，覆盖；包含，包括；走过；适用于；报道，采访；给…上保险，足够支付；用枪掩护
盖子， 套子； 封面； 掩蔽， 掩护

sentences.english: I’d just returned from covering the Cambodian war.
sentences.chinese: 我刚报道完柬埔寨战争回来。

detailed_translations.english: to report the details of an event for a newspaper or a television or radio programme

name: firm
trans: 坚实的， 稳固的， 坚定的

sentences.english: She works for an electronics firm.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家电子公司工作。

detailed_translations.english: a business or company, especially a small one

sentences.english: their ongoing search for a new director
sentences.chinese: 他们仍在寻找一个新主任

sentences.english: ongoing negotiations
sentences.chinese: 还在进行的谈判

sentences.english: The discussions are still ongoing.
sentences.chinese: 讨论仍在继续。

detailed_translations.english: continuing, or continuing to develop

sentences.english: They marched in procession to the Capitol building.
sentences.chinese: 他们列队向国会大厦行进。

detailed_translations.chinese: 队伍，行列；一列，一排；列队行进
detailed_translations.english: a line of people or vehicles moving slowly as part of a ceremony

sentences.english: an ignorant and uneducated man
sentences.chinese: 不学无术的人

detailed_translations.english: not knowing facts or information that you ought to know

name: refinement
trans: 精巧的附件， 精制的改良品； 精炼； 文雅

sentences.english: Her mother is a woman with great refinement.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲是一个非常文雅的女人。

detailed_translations.english: Refinement is politeness and good manners

name: distinguish
trans: 区别， 辨别； 辨认出； 使杰出

sentences.english: The factor that distinguishes this company from the competition is customer service.
sentences.chinese: 使这家公司在竞争中脱颖而出的是其客户服务。

sentences.english: The main distinguishing feature of this species is the leaf shape.
sentences.chinese: 这一品种的主要特征是叶子的形状。

detailed_translations.english: to be the thing that makes someone or something different or special

sentences.english: spray from the waves
sentences.chinese: 海浪溅起的水雾

sentences.english: a new hair styling spray
sentences.chinese: 一种新的定型喷发剂

sentences.english: Most farmers use pesticide sprays.
sentences.chinese: 大多数农民都使用喷雾杀虫剂。

sentences.english: She sprayed herself with perfume.
sentences.chinese: 她往身上喷了香水。

detailed_translations.english: water in very small drops that is blown from the sea etc or sent up by vehicles on a wet road
to force liquid out of a container so that it comes out in a stream of very small drops and covers an area

name: dissatisfied
trans: 不满意的， 不满足的

sentences.english: dissatisfied clients
sentences.chinese: 感到不满意的客户

detailed_translations.chinese: 不满意的， 不满足的
detailed_translations.english: not satisfied because something is not as good as you had expected

sentences.english: They went into town with the intention of visiting the library.
sentences.chinese: 他们进了城，打算参观图书馆。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or desire to do something

sentences.english: a rude remark
sentences.chinese: 粗鲁的话

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to be rude, but I had to leave early.
sentences.chinese: 我并不想显得无礼，但我不得不早走。

detailed_translations.english: speaking or behaving in a way that is not polite and is likely to offend or annoy people

sentences.english: an enthusiastic supporter of reform
sentences.chinese: 改革的热心支持者

detailed_translations.english: feeling or showing a lot of interest and excitement about something

name: symptom
trans: 症状； 征候， 征兆

sentences.english: One of the most common symptoms of schizophrenia is hearing imaginary voices.
sentences.chinese: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。

detailed_translations.english: something wrong with your body or mind which shows that you have a particular illness

sentences.english: Our bodies can sweat, thereby losing heat by evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 我们的身体会流汗，由此能通过蒸发散热。

detailed_translations.english: with the result that something else happens

name: disastrous
trans: 损失惨重的， 灾难性的； 极坏的

sentences.english: a disastrous first marriage
sentences.chinese: 以失败告终的第一次婚姻

sentences.english: The move proved disastrous (= was disastrous ) for the company.
sentences.chinese: 这一行动对公司来说是一场灾难。

detailed_translations.english: very bad, or ending in failure

sentences.english: They were all there except me.
sentences.chinese: 除了我以外他们都在那里。

sentences.english: We all went except him.
sentences.chinese: 除他以外， 我们都去了。

sentences.english: They all howled with laughter except me.
sentences.chinese: 除了我以外，他们全都哈哈大笑起来。

name: impulse
trans: 冲动， 突如其来的念头； 刺激， 驱使； 脉冲

sentences.english: a sudden impulse to laugh
sentences.chinese: 突然想笑的冲动

sentences.english: It is the passions which provide the main impulse of music.
sentences.chinese: 激情是音乐创作的主要动力。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong desire to do something without thinking about whether it is a sensible thing to do

sentences.english: He cosseted her with flowers and champagne.
sentences.chinese: 他用鲜花和香槟向她大献殷勤。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone as much care and attention as you can, especially too much

name: understandable
trans: 可以理解的， 能懂的； 可同情的
