sentences.chinese: 父母生气了想找个人出气，这是可以理解的。

sentences.english: He just can’t face anyone at the moment, which is perfectly understandable.
sentences.chinese: 他现在就是无法面对任何人，这完全可以理解。

sentences.english: an understandable mistake
sentences.chinese: 情有可原的失误

detailed_translations.chinese: 可以理解的；可以了解的
detailed_translations.english: understandable behaviour, reactions etc seem normal and reasonable because of the situation you are in

sentences.english: The liquid will crystallize at 50 degrees centigrade.
sentences.chinese: 这种液体在50摄氏度时结晶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使结晶；明确；使具体化；做成蜜饯
detailed_translations.english: if a liquid crystallizes, it forms  crystals

name: concur
trans: 同时发生； 意见相同， 一致

sentences.english: And so, a lot of people see this as a sort of … or create a scenario, an Orwellian scenario, a Big Brother type scenario but I don't concur.
sentences.chinese: 所以，大多数人会把这个现象视为一种……或者说创作一幕剧情，一幕奥威尔式或是“老大哥”式的剧情，但是我并不同意这样的看法。

detailed_translations.english: to agree with someone or have the same opinion as them

sentences.english: What you said was true. It was, nevertheless, a little unkind.
sentences.chinese: 你说的都是实话，只不过有点刻薄。

sentences.english: Although the market has been flat, residential property costs remain high. Nevertheless, the fall-off in demand has had an impact on resale values.
sentences.chinese: 尽管市场一直疲软，房价持续偏高。然而需求的减少还是对二手房价格产生了影响。

detailed_translations.english: You use nevertheless when saying something that contrasts with what has just been said.
in spite of a fact that you have just mentioned

name: prominent
trans: 突出的； 著名的； 显著的

sentences.english: a prominent Russian scientist
sentences.chinese: 杰出的俄罗斯科学家

sentences.english: The World Cup will have a prominent place on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 世界杯赛将占据议程表的重要位置。

sentences.english: a prominent nose
sentences.chinese: 高鼻子

detailed_translations.english: important

name: insularity
trans: 岛国； 与外界隔绝的生活状况； 褊狭

detailed_translations.chinese: 岛国； 与外界隔绝的生活状况； 褊狭

sentences.english: We have to tackle the fundamental cause of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须解决问题的根本原因。

sentences.english: the fundamental principles of liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 自由和平等这两个基本原则

detailed_translations.english: relating to the most basic and important parts of something

name: global
trans: 全球的， 全世界的； 整体的， 全面的

sentences.english: global climate change
sentences.chinese: 全球气候变化

sentences.english: the global economy
sentences.chinese: 全球经济

detailed_translations.english: affecting or including the whole world

name: vomit
trans: 呕吐， 恶心； 喷出

sentences.english: He had swallowed so much sea water he wanted to vomit.
sentences.chinese: 他呛了这么多海水，所以想吐。

sentences.english: I knew I was really in trouble when I began vomiting blood.
sentences.chinese: 我开始吐血的时候才知道我的麻烦大了。

detailed_translations.english: to bring food or drink up from your stomach out through your mouth, because you are ill
food or other substances that come up from your stomach and through your mouth when you vomit

name: entitle
trans: 给…权利； 给题名； 给…以称号

sentences.english: They understood that our power alone cannot protect us, nor does it entitle us to do as we please.
sentences.chinese: 他们懂得单凭实力无法保护我们的安全，实力也并不赋予我们随心所欲的权利。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone the official right to do or have something

sentences.english: a research proposal outline
sentences.chinese: 研究计划梗概

detailed_translations.english: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details
to describe something in a general way, giving the main points but not the details

name: fade
trans: 变淡， 变暗； 褪色； 凋谢； 逐渐消失

sentences.english: the fading evening light
sentences.chinese: 渐暗的暮色

sentences.english: a pair of faded jeans
sentences.chinese: 一条褪了色的牛仔裤

sentences.english: The sun had faded the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 太阳把窗帘晒得褪了色。

detailed_translations.english: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this

name: overdue
trans: 过期未付的； 逾期的； 过度的， 过火的； 迟到的， 延误的

sentences.english: an overdue gas bill
sentences.chinese: 逾期未付的煤气账单

sentences.english: The library books are overdue.
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书过期未还。

sentences.english: The baby was a week overdue (= it was expected to be born a week ago ).
sentences.chinese: 宝宝超过预产期有一周了。

detailed_translations.english: not done, paid, returned etc by the time expected

name: nominal
trans: 名义上的； 微不足道的

sentences.english: the nominal head of the rebellion
sentences.chinese: 这次叛乱名义上的领导人

sentences.english: Their conversion to Christianity was only nominal.
sentences.chinese: 他们只是名义上皈依了基督教。

detailed_translations.chinese: 名义上的， 有名无实的； 很少的， 象征性的； 名词性的
detailed_translations.english: officially described as being something, when this is not really true

sentences.english: The government was unable to curb the excesses of the secret police.
sentences.chinese: 政府无法约束秘密警察的过分行为。

sentences.english: the worst excesses of journalism
sentences.chinese: 新闻工作中那些最糟糕的越轨行为

detailed_translations.english: harmful actions that are socially or morally unacceptable

name: retaliate
trans: 报复， 反击； 复仇

sentences.english: I was sorely tempted to retaliate.
sentences.chinese: 我非常想报复。

detailed_translations.english: to do something bad to someone because they have done something bad to you

name: perspective
trans: 角度， 方法； 透视法

sentences.english: the artist’s use of perspective
sentences.chinese: 那位画家对透视法的运用

sentences.english: a perspective of the whole valley
sentences.chinese: 山谷全景

sentences.english: His father’s death gave him a whole new perspective on life.
sentences.chinese: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a method of drawing a picture that makes objects look solid and shows distance and depth, or the effect this method produces in a picture

name: galaxy
trans: [the G-] 银河； 星系； 群英

sentences.english: Astronomers have discovered a distant galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家们发现了一个遥远的星系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 银河；[天] 星系；银河系；一群显赫的人
detailed_translations.english: one of the large groups of stars that make up the universe

sentences.english: There were no secretaries available to take dictation (= write down what someone is saying ).
sentences.chinese: 身边没有秘书记录口授内容。

sentences.english: I hate doing French dictations.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌做法语听写。

detailed_translations.english: when you say words for someone to write down

name: honour
trans: 向…示敬意； 信守， 执行

sentences.english: He was showered with honours – among them an Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 他获得了很多荣誉–其中包括奥斯卡奖。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

detailed_translations.chinese: 尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据
detailed_translations.english: to treat someone with special respect

name: invade
trans: 侵犯， 侵入， 侵略， 侵袭

sentences.english: The Romans invaded Britain 2,000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 2,000年前古罗马人入侵了英国。

detailed_translations.english: to enter a country, town, or area using military force, in order to take control of it

name: evolve
trans: 逐渐形成； 演变， 进化

sentences.english: The school has evolved its own style of teaching.
sentences.chinese: 学校逐步形成了自己的教学风格。

sentences.english: Businesses need to evolve rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 各项业务需要快速发展。

detailed_translations.english: to develop and change gradually over a long period of time

sentences.english: How could she abandon her own child?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么能抛弃自己的孩子呢？

detailed_translations.chinese: 离弃， 丢弃； 遗弃； 抛弃； 放弃
detailed_translations.english: to leave someone, especially someone you are responsible for

name: household
trans: 家庭的， 家用的， 普通的； 家喻户晓的

sentences.english: household chores
sentences.chinese: 家务杂活

sentences.english: ...growing up in a male-only household.
sentences.chinese: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 家庭的， 家喻户晓的
detailed_translations.english: relating to looking after a house and the people in it
A household is all the people in a family or group who live together in a house

name: extol
trans: 赞颂， 赞美， 颂扬

sentences.english: Now experts are extolling the virtues of the humble potato.
sentences.chinese: 现在专家们在颂扬粗陋的马铃薯的种种好处。

detailed_translations.english: to praise something very much

sentences.english: They fear it could have an adverse effect on global financial markets.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心这会对全球金融市场产生不利影响。

sentences.english: Miller’s campaign has received a good deal of adverse publicity .
sentences.chinese: 米勒的竞选活动招来许多负面报道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不利的；相反的；敌对的（名词adverseness，副词adversely）
detailed_translations.english: not good or favourable

name: bulletin
trans: 新闻简报； 公告； 学报； 期刊

sentences.english: At 3:30 p.m. a bulletin was released announcing that the president was out of immediate danger.
sentences.chinese: 下午3:30发布了公告，宣布总统暂时脱离了危险。

detailed_translations.english: an official statement that tells people about something important

sentences.english: Yeah, , now you know how the sex ratio matters!
sentences.chinese: 是的，现在你知道性别比例的问题了吧！ ！

sentences.english: The ratio could reach one in four within a year.
sentences.chinese: 一年之内这个比例可以达到四分之一。

sentences.english: When using profiling it is typical to consider only the ratio (or percentage) of time spent in certain areas.
sentences.chinese: 当使用分析时，它是典型的考虑时间花费在某些领域的比例（或百分比）。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship between two amounts, represented by a pair of numbers showing how much bigger one amount is than the other

name: repack
trans: 重新包装； 重新填塞； 再装配； 拆修

detailed_translations.chinese: 重新包装； 重新填塞； 再装配； 拆修

name: junction
trans: 连接； 联结点； 交叉路口

sentences.english: the junction of Abbot Road and Mill Street
sentences.chinese: 阿伯特路与米尔街的交叉口

sentences.english: Junction 5 on the M40
sentences.chinese: 40号高速公路上的第5交叉口

detailed_translations.english: a place where one road, track etc joins another

sentences.english: James took his habitual morning walk around the garden.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯又像往常习惯的那样绕花园作晨间散步去了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 习惯的；惯常的；习以为常的
detailed_translations.english: doing something from habit, and unable to stop doing it

name: instinct
trans: 本能， 直觉； 天性

sentences.english: Her instinct told her that something was wrong.
sentences.chinese: 直觉告诉她有些不对劲。

detailed_translations.chinese: 本能； 直觉， 生性
detailed_translations.english: a natural tendency to behave in a particular way or a natural ability to know something, which is not learned

sentences.english: The cannons boom, the band plays.
sentences.chinese: 炮声隆隆，鼓乐齐鸣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大炮；加农炮；榴弹炮；机关炮
detailed_translations.english: a large heavy powerful gun that was used in the past to fire heavy metal balls

sentences.english: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion that people have about someone or something because of what has happened in the past

sentences.english: I just shrugged my shoulders and ignored him.
sentences.chinese: 我只是耸耸肩，没有理睬他。

sentences.english: ‘Suit yourself,’ he said with a shrug.
sentences.chinese: “随你的便。”他耸耸肩说道。

detailed_translations.english: to raise and then lower your shoulders in order to show that you do not know something or do not care about something
a movement of your shoulders upwards and then downwards again that you make to show that you do not know something or do not care about something

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

sentences.english: Her illness was caused mainly by stress.
sentences.chinese: 她的病主要是由精神压力引起的。

sentences.english: The workforce is mainly made up of women.
sentences.chinese: 员工主要是女性。

sentences.english: I don’t go out much, mainly because I have to look after the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我不大出去，主要是因为我得照看孩子们。

sentences.english: Increased sales during the summer were mainly due to tourism.
sentences.chinese: 夏季销售额增加主要是由旅游业带动的。

sentences.english: We talked about various things – work, mainly.
sentences.chinese: 我们谈了各种各样的事情——主要是谈工作。

detailed_translations.english: used to mention the main part or cause of something, the main reason for something etc

sentences.english: ...flowering shrubs.
sentences.chinese: …开花的灌木。

detailed_translations.english: a small bush with several woody stems

name: presentation
trans: 赠送； 赠品， 礼物； 授予， 提供； 显示； 引荐， 介绍； 报告； 表演， 上演

sentences.english: the presentation ceremony
sentences.chinese: 颁奖仪式

sentences.english: Dr Evans thanked him for coming to make the presentations .
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯博士感谢他来颁奖。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提供， 显示； 外观， 图像； 授予， 赠送； 报告， 介绍； 表演
detailed_translations.english: the act of giving someone a prize or present at a formal ceremony

name: subliminal
trans: 下意识的， 潜意识的

sentences.english: a subliminal message
sentences.chinese: 潜在的含义

detailed_translations.chinese: [生理] 阈下的；潜在意识的；微小得难以察觉的
detailed_translations.english: affecting your mind in a way that you are not conscious of

sentences.english: Your wedding ring can be engraved with a personal inscription at no extra cost.
sentences.chinese: 你的结婚戒指可以刻上个人题字不另收费。

sentences.english: The shop will also engrave your child's name on the side.
sentences.chinese: 商店也将在一侧刻上你孩子的名字。

sentences.english: ...a bottle engraved with her name.
sentences.chinese: …一个刻有她名字的瓶子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 雕刻；  铭记， 深印于 ， 铭刻
detailed_translations.english: If you engrave something with a design or words, or if you engrave a design or words on it, you cut the design or words into its surface

name: exhaustive
trans: 包揽无遗的， 彻底的， 详尽的

sentences.english: an exhaustive investigation
sentences.chinese: 彻底的调查

sentences.english: The list is by no means exhaustive.
sentences.chinese: 清单一点也不详尽。

detailed_translations.english: extremely thorough and complete

sentences.english: I had to restrain her from running out into the street.
sentences.chinese: 我只得阻止她跑到街上去。

sentences.english: Price rises should restrain consumer spending.
sentences.chinese: 价格上涨会抑制消费支出。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from doing something, often by using physical force

name: monumental
trans: 纪念碑的， 纪念物的； 不朽的， 有重大意义的

sentences.english: a monumental arch
sentences.chinese: 纪念拱门

detailed_translations.chinese: 不朽的；纪念碑的；非常的
detailed_translations.english: relating to a monument or built as a monument

sentences.english: The police need to be briefed beforehand on how to deal with this sort of situation.
sentences.chinese: 需要事先告诉警察这种情况怎样处理。

sentences.english: When you give a speech, it’s natural to feel nervous beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 你在演讲之前感到紧张是很自然的。

detailed_translations.english: before something else happens or is done

name: celebrate
trans: 赞扬， 歌颂； 庆祝

sentences.english: It’s Dad’s birthday and we’re going out for a meal to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今天是爸爸的生日，我们打算出去吃饭庆祝一下。

sentences.english: My folks are celebrating their 50th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我父母正在庆祝他们结婚50周年。

sentences.english: poems that celebrate the joys of love
sentences.chinese: 赞美爱之喜悦的诗歌

detailed_translations.english: to show that an event or occasion is important by doing something special or enjoyable

sentences.english: Katie almost spilled her milk.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂差点把牛奶洒出来。

detailed_translations.english: if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container
if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container

name: collection
trans: 收集， 积聚； 收藏

sentences.english: a stamp collection
sentences.chinese: 一批邮票收藏品

sentences.english: a computerized data collection system
sentences.chinese: 计算机化的数据收集系统

detailed_translations.english: a group of objects, often of the same sort, that have been collected

sentences.english: the mountainous coast of Wales
sentences.chinese: 威尔士多山的海岸

sentences.english: mountainous waves
sentences.chinese: 如山的巨浪

detailed_translations.english: having many mountains

sentences.english: a research laboratory
sentences.chinese: 研究实验室

sentences.english: tests on laboratory animals
sentences.chinese: 在实验室动物身上做的试验

detailed_translations.english: a special room or building in which a scientist does tests or prepares substances

sentences.english: a geometric design
sentences.chinese: 几何图形设计

detailed_translations.chinese: 几何学的；[数] 几何学图形的
detailed_translations.english: having or using the shapes and lines in  geometry  , such as circles or squares, especially when these are arranged in regular patterns

sentences.english: I got out of the car to inspect the damage.
sentences.chinese: 我下车查看损坏情况。

sentences.english: Police inspected the scene and interviewed all the staff.
sentences.chinese: 警察仔细检查了现场并询问了所有员工。

sentences.english: General Allenby arrived to inspect the troops.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦比将军前来检阅部队。

detailed_translations.english: to examine something carefully in order to find out more about it or to find out what is wrong with it

sentences.english: Jones ran a good campaign.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯的活动搞得很成功。

sentences.english: Police have launched a campaign to crack down on drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 警方发起了一场严厉打击毒贩的运动。

detailed_translations.english: a series of actions intended to achieve a particular result relating to politics or business, or a social improvement

name: vital
trans: 生死攸关的； 极其重要的； 有生命力的

sentences.english: The work she does is absolutely vital.
sentences.chinese: 她所做的工作至关重要。

sentences.english: It is vital to be honest with your children.
sentences.chinese: 对自己的孩子坦诚十分重要。

sentences.english: The tourist industry is of vital importance to the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 旅游业对国家的经济至关重要。

sentences.english: Richardson played a vital role in the team’s success.
sentences.chinese: 理查森对球队的成功起了极重要的作用。

sentences.english: The samples could give scientists vital information about long-term changes in the earth’s atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 这些样本可以给科学家提供关于地球大气长期变化的极其重要的资料。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary for something to succeed or exist

sentences.english: American manufacturing organizations have been downsizing their factories.
sentences.chinese: 美国制造商们一直在缩小他们工厂的规模。

sentences.english: ...today's downsized economy.
sentences.chinese: … 今天萎缩了的经济。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩小尺寸； 缩小规模
detailed_translations.english: To downsize something such as a business or industry means to make it smaller

sentences.english: the threat of industrial conflict in the coalfields
sentences.chinese: 煤田发生劳资纠纷的风险

sentences.english: Marx points out the potential conflicts below the surface of society.
sentences.chinese: 马克思指出了隐藏在社会表层之下的潜在矛盾。

sentences.english: His views on the literal truth of the Bible brought him into conflict with other Christian leaders.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持《圣经》字面真理的观点使他与其他的基督教领袖发生了冲突。

sentences.english: Doctors exercise considerable power and often come into conflict with politicians.
sentences.chinese: 医生行使很大的权力，常常和政客们发生冲突。

sentences.english: a lawyer specializing in conflict resolution
sentences.chinese: 专门解决纠纷的律师

detailed_translations.english: a state of disagreement or argument between people, groups, countries etc

sentences.english: The dispute culminated last week in a lawsuit against the government.
sentences.chinese: 这场针对政府诉讼案的争论在上星期达到了高潮。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or organization brings to a court of law to be settled

name: detect
trans: 发现， 察觉； 侦查， 探测

sentences.english: Many forms of cancer can be cured if detected early.
sentences.chinese: 如果发现得早，许多种癌症都可以治愈。

sentences.english: ...a sensitive piece of equipment used to detect radiation.
sentences.chinese: …一台探测辐射的敏感仪器。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or discover something, especially something that is not easy to see, hear etc

sentences.english: a gifted amateur
sentences.chinese: 有天赋的业余爱好者

sentences.english: Mickelson won his first major golf tournament while still an amateur.
sentences.chinese: 米克尔森还是业余选手时就赢得了他第一个高尔夫球锦标赛大奖。

sentences.english: ...professional athletes and amateur runners.
sentences.chinese: …专业运动员和业余赛跑运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 爱好者；业余爱好者；外行
detailed_translations.english: someone who does an activity just for pleasure, not as their job
Amateur sports or activities are done by people as a hobby and not as a job

name: condemn
trans: 声讨， 极力谴责； 给…判刑

sentences.english: Politicians were quick to condemn the bombing.
sentences.chinese: 政治家们立即对爆炸事件进行了谴责。

sentences.english: He was found guilty and condemned to death.
sentences.chinese: 他被裁定有罪，判了死刑。

detailed_translations.english: to say very strongly that you do not approve of something or someone, especially because you think it is morally wrong

name: commerce
trans: 贸易， 商业； 交往， 交流

sentences.english: measures promoting local commerce and industry
sentences.chinese: 促进地方工商业发展的措施

detailed_translations.english: the buying and selling of goods and services

sentences.english: We offer financial assistance to students.
sentences.chinese: 我们向学生提供经济援助。

sentences.english: Can I be of any assistance (=  can I help you  ) ?
sentences.chinese: 我能帮什么忙吗？

detailed_translations.english: help or support

sentences.english: Kitchell says the city was a microcosm of all American culture during the '60s.
sentences.chinese: 基切尔说这个城市曾经是60年代所有美国文化的一个缩影。

detailed_translations.english: a small group, society, or place that has the same qualities as a much larger one

name: definition
trans: 定义， 释义； 清晰

sentences.english: a dictionary definition
sentences.chinese: 词典里的释义

detailed_translations.english: a phrase or sentence that says exactly what a word, phrase, or idea means

sentences.english: In Britain, a lexicographer (dictionary author) named Samuel Johnson, who lived in the 18th century, coined the word “gray” and supported its use.
sentences.chinese: 十八世纪的英国有一个叫塞缪尔.约翰逊的词典编撰人（词典作者）。 他杜撰了“gray”这个单词，并提倡使用。

sentences.english: The lexicographer told the New York Times that "It's easy to stack the deck by finding a definition that does or does not highlight a nuance that you're interested in.
sentences.chinese: 这位词典编纂者告诉《纽约时报》说，“事先找好对一方有利的定义以便突出或抹去词与词间的细微差别，这样造假其实很容易。”

sentences.english: "It has both currency and potential  longevity," said Christine Lindberg, senior  lexicographer for Oxford's US dictionary program, in a statement.
sentences.chinese: 牛津美语辞典项目的高级词典编纂人克里斯汀•琳德伯格在一份声明中说：“这个词既符合当下的潮流，也有一定的潜在寿命。”

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: a beautiful country mansion
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的乡村宅第

detailed_translations.english: a very large house

sentences.english: He hadn’t shaved for days.
sentences.chinese: 他已经好几天没刮脸了。

sentences.english: Brian had cut himself shaving .
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩刮胡子时割破了脸。

detailed_translations.english: to cut off hair very close to the skin, especially from the face, using a  razor

sentences.english: A brief summary is given on a separate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 摘要另写一页。

sentences.english: It says torture and summary execution are common.
sentences.chinese: 据说酷刑和草草处决很常见。

detailed_translations.english: a short statement that gives the main information about something, without giving all the details
a summary report, statement etc gives the main facts in a report etc without any of the details or explanations

sentences.english: a nickel alloy
sentences.chinese: 镍合金

sentences.english: ...a large glass jar filled with pennies, nickels, dimes, and quarters.
sentences.chinese: …一个装满1分、5分、10分和25分硬币的大玻璃罐。

detailed_translations.english: a hard silver-white metal that is often combined with other metals, for example to make steel. It is a chemical element: symbol Ni

sentences.english: She tried to accustom herself to the tight bandages.
sentences.chinese: 她尝试着使自己习惯那些紧绷的绷带。

detailed_translations.english: to make yourself or another person become used to a situation or place

sentences.english: A new computer system entails a lot of re-training.
sentences.chinese: 使用新的计算机系统需要大量的再培训。

sentences.english: Some foreign travel is entailed in the job.
sentences.chinese: 做这份工作有时要到国外出差。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使需要，必需；承担；遗传给；蕴含
detailed_translations.english: to involve something as a necessary part or result

name: inferior
trans: 较差的， 次的， 低劣的； 级别低的， 较低的
下级； 下属， 晚辈

sentences.english: I felt very inferior among all those academics.
sentences.chinese: 与那些大学教师在一起，我自惭形秽。

sentences.english: wine of inferior quality
sentences.chinese: 劣质葡萄酒

sentences.english: inferior goods
sentences.chinese: 质量低劣的商品

detailed_translations.english: not good, or not as good as someone or something else
someone who has a lower position or rank than you in an organization

name: dramatic
trans: 引人注目的； 戏剧性的； 激动人心的； 戏剧的

sentences.english: A superb goal by Owen earned United a dramatic victory yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天欧文的一个超级入球为联队赢得了激动人心的胜利。

sentences.english: Some of the most dramatic events in American history happened here.
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上一些最震撼人心的事件发生在这里。

sentences.english: the dramatic scenery of the Grand Canyon
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷的壮丽景致

detailed_translations.chinese: 引人注目的， 激动人心的； 戏剧的
detailed_translations.english: exciting or impressive

sentences.english: The two leaders also approved treaties to cut stockpiles of chemical weapons.
sentences.chinese: 两位领导人也都赞同削减化学武器储备的条约。

detailed_translations.english: a large supply of things that is kept ready for use in the future
to keep adding to a supply of goods, weapons etc that you are keeping ready to use if you need them in the future

name: spine
trans: 脊椎， 脊柱； 刺， 刺毛； 书脊； 〈喻〉中心

sentences.english: cactus spines
sentences.chinese: 仙人掌的刺

detailed_translations.chinese: 脊柱， 脊椎； 刺， 刺毛； 书脊
detailed_translations.english: the row of bones down the centre of your back that supports your body and protects your  spinal cord

sentences.english: Acidic water will corrode the pipes.
sentences.chinese: 酸性水会腐蚀管子。

detailed_translations.english: if metal corrodes, or if something corrodes it, it is slowly destroyed by the effect of water, chemicals etc

sentences.english: The male mosquito never stings.
sentences.chinese: 雄蚊不叮。

sentences.english: Are your mosquito bites still itching?
sentences.chinese: 你被蚊子咬的地方还痒吗?

sentences.english: The frog darted out its tongue to catch a mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 这只青蛙突然伸出舌头捕捉蚊子。

detailed_translations.english: a small flying insect that sucks the blood of people and animals, sometimes spreading the disease  malaria

name: artificial
trans: 人工的， 人造的； 假的， 矫揉造作的； 模拟的

sentences.english: artificial flowers
sentences.chinese: 假花

sentences.english: artificial light
sentences.chinese: 人造光

sentences.english: artificial fertilizers
sentences.chinese: 化肥

detailed_translations.english: not real or not made of natural things but made to be like something that is real or natural

sentences.english: They did blood tests on him for signs of vitamin deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 他们给他做了血检看是否有缺乏维生素的迹象。

sentences.english: There are deep deficiencies in this law.
sentences.chinese: 这条法律存在严重的缺陷。

detailed_translations.english: a lack of something that is necessary

name: removal
trans: 除去； 免职； 搬迁

sentences.english: the removal of rubbish
sentences.chinese: 移除垃圾

sentences.english: stain removal
sentences.chinese: 去污

detailed_translations.english: when something is taken away from, out of, or off the place where it is

sentences.english: You don't need a humanistic education in order to become a herdsman.
sentences.chinese: 要成为一个牧人，你不需要接受人文主义的教育。

sentences.english: It became a bestseller in Iraq, and was even adapted into a musical, despite one alarming and improbable scene in which a female bear "copulates" with a herdsman.
sentences.chinese: 它在伊拉克成了畅销书，甚至被改编成了音乐剧，尽管其中有一幕令人惊恐且匪夷所思——其中有一个牧人和一头母熊的人兽交。

sentences.english: A herd of horses is what the herdsman wants to have.
sentences.chinese: 这个牧人想拥有的是一群马。

detailed_translations.english: a man who looks after a herd of animals

sentences.english: Have you any comment to make about the cause of the disaster?
sentences.chinese: 你对发生灾难的原因有何评论？

sentences.english: The results are a clear comment on government education policy.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果是对政府教育政策明显的批评。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that you express about someone or something

name: transcend
trans: 超越， 胜过， 优于

sentences.english: The desire for peace transcended political differences.
sentences.chinese: 对和平的渴望超越了政治分歧。

detailed_translations.english: to go beyond the usual limits of something

name: humanistic
trans: 人文主义的， 人性的

sentences.english: Religious values can often differ greatly from humanistic morals.
sentences.chinese: 宗教价值观常常和人文主义道德观相去甚远。

detailed_translations.english: A humanistic idea, condition, or practice relates to humanism

sentences.english: The factory employs over 2,000 people.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂雇用了2,000多名员工。

sentences.english: The report examines teaching methods employed in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 这个报告探讨了课堂教学方法。

sentences.english: Her days are employed in gardening and voluntary work.
sentences.chinese: 她的时间都花在搞园艺和做义工上。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone to work for you

sentences.english: a comparatively small number of people
sentences.chinese: 相对较少的人数

sentences.english: Comparatively few books have been written on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 有关这方面的书相对较少。

sentences.english: Crime on the island is comparatively rare .
sentences.chinese: 这个岛上犯罪活动相对较少。

sentences.english: Comparatively speaking, this part of the coast is still unspoiled.
sentences.chinese: 相对而言，这一段海岸尚未遭到破坏。

detailed_translations.english: as compared to something else or to a previous state

name: conditioner
trans: 护发素， 护发剂； 调节物； 调节器， 调节装置

name: desirable
trans: 值得拥有的； 合意的； 可取的， 有利的

sentences.english: The ability to speak a foreign language is highly desirable .
sentences.chinese: 能说一门外语是非常理想的。

sentences.english: a desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 理想的社区

sentences.english: It is desirable that you should have some familiarity with computers.
sentences.chinese: 应该对电脑有所熟悉，这是很有益处的。

sentences.english: It is desirable to keep the cost as low as possible.
sentences.chinese: 把成本控制得越低越好。

detailed_translations.english: something that is desirable is worth having or doing

sentences.english: a fair maiden
sentences.chinese: 美丽的少女

detailed_translations.english: pleasant and attractive

sentences.english: Has your flat got a balcony?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓有阳台吗？

detailed_translations.english: a structure that you can stand on, that is attached to the outside wall of a building, above ground level

name: preparation
trans: 准备， 预备； 制剂

sentences.english: This dish is good for dinner parties because much of the preparation can be done ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 这道菜适合宴会，因为很多准备工作可以事先做好。

sentences.english: Plans for the new school are now in preparation .
sentences.chinese: 新学校的设计图正在绘制中。

sentences.english: a course in food service and food preparation
sentences.chinese: 餐饮服务和备菜课程

detailed_translations.english: the process of preparing something or preparing for something

name: consist
trans: 由…组成， 由…构成； 在于， 存在于

sentences.english: My diet consisted almost exclusively of chocolate-covered cookies and glasses of milk.
sentences.chinese: 我的饮食几乎只包含裹上巧克力的曲奇饼和一杯杯牛奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

sentences.english: The new software is IBM compatible (= can be used with IBM computers ) .
sentences.chinese: 这个新软件与IBM的计算机兼容。

detailed_translations.english: if two pieces of computer equipment are compatible, they can be used together, especially when they are made by different companies

name: critic
trans: 批评家； 爱挑剔的人

sentences.english: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.chinese: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make judgments about the good and bad qualities of art, music, films etc

name: enable
trans: 使能够， 使成为可能

sentences.english: The new test should enable doctors to detect the disease early.
sentences.chinese: 新的检验使医生能在早期发现该种疾病。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something enables you to do a particular thing, they give you the opportunity to do it

sentences.english: They have received notice of a typhoon approaching.
sentences.chinese: 他们已收到台风即将来临的预报。

sentences.english: We both are under stress and standing in the middle of a typhoon .
sentences.chinese: 你我都处在很紧张的环境中，站在台风的中心。

sentences.english: The football match have to stand over next week for the typhoon storm.
sentences.chinese: 由于台风风暴，这场足球赛延期到下个星期举行。

detailed_translations.english: a very violent tropical storm

name: profession
trans: 行业， 职业； 宣称， 表白

sentences.english: people who work in the professions
sentences.chinese: 从事专业性工作的人

sentences.english: nurses, social workers, and other people in the caring professions
sentences.chinese: 护士、社工和其他从事护理行业的人

detailed_translations.english: a job that needs a high level of education and training

sentences.english: Light silk is best for parachutes, as it compresses well and then expands rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 轻质丝绸最适合制作降落伞，因为这种面料便于压缩，而且展开迅速。

sentences.english: Isobel nodded, her lips compressed.
sentences.chinese: 伊索贝尔紧闭着双唇点了点头。

sentences.english: The miners used rock drills and compressed air to drive through hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 矿工使用钻岩机和压缩空气来凿穿坚硬的岩石。

detailed_translations.english: to press something or make it smaller so that it takes up less space, or to become smaller
a small thick piece of material that you put on part of someone’s body to stop blood flowing out or to make it less painful

sentences.english: We stopped off briefly in London.
sentences.chinese: 我们在伦敦短暂停留。

detailed_translations.english: for a short time

name: imagination
trans: 想象； 想象出来的事物

sentences.english: a storyteller with an incredible imagination
sentences.chinese: 想象力极丰富的讲故事者

sentences.english: It does not take much imagination to understand their grief.
sentences.chinese: 不难想象他们是多么悲伤。

sentences.english: With a little imagination, you can find great inexpensive gifts.
sentences.chinese: 稍微动点脑筋，你就会找到物美价廉的礼物。

sentences.english: These people do exist; they’re not figments of my imagination.
sentences.chinese: 这些人确实存在，他们不是我凭空想象出来的。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to form pictures or ideas in your mind

name: resistance
trans: 反抗， 抵制； 抵抗力， 抵抗性； 阻力； 电阻

sentences.english: Rebel gunmen have put up strong resistance.
sentences.chinese: 持枪的叛乱分子负隅顽抗。

sentences.english: disease resistance
sentences.chinese: 抗病能力

detailed_translations.english: fighting against someone who is attacking you

sentences.english: an eminent lawyer
sentences.chinese: 杰出的律师

detailed_translations.english: an eminent person is famous, important, and respected

sentences.english: He got out of the car and looked underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他下车往底下看了看。

sentences.english: It’s near where the railway goes underneath the road.
sentences.chinese: 它靠近铁路从公路下方穿过的地方。

sentences.english: She was wearing a smart jacket with a T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了件时髦的夹克，里面是一件 T 恤衫。

sentences.english: Her blonde hair was hidden underneath a baseball cap.
sentences.chinese: 一顶棒球帽裹住了她的满头金发。

sentences.english: He has on his jeans and a long-sleeved blue denim shirt with a white T-shirt underneath.
sentences.chinese: 他身穿牛仔裤和一件蓝色长袖粗斜纹棉布衬衫，里面还有件白色T恤衫。

sentences.chinese: 射击场被一排排宝石红照明装置从下面照亮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…的下面；在…的形式下；在…的支配下
detailed_translations.english: directly under another object or covered by it
Underneath is also an adverb
the bottom surface of something, or the part of something that is below or under something else

name: enjoyable
trans: 令人愉快的， 使人快乐的

sentences.english: Games can make learning more enjoyable.
sentences.chinese: 游戏可以寓教于乐。

sentences.english: an enjoyable experience
sentences.chinese: 令人愉快的经历

detailed_translations.chinese: 快乐的；有乐趣的；令人愉快的
detailed_translations.english: something enjoyable gives you pleasure

sentences.english: She puts her baby in this nursery and then goes back to work.
sentences.chinese: 她把孩子送到这家托儿所然后回去上班。

sentences.chinese: 这个有35年历史的花园里有一个苗圃。

detailed_translations.english: a place where young children are taken care of during the day while their parents are at work

sentences.english: A modification of the common-origin theory accounts for the density discrepancy .
sentences.chinese: 关于共同起源的理论，有一种改进的论点解释了密度的不符。

detailed_translations.english: a difference between two amounts, details, reports etc that should be the same

name: spectrum
trans: 谱， 光谱， 频谱； 范围， 幅度

sentences.english: The two articles here represent opposite ends of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 这里的两篇文章代表了两个极端的观点。

sentences.english: the electromagnetic spectrum
sentences.chinese: 电磁（波）谱

detailed_translations.english: a complete range of opinions, people, situations etc, going from one extreme to its opposite

sentences.english: They  bowed before the emperor as he entered the court.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝进入朝廷时他们都向他鞠躬致敬。

sentences.english: The daughter of an emperor does not worry about finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝女儿不愁嫁。

sentences.english: The old chancellor who had offended against the emperor was relegated to the distant boundaries of the country.
sentences.chinese: 触犯了皇帝的老宰相被流放到遥远的边疆。

detailed_translations.english: the man who is the ruler of an empire

name: antiquated
trans: 陈旧的， 过时的； 废弃的

sentences.english: antiquated laws
sentences.chinese: 过时的法律

detailed_translations.english: old-fashioned and not suitable for modern needs or conditions – used to show disapproval

detailed_translations.chinese: 使古旧；废弃（antiquate的过去分词）

sentences.english: This paper outlines in detail the characteristics and directions of use of SHANGHAI brand type GP3100black-and-white photographic roll film.
sentences.chinese: 本文详细介绍了上海感光材料厂生产的新一代的上海牌GP3100型黑白照相胶卷的性能特点和使用方法。

sentences.english: They refused to give me a refund .
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝给我退款。

sentences.english: Return your purchase within 14 days for a full refund .
sentences.chinese: 14 天之内退货可以全额退款。

sentences.english: You should go down there and demand a refund.
sentences.chinese: 你应该到那里去，要求退款。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is given back to you if you are not satisfied with the goods or services that you have paid for
to give someone their money back, especially because they are not satisfied with the goods or services they have paid for

name: diesel
trans: 柴油； 柴油机； 柴油车

sentences.english: a 1.9 litre diesel engine
sentences.chinese: 1.9升柴油发动机

detailed_translations.chinese: 柴油机；柴油；（俚）健康的身体
detailed_translations.english: a type of heavy oil used instead of petrol in engines, especially in trucks, buses, and trains

detailed_translations.chinese: 内燃机传动的；供内燃机用的

name: steep
trans: 陡峭的； 过高的； 急剧的

sentences.english: The road became rocky and steep.
sentences.chinese: 路变得崎岖陡峭起来。

sentences.english: a steep climb to the top
sentences.chinese: 到山顶的一段陡坡

sentences.english: steep cuts in benefits
sentences.chinese: 救济金的大幅度削减

detailed_translations.english: a road, hill etc that is steep slopes at a high angle

name: isolated
trans: 隔离的， 分离的； 与世隔绝的， 偏僻的； 孤立的， 孤独的； 个别的

sentences.english: small isolated communities
sentences.chinese: 偏僻的小社区

sentences.english: Not many people visit this isolated spot.
sentences.chinese: 没有多少人到这个偏僻的地方来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 隔离的， 分离的； 与世隔绝的， 偏僻的； 孤立的， 孤独的； 个别的
detailed_translations.english: an isolated building, village etc is far away from any others

name: classical
trans: 古典的； 传统的； 经典的

sentences.english: the classical theory of relativity
sentences.chinese: 经典相对论

detailed_translations.english: belonging to a traditional style or set of ideas

name: privilege
trans: 给予特权， 特别优待

sentences.english: He had no special privileges and was treated just like every other prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他不享受特权，待遇和任何其他犯人一样。

detailed_translations.english: a special advantage that is given only to one person or group of people

sentences.english: Germany brought on a substitute at half time.
sentences.chinese: 德国队在比赛半场时换上一名替补队员。

sentences.english: substitute goalkeeper
sentences.chinese: 替补守门员

detailed_translations.english: someone who does someone else’s job for a limited period of time, especially in a sports team or school
to use something new or diffe-rent instead of something else

name: discontinue
trans: 停止； 中断； 不连续

sentences.english: Bus route 51 is being discontinued.
sentences.chinese: 51 路公共汽车目前停止运营。

sentences.english: a discontinued china pattern
sentences.chinese: 不再使用的瓷器图案

detailed_translations.english: to stop doing, producing, or providing something

sentences.english: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的
detailed_translations.english: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

sentences.english: Some 4,000 firefighters are battling the blaze.
sentences.chinese: 约有四千名消防人员正在与大火搏斗。

sentences.english: the blaze of light from the security lamps
sentences.chinese: 安全灯的强光

sentences.english: The room was warm, with a fire blazing in the hearth.
sentences.chinese: 房间里暖融融的，壁炉里的火熊熊燃烧。

detailed_translations.english: a big dangerous fire – used especially in news reports
to burn very brightly and strongly

sentences.english: The police are investigating the mysterious deaths of children at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在调查这家医院的儿童神秘死亡事件。

sentences.english: Benson later disappeared in mysterious circumstances .
sentences.chinese: 本森后来就神秘地失踪了。

sentences.english: There’s something mysterious going on.
sentences.chinese: 出了件怪事。

detailed_translations.english: mysterious events or situations are difficult to explain or understand

name: scatter
trans: 散开， 驱散； 撒； 撒播

sentences.english: The sound of gunfire made the crowd scatter in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 枪声使人群四散奔逃。

detailed_translations.english: if a group of people or animals scatter, or if something scatters them, they move quickly in different directions

name: violate
trans: 违反， 违犯， 违背； 亵渎； 侵犯， 干扰

sentences.english: 34 protesters were arrested for violating criminal law.
sentences.chinese: 34名抗议者因违反刑法而被逮捕。

sentences.english: regimes that violate human rights
sentences.chinese: 侵犯人权的政权

detailed_translations.english: to disobey or do something against an official agreement, law, principle etc

sentences.english: He was steering with only one hand.
sentences.chinese: 他只用一只手在驾驶。

detailed_translations.english: to control the direction a vehicle is going, for example by turning a wheel

sentences.english: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.chinese: 人类历史上最重大的事件之一

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially something important, interesting or unusual

name: agency
trans: 机构； 代理， 代办

sentences.english: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
sentences.chinese: 负责为难民提供帮助的联合国机构

sentences.english: the Environmental Protection Agency
sentences.chinese: 环保局

detailed_translations.english: an organization or department, especially within a government, that does a specific job

name: coupon
trans: 优惠券； 票证； 配给券； 参赛表， 订货单

sentences.english: The coupon entitles you to ten cents off your next purchase.
sentences.chinese: 这张优惠券可以让你在下次购物时节省10分钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 息票；赠券；联票；[经] 配给券
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of printed paper that gives you the right to pay less for something or get something free

sentences.english: We can define burnout as exhaustion.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以把burnout (燃尽)解释为 exhaustion (耗尽)。

sentences.english: Could not this very Socratic way be  a sign of collapse, exhaustion, sickness, and the dissolution of the  anarchic instinct?
sentences.chinese: 这个非常苏格拉底式的方法不能是无法无天的天性的崩塌、耗尽、疾患和解体的一个信号？

detailed_translations.english: when all of something has been used

sentences.english: a fascinating book
sentences.chinese: 一本引人入胜的书

sentences.english: That sounds absolutely fascinating .
sentences.chinese: 那听起来极具吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 迷人的， 有极大吸引力的
detailed_translations.english: extremely interesting

name: abstract
trans: 摘要， 提炼； 抽象化

sentences.english: By the age of seven, children are capable of thinking in abstract terms .
sentences.chinese: 儿童到了七岁就具有抽象思维的能力。

sentences.english: Human beings are the only creatures capable of abstract thought (=  thinking about ideas  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人类是唯一具有抽象思维能力的动物。

detailed_translations.english: based on general ideas or principles rather than specific examples or real events

detailed_translations.chinese: 摘要，梗概；抽象派艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a painting, design etc which contains shapes or images that do not look like real things or people

sentences.english: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
sentences.chinese: 共和党人坚持自己的保守议题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 议程；日常工作事项；日程表
detailed_translations.english: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with

sentences.english: His hands were begrimed with oil and dirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的手被油和污物弄脏。

sentences.english: He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
sentences.chinese: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.english: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.english: Women, in general, tend to be more concerned than men about their personal appearance .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.english: She had an outward appearance of calm, but deep down she was really worried.
sentences.chinese: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.english: The metal posts spoiled the appearance of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.english: A garnish helps to enhance the appearance of any dish.
sentences.chinese: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.english: She’s the kind of woman who takes pride in her appearance .
sentences.chinese: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t judge by appearances .
sentences.chinese: 你不该以貌取人。

sentences.english: They work hard at school without giving the appearance of being particularly hard-working.
sentences.chinese: 他们在学校里学习很用功，只是表面上并不显得特别如此。

sentences.english: The case had all the appearances of a straightforward murder.
sentences.chinese: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.english: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.chinese: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.english: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

sentences.english: The industry has changed greatly with the appearance of new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 新技术问世后，这一行业出现了天翻地覆的变化。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone or something looks to other people

sentences.english: alluvial flood plains
sentences.chinese: 冲积泛滥平原

detailed_translations.english: made of soil left by rivers, lakes, floods etc

sentences.english: paint fumes
sentences.chinese: 油漆烟雾

detailed_translations.english: strong-smelling gas or smoke that is unpleasant to breathe in

sentences.english: fake fur
sentences.chinese: 人造毛皮

sentences.english: a fake ID card
sentences.chinese: 假身份证

sentences.english: a fake 20 dollar bill
sentences.chinese: 一张20美元的伪钞

detailed_translations.english: made to look like a real material or object in order to deceive people
a copy of a valuable object, painting etc that is intended to deceive people

detailed_translations.chinese: 伪造， 捏造； 伪装
detailed_translations.english: to make something seem real in order to deceive people

sentences.english: I worked with him over a span of six years.
sentences.chinese: 我和他共事达六年之久。

sentences.english: The bridge crosses the river in a single span.
sentences.chinese: 河上的桥为单跨桥。

detailed_translations.english: the length of time that sth lasts or is able to continue

name: bizarre
trans: 奇形怪状的； 怪诞的

sentences.english: a bizarre coincidence
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的巧合

sentences.english: dancers in rather bizarre costumes
sentences.chinese: 身着奇装异服的舞者

detailed_translations.english: very unusual or strange

sentences.english: The report ascribes the rise in childhood asthma to the increase in pollution.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告认为儿童哮喘发病率上升是因为污染加剧。

sentences.english: He ascribed his failure to bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 他认为自己的失败是运气不好。

detailed_translations.english: to claim that something is caused by a particular person, situation etc

name: poll
trans: 对…进行民意测验； 获得…选票
民意测验；政治选举，大选

sentences.english: A recent poll found that 80% of Californians support the governor.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一项民意调查发现80%的加利福尼亚人支持州长。

sentences.english: Polls indicate that education is the top issue with voters.
sentences.chinese: 民意调查显示，教育是选民心中的头等大事。

sentences.english: Labour is ahead in the polls.
sentences.chinese: 工党在民意调查中处于领先地位。

sentences.english: The latest public opinion poll showed that 25% of us consider ourselves superstitious.
sentences.chinese: 最新的民意调查显示我们中有25%的人认为自己迷信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 民意测验；政治选举，大选
detailed_translations.english: the process of finding out what people think about something by asking many people the same question, or the record of the result

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…进行民意测验； 获得
detailed_translations.english: to ask a lot of people the same questions in order to find out what they think about a subject

sentences.english: Gaelic is still spoken in Ireland by a tiny minority.
sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰仍有极少数人在说盖尔语。

detailed_translations.english: a small group of people or things within a much larger group

sentences.english: The allure and charm of Paris captivate all who visit there.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎的诱惑与魅力吸引了所有到此游玩的人。

sentences.english: The allure and charm of Paris captivate all who visit there.
sentences.chinese: 它的诱惑与魅力吸引了所有到那游玩的人。

name: stringent
trans: 严格的， 苛刻的； 紧缩的， 短缺的， 银根紧的； 迫切的

sentences.english: stringent anti-noise regulations
sentences.chinese: 严格的防噪音条例

detailed_translations.chinese: 严格的；严厉的；紧缩的；短缺的
detailed_translations.english: a stringent law, rule, standard etc is very strict and must be obeyed

name: preferable
trans: 更可取的， 更好的， 更合意的

sentences.english: Anything was preferable to the tense atmosphere at home.
sentences.chinese: 什么都比家里的紧张气氛好。

sentences.english: In warm weather, clothes made of natural fabrics are infinitely preferable (= much better ) .
sentences.chinese: 天气暖和的时候，穿天然织物的衣服要舒适得多。

detailed_translations.english: better or more suitable

name: reference
trans: 参考， 参考书目； 提及， 涉及； 证明书； 介绍

sentences.english: Keep their price list on file for future reference (= so that it can be looked at in the future ) ..
sentences.chinese: 将他们的价目表存档，以供日后参考。

sentences.english: There is no direct reference to her own childhood in the novel.
sentences.chinese: 小说里没有直接提及她自己的童年。

detailed_translations.english: the act of looking at sth for information

sentences.english: a combustion chamber
sentences.chinese: 燃烧室

sentences.english: The heart has four chambers.
sentences.chinese: 心脏有四个腔。

detailed_translations.chinese: （身体或器官内的）室，膛；房间；会所
detailed_translations.english: an enclosed space, especially in your body or inside a machine

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…关在室内；装填（弹药等）

sentences.english: We went out in spite of the rain.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下着雨，我们还是出去了。

sentences.english: Kelly loved her husband in spite of the fact that he drank too much.
sentences.chinese: 虽然丈夫酗酒，凯莉仍然爱着他。

sentences.english: She broke it just out of spite.
sentences.chinese: 她就是出于恶意把它打破的。

sentences.english: The neighbours throw things over the garden wall just to spite us.
sentences.chinese: 邻居把东西扔过花园围墙，故意和我们作对。

detailed_translations.english: without being affected or prevented by something
to deliberately annoy or upset someone

sentences.english: Contact your local branch to arrange an appointment.
sentences.chinese: 请联络当地分部安排预约。

sentences.english: I’d like to arrange a business loan.
sentences.chinese: 我想办理一笔商业贷款。

sentences.english: Matthew arrived at 2 o'clock as arranged.
sentences.chinese: 马修两点钟依约而至。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 准备； 整理
detailed_translations.english: to organize or make plans for something such as a meeting, party, or trip

name: trivialize
trans: 使显得不重要， 轻视， 淡化

sentences.english: The article trivializes the whole issue of equal rights.
sentences.chinese: 文章对平等权利这个大问题轻描淡写。

sentences.english: The debate has been trivialized by the media.
sentences.chinese: 那场辩论在媒体的报道中变得无关紧要。

detailed_translations.english: to make something seem less important or serious than it really is – used to show disapproval

name: publicity
trans: 宣传， 宣扬； 公众的注意， 名声

sentences.english: Much advance publicity was given to the talks.
sentences.chinese: 会谈之前做了大量的宣传。

sentences.english: ...government publicity campaigns.
sentences.chinese: …政府的宣传活动。

detailed_translations.english: Publicity is information or actions that are intended to attract the public's attention to someone or something

sentences.english: Flights by Air Europe depart Gatwick on Tuesdays.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲航空公司的航班每逢周二从盖特威克机场起飞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离开；出发，起程；违反；去世
detailed_translations.english: to leave, especially when you are starting a journey
a Chinese language spoken in Southern China
Cantonese means belonging or relating to the city of Canton or Guangdong province

name: incongruity
trans: 不和谐， 不相称； 不协调或不一致的事物

sentences.english: The incongruity of her situation struck Gina with unpleasant force.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜猛然意识到自己处境尴尬，心里很不舒服。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不调和的, 不适宜的
detailed_translations.english: the fact that something is strange, unusual, or unsuitable in a particular situation

name: commitment
trans: 委托； 许诺； 承担义务

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

sentences.english: fossils of early reptiles
sentences.chinese: 早期爬行动物的化石

sentences.english: Marine sponges have a long fossil record (= their development has been recorded over a long period ).
sentences.chinese: 海绵动物留下了漫长的化石记录。

detailed_translations.english: an animal or plant that lived many thousands of years ago and that has been preserved, or the shape of one of these animals or plants that has been preserved in rock

sentences.english: ...a garden spade.
sentences.chinese: …一把花园里使用的锹。

detailed_translations.english: a tool for digging that has a long handle and a broad metal blade that you push into the ground

name: collision
trans: 碰撞； 冲突， 抵触

sentences.english: Two people were killed in a head-on collision (= between two vehicles that are moving directly towards each other ) on highway 218.
sentences.chinese: 218号公路上有两辆汽车迎面相撞，两人死亡。

sentences.english: a collision between the two countries over fishing rights
sentences.chinese: 两国为捕鱼权而发生的冲突

detailed_translations.english: an accident in which two or more people or vehicles hit each other while moving in different directions

sentences.english: the company that manufactured the drug
sentences.chinese: 生产这种药的公司

sentences.english: manufactured goods
sentences.chinese: 工业品，制成品

sentences.english: Cost will determine the methods of manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 成本将决定生产方法。

sentences.english: a major importer of cotton manufactures
sentences.chinese: 棉花产品的主要进口商

detailed_translations.english: to use machines to make goods or materials, usually in large numbers or amounts
the process of making goods or materials using machines, usually in large numbers or amounts

sentences.english: The people have grown intolerant in recent weeks of the king's autocratic ways.
sentences.chinese: 最近几周，民众越来越难以忍受国王的专制行径。

detailed_translations.english: An autocratic person or organization has complete power and makes decisions without asking anyone else's advice

sentences.english: I have a touch of arthritis in the wrist.
sentences.chinese: 我的手腕有轻微关节炎。

detailed_translations.english: a disease that causes the joints of your body to become swollen and very painful

sentences.english: A potato has about 90 calories.
sentences.chinese: 一个马铃薯大约有90卡路里的热量。

sentences.english: a calorie-controlled diet
sentences.chinese: 控制热量的日常饮食

sentences.english: I need to burn off a few calories (= lose some weight by exercising ) .
sentences.chinese: 我要消耗掉一些卡路里。

sentences.english: My wife convinced me to finally start counting calories (= control my weight by being careful about what I eat ) .
sentences.chinese: 我妻子终于说服我开始计算卡路里、控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring the amount of  energy  that food will produce

sentences.english: Professor Lanphier obtained his doctorate in social psychology from the University of Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 兰菲尔教授从密歇根大学获得了社会心理学博士学位。

detailed_translations.english: a university degree of the highest level

name: intervention
trans: 干涉， 干预， 介入

sentences.english: government intervention to regulate prices
sentences.chinese: 政府介入控制物价

detailed_translations.english: the act of becoming involved in an argument, fight, or other difficult situation in order to change what happens

sentences.english: an advertising slogan
sentences.chinese: 一句广告口号

sentences.english: demonstrators shouting political slogans
sentences.chinese: 高喊政治口号的示威者

sentences.english: the Democrats’ campaign slogan
sentences.chinese: 民主党的竞选口号

detailed_translations.english: a short phrase that is easy to remember and is used in advertisements, or by politicians, organizations etc

name: overfill
trans: 装得太多， 装到满溢

sentences.english: He had overfilled the jug.
sentences.chinese: 他把罐子装得太满了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装得太多， 装到满溢
detailed_translations.english: to put too much of something into a container

name: advice
trans: 劝告， 忠告； 建议， 意见

sentences.english: You should have followed my advice.
sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

sentences.english: He said that all metals were composed of mercury and sulphur in different proportions .
sentences.chinese: 他说一切金属都是由水银和硫黄按不同比例构成的。

sentences.english: Here they endure long hours at dangerous jobs, wringing flecks of gold from the dirt with mercury.
sentences.chinese: 他们每天在这种危险的环境下工作很长时间，从带有水银的泥沙中淘出金沙。

sentences.english: Because glass mercury thermometers harm both humans and the environment, they have been phased out and are no longer recommended.
sentences.chinese: 因为玻璃水银温度计对于人类和环境都有害处，现在已经逐步被淘汰不再建议使用了。

detailed_translations.english: Mercury is a silver-coloured liquid metal that is used especially in thermometers and barometers

name: frequent
trans: 频繁的， 常见的， 常用的

sentences.english: Trains rushed past at frequent intervals .
sentences.chinese: 火车频频驶过。

sentences.english: She was a frequent visitor to the house.
sentences.chinese: 她是家里的常客。

detailed_translations.english: happening or doing something often
to go to a particular place often

name: interact
trans: 相互作用； 相互影响

sentences.english: While the other children interacted and played together, Ted ignored them.
sentences.chinese: 当其他孩子们相互交往、一起玩耍时，泰德却不理他们。

detailed_translations.english: if people interact with each other, they talk to each other, work together etc

name: membership
trans: 会员身份； 全体会员

sentences.english: You should carry your membership card with you at all times.
sentences.chinese: 你应该随身携带会员卡。

sentences.english: Membership fees are being increased this year.
sentences.chinese: 会费今年提高了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 会员身份， 会籍； 全体会员， 会员数
detailed_translations.english: when someone is a member of a club, group, or organization

sentences.english: She got insanely jealous and there was a terrible fight.
sentences.chinese: 她变得过分地猜忌，接着是一场激烈的打斗。

detailed_translations.chinese: 妒忌的；猜疑的；唯恐失去的；戒备的
detailed_translations.english: feeling unhappy because someone has something that you wish you had

name: trace
trans: 追踪，追查；追溯；描摹，标出

sentences.english: There was no trace of anyone having entered the room since then.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何迹象表明在那以后有人进过这房间。

sentences.english: Petra’s lost all trace of her German accent.
sentences.chinese: 彼得拉已完全没有德国口音。

sentences.english: Officers were unable to find any trace of drugs.
sentences.chinese: 警察未能找到毒品的蛛丝马迹。

sentences.english: I saw the faintest trace of a smile cross Sandra’s face.
sentences.chinese: 我看到桑德拉的脸上闪过一丝微笑。

sentences.english: We finally traced him to an address in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于追查到他在芝加哥的一个地址。

detailed_translations.english: a small sign that shows that someone or something was present or existed
to find or discover sb/sth by looking carefully for them/it

name: atmospheric
trans: 大气的， 空气的； 大气层的； 大气所引起的

sentences.english: atmospheric pressure
sentences.chinese: 大气压力

detailed_translations.english: relating to the Earth’s atmosphere

sentences.english: make-up arrayed on the bathroom counter
sentences.chinese: 盥洗台上摆放整齐的化妆品

sentences.english: We visited the local markets and saw wonderful arrays of fruit and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了当地的市场，看到了漂亮地摆放着的水果蔬菜。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange something in an attractive way
An array of objects is a collection of them that is displayed or arranged in a particular way.

name: endeavour
trans: 努力， 尽力； 尝试

sentences.english: But I will endeavour to banish every painful thought, and think only of what will make me happy: your affection, and the invariable kindness of my dear uncle and aunt.
sentences.chinese: 可是我一定会竭力打消一切苦痛的念头，只去想一些能使我高兴的事───譬如想想你的亲切以及亲爱的舅父母对我始终如一的关切。

detailed_translations.chinese: 竭力做到，试图或力图（做某事）
detailed_translations.english: to try very hard

sentences.english: Under federal law, it is illegal to discriminate against minorities and women.
sentences.chinese: 联邦法律规定，歧视少数民族和妇女是违法的。

sentences.english: He is incapable of discriminating between a good idea and a terrible one.
sentences.chinese: 他没能力在一个好主意和一个坏主意之间进行区分。

detailed_translations.english: to treat a person or group differently from another in an unfair way

name: steam
trans: 发出蒸汽； 行驶； 用蒸汽开动

sentences.english: Steam rose from the hot tub.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸气从热腾腾的浴缸里升起。

detailed_translations.english: the hot mist that water produces when it is boiled
if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot
if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot

sentences.english: soldiers learning camouflage technique
sentences.chinese: 在学习伪装技术的士兵

sentences.english: the camouflage netting over the tanks
sentences.chinese: 坦克上的伪装网

detailed_translations.english: a way of hiding something, especially soldiers and military equipment, by using paint, leaves etc to make it look like the things around it
to hide something, especially by making it look the same as the things around it, or by making it seem like something else

sentences.english: Police have been tracking the four criminals all over Central America.
sentences.chinese: 警方一直在中美洲到处追捕这四名罪犯。

detailed_translations.english: to search for a person or animal by following the marks they leave behind them on the ground, their smell etc
a line of marks left on the ground by a moving person, animal, or vehicle

name: enslave
trans: 奴役， 征服， 使受控制

sentences.english: She seemed enslaved by hatred.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎被仇恨所左右。

detailed_translations.chinese: 束缚；征服；使某人成为奴隶
detailed_translations.english: to make someone a slave

sentences.chinese: 安娜走到一扇窗前，跳出去，落到一个擦玻璃工人用的滑车中。她把自己提到空中，看着一些船到来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment consisting of a wheel over which a rope or chain is pulled to lift heavy things

name: collateral
trans: 并行的； 间接的， 附带的

sentences.chinese: 这项计划可能有附带的益处。

detailed_translations.english: relating to something or happening as a result of it, but not as important

detailed_translations.chinese: 抵押品；[法] 担保品；旁系亲属
detailed_translations.english: property or other goods that you promise to give someone if you cannot pay back the money they lend you

sentences.english: Nick rolled down his window and spat.
sentences.chinese: 尼克摇下窗子，啐了口唾沫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吐痰；吐口水；发出劈啪声

the watery liquid that is produced in your mouth

name: congestion
trans: 拥挤， 充塞； 充血

sentences.english: The problems of traffic congestion will not disappear in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 交通堵塞问题不会很快消失。

detailed_translations.english: If there is congestion in a place, the place is extremely crowded and blocked with traffic or people

name: scout
trans: 侦察； 寻找； 搜索

sentences.english: He sent three scouts ahead to take a look at the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他派出三名侦察兵到前面侦察大桥的情况。

detailed_translations.chinese: 搜索，侦察；侦察员；侦察机

to examine a place or area in order to get information about it

name: scour
trans: 四处搜寻， 细查； 擦洗， 擦亮； 冲刷出， 冲刷成

sentences.english: Ada was scouring out the pans.
sentences.chinese: 阿达在擦锅。

detailed_translations.english: to clean something very thoroughly by rubbing it with a rough material

detailed_translations.chinese: 擦，冲刷；洗涤剂；（畜类等的）腹泻
detailed_translations.english: the act of scouring

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

name: fleet
trans: 疾驰， 飞逝， 掠过

sentences.english: Atalanta was fleet of foot (= able to run quickly ) .
sentences.chinese: 阿塔兰特跑起来很快。

detailed_translations.english: fast or quick
a group of ships, or all the ships in a navy

name: couple
trans: 连接， 联合， 结合； 结婚

sentences.english: a newly married couple
sentences.chinese: 一对新婚夫妇

sentences.english: the couple next door
sentences.chinese: 隔壁的那对夫妇

detailed_translations.english: two people who are married or having a sexual or romantic relationship

name: jerk
trans: 急推， 急扭； 抽搐

sentences.english: Wilcox jerked his head to indicate that they should move on.
sentences.chinese: 威尔科克斯扭扭头，示意他们该走了。

sentences.english: ‘Is that the only way out of here?’ he asked, jerking a thumb at the door.
sentences.chinese: “那是这里唯一的出口吗？”他用拇指指了指门口问道。

sentences.english: The sound of the phone jerked me awake.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃声突然把我吵醒了。

detailed_translations.english: to move with a quick sudden movement, or to make part of your body move in this way

detailed_translations.chinese: 急推， 急拉， 急扭

sentences.english: a rural setting
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境

sentences.english: rural bus routes
sentences.chinese: 乡村公共汽车路线

detailed_translations.english: happening in or relating to the countryside, not the city

sentences.english: He was blonder than his brother.
sentences.chinese: 他的头发比哥哥的还黄。

detailed_translations.chinese: 亚麻色的；金色的；白皙的；白肤金发碧眼的
detailed_translations.english: blonde hair is pale or yellow in colour
a woman with pale or yellow-coloured hair

sentences.english: His work was acclaimed by art critics.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品得到艺术评论家的推崇。

sentences.english: Angela Bassett has won critical acclaim for her excellent performance.
sentences.chinese: 安杰拉·巴西特因她出色的表演而赢得了评论界的赞扬。

detailed_translations.english: to praise someone or something publicly
Acclaim is public praise for someone or something

sentences.english: sulphuric acid
sentences.chinese: 硫酸

sentences.english: a juicy apple with a slightly acid flavour
sentences.chinese: 一个多汁、略带酸味的苹果

sentences.english: I was expecting another of his acid remarks, but he remained silent.
sentences.chinese: 我等着他再说一句刻薄的话，但他不吭声了。

having a sharp sour taste

sentences.english: There is no heating available due to fuel shortages.
sentences.chinese: 因为燃料短缺，所以没有供暖。

sentences.english: There is no shortage of funds.
sentences.chinese: 不缺资金。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is not enough of something that people need

sentences.english: industrial townscapes
sentences.chinese: 工业化的城市面貌

sentences.english: Edinburgh’s historic townscape
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的历史风貌

detailed_translations.english: the way a town or large parts of a town look

name: insecure
trans: 不安全的， 不可靠的

sentences.english: Many of them work in low-paid insecure jobs.
sentences.chinese: 他们当中的许多人都做着薪水低、不稳定的工作。

to graze (land) beyond its capacity to sustain stock

name: dubious
trans: 怀疑的； 靠不住的， 不确定的

sentences.english: The firm was accused of dubious accounting practices.
sentences.chinese: 该公司被指控有不诚实的会计行为。

sentences.english: Many critics regard this argument as dubious or, at best, misleading.
sentences.chinese: 许多批评家认为这一论点靠不住，或者说至少有误导性。

sentences.english: The assumption that growth in one country benefits the whole world is highly dubious .
sentences.chinese: 一国的经济增长会对全世界有益的假设是很值得怀疑的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀疑的， 犹豫不决的， 无把握的； 有问题的； 靠不住的
detailed_translations.english: probably not honest, true, right etc

name: swift
trans: 快的； 敏捷的， 迅速的

sentences.english: My letter received a swift reply.
sentences.chinese: 我的信很快就得到了回复。

sentences.english: She shot a swift glance at Paul.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速瞥了保罗一眼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done quickly and immediately

sentences.english: Today, doctors are fearing a worldwide epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 如今，医生们在担心一次世界性的流行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遍及地球的， 世界范围的
detailed_translations.english: Worldwide is also an adjective

sentences.english: the earth’s finite resources
sentences.chinese: 地球有限的资源

detailed_translations.chinese: 有限的， 有限制的； 限定的
detailed_translations.english: having an end or a limit

sentences.english: The problems in our schools do not have a simple remedy.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校的问题没有简单的解决办法。

sentences.english: To remedy the situation, the water must be chemically treated.
sentences.chinese: 为了改善这种情况，水必须进行化学处理。

detailed_translations.english: a way of dealing with a problem or making a bad situation better
to deal with a problem or improve a bad situation

trans: 可耗尽的， 会枯竭的

sentences.english: Your willpower is an exhaustible supply, so don't force yourself to finish tasks if you don't have to.
sentences.chinese: 你的意志力是会枯竭的，所以如果没有必要，不要强迫自己完成任务。

sentences.english: For the coal is an exhaustible resource, Determination of its rational mining scale, its sustainable exploitation and utilization have caught extensive attentions of governments and theorists.
sentences.chinese: 煤炭资源是一种可耗竭性资源，如何确定其合理的开采规模，实现可持续开发和利用已经引起政府和学术界的广泛关注。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可耗尽的， 会枯竭的

sentences.english: A benevolent uncle paid for her to have music lessons.
sentences.chinese: 一位叔叔慷慨解囊，出钱供她上音乐课。

sentences.english: a benevolent smile
sentences.chinese: 慈祥的笑容

detailed_translations.english: kind and generous

sentences.english: The boys showed a complete lack of respect for authority.
sentences.chinese: 这些男孩子根本无视权威。

trans: 熔化， 熔合； 聚变

sentences.english: Her work is a fusion of several different styles.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品是几种不同风格的融合。

sentences.english: the best fusion cuisine in the whole of Vancouver

detailed_translations.chinese: 融合；熔化；熔接；融合物；[物] 核聚变
detailed_translations.english: a combination of separate qualities or ideas

sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢德夫，他好像也不喜欢我。

sentences.english: The two men were a mutual admiration society , gushing about how much they were learning from each other.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人互相吹捧，盛赞对方让自己受益匪浅。

detailed_translations.english: mutual feelings such as respect, trust, or hatred are feelings that two or more people have for each other

sentences.chinese: 周围炮弹四处飞落，我们奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: an exploding mortar shell
sentences.chinese: 一枚爆炸的迫击炮弹

sentences.english: Their car was bigger and therefore more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他们的车大些，所以更舒适些。

sentences.english: Progress so far has been very good. We are, therefore, confident that the work will be completed on time.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止进展十分顺利，所以我们有把握按时完成工作。

name: exchange
trans: 交换，调换；交易；兑换；交流；谈话，争论
交换， 调换； 交易； 兑换； 交流

sentences.english: We exchange gifts at Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 我们在圣诞节时交换礼物。

sentences.english: It’s a place where people can chat and exchange ideas.
sentences.chinese: 在这个地方人们可以聊天和交流想法。

sentences.english: Four of my cassettes for your Madonna CD is a fair exchange.
sentences.chinese: 我用四盒磁带换你的麦当娜激光唱片很公平。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone something and receive the same kind of thing from them at the same time
the act of giving someone something and receiving something else from them

sentences.english: I hesitate.
sentences.chinese: 我犹豫。

detailed_translations.english: to be slow to speak or act because you feel uncertain or nervous

name: incendiary
trans: 放火的， 能引起燃烧的； 煽动性的

sentences.chinese: 阵雨般的燃烧弹击中了歌剧院。

detailed_translations.chinese: 燃烧弹；纵火犯，放火者；煽动者

an incendiary speech, piece of writing etc is intended to make people angry

sentences.chinese: 孩子们跑下黄颜色的校车，奔跑进了操场。

detailed_translations.english: to run with quick short steps, like a child or small animal

trans: 懒散地站； 低头垂肩地站

sentences.chinese: 你坐下时尽量不要无精打采。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下垂；笨拙的人，懒散的人；懒散的样子

detailed_translations.english: to stand, sit, or walk with a slouch

trans: 人名地址录； 号码簿

sentences.chinese: 我在电话簿上找不到你的电话号码。

sentences.english: a new business directory
sentences.chinese: 新的商业名录

detailed_translations.english: a book or list of names, facts etc, usually arranged in alphabetical order

sentences.english: If they wanted to eat something sweet, they had tolocate a beehive, smoke out the bees and retrieve the honey, often byclimbing up a tree or chopping it down.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们想吃某些甜东西，就必须找到一个蜂箱，用烟把蜜蜂熏出来，取出蜂蜜，往往还要爬上树或把蜂窝砍下来。

sentences.english: The spirit of a beehive, the behavior of an economy, the thinking of a supercomputer, and the life in me are distributed over a multitude of smaller units (which themselves may be distributed).
sentences.chinese: 蜂窝精神，经济体的行为，超级电脑的思维，还有我内在的生命分布在众多更小的单元上（这些单元自身可能也会被再分布）。

sentences.english: Its other green initiatives have included a rooftop garden, beehive, and rooftop composting of the restaurant's food scraps. The nightclub has a landfill diversion rate of 89 percent.
sentences.chinese: 其他的绿色运动包括屋顶花园、蜂窝以及利用餐厅食物残渣在屋顶进行堆肥项目。这家夜总会的垃圾填埋转移率达到89%。

detailed_translations.english: a structure where  bee s  are kept for producing  honey

name: behave
trans: 表现； 运转； 起作用； 表现得体； 使检点

sentences.english: She behaved in a very responsible way .
sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应
detailed_translations.english: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc
The way that you behave is the way that you do and say things, and the things that you do and say

sentences.english: laser surgery
sentences.chinese: 激光(外科)手术

detailed_translations.english: a beam of light produced by a laser

sentences.english: The town is a mixture of the old and the new.
sentences.chinese: 这个小城新旧结合。

detailed_translations.english: a combination of two or more different things, feelings, or types of people

name: scope
trans: 眼界， 见识； 范围； 余地， 机会

sentences.english: measures to limit the scope of criminals’ activities
sentences.chinese: 限制罪犯活动范围的措施

detailed_translations.english: the range of things that a subject, activity, book etc deals with

name: democratic
trans: 民主的， 有民主精神的

sentences.english: a democratic government
sentences.chinese: 民主政府

sentences.english: the role of the media in the democratic process
sentences.chinese: 民主进程中媒体的作用

detailed_translations.english: controlled by representatives who are elected by the people of a country

name: expectancy
trans: 期待， 期望； 预期数额
